GSP28mimsvtku:4248: uta bādhyabādhakabhāva iti. tatra vikalpa iti prāptam. tathā hi -- na tāvad ekārthayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4249: samuccayaḥ sambhavati. na ca pākṣikānugrahasambhave ātyantiko bādhaḥ. āhavanīyo hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4250: sāmānyaśāstreṇa vartmahomam apy āskandatīti na tasyātyantabādho nyāyyaḥ. ato vikalpa
GSP28mimsvtku:4251: iti prāpte uktaṃ - yad etad aviśeṣeṇāhavanīyaśāstraṃ tadārād viśeṣaśiṣṭaṃ syād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4252: dūre viśeṣaśiṣṭasyety arthaḥ. viśeṣaśiṣṭaṃ vartmahomaṃ nāskandatīti yāvat. kutaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4253: anyāyyatvād vikalpasya. katham anyāyyatā. lakṣaṇayā hi sāmānyaśāstraṃ viśeṣaśāstreṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4254: pravartate. tat teṣu sandigdham ayaṃ vā viśeṣo 'sya viṣaya iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4255: viśeṣaśāstraṃ tu niścitaviṣayam. ato vaiṣamyān na vikalpaḥ. ata eva sāmānyavacanaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4256: śabdo durbalaḥ iti vakṣyati. tasmāt siddham āhavanīyo bādhyata iti. tathā kvacit
GSP28mimsvtku:4257: puruṣaśīrṣam upadadhātīti viśeṣavacanasāmarthyāt śavaśarīra[558]sparśanaṃ smṛtipratiṣiddham api kriyata eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4258: sāmānyaniṣedhadaurbalyād iti śirovad ity uktam iti. idaṃ tv iha vācyam.[559]keyaṃ sādhanāṃśagāminī hiṃseti. yadi śyenādayaḥ na,
GSP28mimsvtku:4259: teṣām ahiṃsātvenoktatvāt. satyam. pradhānapaśuhiṃsaiva tatrodāharaṇam. yathā vāyavyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4260: śvetam ālabheteti. idaṃ ca śyenodāharaṇam asatsu bhāryāpahārādimanyuhetuṣu anarthatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4261: darśayitavyam. ātatāyivadhe doṣābhāvasmaraṇāt. ṣaṭsvabhicaran na pated iti baudhāyanāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4271: prakāśaṃ vāprakāśaṃ vā manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati //
GSP28mimsvtku:4272: {1,182}iti. nanv asaty api niṣedhe kimaṃśadvayagāminī hiṃsānartho na bhavatīty ata āha -- niṣedheneti // 232 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4273: atra kāraṇam āha -- pratyakṣāder iti. nānārthatve pratyakṣādīni kramante. na cāpramāṇako
GSP28mimsvtku:4274: 'rthaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyata iti. pratyakṣādyaśaktim eva darśayati -- na hīti. na hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4277: nanv asaty api doṣadarśane bāhyahiṃsānām anarthatvadarśanāc coditāsv api vicikitsā jāyata eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4278: ata āha -- bāhye 'pīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nātra vicikitsāyāṃ kiñcit kāraṇam. śāstrād
GSP28mimsvtku:4279: eva bāhye 'pi vicikitsā. aṅgahiṃsāpi śāstravihitaiveti nirvicikitsam anuṣṭhātavyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4280: nanu pratyakṣam eva hiṃsyamānasya duḥkhitatvam upalabhyate. ataḥ kartur api tato
GSP28mimsvtku:4281: duḥkhitvam anumāsyāmahe. kriyānurūpaṃ hi kartṝṇāṃ phalam iti mahājanaprasiddham. yathā cāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:4282: tathā ca nārīṣv api siddham etat karoti yo yallabhate 'py asau tat /
GSP28mimsvtku:4283: yat karmabījaṃ vapate manuṣyas tasyānurūpāṇi phalāni bhuṅkte //
GSP28mimsvtku:4285: ata āha -- hiṃsyamānasyeti syādantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yad etad hiṃsyamānasya duḥkhitvadarśanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4286: tena kartuḥ duḥkhitvānumānam ayuktam. vyāptaliṅgadarśanābhāvāt. na hi hiṃsyamānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4287: duḥkhitā kartur bhaviṣyatā duḥkhena vyāptāvagateti. pratyakṣadarśanānusāreṇa tu viparyaya
GSP28mimsvtku:4290: 183}sphuṭaṃ sukham evopalabhyate. ataḥ kālāntare 'pi hiṃsā sukhakarī,
GSP28mimsvtku:4291: hiṃsātvād adyavad iti śakyate prayogo vaktum ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tadānīm iti // 234 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4292: atra kaścid anumānakuśala āha -- kriyāviśeṣāḥ khalu viṣayānurūpaphaladāyino dṛṣṭāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4293: yathā dānādayaḥ śāstroktāḥ. dānaṃ hi sampradānāparanāmānaṃ viṣayaṃ sukhayatīti pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:4294: avagatam. tac ca kālāntare dātuḥ parāṃ prītimādhāsyatīti śāstrād avagamyate. hiṃsāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4295: ca kriyāviśeṣaḥ. ato yādṛgasyā viṣaye hiṃsye karmaṇi phalaṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4300: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- ya evam iti. evaṃvādino hetur anaikāntikaḥ. kriyāviśeṣāṇām api
GSP28mimsvtku:4302: ca gurvaṅganādau tadātve prītidarśanāt. surāpānasyāpi yadi peyā suraiva viṣayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4303: na tasya duḥkham aduḥkhaṃ veti viṣayānurūpaphaladāyitvam evam ādīnāṃ asiddham iti vipakṣair ebhir vyabhicāritā hetor iti // 236 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4304: viruddhaś cāyaṃ hetur ity āha -- viruddheti. kathaṃ viruddhatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4305: ata āha -- yādṛg iti. dṛṣṭāntānusāreṇa hi hetur gamako bhavati. dānaṃ cātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ. ato yādṛśaṃ dāne phalam avagataṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4306: hiṃsāyām api tādṛg eva phalaṃ bhaved iti. tādṛktvam eva phalasya darśayati -- vidhigamyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4307: dāne hi vidhigamyaphalāvāptir avagatā. tad idaṃ vyāptibalena hiṃsāyām api prāpnotīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4308: vidhibalena tv arthaphalatvam eva hiṃsāyā avagamyate. ato nānarthatvaṃ sidhyatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:4310: 184}-- aduḥkheti. tatheti. vidhigamyaphalāvāptau satyām aguḥkhātmatety arthaḥ. na hi duḥkhātmake phale vidhiḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavatīti // 237 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4311: evaṃ tāvaddhetudoṣāv uktau. idānīṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣaṃ darśayati -- na ceti. viṣayānurūpaphaladāyitā
GSP28mimsvtku:4312: hy atra sādhyate. dāne ca sampradānaṃ viṣayaḥ. na ca dānaṃ dātari tadanurūpaṃ phalam abhiniṣpādayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4313: tato viśiṣṭatamasya mahato 'bhyudayasya dātari niṣpatteḥ. alpā hi prītir gāṃ gṛhītavato
GSP28mimsvtku:4314: bhavati. dātus tu tāṃ pātrasātkṛtavataḥ savatsaromasammitāni tāni vatsarāṇi svargo
GSP28mimsvtku:4315: bhavatīti śāstrānusāreṇāvagamyate. kvacit tu samadviguṇasāhasrānantāni phalāny abrāhmaṇabrāhmaṇaśrotriyavedapāragebhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4316: iti sādhyahīno dṛṣṭānta iti. api caikārthenaiva sādhyapadena pakṣasapakṣayor vyāptiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4317: kathyate. iha ca dṛṣṭānte dāne sampradānaṃ viṣayaśabdasyārthaḥ. hiṃsane tu hiṃsyamānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4318: karma. na caitad yuktam ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- sampradānam iti vaiṣamyamantena. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:4319: tu vaiṣamyaparihārārthaṃ pakṣe 'pi sampradānam eva viṣayaśabdasyārtho bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:4320: tataḥ sisādhayiṣitānarthaviparītapratijñānād viruddhaḥ pakṣo bhaved ity āha -- sampradāne
GSP28mimsvtku:4321: iti. viruddhatām eva sphuṭayati -- prīyata iti. agnīṣomadevatāsampradānako hi paśuyāgaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4323: api prītikarī hiṃseti pratijñātaṃ bhavet. evañ ca nānarthakaratvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4324: prītiphalasyānarthatvāsambhavāt. ato viruddhaḥ pakṣo bhaved iti. kiṃ punar idaṃ devatādhikaraṇaviparītavigrahavattvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4325: ihābhipretya devatā[563]prīyata[564]ity ucyate. yady api anirākaraṇātmakaṃ sampradānaṃ devatā syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:4327: 185}śrutisamavāyitvāt karmasu. ata āha -- iti sthitaṃ taveti. satyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4328: nāyaṃ siddhāntaḥ. tava tu sāṅkhyasya sthitam idaṃ[565]yad devatā prīyata iti. atas te pakṣo viruddha iti // 240 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4335: pūrvaṃ tāvad ubhayatra sampradāne viṣayaśabdārthe doṣa uktaḥ. karmavacanatve doṣam āha -- dṛṣṭānta iti. yadi hi dāne karmaiva viṣayo bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:4336: tatas tasya dīyamānasya gavāder na kiñcit phalam iti na tadanurūpaphalasādhanaṃ yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4337: ity abhiprāyaḥ. viruddhāvyabhicārī cāyaṃ hetur ity āha -- japahomādīti. japādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:4338: hi kriyāviśeṣā na pareṣāṃ pīḍānugrahayor vartante. coditatvamātreṇaiva[566] tu te
GSP28mimsvtku:4339: 'rthatayāvagatāḥ. atas taddṛṣṭāntenaiva coditā hiṃsā artha iti śakyate sādhayitum.
GSP28mimsvtku:4340: ato viruddhāvyabhicāritā. na cātra viṣayānurūpam etat phalam iti śakyate vaktum.
GSP28mimsvtku:4341: viṣaye phalādarśanāt. japasya yadi tāvajjapyamānaṃ viṣayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4342: kiṃ tasya phalam. anyasya tu na kasyacit pīḍānugrahau dṛśyete. ata evoktaṃ parapīḍādivarjanād
GSP28mimsvtku:4343: iti. evaṃvidhaṃ dṛṣṭāntam āsādya coditatvasya hetutvaṃ sambhavatīti viruddhāvyabhicārī
GSP28mimsvtku:4344: hetur bhavati. bhavati ca prayogaḥ -- daikṣapaśuhiṃsā arthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4348: api ca vidhiniṣedhapramāṇakayor dharmādharmayor anumānopanyāso 'tidūram apabhraṣṭa ity āha -- vihiteti // 242 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4349: api ca viṣayānurūpaphalavādinā pīḍānugrahanibandhanaṃ dharmādharmatvam āśritam. evañ ca jape śīdhupāne cānyatarābhāvād ubhayānugrahatā na syād ity āha -- anugrahād iti // 243 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4350: {1,186} gurudāragāmināṃ[567]ca parānugrahād eva mahān dharmo bhaved ity āha -- krośateti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4351: gurudārābhigāmino hi sasādhvasasya hṛdayaṃ śabdāyata iveti krośatety uktam. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:4352: brūyād gurvaṅganāgāmino hi brāhmaṇam iva ghnato hṛdayakrośanam upalabhyate. hiṃsā
GSP28mimsvtku:4355: iti. tatredam uttaraṃ krośatā hṛdayenāpīti. evaṃ hi manyate -- viṣayānurūpaṃ cet karmaṇāṃ phalam,
GSP28mimsvtku:4356: evaṃ sati krośatāpi hṛdayena gurvaṅganāgāmī viṣayasyāṅganāyā mahāntam upakāraṃ janayatīti dhārmiko bhavet. hṛdayakrośanād asyādharmo 'py anumīyata iti ced,
GSP28mimsvtku:4358: kriyāṇām iti vyāptyasiddhiḥ. ataś cānaikāntiko hetuḥ. viruddhārthahetudvayasamāveśe[569]ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4359: dharmādharmatvasaṃśayo bhavet. ato na pīḍānugrahanibandhanaṃ dharmādharmatvam iti // 244 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4365: na kāraṇam upalabhāmahe. adharmānuṣṭhānabuddhyā hi tad bhavati. ānumānikadharmādharmavādinaś
GSP28mimsvtku:4366: ca nādharmabuddhau kiñcin nibandhanam asti. śāstrānusāreṇa hi tanniścayaḥ. ucchāstraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4367: pravartamānasyādharmam ācarāmīti hṛtkampo na jāyate. itarathā tu paropakāritvād asya
GSP28mimsvtku:4368: hṛdayasya prasāda eva jāyata ity āha -- anumāneti // 245 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4369: nanu yad eva svasmin parasmin vānuṣṭhīyamānaṃ pīḍām āvahati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4370: sa evādharmaḥ. ata evātmahiṃsāpy adharmaḥ. tad iha yad api paropakāro dṛśyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4371: 187}tu hṛdayakrośāt pīḍopalabhyata ity adharmatvam. evañ cādharmatve pīḍopapattir
GSP28mimsvtku:4372: ity ata āha -- pīḍāta iti. anapekṣitaśāstrasya prāgadharmajñānotpattinimittābhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4374: tad eva kin nimittam. saiva pīḍā adharmatve nimittam iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:4375: tad iha pīḍādharmatvayor ekatarasyāpi mūlāntarāsambhavād duruttaram itaretarāśrayam aśāstraparatantrasyāpadyata iti // 246 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4376: api ca[570]yadi saty api paropakāre kartur udvegadarśanād gurvaṅganāgamanam adharmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4377: tarhi yasyāto mlecchāder udvego na jāyate tasyādharmotpattir na syād ity āha -- evamādāv
GSP28mimsvtku:4378: iti. śāstrajñasyaiva śāstrānusāryudvego jāyate. tadanabhijñasya tadabhāvād apramāṇako
GSP28mimsvtku:4382: ato vimucyānugrahapīḍe tadabhāvaṃ ca dharmādharmajñānārthibhir vidhiniṣedhāv evānusartavyāv
GSP28mimsvtku:4383: ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. ayam arthaḥ -- nānugraho dharmatve kāraṇaṃ pīḍā vā adharmatve,
GSP28mimsvtku:4384: anugrahābhāvo vā pīḍābhāvamātraṃ vā dharmādharmatva iti // 248 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4385: atra vadanti -- nānumānena hiṃsādīnām adharmatvaṃ sādhyate. kin tu śāstrānusāreṇaiva. niṣedhaśāstreṇa hiṃsāyāḥ pratyavāyaśaktir avagatā. sarvā
GSP28mimsvtku:4386: 188}tīrthātīrthagatā hiṃsaiva. ataḥ kathaṃ hiṃsā satī kācit pratyavāyaṃ na janayiṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4387: na hi daikṣapaśuhiṃsāvidhānaṃ vastunaḥ śaktim utsārayitum utsahate vidyamānadravya[571]guṇādiśaktimātropadeśitvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4388: śāstrāṇām. naiṣāṃ śaktyāvāpodvāpayor vyāpāraḥ. atas tad evedaṃ na hiṃsyād iti śāstropadarśitapratyavāyahetutvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4390: rmaṇī)ti[572]śāstrānudhāvanenaiva hiṃsādīnām adharmatvaṃ kalpyata iti. tad etad upanyasyati
GSP28mimsvtku:4391: -- kvacid iti trayeṇa. kvacid bāhyahiṃsāyāṃ niṣiddhatvāt pratyavāyahetutve hiṃsāyāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4392: śaktir bodhitā na vidhānād apagacchatīti sambandha iti // 251 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4396: evam upanyasya nirasyati -- evam iti dvayena. evaṃvādino hi na surāṃ pibed iti niṣedhaśāstrāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4397: surāpānasya pratyavāyaśaktir avagateti śūdro 'pi tāṃ piban pratyaveyāt. tathā vaiśyastomena
GSP28mimsvtku:4399: viprarājanyayor api tatphalaṃ bhavet. na caitad iṣyate. tathā kālabhedena śaktibhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4400: dṛṣṭaḥ. iṣṭyor darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ parvaṇi śakteḥ pañcamyāṃ cāśakteḥ. agnihotrasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4401: sāyaṃprātaranuṣṭhitasya phalasādhanatvān madhyāhne ca tadabhāvāt. ato yathāśāstram
GSP28mimsvtku:4403: tasmāt śāstrānusāreṇaiva karmaṇāṃ phalaśaktir āstheyety upasaṃharati. -- tasmād iti // 254 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4404: evaṃ sādhanopāyāṃśadvayātiriktāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ na hiṃsyād iti pratiṣedhāj{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4405: 189}jātaṃ pratyavāyahetutvajñānam anyatra tīrtheṣu yo dīkṣitaḥ yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhetetyādividhinā vāryata ity āha -- hiṃseti // 255
GSP28mimsvtku:4406: yat tūktaṃ na vastuśaktyāvāpodvāpayoḥ śāstrasya vyāpāra iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4407: tad iṣyata eva. kevalaṃ śāstrānusāreṇaiva tattatkriyābhedavyavasthitā eva śaktayo 'vagamyante. ato nātiprasaṅga ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- jñānam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4408: katham ekasya karmaṇaḥ śaktibhāvābhāvāv iti cet. laukikāni karmāṇi vidāṅ kurvantu
GSP28mimsvtku:4409: bhavantaḥ. yathā tāvad ekam eva bhojanaṃ svasthātur akartṛkaṃ bhinnaśaktikaṃ dṛṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4410: svasthena hi tat kriyamāṇaṃ rasalohitamāṃsapariṇāmaparamparayā śarīraṃ vardhayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4411: ātureṇa tu kriyamāṇam asamyagdhātupariṇāmāt kṛśī karoti. evam adṛṣṭārtheṣv api karmasu
GSP28mimsvtku:4413: yathā bhojanatvābhede 'pi svasthātur akartṛbhedanibandhanaṃ[573]vyaktibhedam āśritya tatra śaktibhedaḥ samādhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4414: evam ihāpi hiṃsātvenābhede 'pi rūpasyeyam aṅgahiṃsā iyaṃ bāhyahiṃseti vyaktibhedāvagater upapannaḥ śaktibheda ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- rūpābheda iti // 258 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4417: yadi tv avāntarabhedam anaṅgīkṛtya rūpābhedamātreṇaikaphalatvam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4418: evaṃ sati sarvalaukikavaidikakriyāṇāṃ kriyātvād ekaphalatvaṃ syāt. tatredaṃ svargaphalam
GSP28mimsvtku:4419: idaṃ putraphalam ityādyasaṅkaro na sidhyatītyabhiprāyeṇāha -- tathāpīti. āstāṃ tāvanmahāsāmānyenaikatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4420: phalasaṅkaro bhavatīti. yajitvādyavāntarasāmānyābhedād api citrādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalatulyatā
GSP28mimsvtku:4423: sehāpi samānety āha -- bhedād iti. nanu vihitā nāmāṅgahiṃsā. tathāpi kiṃ nānarthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4424: na vidhinānarthaphalena na bhavitavyam iti rājājñā. ata āha -- vidhīnām iti. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:4425: abhiprāyaḥ -- neyaṃ rājājñā. śabdaśaktir eva. vidhir hi kartavyatābuddher hetuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4426: iṣṭābhyupāyaṃ ca kartavyatayā loko budhyate. ato 'vaśyam eva sākṣād vyavahito[574]'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4427: vā vidheyānāṃ puruṣārthaḥ phalam ity avasīyate. sākṣāt pradhānānāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4428: vyavahito 'ṅgānām. tasmān nāto vidher anarthaphalatvam avasīyate. vidhibalād avagamyamānaṃ vidhīnāṃ phalam ity āheti. api ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:4429: anarthakaryaṅgahiṃseti nedaṃ sāndṛṣṭikam. na cānarthasamabhivyāhāro 'syāḥ śrūyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4430: ataḥ katham anarthasādhanam ity āha -- na caiṣv iti. nanv aśrūyamāṇo 'pi kalañjabhakṣaṇādivat kalpayiṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4431: ata āha -- niṣedhād iti. tatra niṣedhaḥ kalpanāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4432: nāsāv iha sambhavati. abhāvād eva vidhānadarśanād iti // 261 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4435: api cāṅgahiṃsānāṃ puruṣārthatve siddhe kadācid anartho 'pi phalatayā kalpyate. na
GSP28mimsvtku:4436: ca tāsāṃ puruṣārthaḥ phalam. prakaraṇe pāṭhāt. prakaraṇavidhiviniyogena kratvarthatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4437: ityabhiprāyeṇāha -- na ceti. kiṃ nāma[575]tat kalpyam ata āha -- karmopakāra iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4439: tataḥ pradhānakarmopakāra eva kalpyate dṛṣṭo 'dṛṣṭo vā. yathāvaghātasya vrīhīṇāṃ vituṣībhāvo vidhyapekṣito dṛṣṭaḥ. adṛṣṭo vā yathā prayājādijanya iti // 262 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4442: {1,191} ato nātrānarthakalpanāvasaro 'stīty āha -- kalpaneti. nāṅgahiṃsāsu phalam apekṣitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4443: kratūpakāreṇa nirākāṅkṣatvād iti bhāvaḥ. kratvarthe 'pi cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ yad ayaṃ paśusaṃskāra eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4445: tatpurassaraṃ viśasanādisaṃskārānuṣṭhānāt. ata eva saṃjñapane paśur vrīhivat pradhānatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4446: śrutaḥ paśuṃ saṃjñapayatīti. tad etad āha -- kratvartha iti. sannipatyopakārapradarśanena[576]kratvarthataiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4447: balīyasīti darśitaṃ bhavati. ārād upakārakatve yāvān kleśo bhaved na ca tāvān apy astīti // 263 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4450: saṃskāratve 'pi cāsyāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ yad ayaṃ dṛṣṭārtha evāvaghātādivat. na tu[577]prokṣaṇādivadadṛṣṭārthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4451: kratvapekṣitaikādaśāvadānaniṣpatteḥ. daikṣe hi paśau hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati. atha
GSP28mimsvtku:4452: jihvāyāḥ. atha vakṣasaḥ ityādibhir ekādaśāvadānasādhyo yāga uktaḥ. na cāsati hiṃsāsaṃskāre
GSP28mimsvtku:4453: paśor ekādaśāvadānaniṣpattiḥ sambhavati. ato dṛṣṭārthatvād aṅgahiṃsāyā nānarthakalpanāvasaro
GSP28mimsvtku:4454: 'stītyabhiprāyeṇāha -- dṛṣṭeti. evaṃ tāvajjyotiṣṭomopāyāṃśasthā hiṃsā nādharma ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4456: tatrāpy ekāhānāṃ jyotiṣṭomaprakṛtitvāc codakaprāptāṅgahiṃsā nādharma ity āha -- abhicāra iti // 264 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4459: ato 'naṅgabhūtāyām eva phalāṃśasthāyāṃ hiṃsāyām etad anarthatvam ity upasaṃharati
GSP28mimsvtku:4460: -- tasmād iti. nanu ca phalāṃśasthāpi hiṃsā śyenādyuddeśena vidhīyamāṇā[578]katham
GSP28mimsvtku:4461: anarthaḥ ata āha -- uddeśād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nātra śyenoddeśena phalaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4462: phalatvena hiṃsāyā evoddeśāt. phalaṃ hy uddiśya sādhanaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4463: na tu viparyayaḥ. nanūddeśyayor api deśakālayor vidhānam{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4464: 192}iṣyata eva. satyam. anyatas tayor aprāpteḥ. phale tu rāgataḥ pravṛttaḥ puruṣo na vidhinā pravartyata ity uktam eveti // 265 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4467: kathaṃ punas tryaṃśabhāvanāvidhāne vidheyāvidheyabhedaḥ śakyate[579]vaktum. ata eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4469: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vidhir hi haṃsa ivodakāt kṣīraṃ vivicya prāptaparihāreṇāprāptaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4470: gṛhṇāti. tathā ca vakṣyati -- tadguṇās tu vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhānārthe[581]na
GSP28mimsvtku:4472: iti. ato viśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhāv api sādhanetikartavyatāmātraparatvāt phalāṃśān nivartata
GSP28mimsvtku:4473: iti. ataḥ siddhaṃ na svarūpeṇa śyeno dharmaḥ. nāpy adharmaḥ. phalasyaiva tv anarthānubandhitvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4474: taddvāreṇānartha ity upacaryata ity upasaṃharati -- ata iti // 266 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4479: nanu ca vidhīnāṃ puruṣārthaphalatvāt śyenasya ca vidhiviṣayatvāt tadbalenārthātmakam
GSP28mimsvtku:4480: eva phalāntaraṃ viśvajidādivat kiṃ na kalpyate. ataḥ svarūpeṇa dharmo bhaviṣyatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:4481: āha -- nirākāṅkṣasyeti. ayam arthaḥ -- bhrātṛvyavadhenaikena svargād api priyatareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:4482: nirākāṅkṣasya śyenasya na phalāntarakalpanā sambhavati. bhāvanākāṅkṣā hi tatkalpanābījam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4483: ekā ca bhāvanaikenaiva bhāvyena nirākāṅkṣeti na bhāvyāntarasambandhaṃ labhate. tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:4486: 193}anarthaphalasya taddvāreṇānarthatvam ity āha -- tasmād iti. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4487: phalānarthānubandhitvāt śyeno na dharma ity ata āha -- phalata iti. īdṛśe karmāṇi loke dharmaśabdaḥ prasiddha iti[582]// 268 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4490: atra codayati -- nanu ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ svato na dharmatvaṃ śyenādeḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4491: nāpy adharmateti. iṣṭābhyupāyo hi codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ. tathā śyenaḥ phalasyānarthānubandhitve
GSP28mimsvtku:4492: 'pi. ato dharma ity evāyaṃ vaktavya iti. atrobhayarūparahitaḥ śyena ity abhipretya
GSP28mimsvtku:4493: sampradhāraṇām avatārayati -- phalam iti. sthitaṃ tāvat śyenaphalaṃ hiṃsā. hiṃsā
GSP28mimsvtku:4494: ca na dharma iti. śyenādisvarūpam idānīṃ lokaprasiddhyanusāreṇāvadhārayāmaḥ dharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:4496: tatrānyataranirdhāraṇāya pakṣadvayam upanyasyati -- yadīti dvayena. lokaprasiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4497: hi naḥ sarvaśabdārthāvadhāraṇe mūlam. tad asāv eva nirūpaṇīyā. tatra yady aniṣṭānubandharahiteṣṭābhyupāyaś
GSP28mimsvtku:4500: paramparayānarthānubandhitvāt. yadi tv anādṛtya paramparayānarthānubandhitvam āhatya prītiphalaṃ laukikā dharmaśabdenopacaranti codanāsamadhigamyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4501: tathā sati śyeno 'pi tādṛśatvād dharmo bhavet. kāryākāryānapekṣayeti. yad eva hi prītimātrānubandhi tat kāryam iti vivekino budhyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4502: viparītam akāryam iti bhāvaḥ. prasiddhivibhāgakathanenaiva cātra nirdhāraṇam uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4503: yathāprasiddhi tāvad dharmaśabdo 'bhyupagantavya iti sthitam. prasiddhiś cāniṣṭānanubandhīṣṭasādhanaviṣayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4505: {1,194} nanv evam adharma evāniṣṭānubandhitvāt śyenaḥ phaladvāreṇa,
GSP28mimsvtku:4506: ata āha -- yadīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- adharmapadaprayogo 'pi laukikānāṃ sampradhāraṇīyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4507: kiṃviṣaya iti. tad yadi codanārtho 'pi sākṣād vyavadhānena vāprītihetur adharma iti prasiddhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4508: tataḥ śyeno 'py adharmaḥ. atha vedavihite nādharmaśabdam aprītikare 'pi paramparayā lokaḥ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:4509: tato nādharmaḥ. na ca vedavihitagocaro 'dharmaśabdaprayogo laukikānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti nādharmaḥ svarūpeṇa śyenādaya iti bhāvaḥ // 272 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4510: yas tu vadati -- vihitā nāmāṃśadvayagāminī hiṃsā. tathāpi pratibaddhaliṅgadarśanena
GSP28mimsvtku:4511: tasyānarthahetutvam anumāsyāmahe. tathā hi hiṃsātvam anarthatvena pratibaddhaṃ bāhyahiṃsāsv avagataṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4512: tad dhi vihitāsv api dṛśyamānam anarthatvam anumāpayayatīti. tad etad upanyasya dūṣayati -- yas tv iti. ayaṃ cāgamabādho 'numāne prapañcayiṣyata iti // 273 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4513: āgamānādare tv anavasthā bhavatīty āha -- tam iti // 274 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4514: nanv āgamānusāreṇa kratugatānām api hiṃsānām adharmatvam avagamyate. tathā hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:4515: santi hi kecana mantrārthavāde[583]tihāsādayaḥ ye kratuvartinīm api hiṃsāṃ nindanti.[584]yathā japastutau
GSP28mimsvtku:4520: iti hiṃsā[585]ṅgatvenaiva vidhiyajñanindā smaryate. ata āha -- gīteti. asyārthaḥ -- pratyakṣo 'tra śrutibādhaḥ. kratau vidhānadarśantāt anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ iti ca śruteḥ.[586]
GSP28mimsvtku:4524: {1,195} yajñārthaṃ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayam eva svayambhuvā /
GSP28mimsvtku:4525: yajñā hi bhūtyai lokasya tasmād yajñe vadho 'vadhaḥ //
GSP28mimsvtku:4526: iti[587]ca. anyaparatayārthavādo vyākhyeyaḥ. yathā vakṣyati -- na hi nindā nindyaṃ nindituṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4530: atrāparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ - nanv aśaktam idaṃ sūtram imāv arthāv abhivadituṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ nendriyādilakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4531: arthaś ca dharmo nānartha iti. bhidyeta hi tadā vākyam iti. evaṃ vākyabhedaparicodanāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4532: kṛtvā parihārabhāṣyam -- ucyate. yatra vākyād evārtho 'vagamyate tatraivam. tat tu
GSP28mimsvtku:4533: vaidikeṣu na sūtreṣu. anyato 'vagate 'rthe sūtram evam artham ity avagantavyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4534: tadākṣipati -- śiṣyān iti. asyārthaḥ -- anyatoviditavedārthebhyo jijñāsubhyaḥ sūtrāṇi
GSP28mimsvtku:4535: jaimininā na praṇītāni. atas tāni teṣāṃ vedavākyatulyāni ubhayaṃ ca vedasūtrātmakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4536: vākyabhedādidoṣād asamartham. na cāśaktam arthapratyāyane pramāṇam. ato na vedasūtrayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4537: kaścid viśeṣa iti na sūtreṣv iti bhāṣyoktam anuttaram iti // 276 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4538: atra parihāram āha -- prāgukteti. asyārthaḥ -- satyam. vākyabhedādinā sūtrāṇām apy aśaktiḥ śiṣyāṃś ca pratyaviśeṣaḥ. kin tu yā pūrvaṃ sati sambhava iti parisaṃkhyoktā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4539: tasyāḥ phalam etad bhāṣyakāreṇa pratipādyate. evaṃ hi nyāyābhāsabhrāntāḥ śiṣyā bhāṣyakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:4540: śikṣitāḥ yad vivakṣitāsambhave vākyabhedādibhir api sūtrāṇi gamayitavyānīti. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4541: ihaiva tāvac codanāsūtre pradarśyate yad vākyabhedenāpi codanāsūtrārtho bodhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:4542: iti. anayeti. bhāṣyoktayā pramāṇāntarapratipannārthaviṣayatayā yuktyety arthaḥ. eṣety
GSP28mimsvtku:4543: api ca bhāṣyoktaiva vākyabhedagatiḥ pratyavamṛśyate. yathāha -- bhinnayor eva vākyayor{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4544: 196}imāv ekadeśāv iti. tad anena śiṣyān pratyaviśeṣe 'pi vyākhyātṝṇām eva vyākhyāprakāro
GSP28mimsvtku:4545: bhāṣyakāreṇokta iti darśitam. vyākhyākārā hi ciraparicitanyāyasāmastyasmaraṇakṣamā
GSP28mimsvtku:4546: nyāyabalena vākyabhedādibhir api sūtrāṇi vyācakṣata iti // 277 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4547: yataś ca pramāṇāntarānusāreṇa vākyabhedādibhir api sūtreṣv avagatiḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4548: tasmād āvṛttyā vā tantreṇa vedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. āvṛttau
GSP28mimsvtku:4549: tāvat sakalam eva sūtraṃ dviḥ paṭhitavyam. tatraikasya codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atra
GSP28mimsvtku:4550: tātparyam. aparasya cārtho dharma ity atra. anyaparatve 'nyatarasambandho 'nuvādaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4551: sūtrabhedena cobhayavidhānāt tatsiddher ubhayānuvādopapattiḥ. tantraṃ codanālakṣaṇādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4552: trayāṇām anyatamam. tadupariṣṭād vakṣyate. tasmin pakṣe na vākyabhedaḥ. tathā hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4553: -- tripadam idaṃ sūtram. padatrayasyāpi cetaretarasambaddho 'rtho vākyārthaḥ. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4554: yad eva trayāṇām ubhayasandhānārtham[588]āvartyate tad eva vākyaṃ bhinatti. tantreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:4555: tūbhayasambandhe na vākyabhedaḥ. sakṛdvacanāt. sakṛduktasyaiva yogyatayobhayasambandhe
GSP28mimsvtku:4556: śaktibhedāt. tad iha dharmapadaṃ vā tantroccaritam ubhābhyāṃ sambadhyate. sidhyati
GSP28mimsvtku:4557: cobhayaṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharmo 'rtho dharma iti ca. madhyapadaṃ vādyantābhyām. evam
GSP28mimsvtku:4558: api ceṣṭaṃ sidhyati artho dharmaḥ sa codanālakṣaṇa iti. ādyam eva vottarābhyām. codanālakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:4559: 'rthaḥ sa eva ca dharma iti. idam ekam eva vākyaṃ trayāṇām anyatamasya tantreṇobhayasambandhād
GSP28mimsvtku:4568: bhāṣyakāreṇa bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv iti vadatā sūtradvayam{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4569: 197}evedaṃ darśitam. tad upanyasyati -- ekadeśeti. artho dharma ity ekaṃ sūtram,
GSP28mimsvtku:4571: niṣpadyate codanālakṣaṇo dharma iti. tad idam uktam -- ekadeśānumānād iti. nanv artho
GSP28mimsvtku:4572: dharma iti codanālakṣaṇācodanālakṣaṇayor anyatarasyā[590]nupādānāt tadapekṣāyām acodanālakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:4573: 'py upatiṣṭhamānaḥ kena vāryate. evaṃ codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atrāpy anarthaprasaṅgo
GSP28mimsvtku:4574: darśayitavyaḥ. ata āha -- itaretareti. etāv eva codanālakṣaṇārthaśabdāv itaretarasamīpyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4575: parasparaṃ sūtradvaye 'pi viśeṣaṇatvena vākyaśeṣatayā kalpyete. ato nācodanālakṣaṇānarthāvayavakalpaneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4576: anuvādatvena cātra codanālakṣaṇārthāvayavasambandho bhinnayoḥ sūtrayor darśayitavyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4577: yadartho dharma ity ekasūtreṇoktaṃ taccodanālakṣaṇa iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4578: yaccodanālakṣaṇo dharma ity atroktaṃ tadartha iti // 279 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4581: aparam api athavā arthasya sataś codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ity ekārtham eveti bhāṣyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4583: darśitam. evam api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyobhayaparatvena vākyaṃ bhidyata[591]eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4584: yathaikatvaviśiṣṭagrahānuvādena sammārgavidhau. ataḥ kena viśeṣeṇā[592]thaveti parihārāntaram uktam iti. yataś cāyam aparihāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4585: tasmāt pūrvoktam eva padatrayatantratvaṃ vākyabhedaparicodanāyām uttaram ity āha -- itīty arthaśabdayorantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:4586: etac ca tantratrayaṃ vyākhyātam eva. saṃjñāśabdena dharmapadam ucyate.[593]tad dhi codanālakṣaṇasyārthasyālaukikī saṃjñā bhūvādīnām iva{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4588: tatas tantreṇa dvyartham ekaṃ vākyaṃ vyākhyeyam. na ca prakārāntareṇa vākyabhedaparicodanā parihartuṃ śakyata iti // 281 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4595: atra codayati -- dharma iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- dve kilātra vacanavyaktī. codanālakṣaṇānuvādena
GSP28mimsvtku:4596: dharmavidhānaṃ viparītaṃ vā. tatrādye tāvat pakṣe codanālakṣaṇatvasyārthatvavyabhicārād
GSP28mimsvtku:4597: yuktam eva viśeṣaṇam. yadā tu sāmānyataḥ siddhadharmānuvādena pramāṇam anena kathyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4599: arthasyaiva śreyassādhanasya dharmatvaprasiddheḥ. sarve hi vādinaḥ prītisādhanaṃ dharma ity atrāvipratipannāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4600: tadviśeṣeṣv eva vivādaḥ. mīmāṃsakā hīṣṭāpūrtayor dharmatvam icchanti. saṅghaṭṭavandanādau
GSP28mimsvtku:4601: saugatāḥ. sāmānyaṃ tu prītisādhanaṃ dharmasvarūpaṃ sarvavādinām avivādasiddham eva.[596]eṣaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4602: ca prāg api sāmānyasiddhir uktā. ata eva ca viśeṣa[597]siddhijijñāsāyāṃ pramāṇaviśeṣavidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4603: tata eva tatsiddheḥ. vedāgame hi pramāṇe yāgādayo dharmāḥ. buddhāgame tu caity avandanādayaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4604: ko dharma ity atrāpi viśeṣajijñāsayaiva praśnaḥ. vakṣyati ca viśeṣasya ca jijñāseti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4605: tasmād eṣaivātra vacanavyaktir mukhyā. ata evādye prathamam uktvā satsūtreṇa ca pratyakṣādinirākaraṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:4606: eṣaiva vacanavyaktiḥ sūtrakārābhimatā lakṣyate. yo dharmaḥ sa codanālakṣaṇaḥ iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4608: nānyathā. tasmād eṣaivātra vacanavyaktiḥ. asyāṃ cārthāvyabhicārād arthaviśeṣaṇam anarthakam iti // 282 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4612: pariharati -- codaneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam. eṣaiva cātra vacanavyaktiḥ. iyam eva tu nāsatyarthaviśeṣaṇe sidhyatīti phalavadarthagrahaṇam.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4613: 199}asati hi tasmin vacanavyaktyantarasandeho bahvet. evaṃ hi tadā sambhāvyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4614: yaś codanālakṣaṇaḥ sa dharma iti. atra tu vakṣyamāṇo doṣaḥ. nityānuvādabhūte tv[598]arthagrahaṇe naivaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4615: arthagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādayor asambhavāt. vidhau tāvad vākyabhedād asambhavaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4616: anuvādasya cāprāpteḥ. na hi codanālakṣaṇam arthasambandhaṃ na vyabhicarati anarthasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4617: tallakṣitatvāt. ato nānuvādaḥ. na caitat parityāgena vākyārthatvam anarthakatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4619: tataraḥ pakṣo 'vadhāryeta. dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhau sambhavati nityānuvādabhūto
GSP28mimsvtku:4620: 'rthaśabda iti sa eva pakṣo niścīyate. ato vidhyanuvādasūcanārtha evārthaśabdo na
GSP28mimsvtku:4621: viśeṣaṇam. viśeṣaṇād vinā caitad iti ca spaṣṭam eva sūtrārtha iti darśayiṣyati // 283 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4625: ata āha -- tatheti. codanālakṣaṇānuvādena dharmavidhāvadharmāṇām api niṣedhacodanayānarthasādhanatvena
GSP28mimsvtku:4626: lakṣitānāṃ brahmahatyādīnāṃ codanālakṣaṇatvād dharmatvaṃ bhavet. na caitad iṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4627: ato na vidheyārtham api vidhiphalam arthavad[600]arthapadagrahaṇam. ato neyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4633: yasyām arthaś ca dharmatayā na tyajyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4634: ekaś ca vākyārtho bhavati. sā ca dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4635: tasyāṃ hi dharmasyārthatvāvyabhicārād artho na tyajyate. eka eva vākyārtho bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4636: sāmarthyalakṣyatvād arthasya. iyaṃ cārthānuvādād eva sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4642: kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣyakāraḥ ubhayam ihetyādigranthenārthapadasya viśeṣaṇatāṃ darśayati. vispaṣṭaṃ hi tatroktaṃ tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity evam artham arthagrahaṇam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4643: yad api cedam athavetyādi bhāṣyam ākṣiptaṃ tasyāpy adyayāvan na kiñcit samādhānam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28mimsvtku:4644: ata āha -- viśeṣaṇād iti. anena bhāṣyadvayam api samāhitam. yat tāvadubhayam ihety
GSP28mimsvtku:4645: uktaṃ tadarthaviśeṣaṇād vinaivārthasāmarthyakāritam eva bhāṣyakāreṇa kathitam. kim
GSP28mimsvtku:4646: idam arthasāmarthyakāritam iti. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yad dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhānād[603]evānarthānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4648: pramāṇānuvādena ca dharmavidhau teṣām api dharmatāpadyeta. tad ihānartho dharma ukto
GSP28mimsvtku:4649: mā bhūd ityevamartham arthagrahaṇam iti vadatā vacanavyaktiviśeṣaparigrahārtho 'rthaśabda
GSP28mimsvtku:4650: iti darśitam. ākṣiptabhāṣyasamādhāne 'py ayam eva grantho vyākhyeyaḥ. nedam athaveti
GSP28mimsvtku:4651: śabdasāmarthyakāritaṃ bhāṣyakārīyam uttaram. tathā hi vākyabhedo bhavati. iha tu
GSP28mimsvtku:4652: vinaiva viśeṣaṇād arthasāmarthyakāritam evedam ucyate. tac ca vacanavyaktiviśeṣāśrayaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:4653: darśitam. na cārthād āpadyamāno vākyabhedam āpādayati. aśabdapramāṇakatvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:4654: vākyabhedasya ca śabdadoṣatvāt. ato 'thavetyādinā dharmoddeśena pramāṇavidhānam atra
GSP28mimsvtku:4655: bhāṣyakṛtā darśitam. tatra cārthaśabdasyānuvādatvād[604]vākyabhedaḥ suparihara eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:4657: idaṃ dharmānuvādena pramāṇavidhānavacanavyakter evārthasāmarthyakāritaṃ phalaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa kathyata ity artha iti // 286 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4664: {1,201} tasya nimittaparīṣṭir iti sūtram. tasyāyam arthaḥ -- tasya dharmasya yannimittaṃ pramāṇaṃ codanābhidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4665: tatparīṣṭiḥ kartavyeti. pākṣikī ca parīṣṭipadarūpasiddhiḥ. tathā hi iṣu gatau ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4666: asmād dhātoḥ iṣer anicchārthasya iti yuci vihite parer vā iti ktinyucor vikalpaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4667: smaryate. tena yujvidhau paryeṣaṇeti bhavati. ktini tu parīṣṭir iti. atra vadanti
GSP28mimsvtku:4668: -- kim idam anavasara eva parīkṣāpratijñānam. codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti hi pratijñātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4669: atas tadupapādanasamarthahetuvacanāvasare kim aparaṃ nimittaparīkṣā pratijñāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4670: na hi naiyāyikāḥ śabdo 'nitya iti pratijñāya tad etat parīkṣāmahe iti parīkṣām avatārayanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4671: api tarhi sahasaiva kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidadhati. tad ihāpi codanāsūtrapratijñātāvadhāraṇadvayopapādanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4672: sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ hetuvacanam ucitam. kim antarā parīkṣāpratijñānena. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:4673: mataṃ - parārthapratijñāsvayaṃ nyāyaḥ yat pratijñānantaram eva hetvabhidhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4674: svapratipattau tu na hetudharmā yojayitavyā iti. tan na. na hi jaiminer api svapratipattaye śāstranirmāṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:4675: anyato viditavedārthaḥ śiṣyahitārthāya sūtrāṇi praṇītavān. ato 'trāpi parārthaiva pratijñā. atho[605]cyate -- dvedhā hi paraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4676: vyutthitāvyutthitabhedāt. tatra vyutthitapratipādane pratijñānantaram eva hetur abhidhīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:4677: iti nyāyyam.[606]uttare tu parīkṣāpurassaram eva hetvabhidhānena pratipādyanta iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4678: tan na. lakṣaṇāntareṣv api prasaṅgāt. bhedādilakṣaṇeṣv api yathāsvam arthaṃ pratijñāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4679: parīkṣāpratijñānam āpadyate. na ca tathā dṛśyate. kaś caiṣa nyāyaḥ yad vipratipannāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4680: pratijñānantaram eva hetur ucyate na śiṣyebhya iti. pratyuta tān eva prati lāghavāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4682: kim antarā vyākṣepakarī pratijñā nikṣipyata iti yatkiñcid etat. tasmād ayam atra
GSP28mimsvtku:4683: samādhiḥ -- ihādyena sūtreṇa śāstrasya prayojanaṃ pratijñātam. dvitīyena ca samastavakṣyamāṇatantrārthasaṃkṣepapratijñānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4684: anena tu sukhagrahaṇārtham ādyādhyāyārthapratijñānam. athātaḥ śeṣalakṣaṇam.[607](3.1.1)
GSP28mimsvtku:4687: 202}etad uktaṃ bhavati -- ihādhyāye dharmapramāṇaṃ parīkṣiṣyāmaha iti. yady api codanāsūtreṇāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4688: samastatantrārthasaṃkṣepe kriyamāṇe pramāṇalakṣaṇārtho 'pi codanaiva pramāṇam eveti pratijñātḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4690: punar anena niṣkṛṣyādyādhyāyārthaḥ pratijñāyate. aniṣkṛṣyamāṇe hi pratijñāsaṅkareṇa[608]na
GSP28mimsvtku:4691: jñāyate kasya pratijñābhāgasya sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ hetur abhidhīyata iti. bahv
GSP28mimsvtku:4692: eva hi tatra pratijñātaṃ dharmasvarūpādi. atas tatrāpi hetvabhidhānam idam iti kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:4693: bhrāmyet. atas tadbhramāpanuttaye svayam eva nirdhāraṇaṃ darśayati. yo 'yaṃ tantrārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4695: tasmin vyākhyāsyamāne nimittaparīkṣaiva tāvad ihādhyāye vartiṣyate pramāṇapurassaratvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4696: prameyasiddheḥ. tad iha tāvac caturvidhā parīkṣā vartiṣyate -- kiṃ codanaiva utānyad eveti niyamaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4699: na cobhayam ity ubhayāpalāpaḥ. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:4706: codanaivānyad eveti yad vānyac codanāpi vā //
GSP28mimsvtku:4707: athavā codanānyac ca na cānyan nāpi codanā /
GSP28mimsvtku:4708: iti. tad ete niyamavikalpasamuccayobhayāpalāpaiś catvāraḥ pakṣā bhavanti. bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:4709: ca pramāṇavikalpaḥ. yathārād avasthitam agniṃ kadācil liṅgād avaiti. kadācid āptopadeśāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4711: īśvaramaharṣayo hi pratyakṣeṇa dharmam avayanti āgamenetara iti pramātṛbhedād ubhayopapattiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4712: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu pradarśanārthaṃ kiṃ codanaiva utānyad apīti darśitam. parīkṣamāṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4713: hi caturdhaiva pratibhā jāyate. tad iha pratyakṣasūtre tāvat pratyakṣādiniṣedhena
GSP28mimsvtku:4715: nirasiṣyate tat pramāṇam anapekṣatvād iti. tad ayaṃ nimittaparīkṣāsaṃkṣepo bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:4722: nāmadheyapādena codbhidādināmnāṃ guṇaparāṇām eva nāmadheyatayaiva kriyopayogakathanam iti kṛtsna evādhyāye dharmasya nimittaparīkṣeti sūktaṃ tasya nimittaparīṣṭir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4723: atra bhāṣyam uktīmadam asmābhiś codanā nimittaṃ dharmajñāne iti tat pratijñāmātreṇoktam ityādi. tad ayuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:4724: sopapattikapratijñābhidhānāt. tathā hi -- codanā hi bhūtam ityādinā codanāprāmāṇyopapattir uktaiva,
GSP28mimsvtku:4725: nānyat kiñcanendriyam iti cānyāprāmāṇyopapattiḥ. ataḥ katham ucyate tat pratijñāmātreṇoktam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4726: ata āha -- pratijñeti sārdhena. asyārthaḥ -- yady api bhāṣyakāreṇānāgatāvekṣaṇena sadautpattikasūtrābhyāṃ vakṣyamāṇā svapakṣasya yuktiḥ pratijñāvyatiriktā
GSP28mimsvtku:4727: tathāpi na sūtrakāreṇa kācid upapattir ukteti tanmatānusāreṇa pratijñāmātrābhidhānam iti // 1 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4728: samarthanāntaram āha -- vṛttikāra iti. asyārthaḥ -- yat tu codanā hītyādinā bhūtādyarthaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ codanāyāḥ kṛtaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4729: tat prāmāṇyadvāramātram eva kathitam. pāramārthikī yuktir upariṣṭād vakṣyate sūtrakāreṇaiva.
GSP28mimsvtku:4730: ato vakṣyamāṇayuktyadhikam eva tat prāmāṇyasambhāvanāmātram abhihitam. sambhāvito
GSP28mimsvtku:4732: na tv asambhāvita iti svābhiprāyeṇāpi pratijñāmātrābhidhānopapattir iti // 2 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4737: -- satsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidhyamānopalambhanatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4738: iti. tad idaṃ vṛttyantare 'nimittād avacchidya tat pratyakṣam ityevamantaṃ lakṣaṇaparaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4739: vyākhyātam. tad etad upanyasya dūṣayati -- varṇyata iti. asyārthaḥ -- dharmasya nimittaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4740: parīkṣitavyamiti hi pratijñātam. anantaraṃ ca pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam ucyamānaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:4743: anupayogo 'pīty āha -- laṣaṇasyeti. lokaprasiddhapramāṇavyavahāriṇo hi mīmāṃsakasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4744: kiṃ tallakṣaṇakaraṇeneti bhāvaḥ. dvyaṃśā hi pūrvapratijñā codanaiva pramāṇaṃ pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4745: eva codaneti tantrārthasaṃkṣepapratijñānam. punaś ca parīṣṭisūtreṇa niṣkṛṣyādyalakṣaṇaviṣayatayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:4746: na cānyatarāṃśaprasādhanenāpi lakṣaṇābhidhānam upayujyata iti. yadi tu naiyāyikādiprasthānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4748: tadvad eva hi tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam ityādivadanumānāder api lakṣaṇapraṇayanam āpatitam ity āha -- kimartham iti // 2 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4749: syād etat. apramāṇam evānumānādi pratyakṣād anyatvāt tadābhāsavad iti tallakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4750: tad ayuktam ity āha -- na tāvad iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yad eva kiñcit tadaprāmāṇyasiddhaye pramāṇam upanyasyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4752: nā)prāmāṇyasiddhaye 'numānam upanyasyate iti svavāgvirodhaḥ. tad alaṃ nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti pāṣaṇḍajalpiteneti.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4753: 205}syād etat -- sambhavaitihyayor ivānumānāgamayoḥ pratyakṣāntarbhāvād itareṣāṃ lakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4754: tan na. lakṣaṇavailakṣaṇyād ity āha -- nāpīti vaktumantena. syād etat -- lakṣaṇavailakṣaṇyam evāsiddhaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4755: sarveṣāṃ saty evendriyārthasannikarṣe jāyamānatvād iti. tan na. na hi cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣṭadhūmo 'py aviditāsmṛtavyāptir anumimāno vahnim upala(?bhya/
GSP28mimsvtku:4758: sādhanam iti sādhanabhedāl lakṣaṇavailakṣaṇye sati nānyonyāntarbhāvopapattiḥ. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4760: na ca vācyaṃ sarvādau pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānād eva tatpūrvakatvenetarāṇi lakṣitānīti pṛthaglakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4761: tatpūrvakasmṛtyādīnām aprāmāṇyadarśanenābhāsasaṅkaraprasakter ity āha -- na cāpīti // 4 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4762: na ca sāmānyātideśalakṣaṇam iva viśeṣātideśalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇoktir anumānādīnāṃ pāramārthimaṃ lakṣaṇam ākṣipati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4763: tena vinā tadupapatteḥ. sāmānyaṃ tu nānākṣiptaviśeṣam ātmānaṃ labhata ity ākṣipaty arthaviśeṣam. tad etad āha -- pratyakṣeti // 5 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4764: tatpūrvakatvasiddhyabhyupagamena cāsmābhiḥ pūrvaṃ[609]smṛtyā vyabhicāra uktaḥ. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4765: api pratyakṣalakṣaṇokter ananyathāsiddhyabhāvān na sidhyatīty āha -- tadatad iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4766: tac cātac ca tadatadī. te pūrve yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- tad vā pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:4767: anyad vā pūrvam anumānādīnām iti na pratyakṣalakṣaṇād avagamyata iti.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4768: 206}yadi tu vinaiva kāraṇena pratyakṣalakṣaṇokter itareṣāṃ tatpūrvakatvam āśrīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4769: hanta atatpūrvakatvam api vāṅmātreṇa śakyam āśrayitum ity āha -- tadukter iti. tadapūrvaṃ yasyeti vigraho darśayitavya iti // 6 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4772: sidhyatu vā pratyakṣalakṣaṇokter anumānādīnāṃ tatpūrvakatvam. yas tv eṣām avāntaralakṣaṇabhedaḥ svarūpaṃ ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:4774: tat sarvaṃ na sidhyatīty āha -- na ceti // 7 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4776: kim amīṣāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇeneti. tat pratyakṣe 'pi samānam ity āha -- prasiddhatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4777: iti. ato bahuṣu pramāṇeṣu yad ekalakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ tad anyaparisaṃkhyārtham eva syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4778: tad etad āha -- tenānyeti sūtramantena. abhimatapramāṇaparisaṃkhyānaṃ cāyuktam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4779: bhāvaḥ. mūḍhena vā jaimininā pratyakṣamātraṃ lakṣitam ity abhyupagantavyam āpadyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:4780: evaṃ cātmīyam ajñānam ṛṣer āropitaṃ bhaved ity āha -- mūḍhena veti nāntena. api ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4781: vākyabhedo nāmāgatyā kvacid āśrīyate yathāgnayaś ca svakālatvāt ity atra vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4782: na ceha sūtre kiñcid anupapannaṃ dṛśyate yad bhittvā vyākhyāyata ity āha -- sambhavatīti // 9 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4783: lakṣaṇam apy etad ativyāpter ayuktam ity āha -- na cāpīti. ativyāptim eva darśayati -- tadabhāseṣv iti. sarve hi mṛgatṛṣṇādivibhramāḥ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4785: iti pratyakṣatām aśnuvīran. seyam ativyāptir iti. alpaṃ cedam asmābhir uktaṃ tadābhāseṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4786: tulyatvād iti. ekaṃ tu svapnajñānaṃ varjayitvā sakalapramāṇāpramāṇasajātīyavijātīyajñānamātrasādhāraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4787: idaṃ lakṣaṇam ity āha -- svapneti. liṅgaśabdasadṛśādisambaddheṣv evendriyeṣv anumānādipramāṇapañcakotpattir iti bhāvaḥ // 10 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4789: cedam uktam. svapne tv ātmamanodehaiḥ saṅgatir astyeveti tad apy anena lakṣaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:4790: vyāpyata iti darśayitavyam iti. svapnajñānātiriktaṃ tu yat kiñcid bhrāntyādi,
GSP28mimsvtku:4791: tat kenacit samprayoge saty eva jāyata iti pratyakṣam āpadyetety āha -- kenacid iti. yathā kenacit samprayoge bhrāntyādir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4792: tathā pūrvam evāsmābhir vivṛtam. ādiśabdena pramāṇasaṃśayayor upādānam iti // 11 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4793: nanu kenacit samprayogamātraṃ na pratyakṣakāraṇam abhipretam. api tarhi grāhyeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:4794: na ca bhrāntyādayo grāhyasaṃyuktanayanasya jāyante. kiṃ tarhi. anyasaṃyuktendriyasyānyārthaviṣayāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4795: na cedaṃ grāhyaviśeṣaṇam asmābhir eva kevalam āśritam. api tu vṛttikāreṇāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaparaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4796: sūtraṃ vyācakṣāṇena. tanmataṃ ca bhavadbhir upariṣṭād vakṣyata eveti nāvayor viśeṣam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28mimsvtku:4797: ata āha -- grāhyeṇeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam abhimataṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavato 'pi. tat tv anupāttaṃ na labhyate. vṛttikāramate tu vyatyastena tadvṛttena tadupādāsyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4798: {1,208} yadābhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ tatsaṃyoge tad iṣyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:4799: iti vakṣyate. ato bhavanmate grāhyaviśeṣaṇānupādānād grāhyasamprayogajam anyasamprayogajaṃ vā jñānaṃ pratyakṣam āpadyeta. ato 'sti mahān vakṣyamāṇena viśeṣa iti // 12 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4800: yata eva yathāvasthitam idaṃ sūtraṃ na pratyakṣaṃ lakṣayituṃ kṣamate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4801: ata eva vṛttikāreṇāpi prāsaṅgikalakṣaṇakaraṇe vyatyayena paṭhitam ity āha -- asāmarthyaṃ ceti // 13 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4803: para idānīṃ satsamprayogaviśeṣaṇopādānasāmarthyād eva grāhyaviśeṣaṇākṣepaṃ manvānaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4804: tadāha -- satsamprayoganirdeśa iti. evaṃ hi manyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:4806: tad yadi samprayogamātrajaṃ jñānaṃ sūtrakārasyābhimatam abhaviṣyat,
GSP28mimsvtku:4808: ta.) na hy asamprayogajaṃ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vā jñānam asti. ato viśeṣaṇopādānasāmarthyād
GSP28mimsvtku:4809: eva grāhyaviśeṣaṇam avagamyate. ato na kiñcid dokṣyatīti. etad eva[610]dūṣayati --
GSP28mimsvtku:4810: etad eva hīti. evaṃ hi manyate -- naivaṃvidhenottareṇa vyutthito bodhayituṃ śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4811: tasya hy etad eva pratipādyaṃ yat tvanmate[611]viśeṣaṇānarthakyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4816: upetya vā brūma ity āha -- svapnādīnām iti. uktam etad{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4817: 209}bāhyendriyavyāpārādinirapekṣaṃ svapnajñānam iti tanmātraṃ varjayitvā sarvam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4818: pratyakṣaṃ prāpnuyād iti. ādiśabdena cādṛṣṭamātrodbodhitasaṃskārakāraṇikā smṛtir
GSP28mimsvtku:4819: abhipreteti. tasmād anupāttam evātra[612]samagraṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam iti na tad vidhātum
GSP28mimsvtku:4820: anuvadituṃ vā śakyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. yat pratyakṣaṃ tad evaṃlakṣaṇakam[613]iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4821: lakṣaṇavidhiḥ. yad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ[614]tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇānuvādaḥ. na cānukto
GSP28mimsvtku:4829: sūtrasya vacobhaṅgim āha -- teneti dvābhyām. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4830: tat pratyakṣam iti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. yallokaprasiddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4831: satsamprayogajatvaṃ nāma dharmo 'sti. taddharmakatvāc ca vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4832: bhavati. tataś ca bhaviṣyaty avidyamāne dharme 'nimittateti // 18 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4834: evaṃ lakṣaṇakaṃ hi tad ity ucyate. tadalakṣaṇaparatve sūtrasyānupapannam ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:4835: -- evam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- śābarā api ye lokaprasiddhalakṣaṇānuvādenānimittatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4837: sampūrṇalakṣaṇābhidhāne sūtrasyāśakteḥ. ato lakṣaṇoktir iha liṅgavivakṣayaiva. yathā dhūmo lakṣaṇam agneḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4838: evaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvam animittatvasya. lakṣyate hi tat teneti bhāṣyakārasyābhimatam iti // 19 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4840: tadubhayam api vyanakti -- yata iti. vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ nāma dharmo liṅgam. animittatā tu liṅgi. yadi tu talliṅgam asiddham iti kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:4841: taṃ prati satsamprayogajatvahetvantaraprasiddhena tenānimittatādhigantavyeti prasiddhenety uktam iti // 20 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4843: ata āha -- pratyakṣatvam iti. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- traya ete prayogāḥ -- pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:4845: satsamprayogajatvaṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt. atra ca vidyamānopalambhanatvasya vyaktam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4846: pañcamyā hetutvam upāttam. itarayos tūpādānenaiva hetutvaṃ sūtritam iti draṣṭavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:4847: iti. ayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yajjane siddham ity asyaiva prapañco veditavyaḥ. tathā hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4850: pratyakṣaṃ yajjana iti ca pratyakṣatvād evaṃdharmakatvam uktam. idaṃ hi tatrākūtaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4851: pratyakṣaṃ sadevaṃdharmakaṃ bhavatīti. idaṃ tv iha vaktavyam. kim anayā prayogaprapañcaracanayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:4852: vimatipadāspadaṃ hi pratyakṣam animitaṃ pratyakṣatvād ity etāvatāpīṣṭaṃ sidhyaty
GSP28mimsvtku:4853: eva. tat tu śuṣkatarkahetor udbhāvakatvān na tathāśritam iti samādhātavyam. evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4854: hi śrutisādhāraṇyamātreṇānimittatvam uktam iti manvīran. na ca śrutisāmānyamātreṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4855: sarvasādharmyaṃ bhavati. na hi bhavati gopadās padaṃ vāg iti viṣāṇavatī. vidyamānopalambhanatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4856: animittatvam ucyamānaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati. kathaṃ ca[615]vidyamānopalambhanam anāgate
GSP28mimsvtku:4857: nimittaṃ bhavati. kathaṃ ca satsamprayogajam avidyamānopalambhanam. vartamānasamprayogajaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4859: sacchabdasya vartamānavacanatvāt. na cānāgatena dharmeṇa vartamānaḥ samprayogaḥ sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4860: sambandhidvayādhāro hi sambandhaḥ. nāsāv anyatarasminn avartamāne vartata iti yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4862: vartitum arhatīti yuktaṃ kramābhidhānam. prapañcarūcayaś ca mīmāṃsakā iti yuktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4866: {1,211} idaṃ tu vācyam -- anaikāntikaṃ satsamprayogajatvaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatve.
GSP28mimsvtku:4867: saty eva hi nadīpūranayanasannikarṣe atītā[616]divṛṣṭivijñānaṃ bhavati. vartamāna
GSP28mimsvtku:4868: eva ca meghacakṣussannikarṣo bhaviṣyadvṛṣṭiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ janayati. ato nāyam ekāntaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4869: yat satsamprayogajaṃ jñānaṃ vidyamānopalambhanam iti. api ca aparokṣanirbhāsam api
GSP28mimsvtku:4870: jñānaṃ vartamānasamprayogajam avidyamānaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭam. bhavati hi vartamāne śuktinayanasannikarṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:4872: sakalapramāṇāpramāṇajñānasādhāraṇyaṃ satsamprayogajatvasya. syān matam -- na tāvadatītānāgatagocaram
GSP28mimsvtku:4874: aviditāsmṛtavyāpter abhāvāt. asti hi tasyāpi nadīpūrajaladacakṣussannikarṣaḥ. na
GSP28mimsvtku:4876: sannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam. rajatānubhavas tu doṣasāhāyyāt prācīnajñānajanmanaḥ saṃskārād
GSP28mimsvtku:4877: yatkāraṇaṃ sannikṛṣyate khalv asya nānārthair indriyam. na cāsatsu doṣeṣv avidyamānaprakāśanam
GSP28mimsvtku:4878: upakalpayati. ato viṣayādidoṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyino vibhramās tam eva svātmani
GSP28mimsvtku:4879: kāraṇīkārayantīti. tan na. kāraṇakāraṇasyāpi kāraṇatvānapāyāt. śukti[617]nayanasannikarṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:4880: eva hi saṃskārodbodhe kāraṇaṃ bhrāntau. anumāne ca liṅgasannikarṣo vyāptismaraṇe.
GSP28mimsvtku:4881: ataḥ śakyaṃ tadubhayam api paramparayā satsamprayogajam iti vaktum. aviśeṣitaṃ ceha
GSP28mimsvtku:4882: satsamprayogajatvamātraṃ hetur uktaḥ. ato duṣpariharam anaikāntikatvaṃ tādṛśasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:4886: atrocyate -- uktam idaṃ lokaprasiddhasya pratyakṣasyāyaṃ dharmaḥ yat satsamprayogajatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4887: nāma vidyamānopalambhanatvasiddhau hetur uktaḥ. loke ca grāhyeṇaiva sati samprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:4888: pratyakṣam iti siddham. na hy[618]anyasamprayuktacakṣuṣo 'nyat pratyakṣam iti dṛṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4889: tad iha grāhyeṇaiva vartamānasamprayogajatvaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatve hetur uktaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4890: na ca tad anumānādiṣu sambhavati. na hi tatra grāhyeṇa vṛṣṭyādinendriyasannikarṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:4891: vartate. lakṣaṇapakṣe tu yāvacchrutamātraparatantratvād āpadyetaiva bhrāntyādi pratyakṣam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4892: tatrāpi tu lokapāratantrye vṛthā lakṣaṇa[619]karaṇam iti. nanu pratyakṣam animittaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4895: tan na. pakṣasapakṣayor abhedāpātāt. tac cāyuktaṃ siddhasādhyayor bhedāt. sādhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:4896: hi pakṣaḥ siddhaś ca sapakṣaḥ. na caikam eva siddhasādhyasvabhāvam ity upapadyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4898: kiṃ[620]tatsādhanena. ata āha -- asmadādāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- pratyakṣaviśeṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4899: pakṣīkṛtya pratyakṣāntaraṃ sapakṣīkriyate iti na pakṣasapakṣayor ekatā. nāpi siddhasādhyateti // 21 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4904: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ parapakṣoktān doṣān iha pariharati -- prakṛteneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4905: parapakṣe hi prakṛtāsaṅgatir uktā. seha nāsti. codanaiva pramāṇam iti hi pratijñātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4906: tac ca pratyakṣānimittatvapratipādanenaiva[621] śeṣāṇām apy anumānādīnām aprāmāṇyadarśanenāvadhāritarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4907: sidhyatīti. kathaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣānimittatve satyanumānādīnām apy animittatvam. na
GSP28mimsvtku:4908: hi pratyakṣam anāgatātivṛttayor asamartham ityanumānenāpi[622]tathā bhavitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4909: meghonnatinadīpūrābhyām anāgatātivṛttāyā vṛṣṭer ananumānaprasaṅgād ata āha -- tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4910: iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vyāptisaṃvedanādhīnajanmatvād anumānasya nityaparokṣeṇa ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4911: dharmeṇa vyāptisaṃvedanāsambhavād anumānodayābhāvaḥ. na ca vṛṣṭyādau prasaṅgaḥ. teṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4912: dṛṣṭapūrvakatvena vyāptisaṃvedanopapatteḥ. ādiśabdena dharmasādṛśyam upādatte. etac
GSP28mimsvtku:4917: nanv evam api pratyakṣavaditareṣām apy animittatvaṃ kiṃ sūtrair na nibaddham ata
GSP28mimsvtku:4918: āha -- śakyam iti. ekalakṣaṇakaraṇe hītaralakṣaṇāsiddheḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4919: āpāditam. animittatve tu pratyakṣasyokte tatpūrvakatvād itareṣām apy{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4920: 213}animittatvaṃ śakyāvagamam iti na pṛthaṅ nibadhyate. yathā vakṣyati -- pratyakṣadvāratvād anumānādīnām[623]apy akāraṇatvam iti. lakṣaṇānupayoge[624]'pi yaḥ paryanuyogo dattaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4921: so 'py atra lakṣaṇānabhyupagamād eva nāstīty āha -- na ceti // 23 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4925: tathā grāhyaviśeṣaṇānupādānād anumānādyanupasaṅgrahāc ca nyūnaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4927: api yad uktaṃ tad apy atra nāśaṅkyata ity āha -- na ceti. lakṣaṇakaraṇasya hi nyūnātirekādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:4928: doṣāḥ nālakṣaṇe prasajantīti. etad dhy atra sarvathā pratipādyaṃ yallokaprasiddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4929: pratyakṣaṃ tad evaṃdharmakam iti. sampūrṇaṃ tu pratyakṣasya svarūpam anenābhidhīyatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4930: mā vā. na nas tatra tātparyam. ataś cānyaparatvāt sūtrasya lakṣaṇapakṣoktā mṛgatṛṣṇādisaṃvidām
GSP28mimsvtku:4931: api pratyakṣatā nāpadyate ity āha -- sarvatheti // 25 //
GSP28mimsvtku:4933: evaṃ tarhi pratyakṣam animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvād ity etāvad eva vaktavyam. kiṃ satsamprayogajatvādyupanyāsena,
GSP28mimsvtku:4934: ata āha -- atīteti sārdhadvayena. ayam arthaḥ -- satyam etāvatāpy animittatā pratipāditaiva.[625]kin
GSP28mimsvtku:4935: tu vidyamānopalambhanatvam evāsiddhaṃ yogināṃ muktātmanāṃ cātītānāgatādiviṣayajñānotpatter iti ye manyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4936: tān prati hetusiddhyarthaṃ satsamprayogajatvam api hetvantaram upanyastaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4937: na punaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpavivakṣayā. tathā vidyamānopalambhanatvād iti hetum abhidadhatā
GSP28mimsvtku:4938: avidyamāno[626]bhaviṣyaddharmo bhaviṣyattvād eva na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyata iti yo hetur antarṇītaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4939: tasyāpi yogim uktātmanāṃ grāhyair arthāntarair bhaviṣyadbhir vyabhicāritā mā bhūd ity etad artham api satsamprayogajatvasyopādānam. etad dhy{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4940: 214}anenocyate -- sarvam eva pratyakṣaṃ saty evendriyasamprayoge jāyate. ato na kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:4941: bhaviṣyadviṣayam iti nāsti vyabhicāraḥ. asiddhatāvyabhicārite samāhṛtya mā bhūtām
GSP28mimsvtku:4946: idaṃ tv iha vaktavyaṃ - nirākṛtam eva aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanād
GSP28mimsvtku:4947: ity atra yogipratyakṣasyānāgatādiviṣayatvam. atra kiṃ punar upanyāseneti. tatraike
GSP28mimsvtku:4948: vadanti -- tatra hi vacanādṛte puruṣāṇām atīndriyānubhavaśaktir nirākṛtā. atra punarvacanād
GSP28mimsvtku:4949: eva pratītya ciraṃ bhāvayato dharmādharmau pratyakṣau bhaviṣyata iti pratyavasthānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4950: nirākriyata iti. tad ayuktam. sarvaṃ hi tadanāgatāvekṣaṇena bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:4951: ihaiva sūtrakāreṇa svayam uktatvāt. na caiṣa pareṣām api siddhāntaḥ yad akasmād eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4953: sākṣād bhāvā bhāsanta iti. api tarhi āgamād eva sāmānyato viditān dharmāṃś ciraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4954: bhāvayataḥ sphuṭam avikalpakāś ca prakāśanta iti. bhāvanābalajam eva jñānaṃ divyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4955: cakṣur ity ācakṣate. yat tu bhautikenaiva cakṣuṣā sarvam aparokṣīkriyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4956: tadatisthavīyaḥ. prauḍhipradarśanaparatayā tair uktam. tādṛśam api cātraiva nirākāryam,
GSP28mimsvtku:4957: ihaiva sūtrakāreṇa nirākṛtatvāt. tasmād atratyam evānāgatāvekṣaṇena tatroktam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4958: uktam eva. nanu ca pūrvapūrvahetvasiddhyāśaṅkayottarottarahetupradarśanam iti yato
GSP28mimsvtku:4959: 'sti tatra dharmo 'yam ityādinā pratyakṣatvamadohetur ity evamantenoktam iti gatārtham idam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4962: atrocyate -- pratyavasthānabījam idānīṃ pareṣām abhidhīyate. avidyamānopalambhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:4963: eva hi yogajadharmabalena yogināṃ pratyakṣam iti hi te pratipannāḥ. ata eva atītānāgate
GSP28mimsvtku:4964: 'py arthe ityādinā hetvasiddhibījam upadarśitam. pūrvaṃ tv asiddhyāśaṅkayā hetukramāśrayaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4965: ity etāvad evoktam. katham asiddhir ity atra na kiñcid uktam. yogyartham abhidhīyate
GSP28mimsvtku:4966: ity atrāpi yoginām atiśayaviśeṣo 'ntarṇītaḥ. sa eva atītānāgatetyādinā prakaṭīkṛtaḥ. kaḥ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:4967: 215}punaratītānāgatādiviṣayatve pratyakṣasya teṣām abhiprāyaḥ. śrūyatām. evaṃ hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4968: manyante -- yad vidyamānopalambhanam asmadādipratyakṣaṃ tena mā nāma dharmo 'nubhūyatām.
GSP28mimsvtku:4969: bhāvanābalabhuvā tu sakalātītā[628]nāgatādiviṣayeṇa kiṃ nānubhūyate. tadasiddher
GSP28mimsvtku:4970: anupapannam iti cet. na. anumānād upapatteḥ. tatraitat syād -- na tasya bhāvanābalabhuvaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4971: pratyakṣasyāsmadādāv adṛṣṭacarasya sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam astīti. tac ca na. evam
GSP28mimsvtku:4973: atiśayo dṛśyate. tathā hi -- kim anyat. iha khalu nitāntaduradhigamam ātmānam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4975: iti viśadataram avalokayante kṛtinaḥ kecid iti vedāntavādino vadanti. na hi tadasmadādivedyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4976: neti yogino 'pi na budhyante. tadvad vā vayam api vijānīmaḥ. bhavati cātra kāraṇaprakarṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:4977: hi kāryaprakarṣeṇa vyāpto dṛṣṭaḥ citrakārādiśilpaprakarṣa iva citrādikarmaprakarṣeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:4978: prakṛṣyate ca kasyacid yogino bhāvanābalabhuvaḥ pratyakṣasya kāraṇam iti svabhāvahetuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4979: athāpi syāt kutaḥ kāraṇaprakarṣo 'vagamyata iti. svabhāvahetor eva. yo yadabhiniviśamāno
GSP28mimsvtku:4981: citrakārasyeva śilpam. abhyasyati ca kaścid avahito dhyānam iti sādhyānvitahetupradarśanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4982: ato dhyānaprakarṣāt tadbalabhuvo jñānasya prakarṣaḥ. kaś ca jñānasyāparaḥ prakarṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4988: tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yadyad evātibhāvyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:4990: iti. nanu jīvanāya śilpināṃ śilpābhyāso yuktaḥ. na tu dhyānābhyāsasya kiñcinnibandhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:4991: asti. kathaṃ nāsti. karuṇā hi dhyānābhyāse nibandhanam. kaścit khalu bhavāntarīyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4993: 216}sa karuṇām evābhiniviśate. abhyāsātiśayāc ca sā tasya prakarṣakāṣṭhām āsādayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4994: sa kāṣṭhāprāptaprakarṣakaruṇo duḥkhottarān saṃsāriṇo dṛṣṭvā dūraṃ dūyamānamānasaś
GSP28mimsvtku:4995: cintayati katham etān uddhareyam iti. tataḥ sa puruṣārthasādhanam anvicchan dhyānāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4996: prayasyati. tataś cirābhyāsān niṣpannadhyāno dharmādharmāv apy aparokṣam īkṣate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4998: hi te. ato yuktaṃ yaddehendriyānuvidhāyisaṃvedanā bhavantīti. yadā punar amī yogābhyāsād
GSP28mimsvtku:5000: tadā dehendriyair vimucyante. tadā niyāmakābhāvāt svayaṃ ca prakāśasvabhāvatvāt sarvam
GSP28mimsvtku:5001: atītādi budhyante. atas tān prati vidyamānopalambhanatvam asiddham iti tatpratibodhanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:5002: lokaprasiddhaṃ sad ityādy ayaṃ jaiminir āheti. tān indānīṃ pratibodhayati -- na lokavyatiriktam
GSP28mimsvtku:5003: iti. ayam arthaḥ -- teṣām api pratyakṣaṃ na lokottaraṃ bhavitum arhatīti // 28 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5006: atra kāraṇam āha -- pratyakṣatveneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- tad yogināṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ navā. yady apratyakṣaṃ na tarhi pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5007: pratyakṣānumānavyatiriktapramāṇānabhyupagamād anumānalakṣaṇābhāvāc ca. na cāpramāṇam arthavyavasthāpanāyālam. ataḥ kiṃ tad abhyupagamena. atha
GSP28mimsvtku:5008: anvarthatvāt pratyakṣaśabdasya avaśyam eva tenendriyajanmanā bhavitavyam. na hy anindriyajaṃ pratyakṣam iti laukikānām upacāro dṛśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5011: kalpanāpoḍham abhrāntaṃ pratyakṣam iti. abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsāpratītiḥ kalpanā.
GSP28mimsvtku:5013: pratyakṣam iti. idaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ yoginām api jñānaṃ vyāpnoty eva. tad[632]dhi nirvikalpakam
GSP28mimsvtku:5014: abhrāntam. ata eva pratyakṣaṃ caturdhā vibhajante tac caturvidham indriyajam indriyajasamanantarapratyayodbhavaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5015: mānasaṃ sarvacittacaittānām ātmasaṃvedanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti. yadi hīndriyajatvam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:5017: tritayam apratyakṣaṃ syāt. mānasaṃ ca mīmāṃsakair api pratyakṣam iṣyata eva. ataḥ sarvānugatāparokṣāvabhāsitvamātravacana eva pratyakṣaśabdo{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:5018: 217}niścīyate. yathā gamerḍor iti ḍopratyayānto vyutpādito gośabdo 'gacchaty api prayogadarśanāt sarvānugatagojātimātravacano niścīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5020: iti. tan na. avayavānvayāvyabhicārāt. avayavānvayavyabhicāre hi samudāyaśaktir ātmānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5021: labhate. na ca pratyakṣaśabdavācyam indriyānvayaṃ vyabhicarati. mānase vyabhicāra
GSP28mimsvtku:5022: iti cet. na. manaso 'pīndriyatvāt. atha nāsti mano nāmendriyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:5023: indriyajam eva tu jñānaṃ dhārāvāhikeṣu santanyamāneṣūttarakṣaṇagrāhiṇo jñānasya kāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5024: mana iti gīyate. uttaraṃ ca mānasam iti. tad ayuktam. atīte hīndriyaja[634]jñāna
GSP28mimsvtku:5025: uttarakṣaṇo 'nubhūyate. sa katham asambaddhena tenāvabhāsayituṃ śakyate. akṣavad iti ced,
GSP28mimsvtku:5026: na. prāpyakāritvasyākṣāṇām ihaiva vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato dvitīyakṣaṇagrahaṇam[635]apīndriyajam
GSP28mimsvtku:5027: eveti nāsti vyabhicāraḥ. tasyāpīndriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt. na hi nimīlitanayanasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5028: rūpabuddhir anuvartamānā dṛśyate. ato 'vayavānvayāvyabhicārān na samudāyaśakter ātmalābhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5029: ato 'nindriyajaṃ sad yogināṃ muktātmanāṃ vā jñānaṃ na pratyakṣam. pratyakṣaṃ sanniyataṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5037: yac ca bhāvanābalaṃ yogijñānajanmani kāraṇam uktam. tan na,
GSP28mimsvtku:5038: avagataviṣayatvād bhāvanāyāḥ. na cākasmād evāvagater utpattiḥ sambhavati. sarvotpattimatāṃ kāraṇavattvāt. atha pramāṇāntarāvagataṃ bhāvyate kiṃ bhāvanayā,
GSP28mimsvtku:5039: tata eva tatsiddheḥ. kiñ ca tat pramāṇaṃ na tāvadanumānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5041: api kim api kāraṇam astīty etāvad unnīyate. na tu kaścid viśeṣaḥ. na cānirdiṣṭaviśeṣaviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5042: bhāvanā bhavati. yogaśāstreṣv api viśeṣā eva dhyeyatayopadiśyante --
GSP28mimsvtku:5043: dhyeya ātmā prabhur yo 'sau hṛdaye dīpavat sthitaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5044: ityādibhiḥ. tarhy āgamād avagataṃ bhāvayiṣyate. yadi pramāṇāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:5045: tata evāvagateḥ kiṃ bhāvanayā. hānopādānārthaṃ hi vastu jijñāsyate. te ca tata eva
GSP28mimsvtku:5046: siddhe iti vyarthā bhāvanā. kāruṇiko 'pi dharmāgamān eva prayatnataḥ śiṣyebhyo vyācakṣīta.
GSP28mimsvtku:5047: na bhāvanā[636]parikhedam anubhavet. atha vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvād āgamānāṃ pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:5048: āgamo na veti vicikitsamāno bhāvanayā jijñāsa[637]te. tan na.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:5049: 218}tato 'pi tadasiddheḥ. bhāvanābalapariniṣpannam api jñānam anāśvāsanīyārtham eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:5050: abhūtasyāpi bhāvyamānasyāparokṣavat prakāśāt. tathā tair evoktaṃ - tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5054: api ca bhāvanābalajam apramāṇaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇāt. yāvad eva hi gṛhītaṃ tāvad eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:5055: bhāvanayā viṣayīkriyate. mātrayāpi tv adhikaṃ bhāvanayā na gocarayati. yogābhyāsāhitasaṃskārapāṭavanimittā
GSP28mimsvtku:5056: hi smṛtir eva bhāvanety[638]abhidhīyate. sā ca na pramāṇam iti sthitam eva. na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:5057: taduttarakālaṃ sākṣātkārijñānam udetīti pramāṇam asti. indriyasannikarṣam antareṇārthasākṣātkārasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5058: kvacid apy adarśanāt. bhavati cātra[639]prayogaḥ -- yogināṃ dharmādharmayor aparokṣāvabhāsi
GSP28mimsvtku:5060: asmadādivat. yac ca kāraṇaprakarṣāt kāryaprakarṣa ity uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5061: tad ayuktam. kāraṇaprakarṣānupapatteḥ. bhāvanāprakarṣānupapattiś ca varṇitaiva prayojanābhāvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:5062: anālambanatvād anadhikaviṣayatvāc ca. na ca tathāvidhātiśayavataḥ kasyacid adyatve darśanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5063: yena dṛṣṭatvād abhyupagamyeta. nityanirdoṣavedāntapramāṇake tu brahmātiśaye na kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:5064: anupapannam. tatrāpi tu nānindriyajaṃ pratyakṣam upapadyate. samucchinnasakalamitimātṛmeyamānaprapañcā
GSP28mimsvtku:5065: hi sāvasthā. yatrāpi cābhyāsāt prakarṣo dṛśyate tatrāpi smṛtir eva prakṛṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5066: na punarabhyāsato 'nindriyasannikṛṣṭam api ca vastvaparokṣaṃ bhavati. na hy abhrāntasyāsannihitam
GSP28mimsvtku:5067: avartamānaṃ ca puraḥsthitavadavabhāsata ity utprekṣitum api śakyam ity alam aneneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5071: nanu ca śeṣahetuprasiddhaye pratyakṣatvaṃ hetur iti pūrvam uktam. katham idānīṃ tena vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5072: ata āha -[640]satsamprayogajatvam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nāyaṃ śāstrīyo hetukramaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5073: yena tadatikrame doṣo bhavati. ato vyāptibalena śakyam anenāsmadādipratyakṣavad ubhayaṃ sādhayitum iti yatheṣṭābhidhānam iti // 29 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5076: atra sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣatvābhyupagamena yogipratyakṣasyānimittatāṃ pratipādayatā nimittatvābhyupagame vā na pratyakṣatvam ity arthād āveditam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5077: 219}prayogadvayena darśayati -- teṣām iti dvayena. tatas tv eveti. avartamānaviṣayatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5078: evety arthaḥ. yadi tu nirākṛtasvapakṣo bauddho 'pratyakṣaśabdavācyam eva tat pramāṇāntaram iti brūyāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:5079: tadarthaṃ pramāṇatvanirākaraṇam. etac ca sūtrakāreṇaiva satsamprayogagrahaṇasāmarthyād evopāttam iti sad ity etena kathyate ity uktam iti //
GSP28mimsvtku:5080: anyan mataṃ - siddhānāṃ khalu dharmānugrahavaśenānāgatādiviṣayā pratibhaiva jāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5081: sā cādyatve kvacid asmadādīnām apy utpadyate yathā śvo me bhrātāganteti. prāyeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5082: tv ṛṣīṇāṃ tajjñānam utpadyata ity ārṣam ity ucyate. yathāhuḥ -- ārṣaṃ siddhadarśanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5083: ca dharmebhyaḥ iti. tan nirākaroti laukikīti. ayam arthaḥ -- yoginām ṛṣīṇāṃ vā pratibhā
GSP28mimsvtku:5085: pratibhātvād asmadādipratibhāvat. asmadādīnāṃ hi visaṃvādabhūyiṣṭhā pratibhopalabhyata iti // 32 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5086: evaṃ tāvad vidyamānopalambhanatvasya hetor asiddhim āśaṅkya satsamprayogajatvād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5087: yad uktaṃ tad vivṛtam. idānīṃ bhaviṣyattvasya hetor anaikāntikaśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5088: yad uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti -- avidyamāneti. ayam arthaḥ -- yadi satsamprayogajaṃ pratyakṣam iti nocyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:5089: tato 'vidyamāne 'pi saṃyoge yogināṃ kvacit pratyakṣaṃ jāyata iti tasya bhaviṣyaty
GSP28mimsvtku:5090: api dharme śaktir anivāritā syāt. tataś ca bhaviṣyattvasya hetor anaikāntikatvam[641]iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5094: {1,220} nanu bhaviṣyattvād dharmo na pratyakṣa ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5095: tad yadāsau bhaviṣyaṃs tadā mā nāma pratyakṣo bhavatu. yadā tu pravartate tadā kin nāma na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5096: ata āha -- pratyakṣa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- anuṣṭhānārthaṃ hi pramāṇam anviṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5097: tadanuṣṭhānāt prāg evānveṣyam. na cānuṣṭhānāt prāg dharmo 'stīti kathaṃ pratyakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:5098: bhaved iti. kim idānīm anyenānuṣṭhito vidyamānaḥ pratyakṣo[642]dharmaḥ nety āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:5099: anuṣṭhita iti. na pratyakṣa iti sambandha iti. atra kāraṇam āha -- phalasādhanarūpeṇeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5100: bhaved etad evaṃ yadi dravyādayaḥ svarūpeṇa dharmā bhaveyuḥ. phalasādhanarūpeṇa caite
GSP28mimsvtku:5101: dharmā iti tādrūpyeṇa ca dharmatvam ity atroktam. tac ca rūpam anuṣṭhānakāle nāsti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5102: āmuṣmikaphaleṣv atra phalasyābhāvāt. aihikaphaleṣv api cireṇa. nirantarayor hi sādhyasādhanayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5103: sādhanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati mardanasukhayor iva. iha tu phalakāle sādhanaṃ cirātivṛttaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5104: sādhanakāle phalam ajātam iti na phalasādhanaṃ pratyakṣam. śaktis tu sarvabhāvānāṃ nityaparokṣaiva. tena na tadviśiṣṭo dharmaḥ pratyakṣo bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:5107: prakṛtam idānīṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvena pratyakṣasya dharme 'nimittatvam upasaṃharati
GSP28mimsvtku:5108: - asmad[643]iti dharmentena. dhyāyināṃ pratyakṣaṃ vidyamānopalambhanaṃ sad dharme
GSP28mimsvtku:5109: na pramāṇam asmatpratyakṣavat. vakṣyamāṇahetvapekṣayā caśabdaḥ. neṣyata iti vakṣyamāṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:5110: sambandha iti. ayaṃ ca sūtrakāreṇopapattikramoktyā sarveṣāṃ cittaṃ bhāvayituṃ[644]hetukramo
GSP28mimsvtku:5111: darśitaḥ. śakyate ca pratyakṣatvamātreṇaivānimittatā sādhayitum ity āha -- pratyakṣatvād iti // 35 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5116: 221}sacchabdam ādau cintayati. atra bhikṣuṇoktaṃ sadviśeṣaṇam anarthakam,
GSP28mimsvtku:5118: sad ity asadvyudāsāya na niyogāt sa gaṃsyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:5120: iti. etad anabhyupagamena nirākṛtya karmadhārayasamāsam eva darśayati -- avidyamāneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5121: asyārthaḥ -- nāyam arthaḥ sūtrasya satā samprayogaḥ satsamprayoga iti. kiṃ tarhi.
GSP28mimsvtku:5122: saṃś cāsau samprayogaś ceti karmadhārayo 'yam. sacchabdaś ca vidyamānavacanaḥ. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:5123: ayam artho bhavati -- vidyamānasamprayogajaṃ pratyakṣam iti. tataś ca yat teṣām avidyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:5124: 'rthe ityādinā yogijñānasya pratyakṣatvanirākaraṇam uktaṃ tad evaṃ labhyate. vartamānārthavācino
GSP28mimsvtku:5125: hi sacchabdasyāsad[645]vyudāsaḥ. sa katham asati tasmin sidhyet. ayaṃ ca sūtrārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5126: satīndriyārthasambandhe iti vyācakṣāṇena bhāṣyakāreṇokta iti draṣṭavyam iti // 36 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5129: nanv ayam artho nimittasaptamyaivātra labhyate. na hy asatsamprayogo nimittaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5130: ata āha -- sasamyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam avartamānaḥ samprayogo nākṣaje jñāne
GSP28mimsvtku:5131: kāraṇam. api tu tam api kecit kāraṇatayā manyante. tad iha samprayoga ity etāvati
GSP28mimsvtku:5132: śrute sati bhāviny atīte ceti yatheṣṭaṃ kalpayeyuḥ. atas tatkalpanānirākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5133: vyaktam eva jaimininā sadviśeṣaṇam upāttam iti // 37 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5134: vyākhyātaḥ sacchabdaḥ. saṃśabdam idānīm anusandhatte -- samyag iti. samyakprayogaḥ samprayogaḥ. tena duṣprayogo nivārito bahvatīti. āha -- viśekṣyati bhavān samā prayogaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5135: prayogam eva[646]tāvadādau bhavān vyākurutām ata āha -- prayoga iti. rūpādisaṃvitkāryonneyam indriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraṃ prayogāparaparyāyam ācakṣata iti // 38 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5138: {1,222} kaḥ punar atra duṣprayogaḥ yaḥ saṃśabdena vyāvartyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5139: ata āha -- duṣṭatvād iti. kathaṃ punar asau duṣṭaḥ. prayogasya hy atyāsattyādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:5140: doṣāḥ. na ca te śuktisamprayuktacakṣuṣo bhrāmyato doṣā bhavanti. viṣaya eva tu tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:5141: sādṛśyad ūṣito viparītakhyātihetuḥ. ata āha -- rajatekṣaṇād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5142: -- jñānakāraṇaṃ hi samprayogaḥ sa duṣṭo 'nyadanyātmanā bhāsayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5143: kāraṇadoṣāvinābhāvāt kāryadoṣasya. aduṣṭas tu samyagjñānaṃ janayati. sarvakāraṇadoṣābhāvena ca tasya samyaktvaṃ bhavati. yadā punar indriyārthayor anyatarad api duṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5144: tadā tadāśritaḥ saṃyogo 'pi duṣṭo bhavati. ataḥ saṃyogasya svadoṣā atyāsattyādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:5145: viṣayadoṣāś ca sādṛśyādayo dūṣakā bhavanti. tad iha śuktau rajatam iti gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5146: kāryadoṣāt śuktikāyogo duṣṭa ity avagamyate. ato 'sau samyagarthavācinā saṃśabdena
GSP28mimsvtku:5147: vāryata iti. evañ cāvayavavyākhyāyām āśrīyamāṇāyāṃ lokasiddhalakṣaṇānuvādenāpy animittatvavidhir
GSP28mimsvtku:5149: tathā yad api bauddhaiḥ prāptivacanaṃ prayogaśabdaṃ manvānaiḥ śrotracakṣuṣor aprāpyakāritvād avyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam ity uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5150: tad api vyāpāramātravacanaṃ prayogaśabdaṃ vyācakṣāṇair asmābhiḥ parihṛtam ity āha -- tataś ceti. vyāpāramātravācitvād aviruddham ity uparitanena sambandha iti // 40 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5151: śrotracakṣuṣor aprāpyakāritve bauddhānām abhiprāyam āha -- prāpyeti nontena. evaṃ hi tair uktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:5152: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca /
GSP28mimsvtku:5153: iti. yadi cakṣuśśrotre viṣayaṃ prāpya gṛhṇītaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5154: yad idaṃ dūre śabdo dūre 'rtha iti sāntaragrahaṇaṃ yac ca sumahatāṃ mahīmahīdharādīnām adhiṣṭhānādhikaparimāṇānāṃ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:5156: prāpyakāriṣu tvagādiṣv adarśanāt. tad etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yat prāpyakāri na tat sāntaram adhikaṃ ca vedayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5157: yathā kāyaḥ na ca tathā śrotracakṣuṣī ity āvītahetuḥ. upālambhe kilaśabdaḥ. ubhayasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:5158: samādhāsyamānatvād iti. ārjavāvasthānaṃ vā samprayogo 'bhimata ity āha -- yadi veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5159: ārjavāvasthitasya hi rūpādijñānam utpadyate. tatraiva samprayogaśabdopacāraḥ. tvagādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:5160: samprayogaśabdārtho jñānahetur upalabdhaḥ. tad idam ārjavāvasthānam api taddhetutayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5161: tathā vyapadiśyate. evam eva vyāpāre 'pi darśayitavyam iti // 41-42 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5162: kāryalakṣitayogyatālakṣaṇo vā yaḥ śabdārthayor iva rūpādicakṣurādyoḥ sambandhaḥ samprayoga
GSP28mimsvtku:5163: ity āha -- yogyateti. athavāstu sāṅkhyādisiddhāntasiddhaḥ prāptirūpa eva sambandhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5164: nātrāpi kiñcid duṣyatīty āha -- sāṅkhyādīn iti. nirjitya hi sāṅkhyādīn prāptipakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:5165: 'tra dūṣyate. na ca te nirjetuṃ śakyāḥ. aprāpyakāripakṣe hi sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:5167: anumānenāpi śrotracakṣuṣoḥ prāpyakāritvam avagamyate ity āha -- tayor iti. tayoḥ śrotracakṣuṣor ity arthaḥ. cakṣuśśrotre prāpyakāriṇī,
GSP28mimsvtku:5168: bāhyendriyatvāt tvagindriyavad iti. nanu ca karṇaśaṣkulī cakṣurgolakaṃ ca śarīrastham evopalabhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5169: kathaṃ tat prāpyakārīty ucyate. tad etad eteṣāṃ tāvat prāpyakārivādināṃ sāṅkhyānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5170: matena samādadhāti -- kecid iti. evaṃ hi sāṅkhyā manyante -- āhaṅkārikayoḥ śrotracakṣuṣor
GSP28mimsvtku:5171: vṛttiḥ śarīrād bahir bhavati arthadeśaṃ prāpnoti. sā ca kāryadarśanonneyā yathākāryam
GSP28mimsvtku:5174: tatroddharaṇapūraṇādinigrahānugrahadarśanāt. itarathā tadasambhavāt. yadi hy adhiṣṭhānātiriktam akṣaṃ bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:5176: ata āha -- cikitsādīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadīndriyam adhiṣṭhāne na sambaddhaṃ bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:5177: tato 'dhiṣṭhānasaṃskāras tasyopakārako na syāt. adhiṣṭhānādhāraṃ tu tat. atas tasyaivādhārabhūtasyādhiṣṭhānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5179: nanv evam api golakādhikaraṇasyaiva tatsaṃskāra upakārako bhavatu,
GSP28mimsvtku:5180: tasya tv asambaddhasya bhāgasya golakena golakasaṃskāro nopakārakaḥ syāt. tena ca
GSP28mimsvtku:5181: saṃskṛte na prayojanam. tasyaiva prāptatvena prakāśakatvāt. ato yat prakāśakaṃ tat
GSP28mimsvtku:5182: saṃskartum aśakyam asambandhāt. yac ca śakyaṃ na tena saṃskṛtena prayojanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:5184: ata āha -- taddeśa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- ekaivendriyavṛttir anugatādhiṣṭhānadeśasambandhā arthadeśaṃ yāvat prāptā,
GSP28mimsvtku:5185: ato 'dhiṣṭhānadeśa eva saṃskāraḥ sarvopakārako bhaviṣyati. yathā pādayoḥ prayuktaḥ saṃskāro dūrasthasyāpi cakṣuṣa upakārako bhaviṣyatīti //
GSP28mimsvtku:5186: ato nāyam ekāntaḥ yadadhiṣṭhānadeśe saṃskārāt tadvartyevendriyamitīty āha -- tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:5187: iti. nirantarādhikagrahaṇam upapādayati -- bahir iti syādantena. kāryadarśanabalena
GSP28mimsvtku:5189: 225}ity uktam. ato 'dhiṣṭhānādhikaparimāṇārthadarśanāt pṛthvagrā kalpayiṣyate. nirantaradarśanāc ca santatā. ato yatra yādṛśaṃ vṛttibhāge pārthavaṃ pṛthutvaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5190: tadanurūpam evādhiṣṭhānādhikaṃ mahīdharādi gṛhyate. amūrtāyā api vṛtter aupādhiko
GSP28mimsvtku:5191: vyomna iva bhāgavyapadeśaḥ. yad eva tayā prakāśyate tadaupādhikam eva bhāgavyapadeśaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5192: labhate iti. na ca vācyaṃ yadi vṛttir gatvārthaṃ prakāśayati kim iti tarhi nitāntadūravartino
GSP28mimsvtku:5193: 'pi bhāvān na prakāśayatīti. yāvati hi dūre kāryam upalabhyate tāvantam evādhvānam
GSP28mimsvtku:5194: asau sarpatīty adhikadarśanavat kalpanīyam ity āha -- dūre 'pīti // 48 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5196: sā tarhi nirgatya gatāsty eveti kiṃ na pihitendriyasyāpi bhāvā bhāsante,
GSP28mimsvtku:5197: ata āha -- dīpaprabheti. nāvaśyaṃ pihitendriyasya vṛttir asti kāryābhāvāt tu sā dīpanāśe prabhāvannimīlayato 'pi naṣṭety unnīyata iti // 49
GSP28mimsvtku:5198: astu vā adhiṣṭhānapidhāne 'pi vṛttiḥ. ātmaprayatnānugṛhītā tu sā ātmany artham upanayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5199: adhiṣṭhānapidhāne hy ātmanaḥ prayatnocchedāt prayatnānadhiṣṭhitayā tayānupanīto 'rtho
GSP28mimsvtku:5201: vicchinnabodham idānīm upapādayati -- vicchinna itīti. vibhor apy ātmanaḥ prāgbhavīyaka[647]rmārjitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5202: sakalabhogāyatanaṃ śarīram iti. tadapekṣayā vicchedabuddhiḥ. kāyendriye tu śarīravicchedābhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5203: avicchedabodho yukta iti. śabde tu vicchedādhikabodho bhrāntir eveti kiṃ tadupapādanena.[648]tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5204: hi -- svadeśa eva śabdaḥ śrotreṇa prakāśyate. kutas tasya vicchedaḥ. kutaḥ vibhor{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:5205: 226}amūrtasya vṛddhihrāsāv ity āha - śabde[649] tv iti. etat tu svamatenoktam. sāṅkhyamate
GSP28mimsvtku:5206: tu śrotravṛttiḥ śabdadeśaṃ gacchaty eva. tatra śarīrāpekṣayaiva vicchedabodho vaktavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5212: ayaṃ ca sāṅkhyasiddhāntasiddho vṛttigamanapakṣo vārttikakāreṇa prāptisādhāraṇyamātreṇoktaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5213: na punarabhipretaḥ. na hīndriyavṛttir nāma kācit pramāṇenāvagamyate. tathā hi -- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilā manyante. yathāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:5215: iti. kaś cāyam ahaṅkāraḥ. yadi yo 'yam ātmānaṃ prakāśayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5216: sa tarhi jñānamitīndriyāṇāṃ kathaṃ prakṛtir bhaviṣyati. ātmādhāram āntaraṃ jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5217: kathaṃ tena bāhyendriyāṇyārabdhuṃ śakyante. atha mataṃ tattvāntaram ahaṅkāra iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5218: tan na. pramāṇābhāvāt. api ca tattvāntaram api tat kāpilair vibhuḥ saṅgīryate. tatas
GSP28mimsvtku:5219: tanmayānīndriyāṇy api vibhūni bhaveyuḥ. na ca vibhūnāṃ vṛttir upapadyate. vṛttir
GSP28mimsvtku:5220: nirgamanam. na ca tad vibhūnāṃ sambhavati. syān matam -- na ca brūmo vibhūnīndriyāṇi gacchantīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5221: kiṃ tarhi. tadādhārā vṛttir iti. keyaṃ vṛttir iti vaktavyam. yadi śrotrādīnāṃ śabdādigrahaṇayogyatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:5222: sā tarhy amūrtā śaktiḥ kathaṃ gacchet. api ca trīṇy antaḥkaraṇāni mahānahaṅkāro mana
GSP28mimsvtku:5223: iti kāpilā manyante. na ca karaṇaṃ karaṇāntarāṇāṃ prakṛtir upapadyate karaṇatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:5224: manovat. ato nāhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi. na ca tadvṛttir amūrtā prāpyakāriṇīti pramāṇavatī
GSP28mimsvtku:5225: kalpanā. tathā śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyati śrotrāgamanapakṣe cety atra vṛttigamanapratiṣedham.
GSP28mimsvtku:5227: kiṃ punarbhautikatve pramāṇam indriyāṇām. dṛṣṭānusāraḥ. tathā hi -- bahirbhūtānām
GSP28mimsvtku:5228: eva yathāyathaṃ rūpādyabhivyañjakatvam upalabdham. tejasā hi rūpaṃ prakāśyate yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5229: dīpena. raso 'dbhiḥ. śuṣkāṇām[650]api dravyāṇāṃ sann api raso na vyaktam upalabhyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5230: yathārdrāṇām. na ca śuṣkeṣu raso nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5231: yāvaddravyabhāvitvāt. ato 'dbhī raso 'bhivyajyate. pārthivaṃ ca kiñcid dravyaṃ{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:5232: 227}gandhasyābhivyañjakaṃ dṛṣṭam. yathā nimbatvak candanagandhasya. tatkaṣāyapariṣiktasya hi candanasya sphuṭataraṃ gandho 'bhivyajyate. na cādbhir asāv abhivyajyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5233: kevalānām anabhivyañjakatvāt. vāyunāpi bahiḥ sparśābhivyaktir upalabdhā,
GSP28mimsvtku:5234: yathā hemantaśiśirayor viyati vitatānām apāṃ sūkṣmatvād anupalakṣyamāṇānāṃ vāpi vāte
GSP28mimsvtku:5235: śītasparśo 'vagamyate. na cāsau vāyoḥ. anuṣṇāśītasparśatvād vāyoḥ. ato rūpābhivyañjakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5236: cakṣus taijasam. āpyaṃ rasanam abhivyañjakaṃ ca rasasya. ghrāṇaṃ pārthivaṃ gandhasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:5237: vāyavīyaṃ tvagindriyaṃ sparśasya. śrotram idānīṃ kiṃprakṛtikam. tad api bhautikam
GSP28mimsvtku:5238: indriyatvāt. kiṃ punarbhūtaṃ tasya prakṛtiḥ. ākāśa iti vadāmaḥ. tathā hi -- dvividhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5239: kāryaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śarīram indriyaṃ ca. ākāśasyāpy avakāśadānena śarīropakārakatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:5240: kāryakāraṇatvam. atas tasyāpīndriyeṇa kāryeṇa bhavitavyam. tatrendriyāntarāṇāṃ bhūtāntaraprakṛtitvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5241: ākāśam eva śrotrasya prakṛtir iti niścīyate. api ca svaguṇam eva bhūtāntarāṇi vyañjayanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5243: ākāśaguṇatvāt. ata ākāśam eva tasyābhivyañjakam iti yuktam. evañ ca dṛṣṭānusāriṇī
GSP28mimsvtku:5244: kalpanā kṛtā bhavati. santi hi deheṣu pṛthivyādibhūtabhāgāḥ kḷptagandhādyabhivyaktiśaktayaś
GSP28mimsvtku:5245: ca bahir iti śarīre 'pi vartamānānāṃ teṣām eva vyañjakatvānumānaṃ yuktam. evañ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:5247: ma)rthitā bhavati. tvagghrāṇarasanānāṃ hi sthitam eva prāpyakāritvam. śrotrasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:5248: karṇacchidraparimitanabhaso dharmādharmopagṛhītasya svadeśa eva vibhuṃ śabdaṃ prakāśayataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5249: prāpyakāritvam eva. tejaso hi visaraṇasvabhāvasya cakṣuṣo nirgatasyārthadeśaprāptir
GSP28mimsvtku:5250: upapannaiva. anudbhūtarūpatvāc ca tasya rūpānupalambhaḥ. ata evāgnitejasaḥ pṛthvagrādikalpanā
GSP28mimsvtku:5252: mūrtatvād upapattimatī. sarvatra ca yathākāryadarśanaṃ yogyatāsanāthā prāptir indriyārthayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5253: sambandha iti darśayitavyam. ato na kācid atiprasaktir vaktavyā yathā vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:5254: prāptimātraṃ hi sambandhaḥ iti. ataḥ siddham indriyāṇi bhautikāni prāpyakārīṇi ceti // 51 //
GSP28mimsvtku:5257: evaṃ tāvat satsamprayogaśabdāḥ vivṛtāḥ. padānvayam ataḥ param anusandhāsyāmaḥ. atra kila puruṣasya samprayoga indriyāṇāṃ buddhijanmety ucyate.{1,
GSP28mimsvtku:5259: vibhoḥ puruṣasya sarvabhāvair eva samprayogāvyabhicāreṇa viśeṣaṇopādānavaiyarthyāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5260: indriyāṇāṃ ca bhautikānām acetanatvāt. cetanā hi buddhir iti sarvalaukikāḥ parīkṣakāś
GSP28mimsvtku:5261: ca manyante. na punarindriyavyāpāro buddhir iti. sāṅkhyā hīndriyavṛttau buddhiśabdam
GSP28mimsvtku:5262: upacaranti. tatra teṣām eva paribhāṣāmātram. ato 'tra vaktavyaṃ kīdṛśo 'tra padānvaya
GSP28mimsvtku:5263: ity ata āha -- puruṣendriyaśabdāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kim atra vaktavyam. bhāṣyakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5264: puruṣendriyaśabdau vyavahitakalpanayā vyākhyātau yenaivam āha satīndriyārthasambandhe
GSP28mimsvtku:5265: puruṣasya yā buddhir jāyate tat pratyakṣam iti. kaḥ punar ayaṃ puruṣaḥ yasya buddhijanmanā sambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5266: ata āha -- puruṣa iti. nātra tātparyamanyaparatvāt sūtrasya. paramārthatas tu puruṣo 'trātmābhipretaḥ ya ātmavāde prasādhayiṣyate. na śarīraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5268: nanv evam api yannityam ātmānaṃ mīmāṃsakā manyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:5269: tan na sidhyet. jñānajanmani vikārāpattyā carmavadanityatvaprasakteḥ. jñānajanmanā tv avikṛtasya pūrvāvasthāyām ivāpramātṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5270: ata āha -- vikriyeti. evaṃ hi manyante -- na kiñcid vikārmātreṇa vastu naśyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5271: tatpratyabhijñānāt. etac cātmavāda eva bhāṣyakāreṇa vakṣyate. ato duruktaṃ paraiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5272: buddhijanmani puṃsaś ca vikṛtir yady anityatā /
