GSP28mimsvtku:7115: daśādhyāya eva śeṣalakṣaṇaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ. yo 'pi vacanavyaktibhedena pūrvapakṣasiddhāntavibhāgaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7116: yathā svargakāmo yajeteti svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yāgena svargaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7118: so 'pi nārthaśūnyāsu buddhiṣu sidhyati. karmabhyaś ca darśapūrṇamāsakārīryādibhyaḥ paraloke ihaloke bhavatsvargavṛṣṭyādiphalasambandho bāhyāśraya
GSP28mimsvtku:7119: asati tasmin dvaividhyānupapatteḥ. ataḥ sarvam idaṃ bāhyārthasiddhāv asatyām ayuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:7120: āpadyeteti tadupapādanāya dharmārthibhir mīmāṃsakair lokaprasiddhaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7121: pramāṇaiḥ pūrvottarapakṣavibhāgenārthasya sadasadbhāvayor yatnaḥ kāryaḥ. pūrvapakṣaviśuddhā
GSP28mimsvtku:7122: hi buddhiḥ siddhāntakarī bhavati. ato 'numānenaivārthāpahnavapūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7123: tatsadbhāvasiddhānto darśayitavyaḥ. sarvaś cāyaṃ prayāsaḥ sakalalaukikavaidikakriyāṃ{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7124: 33}prati tatsiddhyartham iti yāvat. anyathā sarvārthakriyāṇām ucchedo bhavet. ataḥ prayojanavad bāhyārthapratipādanam. akriyāṅgasya tu pratipāditasyāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:7125: m eveti kriyāṃ pratīti yuktam eveti // 4 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7126: atra codayati -- yadeti. jñānamātrapakṣe hi bauddhānām iva sarvo 'yaṃ pramāṇādivyavahāraḥ sidhyaty eva. te hi vadanti --
GSP28mimsvtku:7128: loke saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ //
GSP28mimsvtku:7129: iti. atas tadvad eva vyavahārasiddhau kiṃ pāramārthikārthapratipādanavyasaneneti // 5 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7130: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- saṃvṛter iti. satyam. saṃvṛtisatyena sarvam idaṃ bauddhair āśrīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7131: na tv etad yuktam. satyabhedānupapatteḥ. yaḥ khalv ayaṃ satyabhedo bauddhair āśritaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7133: nāyam upapadyate. saṃvṛteḥ satyatvābhāvāt. mithyāparyāyo hi saṃvṛtiśabdaḥ. kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7134: tasya satyaśabdasamabhivyāhāraḥ. na hy ayam akṣaśabda iva vibhītakādīnāṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7135: sādhāraṇaḥ satyaśabdaḥ. ataḥ satyabhedānupapattir iti. virodham eva vyanakti -- satyaṃ ced iti // 6 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7136: virodhād eva ca mṛṣārthaparamārthayoḥ sāmānyam api satyatvaṃ nābhyupagantuṃ śakyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7137: samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyam. kutas tasya virodhinor avakāśaḥ. na hi bhavati dharmādharmayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7138: dharmatvam adharmatvaṃ vā sāmānyam ity āha -- satyatvam iti virodhādantena. anyamātrayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7139: api tatparāmarśābhāvād durupagamaṃ sāmānyaṃ vṛkṣasiṃhayor iva vṛkṣatvam. kiṃ punarvirodhinos
GSP28mimsvtku:7141: 34}na hīti. atra cākṣādivat sādhāraṇaśabdatā pūrvaṃ satyaśabdasya nirākṛtā iha gavādivat sāmānyaśabdateti vivecanīyam iti // 7 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7142: ato lokaṃ vañcayituṃ mithyāparyāyo 'pi saṃvṛtiśabdo bauddhavidagdhair anudvegakaratayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7143: mithyātva eva vivakṣite svanāstikyaparijihīrṣayā prayukto lālāyām iva vaktrāsavaśabda
GSP28mimsvtku:7144: ity āha -- tulyārthatva iti saṃvṛtirantena. vakṣyamāṇenetikaraṇena sambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7145: kalpanāvācoyuktir api svanāstikyaparihārārtham eva tair āśritety āha -- kalpaneti
GSP28mimsvtku:7146: ceti. kalpanāmātrakalpitena bāhyena sarvalaukikavyavahāra ity api nirvastuke jagaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7147: abhinnasya cinmātrasya kalpanāyā bhettum aśakyatvād durbhaṇam. kvacid dhi bhinnam
GSP28mimsvtku:7148: eva kiñcid rūpāntaraṃ kalpanās padaṃ bhavati śuktāv iva rajatarūpam. yasya tu na
GSP28mimsvtku:7150: tat kena rūpeṇa kalpyatām. tad etad āha -- kalpanāpīti // 9 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7151: nanu tridhaiva tattvaṃ vibhajāmahe satyam asatyam saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti. saṃvṛtaṃ hi nātyantam asad bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7153: pramāṇāntaravirodhāj jātyādivat. ato na saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇaṃ nāpramāṇam iti vidhāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7154: evedam iti yuktas tadāśrayatayā vyavahāra ity ata āha -- tasmād iti. yataḥ khalu
GSP28mimsvtku:7156: tasmād yat paramārthato nāstīti nirūpyate na tat saṃvṛtyā tadrūpaṃ bhavitum arhati. nāsty eva tat. yat tu tāvad vyavahārāvisaṃvādi tad asty
GSP28mimsvtku:7157: na hy asataḥ sarvadā vyavahārahetubhāvaḥ sambhavati. yad evārthakriyākāri tad eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7158: ca paramārthasad iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ. ataḥ katham arthakriyākāritve saty api jātyādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:7159: asatyatvam. tasmād yadi vyavahārāṅgatayā bāhyam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7161: 35}tad eva satyam ity ucyate. anyat tu saṃvṛtir mithyeti. na tu satyadvayakalpanātmānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7162: labhate. tantreṇa tadvṛttasya pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhaḥ. paramārthata iti ca nāstīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7164: api ca svapnāvagatā apy arthāḥ kecicchokaharṣādivyavahārahetavo dṛśyante. atas te
GSP28mimsvtku:7165: 'pi sāṃvṛtā eva. tadvac ca bāhyārthābhyupagame svapnādibhogatulya eva śubhāśubhakarmaphalopabhogo
GSP28mimsvtku:7166: bhavet. atas tannivṛttyartham api paramārthasatye bāhye prayasyate ity āha -- svapnādīti // 11 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7168: ata āha -- na hīti. kim iti na pravartate ata āha -- yādṛcchikatvād iti. na hi svapnasukhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7169: me bhavatīti vidvāṃsaḥ prayasyanti. yādṛcchikaṃ hi svapnasukham agaṇitasāmparāyikaihikanimittaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7170: na tat prayasyato bhavatīti buddhvā vidvadbhis tūṣṇīm udāsīnair evāsyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:7172: ato 'vaśyaṃ pāramārthikīṃ phalaprāptim icchadbhir upapattyā bāhyavastuviṣayā pratipattir vidhātavyety asti vicārasya prayojanam ity upasaṃharati -- paramārtheti // 13 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7173: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa bāhyārthasadbhāva eva pūrvapakṣapurassaraṃ pratipāditaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7174: na tu jñānasadbhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asti hi tatsadbhāvavipratipattir api. mādhyamikā hi jñānam apy apalapanti. atas tannirākaraṇam api yuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7176: tatra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ata āha -- tatreti trayeṇa. asyārthaḥ -- yogācārā hi jñānamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:7177: arthaśūnyaṃ pāramārthikaṃ manyante. mādhyamikās tu jñeyābhāvād akarmakajñānānutpatter
GSP28mimsvtku:7178: jñānasyāpy abhāvam icchanti. tatra dvayor api vādinos tāvad bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ sādhāraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7179: arthanivṛttyadhīnatvāt jñānanivṛtteḥ. ato dvayor api sādhāraṇo bāhyārthāpalāpa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7180: sa eva nirākriyate. api ca tanmūlo jñānāpahnavaḥ. tatas tasmin nirākṛte nirākṛta
GSP28mimsvtku:7181: eveti bāhyārthasadbhāve pūrvottarapakṣavibhāgena bhāṣyakṛtā prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ. ādyas
GSP28mimsvtku:7182: tatraśabdo vākyopanyāsārthaḥ. dvitīyas tu pūrvoktadarśanabhedaparāmarśārthaḥ. tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:7184: nanu bāhyārthāpahnavo dvidhaiva bauddhair āśritaḥ pramāṇataḥ prameyataś ca. tathā hi -- evaṃ tair uktaṃ - na tāvadaṇavo 'tīndriyāḥ pramāṇaviṣayāḥ. na tatsamūhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7186: ca tanmātrāpātāt. evam āntyāvayavebhyo vikalpya avayavī nirākāryaḥ. te tv atīndriyā
GSP28mimsvtku:7187: eva. ato na kiñcana grāhyam avatiṣṭhate iti. tad etat parityāge kiṃ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7188: yat pramāṇata eva bāhyāpahnava upanyasyate nirasyate ceti. ata āha -- bāhyārtheti sārdhena. ayam arthaḥ -- yady api dvedhā bāhyārthāpahnavo bauddhair āśritaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7189: tathāpi pramāṇāśrita eva mūlabhūtatvād iha vicāryate. pramāṇamūlā hi prameyasthitiḥ. tad yadi pramāṇam anuguṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7190: kiṃ vastuvikalpaiḥ. na tadbalena tadanupapattiṃ parihṛtyārtho vyavasthāpyate. atha tu{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7192: kiṃ prameyavikalpaiḥ kṛtakarair iti. iha śābare tantre. idānīm asminn avasare. pramāṇastha eva bāhyāpahnavo vicāryata iti // 17 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7194: tataḥ pratyakṣasya mukhyatvāt tadanusāreṇaiva vicāro yuktaḥ. bauddhair api pratyakṣasāmarthyād
GSP28mimsvtku:7195: evaikaṃ tattvam āśritam. naikasminn ākāre bhāsamāne dvaitam ātmānaṃ labhate iti hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7196: manyante. anumānaṃ tu bhrāmyataḥ pratyuktam iti kiṃ tatpurassarīkriyate ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7197: prastuta iti. evaṃ hi manyate -- yady api pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇam eva bāhyārthasadasadbhāvayoḥ pradhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7198: tathāpi parair anumānam api bāhyāpahnave darśitam iti tad api nirākāryam. anirākṛte
GSP28mimsvtku:7199: hi tasmiṃs tatraiva kecid āsthāṃ pratibadhnīyuḥ. atra cāyam evopanyāsakramo yuktaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7201: tatas tasya pratyakṣeṇa bādham upanyasya tasmiṃś cokte punaḥ pratyakṣaśaktyapekṣaṇena pūrvottarapakṣāvā(?dāv e/
GSP28mimsvtku:7202: da e)va pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇena nirṇaye kṛte 'numānasyopanyāso 'navasara eva syād iti // 18 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7203: anumānabhāṣyam idānīṃ prakṛtasaṅgatidarśanārtham avatārayati -- tatreti ityantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7204: saṅgatim āha -- asyeti durlabha ityantena. ayam arthaḥ -- yat sūtrakāreṇa tatsaṃyogajaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7205: pratyakṣam uktaṃ tadākṣepeṇaiva saṅgacchate. kālpaniko hy ayam indriyārthasamprayogaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7206: indriyāder abhāvāt. kālpanikaś ca sakalamithyājñānasādhāraṇa iti tadatadyogajatvavibhāgo na yukta iti sūtroktākṣepa iti // 21 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7207: {2,38} svoktākṣepeṇa vā saṅgatir ity āha -- mithyātvam iti. yad etadvṛttikāragranthānta
GSP28mimsvtku:7208: uktaṃ - yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ sa evāsamīcīnapratyayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7209: nānyaḥ iti tadanenākṣipyate. sarvamithyātve viśeṣaṇopādānavaiyarthyam iti // 22 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7210: bhāṣyatirohitam anumānam idānīṃ vispaṣṭam upanyasyati -- stambhādīti. stambhādipratyaya iti dharminirdeśaḥ. mithyeti dharmavacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7211: pratyayatvād iti hetuḥ. tathāhīti dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti // 23 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7212: atra bhāṣyaṃ sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ iti. tad yathāśrutaṃ sarveṣām anālambanatvaṃ sādhayati. tatra cāṃśe siddhasādhanatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7213: vibhramāṇām anālambanatvāt. yadvijñānam anyathā santam anyathā budhyate 'rthaṃ tannirālambanam
GSP28mimsvtku:7214: iṣyata eva. tathā sarvasmin pakṣīkṛte svapnajñānasyāpi tadantarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7215: sarva eveti caivaśabdānupapattiś ca. sa hi vibhaktapratiṣedhe dṛṣṭaḥ. yathedaṃ devebhya
GSP28mimsvtku:7216: idaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti vibhakte bhavati vacanaṃ sarvam evedaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti. tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:7217: vibhāgapratiṣedhapara evakāro dṛśyate. sarvasmiṃs tu pakṣe sarva ity ācakṣīta,
GSP28mimsvtku:7218: naivakāraṃ prayuñjīta. ato jāgradbuddhivivakṣayaiva bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātavyam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7219: -- siddhasādhaneti sārdhena. nanv evam apy aviśeṣitanirālambanatvopādāne 'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7220: svāṃśālambanatvaṃ jñānānāṃ bauddhair iṣyata evāta āha -- svāṃśeti. ata eva kāraṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:7222: {2,39} aparam api bhāṣyaṃ pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne. jāgrato 'pi stambha iti vā kuḍya iti vā pratyaya eva bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7223: tasmāt so 'pi nirālambanaḥ iti. tasyārtham āha -- pratyayasyeti. pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:7224: upalakṣitaḥ svapne ity etāvatā bhāgena tāvat sādhyena nirālambanatvena vyāptaṃ pratyayatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7225: hetur nirdiśyate. dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti yāvad iti. nanu na pratyayatvād iti hetur upāttaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7226: kasya vyāptir nirdiśyate. ata āha -- hetuś ceti. yady api pratyayatvasya na vyaktaṃ pañcamyā hetutvam upāttaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7227: tathāpi upanayanākhyena sādhanavākyāvayavena jāgrato 'pītyādinā hetuḥ pradarśita eva. yadaiva hi sādhyānvitaṃ pradarśitaṃ pratyayatvaṃ punaḥ pratijñārtha upanīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7228: tadaiva tad atra hetur iti pradarśitaṃ bhavaty eva. sādhyānvitasyaiva pakṣasthasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7229: hetutvād iti. kaḥ punar ayam upanayaḥ. sādhanavākyāvayavaviśeṣaḥ. pañcāvayavaṃ hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7230: sādhanavākyaṃ pratijñā hetur udāharaṇam upanayo nigamanaṃ ceti. tatra sādhyanirdeśaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7231: pratijñā. yathā anityaḥ śabda iti. utpattidharmakatvād iti hetuḥ. utpattidharmakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7232: sthālyādi dravyam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam ity udāharaṇam. tathā cotpattidharmakaḥ śabda ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7233: upanayaḥ. sa hy udāharaṇāpekṣaṃs tathety upasaṃhāro na tatheti vā sādhyasyopanaya
GSP28mimsvtku:7234: iti varṇitam. kim uktaṃ bhavati. dvedhā hi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayati udāharaṇasādharmyād
GSP28mimsvtku:7235: vaidharmyād vā. tatra sādharmyaṃ pradarśitam. vaidharmyaṃ tu yathā -- tasyām eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7236: pratijñāyāṃ tasminn evotpattidharmakatvād iti hetau anutpattidharmakam ātmādi dravyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7237: nityaṃ dṛṣṭam. na ca tathā śabdo 'nutpattidharmaka iti. tatra yo 'yaṃ dvividhodāharaṇāpekṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7238: sādharmyodāhṛte tatheti vaidharmyodāhṛte na tatheti sādhyasya śabdasya sambandhitayotpattidharmakatvasyopasaṃhāravacanam upanayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7239: sa codāharaṇāpekṣa eva. udāharaṇadvaitād eva tadupasaṃhāradvaitaṃ bhavati. vaidharmyodāharaṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:7240: ca viruddhanivṛttyā sādhyasambandhitvena hetor upasaṃhāraḥ. yathātmādi dravyaṃ nityam anutpattidharmakam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7241: na ca tathā śabdaḥ ity anutpattidharmakatvapratiṣedhenotpattidharmakatvam upasaṃhriyate. prakṛte tu sādharmyodāharaṇe{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7242: 40}tathaiveti hetor upasaṃhāra upanayo veditavyaḥ. nigamanaṃ tu hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam. tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti. nigamyante 'nena
GSP28mimsvtku:7243: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayā ekatrārtha iti nigamanam. samarthyante sambadhyante iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7244: yāvat. asati hi tasminn anabhivyaktasambandhānām arthapratipādakatvaṃ na syāt. sati
GSP28mimsvtku:7245: tu tasmin sarveṣām avayavānāṃ tātparyadarśanāt parasparasambandhaḥ sphuṭo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7246: nigamanaṃ saṅgamanaṃ sambandhanam iti yāvad iti // 26 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7247: nanu nāvyāvṛtto vipakṣād dhetur bhavatīti vaidharmyadarśanena hetor vyatireko darśayitavyaḥ. na cātra tathā darśitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7248: sādharmyamātravacanāt. ata āha -- vipakṣeti. nirālambanatve hi sādhyamāne sālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7249: vipakṣaḥ. na ca sarvānālambanatvavādinas tad astīti kiṃ tadvyatirekapradarśaneneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7250: nanu pratyaye pakṣīkṛte tasminn eva hetau pratijñārthaikadeśo hetur ata āha -- sāmānyasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7251: sāmānyaviśeṣātmakā hi pratyayāḥ. tatra viśeṣe pakṣīkṛte sāmānyaṃ hetur iti na pratijñārthaikadeśateti // 27 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7252: atra siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ jāgrato hi buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyatīti. anena
GSP28mimsvtku:7253: kila supariniścitatvena jāgraddhiyāṃ sālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. na ca supariniścitatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7254: bāhyālambanasambaddhaṃ parān prati prasiddham. ato nānenāsiddhāvayavenānālambanānumānaṃ parāṇudyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7255: sapratisādhanaṃ vā bhavati. tasyobhayaprasiddhāvayavatvāt. asya ca tadviparītatvāt. ato{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7256: 41}jātyuttaram evedaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa dattam ity ākṣipati -- jāgrajjñāna iti dvayena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7257: vaidharmyavikalpasamayoś ca svarūpaṃ śabde vakṣyāmaḥ. saty eva pratyayatve supariniścitāsupariniścitadharmāntaravikalpanāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7258: sādhyadharmavikalpāpādanena vikalpasamatā. tathā sādharmye vādinā prayukte nirālambanānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7260: vaidharmyāt pratyavasthānena vaidharmyasamatā. prapañcas tu paścād bhaviṣyatīty uktam iti // 28 --29 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7261: evam ākṣiptaṃ bhāṣyam ekena[704]matena samādadhāti -- duṣṭatvād iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- duṣṭasādhanaprayoge duṣṭam evottaraṃ deyam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7262: evaṃ hi tadā vādī pratibodhito bhavati yathā bhavān madīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ manyate tathāham api[705]tvatsādhanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7263: ato 'sau svasādhanān nivartate iti. idaṃ tu samarthanaṃ nopapadyate. nigrahasthānadvayaprasakteḥ. paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaniranuyojyānuyogātmakanigrahasthānadvayam evaṃvādino bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:7264: yaḥ santaṃ doṣam anuktvānyam asantaṃ jalpati. na caivaṃvādinaḥ svasādhanadūṣaṇāvagamo
GSP28mimsvtku:7265: bhavati. param eva tu duṣṭadūṣaṇaprayogeṇopālabhate. ataḥ pāśupatottaratulyam ekajātīyakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7266: varjanīyam ity anyathā samādhānam āha -- pratijñeti. nānenānumānam upanyasyate. kin
GSP28mimsvtku:7267: tu paroktānumānasya pratyakṣavirodho varṇyate. asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe 'numānaṃ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7268: iha tu supariniścitābhir jāgradbuddhibhir niścitasadbhāvasya bāhyasya pratyākhyānānumānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7269: pratyakṣeṇa mukhanirodhān na jāyata evāgnāv iva śaityānumānam. yadi paraṃ bāhyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7272: dho) jāyata eva. tathāvidhasyāpi mithyātve kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ. nanv evam anumānam anāśvāsanīyam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7274: uktam etat pratyakṣe paripanthini na tatpratipakṣam anumānam ātmānaṃ labheta śrauta
GSP28mimsvtku:7275: iva viniyoge laiṅgikaḥ. sādhanavākye tv ayogyānvayapadasannikarṣād vandhyāsutavākyavat
GSP28mimsvtku:7276: saṃsargajñānaṃ bhrāntir eva. na tu kasyacid laiṅgikaṃ stambhādiṣv abhāvajñānam utpadyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7277: nanu vyāptaṃ pratyayatvam anālambanatvena. vyāpyāc ca jñātasambandhasya vyāpakajñānaṃ notpadyata iti{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7278: 42}haṭha evāyam. na. vyāptibhaṅgāt. saṃvidann eva hi vyāptim abādhitena pratyakṣeṇa sarvadeśakālādibhāvinā na pratyayatvaprayuktaṃ mithyātvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7279: api tu pūrvoktahetudvayaprayuktam iti niścinoti. tad idam uktam -- anyatas tu svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvo visaṃvādād avagamyate iti // 30
GSP28mimsvtku:7283: kathaṃ punar atra pratyakṣabādhaḥ. pratyakṣaṃ hi grāhyam antareṇātmānam alabhamānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7284: tanmātram avasthāpayati na bāhyam. kiṃ hi tasya bāhyena vinā na sidhyati. grāhyaś
GSP28mimsvtku:7285: ca svāṃśo bauddhair abhyupagata eva. ato na bāhyāpahnave pratyakṣatvādivirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7286: ata āha -- śakṣyāma iti dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- śūnyavāde hi pratyakṣasya svāṃśagocaratvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7287: nirākariṣyāma eva. tannirākaraṇe ca bāhyaviśeṣaṇopādānam anarthakam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7288: tadvyatiriktagrāhyāntarāsambhavāt. ato 'nālambanapakṣo grāhyamātranivāraṇa eva bhavati. pratyakṣādeḥ svāṃśanirākara(ṇā)
GSP28mimsvtku:7289: d bāhya eva viṣayo 'vaśiṣyate. ato bāhyaviśeṣaṇena vinā grāhyamātrāpahnave bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7290: pratyakṣādibhiḥ pakṣabādhaḥ. saty api kathañcid bāhyaviśeṣaṇe pratyakṣāder api bāhyaviṣayāvaśeṣāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7291: tanniṣedhaṃ kurvāṇasya vādinas taiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pakṣabādhanaṃ bhavet. pūrvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7292: tu pratyakṣagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārthaṃ sarvapratyakṣādivirodha eva tv anālambanānumānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7294: yat tu supariniścayena bāhyālambanasambandhaḥ prasiddhaḥ. kiṃ tadupanyāsenety uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7295: ata āha -- suniścayeneti. uktam idam asmābhir nāyam anumānaprayoga iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7296: kin tv anumānena jāgratpratyakṣadhiyāṃ svapnadhīsāmānyaṃ manyamānasya tadvaiṣamyapradarśanārthaṃ supariniścitatvābhidhānam. supariniścitā ete{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7297: 43}pratyayā balīyāṃsaḥ. naiṣu paripanthiṣv anumānam ātmānaṃ labhate. etasmād anumānād ity arthaḥ // 33 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7298: etad eva prapañcayati -- duṣṭajñāneti. duṣṭenāsupariniścitena gṛhīto 'rthaḥ pratiṣedham
GSP28mimsvtku:7299: arhati netara iti. gṛhītamātrabādhe tu bahavaḥ sādhanadoṣā bhāṣyakāreṇāntarṇītāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7300: tān pratipādayiṣyan pakṣābhāvaṃ tāvad āha -- gṛhīteti. yadi gṛhītamātraṃ mithyety ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7301: tadā yo 'yaṃ nirālambanāḥ pratyayā iti svapakṣaḥ so 'pi gṛhītatvān mithyā syāt. ataḥ śakyaṃ vaktuṃ pakṣa evāsmin bhavatsādhane nāstīti // 34
GSP28mimsvtku:7302: api ca, nirālambanatvena viśiṣṭāḥ pratyayāḥ sādhyante. tad iha viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedāvagrahasyāpi mithyātvān na viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor vivekaḥ sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7303: tadabhāvāc ca vaktuṃ śakyam aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣo 'prasiddhānyataro veti. tad etad āha -- agrāhyatvāc ceti. anyatarasya vā asiddhir vaktavyety arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7304: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- vaktṛśrotror iti. pañcadhā svavāgvirodhaḥ. abhidhoccāraṇadharmadharmyubhayoktibhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7305: tad idam ubhayoktyā svavāgvirodhaḥ. dvayor api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor nirālambanatvapratyayayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7306: yad vaktuḥ śrotuś ca jñānaṃ jāyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7307: tad api pratyayatvād anālambanam iti pakṣo na sidhyatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7308: tatsālambanatve cānaikāntikatvān na pratyayānām anālambanatvaṃ bhavet. so 'yam ubhayoktyā svavāgvirodha iti // 36 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7309: {2,44} dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- sambhavo na ceti. evaṃ hi vikalpanīyam. kiṃ nirālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7310: dharmiṇo bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā. na tāvad abhinnaṃ viśeṣaṇam arhati. na ca bhedagrāhiṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:7311: jñānasya mithyātvād bhettum arhatīti. upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 37 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7312: bauddhānāṃ pratyavasthānam āha -- nirālambanateti. evaṃ hi manyante -- vastuni vyatirekādivikalpo
GSP28mimsvtku:7313: yuktaḥ nāvastuni. yathāhuḥ -- vastuny eṣa vikalpaḥ syād iti. na cālambanapratiṣedho
GSP28mimsvtku:7315: dūṣaṇā[706]ntaram āha -- yadīti tvamantena. yadi tāvad avastu,
GSP28mimsvtku:7316: kathaṃ tad asmān pratibodhayitum icchā bhavataḥ. svayaṃ vā tadviṣayā buddhiḥ. na
GSP28mimsvtku:7317: hy avastu buddhiviṣayo bhavati. tadviṣayatve ca vastutvāpātāt. arthakriyālakṣaṇatvāc
GSP28mimsvtku:7318: ca sattvasya. tallakṣaṇatvāc ca vastutvasyeti. yadi tūcyate - yady api nirālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7319: nāma na kiñcit paramārthato 'sti. tathāpi tatsattvaṃ kalpayitvānumānavyavahāraḥ kriyate
GSP28mimsvtku:7320: pratimāyām iva devatātvam ārādhanādivyavahāra iti. tad ayuktam. asataḥ kalpanāyogāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7321: anyatra prasiddhasadbhāvā hi viṣṇvādyā devatā yuktaṃ[707]yad anyatra kalpyante. atyantāprasiddhasadbhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7322: tv anālambanatvaṃ na gaganakusumādivat kalpanām arthati. tad etad āśaṅkayā sahāha
GSP28mimsvtku:7327: {2,45} api ca keyaṃ kalpanā. yadi jñānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7329: tat tarhi kalpanā jñānotpattau vyāpriyamāṇā katham avastu bhaviṣyati. arthakriyākāritvam eva hi vastutvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7330: jñānotpādanam api cārthakriyetyabhiprāyeṇāha -- kḷptāv iti. atra codayati -- katham iti. yady avastu na sādhyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7331: kathaṃ tarhi bhavatām api meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ sādhyata iti. pariharati -- vastv
GSP28mimsvtku:7332: iti. bhaved evaṃ yady abhāvo na vastu syāt. sa vastv ity abhāvaparicchede vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7333: yady api cābhāvo na vastuśabdavācyaḥ lokavirodhāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7334: tathāpi nāsau nissvabhāvaḥ. prakhyāyate hy asau svasaṃvedyena bhāvātirekiṇā rūpeṇa. ato 'rthakriyāyā eva ghaṭiṣyata iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti // 40 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7335: kiñ cedam api cātra vikalpanīyaṃ - yo 'yaṃ dharmiṇo nirdeśakaḥ pratyayaśabdaḥ sa kiṃ bhāve kartari karaṇe vā vyutpadyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7336: karmaṇi vā. pūrvokteṣu tāvat kalpeṣu virodhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7337: akarmakapratyayāsambhavāt. na hi pratītir asti pratyetavyaṃ nāstīti sambhavati. tadanavaṣṭabdhasya (?kṛ/
GSP28mimsvtku:7338: ta)drūpasyāprakāśāt. evam eva kartṛkaraṇayor api vācyam. yadi jñānam evārthaprakāśe tajjanmani vā kartṛtvenopacaryate karaṇatvena vā vivakṣādhīnatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7339: tathāpi tayoḥ pratyāyyena karmakārakeṇa vinānupapattiḥ. so 'yaṃ svavāgvirodhaḥ. pratyaya
GSP28mimsvtku:7340: ity uktamātra eva tatsvabhāvaparāmarśāt pratyetavyābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate mātā me vandhyetivanmātṛtvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7341: vandhyātvam. ato na pratyaye pakṣīkṛte nirālambanatvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam. karmavyutpattau
GSP28mimsvtku:7342: siddhasādhanam eva. tad etat sarvam āha -- tatheti //
GSP28mimsvtku:7343: siddhasādhanaṃ vivṛṇoti -- pratyāyyasyeti. na khalu jaḍo rūpādiḥ kiñcinnālambata iti // 42 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7344: {2,46} kartṛkaraṇapakṣe tv ayam aparo doṣaḥ yaddharmadharmivacanayoḥ śabdayor api
GSP28mimsvtku:7345: nirālambanatvaṃ pratijñāyeta. pratīte hi kartā karaṇaṃ vā pratyayaḥ. yathā ca kartṛkaraṇatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7347: tathā śabda iti. ata eva vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:7348: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpitam /
GSP28mimsvtku:7349: iti. kiñ cedaṃ śabdayor anālambanatvam anyad ato 'bhidheyābhāvāt. tadabhāve ca pakṣābhāvaḥ prasajyata ity āha -- kartṛtva iti // 43 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7350: bhāvādiṣu virodhaḥ syād iti yad uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti -- pratyāyyena ceti. kartrādibhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7351: hi na pratyāyyabhedam antareṇa sambhavati. atas tatpravṛttinimitte pratyayaśabde
GSP28mimsvtku:7352: svavacanavirodhaḥ. sa cāyam asmābhiḥ prāg eva vivṛtaḥ. vāśabdo 'nantaravivṛtakarmavyutpattyapekṣayeti // 44 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7353: yadi tv avibhaktāvayavo rūḍhirūpeṇa pratyayaśabda upādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7355: tathāpi vastv antaragrāhakasyaiva vastuto 'smākaṃ pratyayatvena prasiddheḥ svavacanavirodha eva bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:7356: tad etad āha -- athāpīti. tathāpīti. tathāpi svavacanavirodha iti pūrveṇa sambandha iti. kathaṃ svavacanavirodhaḥ. ata āha -- grāhakam iti //
GSP28mimsvtku:7357: vastvantarasyaiva hi grāhyasya grāhakam ātmadharmākhyaṃ vastv eva pratyaya iti naḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7358: prasiddham. ataḥ kathaṃ tasyāsati grāhye siddhir iti dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- tam abhyupetyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7359: evam ayam asādhanavādī vaktavyaḥ kiṃ yādrśo 'smābhiḥ pratyaya{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7361: na vā. tatrābhyupagame tāvadabhyupetavirodha iti. api caivaṃ sati cāprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣo bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7362: tvanmate bāhyārthagrāhipratyayānabhyupagamād ity āha -- viśeṣyasyeti. atādṛśe tu svābhimate pakṣe 'smākam aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣa ity āha -- asmākam iti // 46 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7364: sa pakṣo bhavadabhimato 'thavā svatantraḥ. pūrvasmin kalpe bhavato 'prasiddhaviśeṣyatā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7365: uttarasminn asmākam iti pūrvavad eva darśayitavyam ity āha -- ātmadharmeti. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:7366: tv anirdhāritaviśeṣaṃ pratyayamātraṃ pakṣīkriyata ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7367: tan na. tathāvidhasyānirūpaṇād ity āha -- na ceti // 47 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7368: nanu śakyam idam anyeṣv api pakṣīkṛteṣu vaktuṃ yathā -- kim ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ svatantraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7369: vā dravyaṃ paudgalākhyaṃ vā nityatayā pakṣīkriyata iti. atha tatrāvivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7371: tad ihāpi samānam ity ata āha -- śabdeti. yathā śabdārthasāmānyarūpeṇānyeṣāṃ pakṣāṇāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7372: naivam iha bhavataḥ sambhavati. asādhāraṇarūpātirekiṇaḥ sāmānyātmano vācyasya bhavatām aniṣṭatvād iti // 48 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7373: evaṃ tāvad dharmī vikalpya dūṣitaḥ. dharmam idānīṃ nirālambanatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati
GSP28mimsvtku:7374: -- nirālambanateti. sarvathā nirālambanatve sādhye 'prasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7375: na hi sarvathā nirālambanatvaṃ nāma kiñcid{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7377: so 'pi na sarvathā nirālambanaḥ. sarvatra yathākathañcidālambanasiddher vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato dṛṣṭāntābhāvo 'py evaṃ satyāpadyeteti // 49 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7378: yadi tu na sarvathā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. kin tu sālambanasyaiva kenāpi prakāreṇa nirālambanatvam apīty ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7379: tadā rasādijñānānāṃ rūpādyālambanaśūnyatayā siddhasādhanam ity āha -- kenacid iti // 50 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7380: nanu yadākārā buddhis tan nālambate iti sādhayiṣyāmaḥ na siddhasādhanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7381: tad etadāśaṅkate -- atheti. etad api nirākaroti -- svākārasyeti. abhyupagato hi bhavadbhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7382: svākāro buddher ālambanaṃ yadābhāsaṃ[708]prameyaṃ tad iti vadadbhiḥ. atas tadālambanābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7386: nanu kim āpādya dūṣaṇodbhāvanam. bāhyānālambanatvaṃ hi naḥ pakṣaḥ. tathā ca bhāṣyopaskāre
GSP28mimsvtku:7387: varṇitam eva. ato nābhyupetabādha ity ata āha -- bāhyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vikalpanīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7388: idaṃ bāhyānālambanatvam. kiṃ bāhyam ity anena rūpeṇa nālambata ity evaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7389: vastuto vā bāhyaṃ nālambata iti. pūrvasmin pakṣe siddhasādhanam. parasmin doṣo vakṣyate. stambhādidhiyo hi stambhādyākāratayaiva svaviṣayam ālambante na bāhyatayeti // 52 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7391: tatas tadrūpasaṃvedanasya dṛṣṭatvāt saṃvidvirodha evety āha -- tatheti // 53 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7392: atra codayati -- dvicandrādiṣv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- samāno 'yam anālambanatvābhimateṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7393: dvicandrādibodheṣu saṃvidvirodhaḥ. tatrāpi dvāv eva candrau bhāsete. tadapahnave
GSP28mimsvtku:7394: sphuṭa eva saṃvidvirodhaḥ. ataḥ kena prakāreṇa teṣām anālambanatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7395: pariharati -- nendriyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi vayaṃ pratibhāsaviparyāsād anyathātvaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7396: tata evam upālabhyemahi. na tv evam. yad eva vijñānam indriyāprāptam arthaṃ prakāśayati
GSP28mimsvtku:7397: tadanālambanam iti naḥ siddhāntaḥ. tathā ca dvicandrādijñānam. tato 'nālambanam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7401: nanv evaṃ saṃvedanānapahnave yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvāt sadasadviveko na syād
GSP28mimsvtku:7402: ata āha -- sarvatreti. asyārthaḥ -- idaṃ sad grāhyam idam asad grāhyam iti nāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7403: artha idam arthaṃ prakāśayati idaṃ neti. kin tarhi. jāyamānāyām evārthagocarāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7404: saṃvittāv indriyārthasaṃyogasadasattvato 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ. yad indriyasamprayuktam arthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7405: prakāśayati tat sad grāhyam. viparītam anyat. na ca yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7406: bādhakadarśanāt. ato yad deśāntarastham indriyāprāptam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tad asad grāhyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7407: tasyārtho nāstīty ucyate. kvacid dhi kiñcit pratiṣidhyate. na svarūpeṇaiva kiñcit.
GSP28mimsvtku:7409: 50} rajataṃ nāstīti. asti hi tad deśāntarādiṣu. kin tu iha nāstīti yatrendriyeṇa na prāpyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7410: idam astīty api yad eva yatrendriyeṇa prāpyate tad ucyate. iha ghaṭo 'stīti pratītiḥ na punar ghaṭo 'stīti // 55 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7411: na caiṣa vibhāgo bauddhasya sambhavatīty āha -- bhavata iti. na ca bauddhasyendriyādīni santi yat prāptyaprāptinibandhanaṃ bhāvālambanālambanapratiṣedhau yujyete iti // 56 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7412: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bahirbhāveti sādhyatentena. na hy anālambanajñānavādināṃ bahirbhāvo nāma kaścit siddhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7413: yena viśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyata iti. kim iti na sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7414: ata āha -- naiṣa iti. pakṣaprajñāpanārthaṃ hi sādhanavacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7416: kiṃ punaḥ pakṣo na jñāyate. ajñāte viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye ca viśiṣṭo na jñāyate. tac cobhayam api prasiddham eveti kiṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇāprasiddhyā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7417: ata āha -- yatheti. viśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv eva kim. na tāvat pakṣasiddhiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7418: tathāvidham anyo bodhayituṃ na śakyata iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:7419: samānam idaṃ tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv apīti tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhau pakṣo na jñāyata iti sūktam iti // 58 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7420: etad eva prapañcayati -- nāprasiddha iti. pratijñāvākyārtho hi{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7421: sa ca padārthapūrvakaḥ. ato bāhyādipadārthāsiddhau pakṣo na sidhyatīti // 59 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7425: iti hi dvāv arthau sambhavataḥ paryudāsapratiṣedhābhyām. paryudāse hi nāmayogānnaño 'vyatiriktālambanaḥ pratyaya ity artho bhavati. niṣedhe tu ākhyātayo(gād)
GSP28mimsvtku:7426: vyatiriktaṃ nālambata iti. ubhayathā hi siddhasādhanam. prameyatvādinā hi jagato
GSP28mimsvtku:7427: na bhedam ātiṣṭhāmahe. ataḥ stambhādijñānāt prameyatvādināvyatiriktaṃ bhavati. ata
GSP28mimsvtku:7428: evābhedād vyatiriktaṃ ca na bhavatīti siddhasādhanam iti // 60 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7429: kiñ ca, idam api cātra vikalpanīyaṃ kim atyantabhinnena stambhādinā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7430: kathañcid bhinnena vā. pūrvasmin kalpe tāvat siddhasādhanam evety āha -- yadīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7431: siddhasādhanam ity atītena sambandha iti. kathañcid bhinnena tu nirālambanatve sādhyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7432: prāk kalpitena pakṣavirodhaḥ. iṣyate hi kathañcit kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ bhavadbhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7433: api bāhyālambanam. atas tanniṣedhe bhavati prākkalpitena pakṣabādhaḥ. tad etad āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7435: anyathā siddhasādhanaṃ darśayati -- vastv iti. buddhir hi vastvādyākāreṇa jaḍarūpā na kiñcidālambata iti siddham eva. asādhāraṇena tu prakāśātmanā{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7436: 52}bāhyam ālambate. tatrāviśeṣitopādāne śakyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ darśayitum iti. nanu grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam itīdam atra naḥ sādhyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7437: tatra kiṃ nānāvikalpaiḥ. ata āha -- grāhakād iti. na tāvannirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7438: ayam arthaḥ grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam iti. evaṃ saty api yad dviśaktikatvaṃ jñānasyeṣṭaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7440: grāhyāpalāpāt. yady api na bauddhair āśrayātirekiṇī śaktir iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7441: tathāpi śaktibhedadvāreṇa dvyātmakatvam eva darśayatīti draṣṭavyam iti // 62 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7442: yadi tu sarvaprakārāsambhavān nirālambanabuddhyutpattimātram eva prasādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7443: tatrāpi ca siddhasādhanam eva. utpadyate hi nirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity ukte nirālambanatvabuddhiḥ. na tv iyam arthakriyāyai samarthā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7445: nacānarthakatvam evāsyā na siddham iti vācyam. tatsatyatve hetor anaikāntikatvaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7446: ato mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad evātmāṃśaparyavasāyinī buddhir iyam abhyupagantavyā. asmākam
GSP28mimsvtku:7447: api sarvamithyātvagrāhipratyayamithyātvaṃ siddham evety āvayor avivādāt siddham anālambanabuddher
GSP28mimsvtku:7449: evaṃ cotpannāyām apy arthaśūnyāyām ātmāṃśaparyavasāyinyāmanālambanabuddhau caitrādipratyayānāṃ pakṣīkṛtānāṃ dharmatayā nirālambanatā na gṛhītā sādhanotthitayā dhiyeti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7451: 53}satī caitrādisvarūpaparyālocanayālambanaprāptiḥ kena vārayituṃ śakyā. sa mānaviṣayopanipātinor hi viruddhārthagocarayoḥ pratyayayor bādhyabādhakabhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7452: yathedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatam iti cānayoḥ. na ceha tathā. caitrādipratyayā hi svaviṣayaṃ sthāpayanti. na ca tannirālambanabuddhiḥ pratikṣipati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7453: arthābhāvāt. svāṃśagocarā hi sā. ato 'syāḥ svāṃśo viṣayaḥ. caitrādipratyayānāṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7454: caitrādaya iti spaṣṭo viṣayabheda iti kiṃ kena bādhyata ity ucyate. tad etad āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7456: kiñca yat tat pūrvam uktaṃ kartṛtve karaṇatve vā pratyayatve śabdo 'pi pratyayaśabdavācya iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7457: tad yadi tathaiva pratyayaśabdo 'py atra pratītikartṛkaraṇatvātmanā pratyayatvenopādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7459: caitrādayaḥ pratyayaśabdasaṃvittyālambanā na bhavantīti. tatas tasyācetanatvena tatsaṃvittyālambanatvaṃ caitrādīnāṃ nāsti aṃśe siddhasādhanam evety āha -- yadīti // 67 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7460: atha tu buddhyutpādanaśaktivirahastasyānālambanatvam ity ucyate pratyayaśabdo nirālambana iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7461: kim uktaṃ bhavati. na kiñcidviṣayāṃ buddhim utpādayituṃ śakyata iti. tatas tenāśaktena
GSP28mimsvtku:7462: pakṣo na bodhita iti sādhyaṃ na sidhyatīty āha -- buddhyutpādaneti. sādhyāsiddhau
GSP28mimsvtku:7464: {2,54} pūrvābhyupagamaviruddho 'py ayaṃ pakṣa ity āha -- na ceti trayeṇa. na tāvadanabhidhāyakeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7465: padeṣu sādhanavākyaṃ prayogam arhati. na cābhidhānam arthasambandhādṛte padānāṃ sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7466: na ca sambandho bhedam antareṇa. na ca bhedaḥ śabdārthagatabhedaṃ bodhayantyā dhiyā vinā (?na)
GSP28mimsvtku:7467: sambhavati. tad atra sādhanaṃ prayuñjānena bhinnau śabdārthāv abhyupagantavyau. tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7468: sati prāśnikāḥ sabhyā gṛhṇanti ca sāvayavaṃ sādhanavākyaṃ pṛthak ca pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntān
GSP28mimsvtku:7469: vādiprativādinau ceti. yāvad idaṃ nāvasthāpyate na tāvad vyutthita pratipādanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:7470: sādhanasya prayogo bhavati. etac ca sarvam abhyupetya nirālambanatve sādhyamāne bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7472: āptatamatvābhimatabuddhābhiprāyaviruddho 'py ayaṃ pakṣa ity āha -- dharmeti bhedontena. yāvad dhi dharmādharmau bhinnau paramārthau na sidhyataḥ śiṣyaś copadeśyaḥ ātmā copadeṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7473: tāvan na dharmādharmopadeśo ghaṭata iti. upadiṣṭāś ca caityavandanādayaḥ śiṣyebhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:7474: dharmatvena buddhaiḥ. ataś ceṣṭādarśanena sarvam anumataṃ buddhānām iti teṣām āśaya
GSP28mimsvtku:7476: 55}iti. api ca kvacit sūtraviśeṣe sphuṭam eva tair bāhyārtho 'bhimataḥ yadāśritya sautrāntikena bāhyārthasadbhāvo 'saṅgīkṛtaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7477: atas tadīyāgamaviruddho 'py ayaṃ pakṣa ity āha -- sphuṭam iti // 72 -- 73 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7479: api ca sarvajñānānām anālambanatve kṛtsnasādhanajñānamithyātvāt sarvasādhanābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7480: vā yatheṣṭaṃ pakṣādinyūnatvaṃ vā śakyam āpādayitum ity āha -- kṛtsneti. yadi tu na
GSP28mimsvtku:7482: tataḥ pakṣādipratyayair eva hetor anaikāntikatvam ity āha -- teṣām iti // 74 -- 75 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7483: yadi pakṣādigrāhivyatiriktā eva pratyayā nirālambanatvena pratijñāyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:7484: tatas tadvyatireka[709]grāhiṇaḥ pratyayasya pakṣādyaviṣayatvān mṛṣātvam āpadyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7485: ity āha -- tadanyasyeti. abhyupagame doṣam āha -- tanmithyeti. tadanyapratyayamithyātve
GSP28mimsvtku:7486: hi yat tena pakṣādipratyayavyatirekagrāhiṇā gṛhītaṃ tanmithyeti sarvamithyātvam āpadyata iti // 76 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7489: kathaṃ na sidhyaty ata āha -- stambheti. vyatirekagrāhipratyayamithyātve hi na stambhādijñānebhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7490: sādhanajñānasya kaścid viśeṣaḥ. tadvad eva tu sādhanajñānam api mithyā bhaved iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7494: punar api tadanyaviśeṣaṇe 'navasthā. yatraiva tu paraḥ kvacid avatiṣṭhate tanmithyātvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7495: pūrvapūrvābhāvo darśayitavya ity āha -- yāvad iti. kiñcādyapakṣāt prabhṛti ya ete
GSP28mimsvtku:7497: teṣu sarveṣu viruddhāvyabhicāritvam anumānavirodho vety āha -- viruddheti // 77 -- 78 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7498: katham etad ubhayam ity āha -- ittham iti. itthaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa. atra pratisādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7499: vaktavyam iti. tad eva pratisādhanaṃ darśayati -- bāhyeti. bāhyārthālambanā buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7500: iti dhīr dharmiṇī. samyag iti sādhyo dharmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7502: svapnajñānādibādhabuddhivat. idaṃ ca prasiddhāvayavatvena nirālambanānumānād balavad iti tasyānumānabādho bhavati. yadi tulyabalatvam eva manyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7503: tato viruddhāvyabhicāritvam iti viveko darśayitavyaḥ. (svārthikas tv iti?)
GSP28mimsvtku:7504: yadi tu svapnādibādhabuddhir api mithyeti brūyāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7505: tatas teṣām abādhitatvād asatyatve dṛṣṭāntābhāva ity āha -- sāpīti // 79 -- 80 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7506: kiñca bhinnaṃ jñānamātraṃ kṣaṇikam iti yā buddhayaḥ tāḥ samyaṅ mithyā vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7507: satyatve tāvadanaikāntikatvam ity āha -- vijñāneti. tanmithyātvābhyupagame{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7509: evaṃ cāsati jñāne śūnyatāpramāṇārtha iti ko baddhaḥ ko vā mukto bhavet. tad etad
GSP28mimsvtku:7510: āha -- tatheti. mokṣayanto 'pi pravrajyādir evaṃ sati viphalas tapasvinām ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7512: yadi tūcyate -- savikalpakena jñānamātrapakṣo vyavasthāpyate sarvavikalpānāṃ mithyātvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:7513: nirvikalpakena tvātmānaṃ labhata iti. tad ayuktam. na hi jñānamātraṃ viśvaṃ kṣaṇikā
GSP28mimsvtku:7514: bhāvā ity ādi nirvikalpakena kasyacit pratibhāti. anumānena ty evañjātīyakā arthāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7515: sādhyante. tac ca savikalpalatvān mithyaiveti jñānāstitvādipakṣo durlabhaḥ. ato yuktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7516: mokṣayatnasya vaiphalyam ity āha -- vikalpeti sārthena. atra ca nirvikalpakasatyatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7517: stambhādidhiyām api tathāvidhānāṃ satyatvāpatter na bāhyārthābhāvaḥ sidhyatīti vaktavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7519: api ca yogibhyo 'rvācām asmadādīnāṃ sarvam eva jñānaṃ kalpanāspadam iti mithyājñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7520: eva. na hi pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvam ityādijñānebhyo jñānamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7521: jagat kṣaṇikāḥ sarve bhāvā ityādipratyayānāṃ kaścidviśeṣo dṛśyate.{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7522: 58}sarvasya savikalpakatvena mithyābhyupagamāt. ato gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣeṣu tīrthakarapravādeṣu yo 'yaṃ sāṅkhyādisiddhāntaparivarjanena bauddhasiddhānta ekasmin pakṣapātaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7523: tatra na kaściddhetur upalabhyate. na ca kalpanāspadatvā[710]viśeṣe 'pi arthasadasadbhāvakṛtam
GSP28mimsvtku:7524: indriyasānnidhyaviprakṛṣṭakṛtaṃ vā samyaṅmithyātvaṃ sambhavati. sarvakalpanānām asadarthatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7525: sarvabāhyāpalāpe cāsya vibhāgasya durlabhatvāt. tad etad āha -- sarvaṃ ceti dvayena // 86 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7528: api ca buddhīnāṃ mithyātvaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇādijñāneṣu bādhakena vyāptam upalabdham. na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7529: jāgradbuddhayo bādhyante. ato vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttir ity abhiprāyeṇāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7531: vināpi bādhakaṃ mṛṣātvābhyupagame kṣaṇabhaṅgādipratyayamithyātvād avyavasthety āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7532: -- bādhād iti. api ca samyaṅ mithyeti ca pratiyogisāpekṣam. kiñcid dhi samyagapekṣyetaranmithyā bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7533: mithyā ca kiñcid apekṣya paraṃ satyam. tava tu sarvamithyātvābhyupagame kiṃkṛtaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7534: samyaṅmithyātvavibhāgaḥ. asmākaṃ tu jāgrajjñānam eva satyaṃ pratiyogy apekṣya svapnādijñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7537: na kevalaṃ svapnādijñānānāṃ pratiyogyabhāvān mithyātvaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7538: jāgrajjñānānām api śobhanābhidhānasatyapratiyogyabhāvān mithyātvaṃ na sidhyatīty āha -- na ceti // 89 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7539: {2,59} jāgrajjñānapratiyogyapekṣayā svamate svapnādidhiyāṃ mithyātvam uktam. tatraivopapattim
GSP28mimsvtku:7540: āha -- svapneti. svapnādipratyayavidharmāṇo hi jāgratpratyayāḥ. sarvalokaprasiddhā
GSP28mimsvtku:7541: hi te. svapnas tu kasyacid eva nidrākrāntāntaḥkaraṇasya bhavati. ato yathā tadbādhake
GSP28mimsvtku:7542: pratyaye sārvalaukike svapnādipratiyogitvam evam anyeṣām api jāgratstambhādijñānānāṃ tatpratiyogitvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7544: atra codayati -- yoginām iti. satyaṃ pratiyogisāpekṣaṃ mithyātvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7546: satyā hi sā vigalitanikhilakalmaṣasya sphuṭāvikalpaprakāśā jāyate. ato yuktaṃ tadapekṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7548: nanu kasyacid eva bhāvanāprakarṣakāṣṭhāprāptasya yogino jāgradbuddhiparipanthinī
GSP28mimsvtku:7549: buddhir āvirbhavati. tās tu sarvalokaprasiddhā evety uktam. ataḥ katham ekadeśabhuvā
GSP28mimsvtku:7551: ata āha -- prāptānām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- tāvad eva hi saṃsāriṇo na bādhaṃ manyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:7552: yāvan na buddhabhūmim adhirohanti. prāptatadbhūmayas tu sarva eva prāṇabhṛto bādhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7553: manyante. ato na bahvalpaviṣayatayā kaścid viśeṣa iti siddhaṃ yogijñānena pratiyoginā
GSP28mimsvtku:7556: {2,60} na tāvad vayam adyatve kasyacijjāgradbuddhiparipanthinaṃ pratyayam upalabhāmahe.
GSP28mimsvtku:7557: yoginas tu kiṃ bhaviṣyati na veti na naḥ pramāṇaṃ kramata iti. vinaiva tu pramāṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:7558: yogijñāne pratiyoginīṣyamāṇe śakyam asmākam api vaktum. asmadīyānāṃ yogināṃ tvad[711]uktapratiyoginī
GSP28mimsvtku:7559: viparītā vā bādhabuddhir bhaviṣyati svācchandye hi niyāmakābhāvād ity āha -- yoginām iti // 94 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7563: vā naitad evam iti pratikṣepāt tadviṣayaviparīteti. na caivam āvayor aviśeṣa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7564: vaktavyam. anumānena hi vayaṃ yogibuddhīnām īdṛśatvam upapādayāmaḥ. ya eva hi kaścit
GSP28mimsvtku:7565: pramātā gṛhītas tenaiva dṛṣṭāntena yoginām api bahirviṣayabodho 'numīyate. sarvasyādyatanasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7566: grahītur bahirviṣayabodhāt. jñānamātraṃ tu nirmuktākhilanīlādivibhāgam avayanti yogina ity adṛṣṭāntaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7567: tad etad āha - īdṛktveti. bhavati cātra (prayogaḥ.)
GSP28mimsvtku:7570: nanu yogināṃ jāgradbuddhipratiyoginī buddhir utpadyata iti na pramāṇaṃ kramata iti yad uktaṃ[712]tad ayuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7571: katham anumāne jīvati tadapramāṇakam iti śakyam abhidhātum. evaṃ hy atrānumīyate -- jāgradbuddhayaḥ sapratiyoginyo bādhyā vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7573: tad etad āha -- atheti. pratiyogitābādhyatve prāg eva vyākhyāte iti // 96 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7577: tvamantena. satyaṃ jāgradbuddhīnāṃ hi mṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhayaḥ pratiyoginyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7580: bādhyatvam api siddham. buddhirūpeṇa hi satyabuddhayo 'pi na mithyābuddhibhyo bhidyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7581: ataḥ tāsu bādhyāsu tā api bādhyā bhavantīti vākpravṛttir iti. anyathā siddhasādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7582: darśayati -- grāhyeti. satyabuddhīnāṃ grāhyād anyad grāhyāntaraṃ mithyābuddhīnāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7583: tasmin bādhyamāne sarveṣāṃ grāhyatvenābhedāt satyadhīgrāhyam api bādhitam eva bhavati. api ca yāny eva yogijñānāni jāgraddhiyāṃ bādhakānīṣyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:7584: tair eva hetor anaikāntikatvam ity āha -- bādhakair iti. tadanyaviśeṣaṇopādāne ca pūrvavad anavasthā vācyety āha -- tadanyatva iti // 98 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7585: viśeṣaviruddhaś cāyaṃ hetur ity āha -- mithyeti sārdhena. svapnādibuddhīnāṃ hi mithyābhūtāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7586: saṃsāribuddhayaḥ pratiyoginyo dṛṣṭā iti pratibandhabalena buddhitvena hetunā jāgradbuddhīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7587: mithyādhīpratiyogitvam eva sādhyate. tatra yaḥ pratiyoginīnāṃ dhiyāṃ satyatvaṃ viśeṣa iṣṭaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7588: sa bādhyate. tathā rāgādikṣayanimittāsau yoginām adhigatir iti yaḥ pratiyoginyā yogibuddher viśeṣa iṣṭaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7589: tasya sarvasya bādhād bhavati viśeṣaviruddho hetur iti. ayaṃ ca dharmaviśeṣabādhād virodho 'nusandhātavya iti // 99 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7590: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- mahājanasyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- śakyate hi pratisādhanaṃ vaktuṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7591: jāgradbuddhayaḥ satyāḥ idānīṃ mahājanasyābādhāt parābhimatayogibādhabuddhivad iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7592: idaṃ ca yadi bādhyatvānumānena tulyabalaṃ tataḥ sapratisādhanam. atha tu prasiddhāvayavatvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7594: 62}iti prāg apy uktam eva. sarvathā tāvat parasādhanaṃ pratibadhnātīty atra tātparyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7595: yogijñānena bādhād dhetor asiddhir mā bhūd iti idānīm ity āha. yogināṃ bādhabuddher
GSP28mimsvtku:7597: mūlasādhane ca ye dharmādivikalpair doṣā uktāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7598: te 'py atrānumāne 'nusandhātavyā ity āha -- pūrveti. evaṃ punas tatpātanikāṃ kṛtvā
GSP28mimsvtku:7599: tatraiva dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- tasya ceti. tasya ca pūrvasādhanasyādhunā doṣāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7600: abhidadhmahe. dharmadharmiṇau vikalpya dūṣitau. hetur api tasyobhayasiddho nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7601: sādhyābhedāt. na hi pratyaya eṣa sādhye sa eva hetur vācyo bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7602: pratijñārthaikadeśatvāt. ato hetuśūnyaṃ sādhanam iti. nanu sāmānyasya hetutayā pakṣaikadeśatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7603: pratikṣiptam ata āha -- sāmānyam iti. uktam idam asmābhir ubhayasiddho hetur nāstīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7605: atyantābhinnaṃ ca na naḥ kiñcid astīti siddhaṃ nobhayasiddho hetur astīti // 102 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7606: sārūpyānyanivṛttirūpaṃ tu sāmānyam upariṣṭān niṣetsyata ity āha -- sārūpyeti // 103 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7607: upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. yadi tu mā bhūta sāmānyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7610: tad ayuktam. apakṣadharmatvād anvayābhāvāc cety āha -- viśeṣayor iti. dvāv atra viśeṣau
GSP28mimsvtku:7611: pariplavete pakṣas tattulyāparanāmā sapakṣaś ca. pūrvatra hetor anvayābhāvaḥ. paratrāpakṣadharmatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7612: pūrvaṃ tu viśeṣasyaiva hetutve sādhyābhedād avācyatvam uktam. idānīṃ vikalpya dūṣaṇāntarābhidhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7614: buddhir eva tv arthaśūnyā hetur bhaviṣyati. utpadyate hi naḥ pratyayatvād ityukte
GSP28mimsvtku:7615: 'narthikā kācid buddhiḥ. sarva evāyaṃ hetvādivyavahāro buddhimātraprabhāvita eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:7616: saugatā manyante. ata āha -- na ceti // 105 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7617: ata eva doṣadvayān nārthaśūnyā buddhir hetur bhavati. na hi sā buddhyantaraṃ dharmaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7618: na hi kṣaṇikā sādhyānvayabhājanam ity aprasiddhāśrayaś cāyaṃ hetur viśeṣyagrāhipratyayanirālambanatvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7619: tadaprasiddher ity āha -- āśrayeti. aprasiddhaviśeṣyaṃ pakṣam ācakṣāṇair evāsmābhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7620: hetor āśrayāsiddhatāpy uktaprāyaivety arthaḥ. tathā nirālambanatā ceha sarvathā yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:7622: tenaiva hetor viruddhatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyahīnatā dve ete bodhite. sarvathā nirālambanatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7623: hi sādhye tathāvidhasya kasyacid asiddher vyāptibalena yathākathañcinnirālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7624: sisādhayiṣataḥ sarvathā nirālambanatvaviruddhaṃ pratyayatvahetuḥ sādhayatīti viruddhatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7625: svapnādijñānānām api sarvathā nirālambanatvābhāvāt sādhyahīno dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tad etad āha -- tatheti. sādhyahīnatāṃ prapañcayati -- svapneti //
GSP28mimsvtku:7627: ata āha -- sarvatreti. asti hi sarvajñāneṣv eva deśāntarādistham ālambanam. yad eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7628: hi kvacid deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva deśāntarādau pratīyata ity etad evānālambanatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7629: na tu sarvathā grāhyābhāva iti. nanu yad eva kvacid deśe kāle vānanubhūtapūrvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7630: tad api svapnajñāne prakāśate. ataḥ kathaṃ tasya deśāntarādisthabāhyālambanatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7631: ata āha -- janmanīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- pūrvānubhūtagocarā hi manomātrasahāyā svapnasmṛtiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7632: doṣavaśāc ca pratyutpannabodhaḥ. na ceha pratiniyamaḥ yad ekatra janmany anubhūtam
GSP28mimsvtku:7634: janmāntarānubhūtam api kutaścid adṛṣṭād manasi viparivartamānam alam eva bhavituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7635: gocaraḥ svapnādidhiyām. ato 'sti tāvad vibhramāṇām api kathañcid avasthitaṃ bāhyālambanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7637: evam antaḥkaraṇajanmanaḥ svapnavibhramasyālambanam uktam. bāhyendriyajanmanāṃ vibhramāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:7638: idānīṃ bāhyam ālambanaṃ darśayati -- alāteti dhiyo'ntena. alātacakrajñāne śīghrabhramaṇadūṣitam
GSP28mimsvtku:7639: alātam evālambanam. gandharvanagaravibhrame tu sanniveśaviśeṣāvasthitāny abhrāṇy
GSP28mimsvtku:7640: eva dūratvāt pūrvāvagatagṛhākāreṇālambyante. tad iha pūrvadṛṣṭagṛhāṇy abhrāṇi ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7641: tatsanniveśaviśeṣabhrāñjyālambanam. tad iha dviprakāro viṣayadoṣo vibhrame kāraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7642: mṛgatoyajñāne pūrvānubhūtatoyamūṣaraṃ ca sūryaraśmitaptam evālambanam. ubhayaṃ hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7644: tadanyatarāpāye hy abhāvāt. iha cāntaḥkaraṇaviṣayadoṣābhyāṃ vibhramaḥ. pipāsādūṣitāntaḥkaraṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7645: hi sūryaraśmitaptamūṣaraṃ toyasadṛśaṃ tadvadābhāti. śaśaviṣāṇabuddhes tu mānasād
GSP28mimsvtku:7647: 65}jāyamānāyā. gavādidravyāntaragataṃ viṣāṇam ātmā ca śaśasya kāraṇam. ubhayabhāvabhāvitvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7648: ekatarāpāye 'pi cāpāyād iti. nanu śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstīti buddher na kiñcid ālambanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7649: na tāvat śaśo viṣāṇaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vāsyālambanam. pratiṣedharūpatvān nābhāvaḥ. svatantrānirbhāsāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7650: tathā hi -- na vayaṃ śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstītyukte svatantram abhāvam avagacchāmaḥ. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:7652: ata āha -- mauṇḍyam iti. asya śṛṅgasya niṣedhe śaśaśiromauṇḍyaṃ kāraṇam. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yady api svatantro 'bhāvo na pratīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7653: bhāvāśrayas tu pratīyata eva. ataḥ śaśamūrdhavartino 'vayavā uparyupari hīyamānā dīrghadṛḍhasanniveśarūpe(?ṇā/
GSP28mimsvtku:7654: ṇa)pariṇatā mauṇḍyāparanāmānaḥ śṛṅgābhāvātmanā jñāyante. yad dhi yathā nirbhāsate
GSP28mimsvtku:7655: tat tatheivālambanam. abhāvo 'pi parādhīna evānubhūyamānas tathaivālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7656: jñānaṃ tu sadrūpaṃ nāsyā nāstītibuddher ālambanaṃ bhavitum arhati. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:7657: bhāvarūpaṃ ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti katham ucyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:7658: iti. yat tarhy anāśritaviṣayaṃ śūnyaśabdāj jñānam utpadyate tadanālambanaṃ bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:7660: viśeṣāprakāśāc ca. ata āha -- vastv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svatantraṃ śūnyajñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7661: utpadyate kiñcid dhi kenacit śūnyam avasīyate. gṛhaṃ caitreṇa jagad vandhyāsutena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7662: ataḥ kevalagṛhādyālambanam eva śūnyajñānaṃ nānālambanaṃ svāṃśālambanaṃ veti // 112 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7663: evam aṅgulyādivākyajanitaśābdavibhramāṇām api sannidhidoṣadūṣitā eva padārthāḥ kāraṇam ity āha -- kāraṇatvam iti. yas tarhy atyantānanubhūtapūrvaḥ{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7665: tatra na kiñcij jñānasyālambanam upalabhyate. viṣāṇādir hi kvacid adṛṣṭaḥ kvacit
GSP28mimsvtku:7666: tūpalabhyata iti yuktam. svarūpāsatas tu kathaṃ kutra vā kalpanam ata āha -- atyanteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7667: pṛthivyādi sūkṣmam eva hi taiḥ pradhānam iti kalpyate. sthūlasya hi jagato nākasmān
GSP28mimsvtku:7668: niṣpattir upapadyata iti pradhānaṃ kalpyate. na ca tadanyat paramāṇubhyo ghaṭata
GSP28mimsvtku:7669: iti kathañcit sūkṣmarūpāvasthitāḥ pṛthivyādaya eva pradhānabuddhyā gṛhyante. so 'yaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7670: sūkṣmarūpatayā teṣām agrahaṇāt tadvyatiriktaḥ pradhānabhramaḥ. paramārthatas tu tatsthāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7671: pradhānaparikalpanād eva tadālambanaṃ prakalpyata iti. ataḥ prakṛtaṃ vipariṇataṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7673: nanv atra prakaraṇe 'vartamāna evārtho buddhyā viṣayīkriyata ity uktam. tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7674: kathaṃ hi vartamānāyā buddher avartamānam ālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati. na hy avartamānaghaṭaviṣayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7675: vartamānaghaṭajñānam upalabdham ata āha -- eṣa iti. yad eva tad vartamānārthatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7676: indriyasannikṛṣṭārthaviṣayatvaṃ ca. ayaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇadharmo na jñānāntarāṇām.
GSP28mimsvtku:7679: nanu kim idaṃ pratyakṣadharma iti. na hy atra vaidiko vidhir asty evandharmaṇā pratyakṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7680: bhavitavyam iti. yathā tv avartamānaṃ na jñānaṃ janayituṃ kṣamam iti pratyakṣaṃ vartamānaviṣayam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7681: evam ābhāsam api tathā bhavitum arhati. kathaṃ hi tatrāvartamānena jñānam utpādayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7682: śakyam asataḥ karaṇatvāyogāt. tad etad āśaṅkate tāvat -- katham iti. pariharati --
GSP28mimsvtku:7683: kuta iti. avartamānaṃ hy arthakriyāntareṣv asamarthaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7684: jñānaṃ tu janayaty eva. bhūtabhaviṣyantyor api vṛṣṭyor anumānodaye kāraṇa[713]bhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7685: pratyakṣaṃ tv indriyasannikarṣānuvidhāyi. na cātrāvartamānenendriyaṃ sannikṛṣyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7686: iti bhavati vartamānaviṣayam. doṣasahāyebhyas tv indriyebhyaḥ prācīnānubhavajanitasaṃskāravaśenāvartamānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7687: eva vartamānam iva bhāsata iti na nopapannam. nanūktam asataḥ kāraṇatvānupapattir
GSP28mimsvtku:7689: 67}kāraṇam. nacāsataḥ śaktisamavāyaḥ sambhavati. na. sattvāt. yadi tadekāntam asad bhaved,
GSP28mimsvtku:7690: na jñānaṃ janayet. asti tad deśāntarādiṣu rajatādīti na tasya śaktisamavāyo 'nupapannaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7691: sannidhānaṃ tu tasya nāstīti kvacid evāvartamānam ākhyāyate. yat tarhi nāsty eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7693: tat kathaṃ jñānasya kārakam atītam anāgataṃ vā. tatrāpi sāmānyānumānāt. tenātmanā
GSP28mimsvtku:7694: sata eva kārakatvam. atha vā yadā tāvat tadāsīt yadā tāvacchaktimatā kārakībhūtenātmani jñānaṃ janitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7696: tad evaṃ paramparayā viṣayaśaktir ātmani saṅkrāntā. sa cātmā nitya iti sadāśrayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7697: śaktiḥ kāryāṇy ārabhate. tayaiva cātmasamavāyinyā śaktyā smṛtyādijñāneṣu jāyamāneṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:7698: atītānāgatārthāḥ kāraṇam ity ucyate yāga iva vinaṣṭo 'pi śaktidvāreṇa. bhavatu tāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:7700: bodhe tu katham. tatrāpy agṛhītapūrvasya sambandhāgrahaṇenānumātum aśakyatvād avaśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7701: pūrvānubhavo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. atas tatrāpi paramparayā kāryaśaktisaṅkrānter upapannaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7702: kārakatvam. nanv anya eva pūrvānubhūto viśeṣo 'nyaś cāyaṃ yaḥ samprati bhaviṣyat
GSP28mimsvtku:7703: tayā jñāyate. ataḥ katham anyāhitaśaktyānyasya kārakatvam. na. sāmānyātmanaikatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7707: nanv evam api na tāvad yathāpratibhāsaṃ bhavadbhir artho 'bhyupagataḥ. sannihito
GSP28mimsvtku:7708: hi pratibhāsaviṣayaḥ. na cāsau tatheṣyate. pratibhāsavisaṃvādivastvabhyupagame na
GSP28mimsvtku:7709: kiñcit pramāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ. tathā sati hi svāṃśālambanatvaṃ kalpitaṃ bāhyālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7712: 'yam āvayor vivādaḥ. na ca bāhyasadbhāve pratibhāsavisaṃvādaḥ. bhrāntijñāneṣv api
GSP28mimsvtku:7713: bahir eva viṣayā bhāsante. idaṃ toyam iti mṛgajalajñānaṃ nāhaṃ toyam iti. asti ca taddeśāntare.{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7714: 68} na hi bādhakenāpi bahirviditas toyasadbhāvo bādhyate. na hi tat toyaṃ nāstīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7715: bhavati matiḥ. kin tu idaṃ na toyam iti. kim uktaṃ bhavati. iha toyaṃ nāstīti. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:7716: iha kvacid eva toyasaṃyogo vāryate na toyam. ataḥ sannidhibādhe kaḥ pratibhāsavirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7717: nanv evam api sannidhijñānam evāsatsannidhyālambanatvena nirālambanaṃ bhavet. na.
GSP28mimsvtku:7718: sannidhir ity ūṣarasaṃyogas toyasyāpadiśyate so 'pi kvacit prasiddha eveha pratiṣidhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7719: iti na kiñcid anālambanam. ato yathāpratibhāsam eva sarvam idam upadarśitam iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:7725: yady evam apahnutaḥ satyamithyātvavibhāgaḥ. ata āha -- tasmād iti jñānamantena. bāhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7726: evānyathāsantam anyathāpratipadyamānam anālambanaṃ jñānam ācakṣmahe. nāsad grāhyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7727: tad evaṃ mithyocyate iti. abhāvālambanasya tarhi jñānasya kim ālambanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7730: tasya bhāvād viviktasyāsvatantrasyānirbhāsāt. ato balād anālambanam evāpatitam ata āha -- abhāveti // 117 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7731: atra kāraṇam āha -- bhāveti. satyaṃ na svatantro 'bhāvo 'vasīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7732: bhāvadharmo hy asau kathaṃ svatantro 'panīyeta. atas tvaduktād eva svatantrānirūpaṇāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7733: kāraṇāt sadātmanāvasthite gavādau vastvantarābhāvātmanā yaj jñānam utpadyate tadabhāvālambanam ucyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7734: idaṃ ca prāg apy uktam adhunopapāditam iti vivekaḥ. bauddhānāṃ tu sarvasaṃvidām ātmaparyavasāyitvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7735: arthasannidhyasannidhikṛtaviśeṣābhāvāc ca dvayam api nirālambanatvam abhāvālambanatvaṃ ca durnirūpaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7736: dvayahetor abhāvāt. sati hi hetau sahetukaṃ sad etannirūpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7737: na tv etad astīty āha -- bhavatām iti. bhavanmata ity arthaḥ // 118 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7738: {2,69} tad evaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭānte sādhyahīnatā vivṛtā. idānīṃ viruddho hetur iti dūṣaṇāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7739: āha -- pratijñeti. yathā dharmadharmibodhakapratyayanirālambanatvān na dharmo dharmī
GSP28mimsvtku:7741: tathā samastavyastayor dharmadharmiṇor vyāptibalena svarūpasvaviśeṣau vighnan viruddho 'pi pratyayatvaṃ hetur iti // 119 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7742: dṛṣṭānto 'pi na kevalam sādhyahīnaḥ sarva eva tu dṛṣṭāntadoṣās tadvacanābhāvaprabhṛti yojayitavyāḥ. na hy ekasmin jñānamātre vastuni dṛṣṭāntavaca(saḥ)
GSP28mimsvtku:7745: tasya cāsādhyāṃśena vyāptiḥ dṛṣṭāntadharmitaddharmatā ca sādhyasādhanayor iti sarvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7746: idam upapadyate. ato yatheṣṭam eva dṛṣṭāntasya tena tena vacanādinā nyūnatvaṃ śakyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7748: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntanyūnaś cāyaṃ prayoga iti kecid anuyuñjata ity āha -- kecid iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7749: dvedhā hi dṛṣṭāntavacanasamayaḥ. kecid vyāptyā sādharmya ukte 'pi vaidharmyavacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7750: kāryam iti manyante. tad idam ekeṣāṃ matena paricoditam iti kecid ity uktam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7751: nanu ca vipakṣād hetuṃ vyāvartayituṃ vaidharmyavacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7752: na ceha vipakṣānuvṛttiḥ sambhavati. sādhanabhāṣyasya tadantareṇa hetor vipakṣād vyāvṛttyasiddheḥ. a(?nye tu/
GSP28mimsvtku:7753: nyais tu) hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiṃ darśayituṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanam. tad yadi samyak sādharmyavacanād eva vyāptir avagatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7756: tadā kiṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti sādhanabhāṣyavyākhyānāvasare varṇitam. uktaṃ ca parair api na vā tadabhāvāt tatrāvṛtter iti. ato{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7757: 70}vaidharmyasyāvacanam ity adoṣaḥ. ata āha -- tadabhāveti. tadabhāvād avṛttir iti yad etad tavābhidhānaṃ tasyātra prakṛtasādhane 'vasaro nāstīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7758: katham anavasaro 'ata āha -- vidhirūpeti. tadabhāvād avṛtter iti yad uktaṃ tasyāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7759: arthaḥ -- bhāve pratijñāte vidhirūpeṇābhāvo vipakṣo bhavati. tadabhāve ca vipakṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:7760: 'bhāvasya nissvabhāvatvān na hetor vṛttiḥ sambhavatīti na vaidharmyaṃ vacanīyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7761: etad api bauddhā vaktum aśaktā eva. na hi teṣāṃ kvacid api pratyakṣavad vidhirūpeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7762: hetuḥ prakāśakaḥ. vyatirekapradhānavādino hi te. sarvatra sādhyānvitahetusaṃvido
GSP28mimsvtku:7763: durlabhatvāt. ato vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhenaiva sarvatra hetor gamakatvam āśritam. na
GSP28mimsvtku:7764: cāsati vaidharmyavacane vipakṣavyāvṛttiḥ śakyate darśayitum. ataḥ sarvatraiva tvanmate
GSP28mimsvtku:7765: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta eva vācyaḥ. tad etad upetyāpi tāvad ucyate. bhavatu vidhirūpapratijñāsvabhāvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7766: vipakṣatvāt tadabhāvād avṛttiḥ. ālambanābhāvātmakatve tu nirālambanatve vastuni sādhye
GSP28mimsvtku:7767: pratijñāte vastvātmakaṃ sālambanam eva vipakṣaḥ. tatra ca hetor vṛttisambhāvanāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7768: vyatireko[715]vaktum ucita eva. ato vaidharmyanyūnatā sūkteti // 122 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7771: vidhirūpapratijñāyām api vaidharmyasya prayojanābhāvamātram. avastvātmake tu vipakṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:7772: vaidharmyasya prayogaḥ sambhavaty eva. kriyate cānumānakuśalaiḥ. ato 'vaśyaṃ vācyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7773: yan nocyate tan nocitam ity āha -- tatreti. tadvṛttena vidhirūpapratijñā parāmṛśyate. hiśabdo hetau. yasmād avastuvipakṣe prayogaḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7774: tasmāt sarvatraiva vaidharmyaṃ vācyam. tad ihānavasaraṃ pratijñāyottaraśloke pūrvottarārdhābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7775: hiśabdadvayena hetudvayam uktam iti prayogasambhavam eva darśayati -- yasminn iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7776: śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād ity ukte yad anityaṃ na bhavati tat kāryam api na bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7777: yathā khapuṣpam iti śakyam eva vaidharmyavacanam.{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7778: 71}sarvābhāvasyāvastuni śakyanidarśanatvāt. bhāvo hi tatra nidarśayitum aśakyaḥ. vināśākhyakriyāsāmānyaṃ cānityatvam iti vidhirūpapratijñā darśayitavyeti
GSP28mimsvtku:7779: tad evaṃ tāvad avastuvipakṣe 'pi prayogasambhavo darśitaḥ. atra tu prakṛtasādhane
GSP28mimsvtku:7780: vastuna ālambanābhāvasya sādhyatvaṃ vastunaś ca sālambanasya vipakṣatā. vastuni ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7781: hetuvṛtteḥ sambhavād vipakṣād vyatirekaḥ prayojanavattvād vācya evety āha -- atra
GSP28mimsvtku:7782: tv iti vācyontena. yas tv atrāpi vyatirekaṃ darśayati tenāvaśyaṃ[716]yannirālambanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7783: na bhavatīti nañātmanaḥ pratiṣedhadvayāt sālambanavidhir eva pradarśito bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7784: na ca sarvasminn evāsati vastuny ālambanavidhiḥ śakyo vaktum. seyam ubhayataḥpāśā
GSP28mimsvtku:7785: rajjuḥ. vaidharmyavacane vastutvāpātaḥ. avacane vācyāvacanam iti. tad etad āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7789: yadi tarhi sarvathaiva vaidharmyaṃ vācyaṃ sarvajñaniṣedhe kā vārtā. tatrāpi hy avastuni
GSP28mimsvtku:7790: sādhye vastvātmanaḥ sarvajñavipakṣād dhetur vyāvartyaḥ. tathā ca tadabhyupagamaprasaktir
GSP28mimsvtku:7791: ata āha -- evam iti. evaṃ hi tatra sādhyate buddhapratyakṣam asarvaviṣayaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7792: pratyakṣatvād asmadādipratyakṣavat. sarvaviṣayaṃ tu na pratyakṣaṃ śabdavad iti. evaṃ tāvad vyāpakaṃ vaidharmyaṃ manvānānām anuyogo darśitaḥ. na tv evaṃ manyāmahe. vakṣyati hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:7793: vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyam apekṣyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:7795: {2,72} anaikāntikāśaṅkānirākaraṇaṃ tu tadukteḥ prayojanam iha vipakṣābhāvād eva tan
GSP28mimsvtku:7796: na sambhavatīti kiṃ tadvacanenety āha -- vaidharmyeti. etad iti. prakṛtasādhanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7798: sādhu tarhi sādhanam āpannaṃ sampratipattir evottaram ata āha -- sarvatheti. yeṣāṃ hi sādhyasiddhāv upāyāntarāṇi pratijñāhetudṛṣṭā(?ntāni/
GSP28mimsvtku:7799: ntāḥ) santi, te vādamārgeṣv adhikṛtāḥ. saugatās tu na kathātraye. ato na nāma vaidharmyavacananyūnatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7800: dūṣaṇam. anupāyasya hi kathaṃ sādhyasiddhir bhaviṣyati. vayaṃ hi sādharmyāt sādhyasiddhiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7801: manvānā vaidharmyaṃ nādriyāmahe. sarvāpalāpavādī tu vāde nādhikṛta eva. pradarśanamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7802: hi vādagrahaṇam. tisro hi kathā bhavanti. vādo jalpo vitaṇḍā ceti. śiṣyaviṣayo hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7803: vāhaḥ. vyutthitaṃ tu śiṣyamāṇam arthaṃ pratipādayituṃ jalpavitaṇḍe. tayoḥ svapakṣasthāpanāhīnaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7804: vacanaṃ vitaṇḍā. tad atra traye 'pi śūnyavādino 'nadhikṛtā iti // 128 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7805: sarvapūrvoktadoṣaparihāreṇedānīṃ bauddhaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate -- nanv iti. sālambanavādinaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7806: hi bhavantaṃ pratibodhayitum idaṃ sādhanam. tatas tvaṃ prasiddhair eva hetvādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7807: sādhyaṃ budhyamānaḥ kiṃ māṃ prati bahuprakāraṃ pratijñādi vikalpya dūṣaṇamāttha bravīṣīti // 129 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7808: mīmāṃsakaḥ prakṣīṇanikhilakuhetujālam evaṃvādinam apahasati -- vipralipsur iti. nyāyavit
GSP28mimsvtku:7809: kilāsi. kim asmān vipralabdhum evaṃvidhaṃ bhāṣase. kiṃ khalu kathāsv apy ubhayasiddhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7811: {2,73} nanu parāsiddhas tāvad hetuḥ prayujyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ. śabdo 'nityaḥ kāryatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7812: iti. na hi mīmāṃsakasya śabdakāryatvaṃ siddham. athāsiddham api vyāpārānantaradarśanādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7815: ata āha -- yo 'pītidvayena. parāsiddhe hi svayaṃsiddhe prasādhanaṃ pratīkāro bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7816: svatosiddhe tu pratikriyaiva nāsti. tasmin sādhyamāne pūrvābhyupagamavirodho bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7817: asādhitena tv asatā na sādhyaṃ sādhyata iti // 132 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7818: atra codayati -- pareti. parapratipādanārthaṃ hi sādhanavacanam. na cāsau[717]paro
GSP28mimsvtku:7819: 'siddhena pratipādayituṃ śakyate. ataḥ parāsiddho na sādhanam iti yuktam. svāsiddhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7820: tu kiṃkṛtam asādhanatvam iti na vidma iti // 133 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7823: nanūbhayasiddho hetur iti bhavadvṛddhair api bhāṣitaṃ tat parityaktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7824: ata āha -- dvayor iti. nāyam adṛṣṭāya vṛddhopadeśo dṛṣṭānusāreṇa parāsiddhapratiṣedhaparatvam evāsya niścīyate ity āha -- pratyeṣya(ntī)
GSP28mimsvtku:7825: ti. svasiddhair hetvādibhiḥ paraḥ sādhyaṃ vaktā tu svayam asiddhaṃ kathaṃ śaknoty ata āha -- vaded iti // 135 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7826: {2,74} pratyakṣaparidṛṣṭaṃ hi sādhanavākyaṃ vaktṛprayuktaṃ taddarśanena bhavati kācit
GSP28mimsvtku:7827: prayuktiśaktikalpanā. kiṃ tadviśeṣāvadhāraṇena. tava tu sāpy[718]apratijñānārthinaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7828: sādhanaśaktiparīkṣaiva yuktā kim anena kathaṃ vaktrā sādhanaṃ prayuktam iti. etad
GSP28mimsvtku:7832: puruṣādhīne hi nirṇaye tatpratyayānusāritvān nirṇasyaya tajjñānakāraṇānusaraṇam ucitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7834: atrāpi tu puruṣādhīne nirṇaye pratijñāmātrād eva tadanusārī nirṇayo bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:7835: na sādhanāpekṣā syād ity āha -- yadi caivam iti // 138 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7836: na tv etad astīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati -- yatas tv iti. asyaiva sādhanasyaivety arthaḥ. kim idānīṃ vākyam anapekṣitārtham eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7839: atas tacchaktir eva cintanīyā. kiṃ puruṣanirūpaṇena. na hy ayam aprāptapratyayānusārī niścaya iti // 139 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7840: ato yathā svārthānumāne na vaktāram apekṣate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7841: evam ihāpi bhavān nāpekṣetaivety āha -- tasmād iti. yataḥ smārakaṃ vākyam ity arthaḥ // 140 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7842: {2,75} yadi tu sarvapramāṇeṣv eva puruṣāpekṣeṣyate sā tarhi pratyakṣeṇārtham upala(?bhya/
GSP28mimsvtku:7843: bha)mānasya prāpnoti. na ca matprasiddhā yuktiḥ sādhyaṃ vā yat pratyakṣeṇa paricchidyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7844: tatrāsti yathātra sādhyasya nirālambanatvasya pratyayatvasya hetoḥ siddhim icchasīty
GSP28mimsvtku:7846: tasmāt svayaṃsiddhenāpi parāsiddhena sādhyārthapratipattir na sāhasāspadam ity āha -- tasmād iti // 142 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7847: pariharati -- satyam iti dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- syād etad evaṃ yadi matpratipattimātraphalam
GSP28mimsvtku:7848: eva sādhanavacanaṃ bhavet. tathā hi -- kiṃ sādhanavacanenāpi avadhāyakatvaṃ budhyadhvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7850: siddhaś cāyaṃ bhavatāṃ jñānamātraṃ jagad iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7851: tadā kutaḥ punar idam avagatam iti paryanuyukte tvam eva jānāsīti naivaṃvidham uttaram upapadyata iti // 144 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7852: kathaṃ nopapadyate ata āha -- svayam iti. jñānakāraṇam anuyukte tad eva vaktavyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7853: na matprasiddhiḥ. evaṃ hi matprasiddhivacanam upapadyate yady agṛhītena matprasiddhena
GSP28mimsvtku:7854: vā hetunā sādhyam etad bhavān svayaṃ pratipannaḥ. pratipanna iti kartari rūpam. na
GSP28mimsvtku:7856: {2,76} kiñ ca bhavadīyaparārthānumānalakṣaṇānusāreṇāpi svapratipattiprakāśanaphalam eva sādhanavacanaṃ yenaivam uktam. parānumānaṃ tu svadṛṣṭārthaprakāśanam
GSP28mimsvtku:7857: ato 'vaśyaṃ svajñānakāraṇam avasthāpanīyam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- na ceti. svaniścayahetoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7858: pratipādanād anyatra sādhanavacanaṃ na prāśnikān sabhyān prati vyāptiyate. te hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7859: pratipādyāḥ. vyutthitas tu yadi vaiyātyād upapāditam api na budhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7860: kim atra vidheyam. prāśnikapraśnaniścayāt tu tattvam ity anādṛtya prativādinaṃ prāśnikapadaṃ prayuktavān iti // 146 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7861: api ca parabuddher apratyakṣatvān matprasiddhatvam api bhavatāṃ duradhigamam evety
GSP28mimsvtku:7862: āha -- matprasiddhatvam iti. kiñ ca viditapūrvam arthaṃ vivakṣitvā sādhanavākyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7863: prayujyate. tava tvajānataḥ kiṃkṛtā vivakṣā. na cātatpūrvā vākyaniṣpattiḥ sambhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7864: āha -- katham iti. jijñāsamāne 'pīti. na tāvad ahaṃ jijñāsamānaḥ vyutthitatvāt. atas
GSP28mimsvtku:7865: tvannigraha eva mama sarvathā vidheyaḥ. yady api jijñāsur ahaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7866: tathāpi bhavato vivakṣākāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate pūrvavijñānābhāvād iti. yata eva svāsiddhaṃ vaktum aśakyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7867: ata eva vṛddher api bhavadīyair ubhayasiddhahetutvaṃ bhāṣitaṃ na parasiddhiparam ity āha -- itīti // 148 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7869: tena tarhi yathā tvaṃ matprasiddhena hetunā mama sādhyajñānam ādhātum icchasi. evam
GSP28mimsvtku:7870: ahaṃ matprasiddhair apy amībhir bhavadasiddhair hetvādibhis tattannyūnatodbhāvanena
GSP28mimsvtku:7871: nānāvidhair dūṣaṇais tavājñānam ādhātum icchāmi. matprasiddhā api hetvādayaḥ tavāsiddhā
GSP28mimsvtku:7873: 77}ko viśeṣaḥ yat svayam asiddhaṃ sādhanam ucyate na dūṣaṇam. ato 'nabhijñasya parārthānumānaprayogānupapattir ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- teneti //
GSP28mimsvtku:7874: yā ceyaṃ bhavato mṛṣṭāśā svāsiddhair hetvādibhiḥ kila mayā sādhyaṃ boddhavyam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7875: sāpy ayuktā. tavaiva hy atatsādhanāt. sādhyaṃ budhyamānasya mamāpi pratighāto bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:7876: sādhyasādhanayor itaretarapratighātāvagamād ity āha -- yatheti caturbhiḥ. nigadavyākhyānāḥ ślokā iti // 153 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7877: hetupratijñāvirodhākhyam api nigrahasthānam āpadyate ity āha -- vispaṣṭaś ceti. akṣapādena hetupratijñāvirodho[719]nigrahasthānam ity uktam. udāhṛtaṃ ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:7878: śabdo nityaḥ sarvasyānityatvād iti. nitye hi śabde na sarvānityatvaṃ sarvānityatve vā na tadantargatasya nityatvam iti hetupratijñayor itaretaravirodho nigrahādhikaraṇam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7879: tad idaṃ bhikṣuṇā dūṣitam. uktaṃ ca nāyaṃ hetuḥ vaidharmyavacanatvāt. yadāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7883: iti. hetur hi pakṣadharmo bhavati. na ca sarvasyānityatā śabdadharmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7884: katham asau hetuḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tv asau nityatvasya. na hi tato 'nyaḥ sādhyavipakṣabhāga{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7886: tadvipakṣo 'nityatā. tad yuktaṃ sarvaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta eveti. tad atredam ākūtaṃ - yannityaṃ na bhavati tat sarvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7887: nāyaṃ sarvamato 'sarvatvān nityaḥ śabda iti. asarvatvaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7888: ataḥ sarvasyānityatvam ahetur iti na hetusādhyayor virodha iti. punaś coktaṃ - vaidharmyavacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:7889: api nedaṃ samañjasamabhāvaniyamasya viparītatvāt hetvabhāve hy atra sarvatve sādhyābhāvasyānityatvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7890: pradarśanaṃ kṛtam. sādhyābhāve tu vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte hetvabhāvo darśayitavyaḥ. vyāptiviparyayasyānumāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7891: vakṣyamāṇatvāt. tad ihānityatvasya sarvatvād iti vaktavye sarvasyānityatvād iti vacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7893: hetāv asmin vivakṣite 'kṣapādena hetusādhyayor virodho 'bhihitaḥ. yattvapakṣadharmatvān na hetur iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7894: tad dūṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati. asarvatvaṃ vā kathaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7895: tad apīha sarvāntargater asiddham eva. ataḥ kṛtvācintāmātreṇedaṃ naiyāyikair uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7896: hetāv asmin vivakṣite hetupratijñayor virodha iti. mā bhūd vā tadudāharaṇam. iha
GSP28mimsvtku:7898: yam etam adṛṣṭvā parair bauddhair uktaṃ na pratijñāhetur virodho dūṣaṇam iti. kilaśabdo 'rucau. atrodāharaṇaṃ vispaṣṭatvād virodhasyeti // 154
GSP28mimsvtku:7899: atra codayati -- nanv iti. saṃsārāvasthāyām anumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ. atra ca hetvādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:7900: lokaprasiddhā eva. loka iti laukikasaṃvṛtisatyam apadiśati. ataḥ saṃvṛtisatyasiddhena
GSP28mimsvtku:7902: paramārthāvasthāyāṃ tu sarvābhāvam ācakṣmaha ity avasthābhedād adoṣa iti //
GSP28mimsvtku:7903: pariharati -- yo 'dhuneti. yadi hi tadbādhakabalena nāstīty ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7904: prāg api nāsīd eva. bādhakena tatprāg api pratikṣiptaṃ rajatam iva śuktāv avagatikṣaṇād ārabhya. ataḥ prāg apy asataḥ kathaṃ sādhanatvam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7905: {2,79} prāk sādhanatvābhyupagame vā paramārthāstitvam āpadyata ity āha -- sādhaneti. kāraṇam āha -- siddhir iti // 159 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7907: ata āha -- na dṛṣṭeti. nātyantam asataḥ sādhanatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śaśaviṣāṇavad ity anumānam antarṇītaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7908: kvacid dṛṣṭasyāpi rūpasyānyatropacaritasya paramārthopāyatā nāsti. kim utātyantāsato hetvāder ity āha -- bāṣpādineti // 158 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7910: nanu varṇātmanā asatyānām api rekhādīnāṃ paramārthavarṇopāyatā dṛṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7911: ato naikāntiko 'satyatvaṃ hetur ata āha -- ye 'pīti. vipakṣavṛttir hi hetur anaikāntiko bhavati. na ca paramārthopāyeṣu rekhādiṣv asatyatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7912: svarūpasatyatvāt. tena ca rūpeṇa varṇabodhopāyatvāt. taddarśino hi smṛtasaṅketasya varṇā buddhau bhavantīti // 160 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7913: nanu bhavantu svarūpasantaḥ. varṇātmanā tāvadasatyā eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7914: ata āha -- varṇeti. sarve hi bhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa santaḥ pararūpeṇāsantaḥ. kenacid viśeṣeṇa rekhodāharaṇam iti // 161 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7915: {2,80} na caiṣa prakāro 'tyantāsatāṃ hetvādīnāṃ sambhavatīty āha -- svarūpa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7916: asatyam api kenacid rūpeṇa sad eva rūpāntareṇa bhavati. na hi nissvabhāvam iti nāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:7918: etad eva sphuṭayati -- hetvādīnām iti. atra ca bāṣpādīnām ivāgnyādāv upāyatvaṃ hetvādīnāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7919: na paramārthena tu lekhyavad ity āha -- teneti. hetutvābhāvapratipādanaparam idam iti // 163 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7920: atra codayati -- upāyānām iti. kim idaṃ nissvabhāvatvam upāyānām āpadyate. saṃvṛtyātmakā hi te. tena ca rūpeṇa santa eveti // 164 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7921: pariharati -- saṃvṛtyeti. sāṃvṛtaṃ hi rūpaṃ vāṅmātranirmitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7923: api ca, paramārthāl lokasya saṃvṛtisatyasya bhede na hetur asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7924: tadbhedagrāhiṇo 'pi jñānasya mithyātvād ity āha -- paramārtheti. api ca yadi paramārtho 'pi laukikopāyagamyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7926: laukikopāyagamyatvād bāṣpādivāgnir avagamyamāna ity āha -- laukiketi. pūrvaṃ ca satyabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:7927: nirākṛtaḥ. idānīṃ sāṃvṛtasya paramārthopāyateti vivekaḥ. nanv asata eva śrutyādiprapañcāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7928: prapañcavilayātmano brahmaṇo nirūpaṇaṃ vedāntavidbhir iṣyate. yathāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7930: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tadvedobhayaṃ saha /
GSP28mimsvtku:7932: iti. kim uktam. vidyārūpaṃ ca brahma,
GSP28mimsvtku:7933: avidyārūpaṃ ca śrutyādi. tadubhayam api yaḥ saha veda so 'vidyopalakṣitaṃ mṛtyuṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7934: tīrtvā vidyārūpeṇopalakṣitaṃ brahmānandaṃ pratipadyata iti. tad evam avidyāta eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7935: vidyāprāptir iṣyate iti. kim aparāddham evaṃ bruvāṇair asmābhiḥ. naiṣa naḥ siddhāntaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7936: yad asann eva śrutyādiprapañco brahmaṇi pramāṇam iti. teṣām api pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhānām
GSP28mimsvtku:7937: aśakyāpahnavatvāt. yathā hi so 'yam iti pratyakṣasiddhaḥ pratyagātmā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7938: evaṃ teṣv iti tadvad eva samyañco bhavitum arhanti. tasya ca pūrvottarakarmanirodhānutpādābhyāṃ vigalitabhogabhogāyatanasya kaivalyaṃ mokṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:7939: na prapañcavilayam. ekam evādvitīyam ityādivedāntās tv arthavādāntaravad viṣayavairāgyapratipādanaparatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7940: kathañcid gamayitavyāḥ. sa eṣa neti netītikaraṇena spaṣṭam eva bahirviṣayasadbhāvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7941: upadarśayati. eṣa ity aparokṣanirdiṣṭasya brahmaṇo viṣayavivekamātraṃ kathayati na
GSP28mimsvtku:7942: tadabhāvam. śrutyādiṣu cāvidyāvādo brahmaṇaḥ praśaṃsārthaḥ. apaśavo 'nye gośvebhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7943: itivat paśvantareṣv apaśuvādaḥ. ato na kvacidaparamārthasya paramārthopāyatā. astu
GSP28mimsvtku:7944: vā nityanirdoṣavedāntasiddham aprapañcaṃ brahma. na tu kṣaṇikasaṃvedanapravāhātmakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7945: dvaitaṃ kutaścit pramāṇād avagacchāma ity alambanenāpi // 166 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7946: pratyavasthānāntaram idānīṃ bauddhasyopanyasyati -- nanv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- yady api bāhyo hetvādir artho nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7948: hi hetvādivikalpavibhāgā bhavanti hetur ayaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'yam ityādayaḥ. vikalpa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7949: savikalpikāṃ buddhim ācakṣmahe. ato vāsanābhedād buddhibhedaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7950: tadbhedād dhetvādibheda ity uktaṃ bhavati. avaśyābhyupagama(?niyama/
GSP28mimsvtku:7951: nīya)ś cāyaṃ bhavadbhir api. buddhinibandhano dharmyādibhedaḥ. na hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7952: 82}parasparaṃ dharmiṇo vā bhinnayor hetusādhyayor avagatir asti. ato jñānabhedanibandhana
GSP28mimsvtku:7953: evātra bhinnatvavyavahāraḥ. sarvatraiva ca jñānam eva bhedanibandhanam. sudūram api
GSP28mimsvtku:7954: gatvā yuktibhir anusaṃhito bhedo jñāna eva paryavasyati. ato 'stu tannibandhana eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7955: sarvatra bhedaḥ. deśādibhedād api hi bhedaṃ bruvāṇas tadbhedaṃ paryanuyukto jñānabhedam
GSP28mimsvtku:7956: evālambate. tāvatāpi vyavahārasiddhau kiṃ prakārāntareṇa bhedo 'nusriyata iti. atrāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:7957: agnidhūmādau kṛtakānityatvavilakṣaṇaḥ sphuṭo bhedāvagraho bhavati. tatrāpi na jātibhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:7958: nibandhanam iti vācyam. so 'pi cāgnidhūmaśabdanirmita eva. na hi saṃvṛtikalpanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7959: anyena prakāreṇa jātibhedam upalabhāmahe. ataḥ śabdabhede 'rthavikalpavilāsitā evāgnitvādaya
GSP28mimsvtku:7960: iti. idaṃ ca bāhyanirākaraṇaparatayānāsthayoktam. na śabdabhedo 'pi vijñānabhedād
GSP28mimsvtku:7961: vinā sambhavati. so 'pi jñānamātraprabhāvita evābhyupetya bāhyahetvādivikalpavibhāgārtham ukta iti // 167 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7962: ayam evāsmadīyatantrakārāṇāṃ siddhānta ity āha -- nyāyavidbhir iti. nyāyavidbhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7963: hi diṅnāgācāryair idam uktaṃ sarva evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena
GSP28mimsvtku:7965: etad api dūṣayati -- astīti. nāsataḥ śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ śabdanibandhanaḥ tajjanitabuddhinibandhano
GSP28mimsvtku:7966: vā bhedo dṛṣṭa iti duruktam idam apareṣāṃ buddhyārūḍhenānumānānumeyavyavahāra iti // 169 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7968: tayor eva tu katham akasmād udbhavaḥ. na hy akāraṇikā kāryotpattiḥ sambhavati. na ca śūnye jagati{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7969: 83}tayoḥ kāraṇam utprekṣitum api śakyata ity āha -- nirvastuka iti. yaś cāyaṃ śabdabhedo hetvādibhedahetutayopavarṇitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7970: so 'pi tadabhāvād anupapanna ity āha -- śabdeti // 170 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7971: kiñ ca yady avidyamāna eva buddhimātrakalpitaḥ sādhyādibhedo 'numānavyavahārāya kalpyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7972: tato dūṣaṇavyavahāro 'pi tadvad eva syāt. utpadyate khalv asmin sādhane hetvādinyūnatoktimātrād eva dūṣaṇabuddhir ity āha -- yadi veti dvayena
GSP28mimsvtku:7973: śakyate ca vaditum evam api sarva evāyaṃ dūṣyadūṣaṇavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dūṣyadūṣaṇanyāyena,
GSP28mimsvtku:7974: na bahiḥ sadasattvam apekṣata ity āha -- yaś ceti // 173 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7975: nanv evam apy āvayor aviśeṣa eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7976: yathā hi no dūṣaṇajñānam utpannam evaṃ bhavato 'pi sādhanajñānam. ataḥ kathaṃ vijayase
GSP28mimsvtku:7977: ata āha -- buddhīti. ayam āvayor viśeṣaḥ buddhimātravyavahāriṇo bhavato maduktadūṣaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7978: siddham iti na te pakṣaḥ sidhyati. tvaduktaṃ tu sādhanam asmākam asiddham iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:7980: kathaṃ sādhanam asiddham ata āha -- bāhyeti. bāhyārthavyavahāriṇo hi vayaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7981: na tvam iva jñānaikaśaraṇāḥ. tatra katham asati bāhye budhyāmaha iti // 175 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7982: {2,84} punar api paraś codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hi me sādhanam asiddham,
GSP28mimsvtku:7983: evaṃ dūṣaṇam apīti na duṣṭaṃ sādhanam iti // 176 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7984: mīmāṃsakas tu pāśupato 'yam evaṃvādī yad vihāya sādhanam abhāvād dūṣaṇasyāpy aduṣṭatvam ātiṣṭhata iti sāpahāsam āha -- nedānīm iti // 177 //
GSP28mimsvtku:7986: so 'pi tadbhedanimittābhāvād anupapanna ity āha -- na ceti. nanu jñānabhedād eva vāsanābhedo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7989: vāsanānibandhane tu tadbhede 'nyonyāśrayatvam ity āśaṅkayā sahāha -- jñāneti. nanu svabhāvabhinnam eva jñānaṃ vāsanābhedanibandhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7990: katham anyonyāśrayatvam ata āha -- svacchasyeti. svacchasya hi jñānātmanaḥ svayam
GSP28mimsvtku:7994: nanv anāditvād eva bījāgkuravad itaretarāśrayaparihāro bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:7995: iti. prasiddhātmanor hi bījāṅkurayor anāditvād bhavati doṣaparihāraḥ. vāsanā tv asti
GSP28mimsvtku:7996: bhinnā ceti na kiñcit pramāṇaṃ kramate. yo hi{2,
GSP28mimsvtku:7998: sa kathaṃ vāsanām anujānāti. tadanujñāne vā kim aparāddhaṃ bhāvāntarair iti. api
GSP28mimsvtku:7999: ca pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitaṃ smaraṇahetusaṃskāram eva vāsanām ācakṣmahe. tad asau saty
GSP28mimsvtku:8000: api grāhakaṃ jñānam eva vividham upakalpayati. yat tu vicitrā bahirbhāvā bhāsante
GSP28mimsvtku:8001: tat kasya hetor iti na jñāyata ity āha -- kuryād iti // 180 //
GSP28mimsvtku:8002: na grāhyabhede vāsanā kāraṇam ity atropapattim āha -- saṃvittyeti. smṛtihetur hi
GSP28mimsvtku:8003: vāsanā. na cānubhūtāt smṛtir adhikaṃ mātrayāpi gocarayati. na ca bahiratyantāsanto
GSP28mimsvtku:8004: bhāvāḥ kvacid api gṛhītapūrvā iti na tān vāsanā smārayituṃ prabhavatīti. kiñ ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:8005: ataś ca vāsanā nopapadyate yat kāraṇaṃ kṣaṇikāni jñānāni niranvayavināśīni parasparam asahitāni cety āha -- kṣaṇikeṣv iti. yathā tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ niranvayavināśināṃ ca na vāsanā,
GSP28mimsvtku:8007: asāhityān na vāsanety uktārtham eva prapañcayati -- pūrveti. sāhityābhyupagame 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:8008: samavāyādyanyatamalakṣaṇasambandhābhāvād vāsanā nopapadyate. na hy asambandhaḥ kālāgarudhūmo
GSP28mimsvtku:8011: atra kāraṇam āha -- kṣaṇikatvād iti. vyāpāranibandhano hi vāsyavāsakabhāvaḥ kārakaviśeṣatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8012: tasya. na ca kṣaṇikaṃ pūrvam uttaraṃ vā tayor eva vyāpriyata iti sambhavati. nanu janmaiva buddher{2,
