GSP28mimsvtku:10627: kenacin nāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandha upādīyate. na hy evaṃ prayujyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10628: agniparvatayor asti sambandhaḥ dhūmavattvād iti. nāpi parvatasyāgnir iti. deśam eva tv agnyādinā viśiṣṭam anumimānā dṛśyante. yad evaṃ prayuñjate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10629: agnimān parvata iti. sambandho 'pi nānumīyata ity atītena sambandha iti. na paraṃ pratijñāyāṃ nopādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10630: udāharaṇe 'pi na tenānugamo liṅgasya nirdiśyate. na hi bhavati darśanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10631: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatrāgnisambandha iti. bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so gnimān iti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10632: tad etad āha -- na cāpīti. iheti mitiṃ pratyavamṛśati. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- na sādhanavākye
GSP28mimsvtku:10633: sambandhas sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā nirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10635: {3,28} api cāyaṃ sambandhas sādhyamānas sanmātratayā vā sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10636: kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ. na tāvad vastusattāmātram anumānasya viṣayaḥ. na ca parvatādivat siddhasādhyarūpam ākāradvayaṃ sambandho vahati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10637: yenānumānasya viṣayo bhavet. tasmān na kathañcit sambandhas sādhya ity āha -- na ceti. nanv asati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na śakyate. nāsti nāma sa prakāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10638: yadasambandhyamāna evāgninā parvatas tadviśiṣṭo bhavatīty ata āha -- tasmād iti vyāntena. na(nu)
GSP28mimsvtku:10639: satyam asati sambandhe viśiṣṭo na bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10641: viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva tv arthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā
GSP28mimsvtku:10642: na punaḥ svatantrasyeti. atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha -- yatheti. daṇḍyādiśabdā hi daṇḍādiviśiṣṭam
GSP28mimsvtku:10644: na tv abhidadhati. tadvad ihāpi parvato 'gnimān iti sādhyamāne 'rthagṛhīto 'gnisambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10645: na punas sa eva sādhyate. yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau satyāṃ sambandho nāntarīyako bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10646: evam atrāpi viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne nuniṣpādī bhavatīty arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:10647: idaṃ tu cintanīyam. kathaṃ daṇḍyādiśabdā viśiṣṭavacanā iti. matvarthīyapratyayāntā hi te. sa cāsyāsmin nāstīti sambandhe smaryate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10648: atas sambandha evātra pratyayārthaḥ. sa ca pradhānaḥ. prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10649: saha brūtaḥ prādhānyena iti smṛteḥ. idaṃ hi bhedenaivobhayor abhidhāne prādhānyapratipādanārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10650: vacanam. pradhānaṃ ca śabdārthaḥ. atas sambandhavacanā eva daṇḍyādiśabdā iti yuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10651: api ca nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣyate buddhir utpadyata iti viśiṣṭābhidhitsāyām avaśyam
GSP28mimsvtku:10652: bhāvi prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇābhidhānam āpatati tata eva viśiṣṭāvagāhasiddher na tadyāvacchabdasyābhidhānaśaktir upakalpayituṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10654: ca -- kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ tvatalbhyām iti smarati. kathaṃ ca tābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10655: taddhitavṛttau sambandho 'bhidhīyate. yadi taddhitābhidheyo na syāt. abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi tayoḥ smaraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10656: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10657: tadabhidhāne tvatalāv iti. tad yadi daṇḍapuruṣasambandho daṇḍiśabdasyābhidheyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10658: tathā sati tanniṣkarṣe daṇḍitvaṃ daṇḍiteti tvatalor anuśāsanam upapadyate. yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:10659: gośabdābhidheyaṃ sāmānyaṃ gotvam iti tv apratyayena niṣkṛṣyate. atas sambandha eva
GSP28mimsvtku:10660: daṇḍyādiśabdānām abhidheya iti sāmprataṃ katham ucyate nāntarīyakas sambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:10661: atrābhidhīyate -- na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhavācyatvam adhyavasātuṃ śakyate. śabdānuśāsanamātraṃ hi tad asyāsty asminn (5.2.94)
GSP28mimsvtku:10662: iti, na punararthānuśāsanam. api ca vṛttivigrahayor anyathānyathā guṇapradhānabhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:10663: dṛśyate. yathā citragur iti citrābhir gobhir viśiṣṭo devadattādir eva vṛttau pradhānatayāvagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:10664: vigrahe tu citrā gāvo yasyeti gavām eva devadattādir viśeṣaṇatayā guṇabhūtaḥ. tāś
GSP28mimsvtku:10665: ca pradhānam. vede 'pi rathantarasāmā soma iti. tad yady api smṛtikāreṇa ta(d a)
GSP28mimsvtku:10666: syeti vigrahe sambandhaḥ pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10667: tathāpi gomadāditaddhitavṛttau tadvān eva pradhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10668: tathā pratīteḥ. gomacchabdo hi puruṣapradhāno bhāsate na sambandhapradhānaḥ. pāṇiner
GSP28mimsvtku:10669: api bhagavatas sambandhābhidhānadvāreṇa viśiṣṭavācyataiva pratipādayitum abhimatā.
GSP28mimsvtku:10670: vṛttau vigṛhyamāṇāyām avarjanīya eva ṣaṣṭhīprayogaḥ. tāvatā ca tadarthaḥ pradhānatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:10671: vācyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti bhrāntir upajāyate. ato na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhasya vācyatā.
GSP28mimsvtku:10672: yat tu prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇam abhidheyam iti. satyam. na tv iha sambandho viśeṣaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10673: daṇḍo hi daṇḍino viśeṣaṇaṃ na sambandhaḥ. sa ca prakṛtyā prathamam abhihita eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:10674: ata eva nānekābhidhānaśaktikalpanādoṣaḥ. nirbhāgaśabdeṣu hi gavādiṣu viśiṣṭapratītāv
GSP28mimsvtku:10675: api viśeṣaṇamātram abhidhīyata iti yuktam. tatra hy ekasyaivobhayābhidhānaśaktikalpanādoṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:10676: bhavati. daṇḍyādiśabdās tu bhāgavantaḥ. teṣu bhinnābhyāṃ prakṛtipratyayābhyāṃbhinnau{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10678: puruṣo daṇḍiśabdenābhidhīyate. nanv asati sambandhe daṇḍo viśeṣṭum eva naraṃ na śaknoti.
GSP28mimsvtku:10679: satyam. na tv etāvatā sambandho vācyo bhavati. na hi pṛthivyām anavasthitā gāvo na
GSP28mimsvtku:10680: tadvantaṃ viśiṃṣantīti pṛthivy apy abhidhīyata iti yuktam abhidhātum. yata eva tv
GSP28mimsvtku:10682: ata eva sambandho 'py arthād antarbhāvyate. na tv abhidhīyate. yat tu sambandhābhidhāne tvatalor anuśāsanam asati sambandhavācyatve 'nupapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:10683: tad ayuktam. na hy abhidheyaniṣkarṣe gomadādiṣu bhāvapratyayānuśāsanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10684: api tarhi abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād iti tv abhidheyaniṣkarṣārtham
GSP28mimsvtku:10685: eva smaraṇam. itarathā tv anenaiva gatārthatvāt kṛttaddhitasamāseṣv ity avacanīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:10686: āpadyeta. ataḥ prāk pratīte ekanimittasambandhiviśiṣṭe 'parasmin sambandhiny abhihite
GSP28mimsvtku:10687: 'rthagṛhītas sambandho nābhidheyapakṣe nikṣipyate. sarvayaugikānām api caiṣaiva dig
GSP28mimsvtku:10691: iti. ato 'numeyāntarāsambhavād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhūtau dharmadharmiṇāv evānumānasamadhigamyāv iti // 32 -- 33 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10692: upasaṃharati -- viśeṣaṇeti gamyāv ityantena. sa cāyam aṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ kaiścid vikalpenāśritaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:10693: evaṃ hi manyante. sarvathā hi dharmamātre dharmiṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddhasādhyatādidoṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:10694: bhavati na viśiṣṭapramāyām. viśiṣṭatā tu kadācit kasyacid yathābhiprāyaṃ bhavatu nāma,
GSP28mimsvtku:10695: na kiñcid duṣyati. sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇa eva parvatāder agnyādidharmas taddharmeṇaiva dhūmādināvagantavyaḥ. sa tu dharmo viśeṣaṇabhūto viśeṣyabhūto{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10696: 31} vāvagantavya iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ. ubhayathāpi svatantrānumānābhāvād ity āha -- aṅgety avadhāryate 'ntena // 34 -- 35 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10697: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- atreti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇakārair
GSP28mimsvtku:10698: api yathālokam evānugantavyāni. na tu viparītam. na hy agniḥ parvataviśiṣṭa iti loko
GSP28mimsvtku:10699: budhyate. api tu parvato 'gnimān iti. tathā svayam anumānena pratipannam arthaṃ tenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:10700: paraṃ pratipādayanto laukikā dharmiṇā viśiṣṭam eva hetuṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:10701: yathāgnyanumāna eva dhūmavattvād agnimān iti. tac cedam agnau deśena viśiṣṭe numīyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:10702: nopapadyate. viśeṣaṇatayā hi parvataviśiṣṭo 'gnir iti dharmiṇy upātte dhūmavattvād
GSP28mimsvtku:10703: iti hetudharmeṇa tasya sambandho na sphuṭaṃ prakāśate. dharmadharmitayāvagatasya
GSP28mimsvtku:10704: hetutvam. na ca guṇabhāvopātto dharmī hetudharmasambandham arhati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10705: guṇānāṃ parasparāsambandhāt. ato 'smāt parārthahetuprayogaviśeṣād eva laukikānām
GSP28mimsvtku:10706: īdṛśī pratipattir unnīyate. yat svayam api dharmaviśiṣṭam eva dharmiṇaṃ budhyate
GSP28mimsvtku:10708: yadi tarhi dharmiṇo hetudharmeṇa sambandho na sphuṭaḥ kena tarhi prasajyata ity ata
GSP28mimsvtku:10709: āha -- pradhānatvād iti. dhvaniviśiṣṭam anityatvaṃ kṛtakatvād ity ucyamāne 'nityatvākhyena
GSP28mimsvtku:10710: dharmeṇaiva sādhyatayā pradhānabhūtena kṛtakatvādihetus sambadhyeta na dhvaninā guṇabhūtena.
GSP28mimsvtku:10711: sarvasya hy ekavākyagatasya pradhānānvaya eva yuktaḥ. pradhānasambandhe ca hetor
GSP28mimsvtku:10714: kiṃ tarhi dhvaneḥ. ato dharmy eva dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ pramātṛbhir avagamyate. tathaiva parasmai pratipādyata iti yuktam iti. yadi tūcyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10715: satyaṃ pradhānatayā dharmeṇa hetos sambandho vākyād avagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10716: liṅgabalīyastvena tu vākyaṃ bādhitvā dharmiṇaiva sambandhaḥ kalpayiṣyate. hetudharmasya hi dharmiṇaiva sambandhayogyatā na dharmeṇa,
GSP28mimsvtku:10717: ato dharmasambandhābhāvād dharmiṇaiva sambandho bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- tatreti.
GSP28mimsvtku:10718: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam evaṃ dharmiṇā sambandhaḥ sidhyati. kiṃ tvayam eva kleśo
GSP28mimsvtku:10719: yadvākyasvarasabhaṅgo nāma. ata evāha -- kalpyo 'sāv iti. anyathāpratipannasyānyathākalpanaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:10721: dhvaneḥ kṛtakatvād iti vā punardharmyupādānena hetur viśeṣaṇīyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10722: na caivaṃ prayoktāraḥ prayuñjānā dṛśyanta ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- dhvaner iti. yas tu
GSP28mimsvtku:10723: vadati dharmiṇy api viśiṣṭe sādhye 'nvayopadarśanavelāyāṃ yatra yatra kṛtakatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:10724: ity ukte dhvanir eva pradhānatayā sambadhyeta nānityatvaṃ guṇabhūtatvād iti taṃ pratyāha
GSP28mimsvtku:10725: -- anvayasyeti. anvayopadarśanakāle hi bhedenaiva dharmam upādadate. yatra yatra
GSP28mimsvtku:10726: kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrānityatvam iti na tatra pradhānasambandhāśaṅkā. ataḥ pratijñāvasthāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10727: dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yo guṇabhāva āsīt. nāsau dṛṣṭāntavākye duṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:10728: hetus tv aviśiṣṭa eva tārkikaiḥ prayujyata ity uktam. tatrāviśeṣita eva prayukte
GSP28mimsvtku:10729: bhavati pradhānabhūtadharmasambandhāśaṅketi. yas tu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10730: viśeṣyate dhvaner anityatvam iti. evaṃ ca kṛtakatvād ity asyāvipariṇatavibhaktikena
GSP28mimsvtku:10731: dhvaninaiva sambandhaḥ sphuṭo bhavati. dharmasambandha eva yathāvad vibhaktivipariṇāmena
GSP28mimsvtku:10732: syāt. sa cānyāyya iti sa vaktavyaḥ. nirākṛto 'yaṃ pakṣo vārtikakṛtaiva --
GSP28mimsvtku:10733: sambandho 'py anupādānān nāmnā ṣaṣṭhy api vā mitau
GSP28mimsvtku:10734: iti. ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet. tasya ca sādhyatā nirākṛtaiva. viśiṣṭasādhyapakṣa eva sthitvā dharmiviśiṣṭatā adharmasyedānīṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10735: 33}nirākriyate. kim atra sambandhasādhyatvaṃ punar upakṣipyate. tadalam anena bālabhāṣiteneti // 38 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10736: api ca agner deśaviśiṣṭatve sādhyamāne vakṣyamāṇasamastapakṣaprakārāṇām asambhavo
GSP28mimsvtku:10737: 'pīty āha -- agner iti. dūṣaṇāntarasamuccaye cakāraḥ. etad iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇapratinirdeśa
GSP28mimsvtku:10738: iti. tān eva pakṣaprakārān vaktuṃ saṃkṣipya pratijānīte -- viśiṣṭeti // 39 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10739: idānīṃ vibhajya tān eva darśayati -- yo 'gnir itītyantena. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:10740: vivekas tu pakṣāṇāṃ praṇihitair avagamyata iti. ihacādyayor dvayoḥ pakṣayos siddhasādhyatā
GSP28mimsvtku:10742: dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇas siddha eva kiṃ tat pra(sā)
GSP28mimsvtku:10743: dhānena. pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ity āha -- iha tv iti. siddhasādhyatā suprakāśaiva // 40 -- 42 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10744: virodhaṃ prapañcayati -- vyāptir iti. yat tāvat yo 'gniḥ so 'nena yukta ity uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10745: tad ayuktam. na hy anena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ cātrāsannidhānāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:10747: {3,34} yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yad uktaṃ tad dūṣayati -- nāpi pūrvasyeti. dṛṣṭasyāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:10748: agner anena deśena vyāptir na vidyata ity arthaḥ. yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇety atra dūṣaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:10749: āha -- nāpīti deśairantena. na hy eṣa puraḥsthito vahniḥ sarvair deśair viśeṣyate
GSP28mimsvtku:10750: sarvatra tasyābhāvād iti. pūrveṇa vāpy ayam ity atra virodham āha -- pūrveṇeti. pūrveṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:10753: asya ca tatra. pūrvānubhūtasya tv agner deśamātreṇa sambandhaḥ puraḥsthitavahneḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:10754: sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya dūṣita iti // 43 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10755: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣv aṣṭamaḥ pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etad deśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yam
GSP28mimsvtku:10756: agnir iti tannirākaroti -- etad iti. ayaṃ puraḥsthito 'gnir anena deśena viśiṣṭa
GSP28mimsvtku:10757: iti naitat sādhayituṃ śakyam. na hy apratyakṣadeśo vahnir ayam iti nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10758: nitarāṃ viśiṣṭatayā sādhayitum. yas tu vadati smṛta eva vahnir anena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10759: sa vaktavyaḥ. svadeśakālavartty eva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham asāv anena deśena
GSP28mimsvtku:10760: viśeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ. tad evaṃvādinā nāpi pūrvasyety api nālocitam. anavacchinnasmṛtāv
GSP28mimsvtku:10761: api ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇam iti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam. dharmāṇāṃ dharmiviśeṣaṇatayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:10762: sarvadāvagater ity alam aneneti. deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatām arhatīty abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:10764: yadi cāgnir viśeṣyo bhavet tatas tasyaivāyam ādyo jñānakālo bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:10765: prasiddhasyāprasiddhena viśeṣaṇāt. iha tv ādau parvata eva jñāyate. katham asau paścāt
GSP28mimsvtku:10766: pratyeṣyamāṇasyāgner viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatīty āha -- tajjñāneti. tadvṛttenāgniṃ nirdiśati.
GSP28mimsvtku:10767: agner jñānakāle hi sa eva deśo buddhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10770: 35}deśo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati. pramitaṃ hi vastvapramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitaṃ bhavati kīdṛgdharmo 'yam iti. tathā ca deśa iti sa eva pramitsyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10772: na punaragnir iti. nanu deśo 'pi pratyakṣāvagata eveti katham asāv anumānasya viṣayo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- deśasyeti. svarūpamātram eva hi deśasya pratyakṣeṇāvagatam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10773: anumānena tu pāvakādiviśiṣṭatā tasyānumīyata iti na gṛhītagrāhitvam iti. ato dharmy eva dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ na dharmo dharmi viśiṣṭa ity āha -- tasmād iti // 46 -- 47 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10774: evaṃ ca deśa evāgniviśiṣṭaḥ prameyo 'vatiṣṭhate. sa hi dharmī,
GSP28mimsvtku:10776: atadāśrayatvād deśasyety āha -- sā deśasyeti. anye tu pūrvāvagatadhūmam apy agniviśiṣṭam
GSP28mimsvtku:10777: anumānasya prameyaṃ manyante. tad api sādhv evety abhiprāyeṇāha -- dhūmasyānyaiś
GSP28mimsvtku:10778: ca kalpiteti. sā prameyateti sambandhaḥ. atra codayati -- nanv iti. viśiṣṭo 'numānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:10779: viṣaya ity uktam. nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena liṅgam api śabdavad viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyy
GSP28mimsvtku:10780: eva yuktam. śabdo hi viśeṣaṇamātra eva vartata ity ākṛtyadhikaraṇe vakṣyata iti // 48 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10781: pariharati -- naivam iti. kāraṇam āha -- na hīti. anekaśaktikalpanābhayena hi śabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:10782: viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasānam iṣṭam. liṅgaṃ tu pūrvāvagatapratibandhabalena pratibandhakadhiyam
GSP28mimsvtku:10783: upakalpayati. tad yāvataiva pratibaddham avagataṃ tāvaty eva pratibandhake dhiyam
GSP28mimsvtku:10784: ādadhāti. sarvopādhiparityāgenāgnimanmātreṇa dhūmavattvaṃ pratibaddham avagatam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:10785: agnimattvam evānumāpayatīti na kaścit doṣa iti. na ca viśeṣaṇamātram anumeyaṃ siddhasādhyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:10787: 36}na ceti. viśeṣyo 'pi parvatādisvarūpeṇāvadhāritaḥ so 'pi nānumeya ity āha -- viśeṣya iti // 49 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10788: ato viśiṣṭatvenaiva rūpeṇājñānāt tasyaivānumeyatvam ity āha -- viśiṣṭatveneti. atra codayati -- nanv iti. dhūmo 'py agniviśiṣṭo 'numīyata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:10790: pariharati -- naitad iti. sāmānyaviśeṣyātmā hi dhūmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10791: tatra viśeṣātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānyātmanā hetutvam iti na pakṣaikadeśateti. samadhigataṃ tāvadanumānasya viśiṣṭo viṣaya iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10792: svarūpam eva kim asyeti na jñāyate. tad yadi dhūmatajjñānādīnām anumānatvam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10793: tataḥ pramāṇaphalayor viṣayabhedaḥ sa cāyuktaḥ. ata eva bhikṣuṇā ekam eva jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10794: pramāṇaphalarūpam iti pratyakṣam uktvā tad evānumāne 'py atidiṣṭaṃ pūrvavat phalam
GSP28mimsvtku:10795: asyeti. yadi tv anumeyajñānam eva pramāṇam iṣyate tato 'py atiriktaphalābhāvaḥ. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:10796: vaktavyam anumānasya svarūpam ity ata āha -- dhūmatajjñāneti. yat tāvat bhikṣuṇā pramāṇa(?phala)
GSP28mimsvtku:10797: m eva phalam ity ekaviṣayatvalābhād āśritaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10798: tat pratyakṣavad ihāpi pratiṣeddhavyam. na hi sādhyasādhanayor abhedaṃ laukikā manyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:10799: ko hi vṛkṣacchidayā sārdhaṃ paraśor ekatvam ātiṣṭhate. viṣayabhedaparihāras tu pratyakṣokta
GSP28mimsvtku:10800: evehāpy anusandhātavyaḥ. yathā hīndriyādipramāṇapakṣe yatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate tadviṣayavyāpārāt
GSP28mimsvtku:10801: samānaviṣayatvam upapāditam. evam ihāpi dhūmādipramāṇapakṣe tadvyāpārād eva puroditaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10802: viṣayaikatvam atideṣṭavyam. ato dhūmas tajjñānaṃ vā sambandhas tatsmaraṇaṃ vā pramāṇam astu,
GSP28mimsvtku:10804: tve phalābhāva ity uktam. bhāṣyakāro hi buddhir eva pramāṇam iti darśayati yat kāraṇam asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhir iti vadati. na ca phalābhāvaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10805: hānāder eva phalatvāt. na ca sajātīyam eva phalam iti rājājñā. upayogād dhi sajātīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:10806: asajātīyaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavaty eva. astu vā sajātīyam eva phalaṃ hānādibuddhiḥ phalaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10807: bhaviṣyati. upakārādismṛtir vety abhiprāyeṇāha -- prameyadhīr iti // 52 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10809: kathaṃ tarhi dhūmādipramāṇatvābhyupagamaḥ ata āha -- pratyakṣeti. uktam asmābhir vivakṣādhīnaṃ pramāṇatvam iti. tad yadā dhūmādīnām eva prakṛṣṭasādhanatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:10810: tadā tad eva pramāṇam. bhāṣyakāreṇāpi buddhir vā janma vetyādinā pratyakṣāniyamaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10811: darśayatā sarvatraivāniyamas tulyayā darśita eva. ato na dhūmādiprāmāṇyābhyupagame
GSP28mimsvtku:10813: tac cedam anumānaṃ dvedhā bauddhā vibhajante svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ceti. yadāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:10816: iti. tad idaṃ dvaividhyam anupapannam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- anumāneti. asyārthaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:10818: pratipādanaṃ vāñchatā yathā pūrvam asmābhiḥ pratipāditaḥ pakṣo viśiṣṭo dharmī pramīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:10819: iti sa vaktavyaḥ. idam atrākūtam. svayam anumānena gṛhītam arthaṃ paraṃ pratipādayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10820: sādhanavākyam eva prayujyate. paras tu tato vākyāt trirūpaṃ liṅgam anusandhāya svayam
GSP28mimsvtku:10822: tad asya svārtham evānumānam. vaktur api svayam arthaṃ pratipannavataḥ svārthānumānam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:10823: katarad atra parārthānumānam iti na vidmaḥ. vacanaṃ parārtham iti cet. na. ananumānatvāt. vacanaṃ parārtham iti tu mṛṣyāmahe. yad vadati darśanasya parārthatvād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10825: atrirūpaliṅgajanitatvād anarthadṛk ca. trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam iti vas siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10826: ataḥ kathaṃ vacanam anumānam. athānumānagocarīkṛtārthapratipādanasamarthavacanapārārthyād anumānaṃ parārtham ity upacaryate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10827: tataḥ pratyakṣapratipannam apy arthaṃ bodhayad vacaḥ parārtham iti pratyakṣam api
GSP28mimsvtku:10828: parārtham āpadyeta. yadi tu svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya tasya cāśabdagocaratvān
GSP28mimsvtku:10829: na pratyakṣaṃ parārtham ity ucyate. tad ayuktam. evaṃ hi pratyakṣagṛhītārthaviparītābhidhāyināṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10830: tadvirodhodbhāvanavacanaṃ na yujyate. yo hi pratyakṣaviruddham arthaṃ pratijānīte nāgnir uṣṇa iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10831: sa vacanena taṃ pratyakṣaviṣayam arthaṃ pratipādya nirākriyate. pratyakṣaviṣaye tu śabdāgocare tannopapadyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:10832: ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayam api śabdo vadatīty abhyupagantavyam. evaṃ ca pratyakṣaviṣayavacanaparārthatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:10833: kaḥ pratyakṣaparārthatāṃ vārayatīti dvaividhyānupapattiḥ. ato yathoditaḥ pakṣa eva vācya ity uktavān.
GSP28mimsvtku:10834: idaṃ tu vaktavyam -- ko 'yaṃ pakṣo nāma,
GSP28mimsvtku:10836: pratijñārthaḥ pakṣaḥ. kā pratijñā. sādhyasamarpakaṃ vacanam. yadāhuḥ -- sādhyanirdeśaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:10837: pratijñeti. ataḥ sādhyaḥ pakṣa ity ācakṣmaha iti vācyaḥ pakṣa ity uktam. tadvacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:10838: idānīm upanyasyati -- tatreti. tatra pakṣe dharmiṇaṃ prathamam uddiśya sādhyadharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:10839: 'gnyādir vidhīyate. yo 'yaṃ parvataḥ so 'gnimān ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ tu pakṣavacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10840: pratijñāparanāmānam eke nānumanyante. vadanti ca kim anenānarthakena,
GSP28mimsvtku:10841: antareṇāpi pakṣavacanam apekṣitaṃ sidhyaty eva. hetur hi sādhyasādhakaḥ. na pakṣasya vacanam. na hy ayam āgamiko 'rthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10843: anarthakaṃ syāt. vaktṛguṇadoṣāvadhāraṇapravaṇa eva prativādī bhavet. hetvadhīne tu
GSP28mimsvtku:10845: kiṃ pratijñāvacanena. hetoś ca sāmarthyaṃ sādhyānvayapradarśanenaiva siddham. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:10846: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ śabdaś ca kṛtaka ity udāharaṇopanayamātrād eva sādhyasiddher
GSP28mimsvtku:10847: anarthikā pratijñā. hetor eva tu trairūpyaṃ darśayitavyam. tac ca dṛṣṭāntadvayenopanayena
GSP28mimsvtku:10849: {3,39} yadi tu vivādam āvedayituṃ pratijñāvacanam ity ucyate. tan na. avyāpakatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:10850: yo hi manyate -- yadā khalv ayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānīte tadetaro 'nityavādī
GSP28mimsvtku:10851: vyutthito bhavati tato jalpaḥ pravartata iti. tac ca naivam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10852: avyāpakatvāt. nedaṃ pratijñāvacanasya vyāpakaṃ prayojanam. vāde asambhavāt. śiṣyaviṣayo hi saḥ. sa ca tattvam eva bodhayitavyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10853: ato hetuśaktim eva pratipādya tattvaṃ bodhyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10855: na hi tena saha vivaditavyam. jalpe syād iti ced,
GSP28mimsvtku:10856: na. anyathāsiddheḥ. tatraitat syāt -- jalpe khalu vivādam ājihīrṣuḥ pratijñāṃ praṇayatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10858: asaty api hi pakṣavacane lakṣyata eva yathā dhvanim anityam anuminotīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10860: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭa ity uktvā kṛtakatvaṃ dhvaner upanayati śabdaś
GSP28mimsvtku:10861: ca kṛtaka iti. tato jalpaḥ pravartiṣyata eva. vitaṇḍā tu yathā tathā vāde darśite
GSP28mimsvtku:10862: pravartata eva. na hi vaitaṇḍikasya kiñcit paranigrahād anyad sādhyam asti. yad asau
GSP28mimsvtku:10863: pratijñāvacanena kvacid arthe sādhyamāne svaviparītasiddhiṃ manvāno jātodvego vivadet.
GSP28mimsvtku:10864: ataḥ pratijñāvacanaṃ kathātraye 'py anupayujyamānam upekṣaṇīyam ity ākṣipanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:10865: atrābhidhīyate -- svadṛṣṭārthaprakāśanaṃ parārtham anumānam iti bhavadbhir evoktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10866: svayaṃ ca kutaścid dhetuviśeṣāt kiñcit kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭam avagatam iti parasmā
GSP28mimsvtku:10867: api tathaiva kathyata iti yuktam. asatyāṃ tu pratijñāyām anāśrayahetvādaya ākāśapatitā
GSP28mimsvtku:10868: iva bhaveyuḥ. nanu nāyaṃ pakṣavacanapurassaram ajñāsīt sādhyam iti kathaṃ parasmai
GSP28mimsvtku:10869: tathā kathayati. maivam. yady api śabdo 'nitya iti svapratipattau noccāritaṃ tathāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:10870: savikalpakatvād asyā buddher asty evātra pramātur viśiṣṭo vikalpaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10871: uccāraṇaṃ tu parārtham iti tanmātraṃ svapratipattau nāsīt. paras tu nānuccāritena
GSP28mimsvtku:10872: śabdena pratipādayituṃ śakyata ity uccārya pratipādyata iti śabdoccāraṇamātram adhikam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10875: sutarām upayogāt. jalpavitaṇḍe hi vijigīṣamāṇayor dvayoḥ pravartata iti paraṃ bhrāmayituṃ pratijñāvacanaṃ na prayujyeta. avivāde tu śiṣyo na vyāmohanīya iti viśadataram eva{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10876: 40}pratijñāvacanena sādhyata iti yuktam. na hi na śabdadāridryaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10877: yad enaṃ tattvaṃ bubhutsamānam upasannam aviśadavacanena parikleśayāma. na caiva
GSP28mimsvtku:10878: jalpe 'nupayoga iti. uktam idam asati hi pratijñāvacane 'nāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarterann
GSP28mimsvtku:10879: iti. guṇabhūtā hi te pradhānabhūtasādhyāpekṣāyāṃ sambadhyante. tac ca nāsati sādhyanirdeśa
GSP28mimsvtku:10880: upapadyate. nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ hetuḥ sambadhyate. tataḥ katham
GSP28mimsvtku:10881: ayam avyāpto 'sya sādhaka ity apekṣite vyāptivacanam. itarathā tv aikārthyābhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:10882: ekavākyataiva na saṃvarteta. tathā hi -- yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity ukte kṛtakatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:10883: anityatayā sambaddham ity anūditam. punaś ca śabdaḥ kṛtaka iti śabdasya kṛtakatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:10884: sambandho 'nūditaḥ. parasparasambandhe tu na pramāṇam. asambaddham idaṃ vākyadvayam ity āśaṅkyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:10885: kṛtakaṃ tāvad anityaṃ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti svarūpānuvādamātram ubhayor iti śaṅkā jāyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:10886: arthāntaraṃ vāpadyeta. yathā cānityatvadharmā kṛtakas tathā śabdātmako 'pīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10887: tad atra sarve kṛtakāś śabdātmāna iti sādhusampāditam āpadyeta. ataḥ pradhānavākyāvayavapratijñā
GSP28mimsvtku:10888: yad apahnūyate tan nāstikānām eva sarvāpalāpavādināṃ śobhate netareṣām. sā hi sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ sāraḥ. yad āhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:10890: taddhānau hīyate vādī taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet //
GSP28mimsvtku:10891: iti sūkto vādivacanaprakāro dharmiṇam uddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyata iti // 53 --54 //
GSP28mimsvtku:10892: nanv evaṃ sādhyaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevalasādhyānvayāvagamād dharmāntaravyudāso
GSP28mimsvtku:10893: bhavet. tataś cānityaś śabda ity ukte 'nitya evety avadhāraṇād ambaraguṇatvādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:10894: 'pi taddharmā na bhaveyuḥ. evaṃ ca hetor api pratikṣepāt sādhyasiddhir api durlabhaiva.
GSP28mimsvtku:10895: asaty avadhāraṇe nityo 'pi syād iti neṣṭasiddhaḥ. atha katham eko nityo 'nityaś cety
GSP28mimsvtku:10897: ata eva tannivṛttyartham avadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itaranivṛttir api bhaved ata āha -- niyama iti. sādhyadharmavivakṣāpekṣayaiva niyamaḥ kalpyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10898: 41}punaravirodhino 'pi dharmāntarāt. ato 'gnimān iti sādhyamāne 'gnyabhāvamātram eva nirākṛtaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10899: na punaḥ dharmāntaram. yathā śuklaḥ paṭa ity ukte tadvirodhinas tadabhāvasyaiva nivṛttir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10900: nāvirodhināṃ sūkṣmatvādidharmāṇām iti. atra cāsannikṛṣṭe 'rtha ity ucyate tasya ko 'rthaḥ. yady anavagatapūrvam evārtham anumānaṃ gocarayatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10901: tan na. sambandhajñānakāla eva hi yāvaddhūmādibhāvitayāgnyādisambandho 'vagata eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:10902: anyathā niyama evāvadhārito na syāt. na cātra deśakālasambandho 'dhika iti vaktavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10903: dhūmasya hi deśādisambandho bhāsate nāgneḥ. dhūmopalakṣitāśeṣadeśasambandhasya sambandhasamadhigama
GSP28mimsvtku:10904: evāvasāyāt. ata eva kaiścit smaraṇābhimānanirāsārtham asannikṛṣṭapadaṃ vyākhyātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10905: smaraṇaṃ hi sannikṛṣṭāvamarśollikhitam eva prāyaśo bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:10906: sa iti hi tat pravartate. na caivam anumānam. ato nedaṃ smaraṇam. nanv asaty api
GSP28mimsvtku:10907: tadullekhe smaraṇam utpadyata eva. yathā pramoṣe. maivam. grahaṇakāraṇābhāṣād dhi
GSP28mimsvtku:10908: tatrānubhavākārapravṛttam api jñānaṃ smṛtir ity āsthitam. na hy asannihitarajatādyavabhāsakāraṇatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:10909: indriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāriṇāṃ sambhavati. smṛtihetus tu prācīnānubhavaprabhāvitā bhāvanā
GSP28mimsvtku:10910: samastīti smṛtir eva pramuṣitatadavamarśā sety āśritam. idaṃ tu pratyutpannaliṅgādikāraṇabalād
GSP28mimsvtku:10911: utpadyamānaṃ laiṅgikajñānam anubhavākārapravṛttaṃ na tadbhāvād uttārayituṃ śakyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10912: anubhūtiś ca naḥ pramāṇam. ataḥ pramāṇam anumānam ity ākhyāyate. yady evam astu tarhīdam
GSP28mimsvtku:10914: pramāṇaṃ bhavati. paricchedamātrasya tu phalatve smṛtāv api prasaṅgaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:10915: sāpi hi svagocaraparicchedātmikaiva jāyate. syān matam -- anapekṣaṃ hi naḥ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:10916: apekṣate ca smaraṇaṃ grahaṇam. ato na pramāṇam iti. tan na. laiṅgike prasaṅgāt. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:10917: api hy ekadeśadarśanādisāpekṣam eva. svaviṣayagrahaṇāpekṣaṃ smaraṇaṃ nedam iti cen
GSP28mimsvtku:10918: na. ihāpi tadapekṣaṇāt. laiṅgikam api hi prācīnāgnijñānasāpekṣam eva. na hy anavagatāgner
GSP28mimsvtku:10919: aviditasambandhasyāgnir atreti matirāvir asti. na ca grahaṇaṃ pramāṇam eveti rājājñā.
GSP28mimsvtku:10920: bhrāntāv api prasaṅgāt. viparītāvagraho 'pi grahaṇam eva. na ca pramāṇam. na cāsau
GSP28mimsvtku:10921: nāstīti yathārthāyathārthajñānavibhāgaṃ vyācakṣāṇair asmābhir uktam eva. api ca arthe
GSP28mimsvtku:10923: 42}sarvam anupalabdhārthaviṣayam eva pramāṇam iti sūtritam. etad api tadvyākhyānāvasare
GSP28mimsvtku:10924: varṇitam eva. ato vyākhyeyam asannikṛṣṭārthagrahaṇam ata āha -- asannikṛṣṭeti. asyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:10925: -- dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadrūpapramitaṃ viparītanirūpitaṃ vā. tadubhayajihāsayeyam
GSP28mimsvtku:10926: asannikṛṣṭavāg iti. kiṃ punas tannirākaraṇam ata āha -- pramitasyeti. vyavahārārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10927: hy apramitaparicchedāya pramāṇam apekṣyate na vyasanena. sa ca sakṛtpramāṇavyāpārād
GSP28mimsvtku:10929: kiṃ punaḥ pramitasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣā na jāyeta. ata āha -- tādrūpyeṇeti. varṇitam
GSP28mimsvtku:10930: idaṃ - dvedhā hi pramitaṃ bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyeneti. tatra tāvat tādrūpyaparicchede
GSP28mimsvtku:10931: na paraṃ pramāṇaṃ phalavat. pūrvaparicchedād eva tadarthasiddheḥ. vaiparītyaparicchede
GSP28mimsvtku:10932: tu pramāṇāntaram anavakāśam eveti tadubhayanirākaraṇārtham asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇam arthavat.
GSP28mimsvtku:10933: nanv evam apramāṇam evānumānaṃ sannikṛṣṭaviṣayatvād ity uktam eva. na. adhikāraviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:10934: yady api pūrvāvagato dharmaḥ smṛtiviṣayaḥ. dharmī ca girir anubhavasiddhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:10935: tathāpi viśiṣṭam anumānena viṣayīkriyata iti varṇitam asakṛt. nanv agniviśiṣṭo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:10936: sambandhasamaya eva saṃviditaḥ. evaṃ hy anena vyāptigrahaṇakāle 'vagataṃ dhūmavanmātram
GSP28mimsvtku:10937: agnimad iti. tad asya dhūmavanmātra evāpekṣā. vidite tu tasminn agnimattā pramitapūrvaivānubhūyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:10938: satyam. kin tu dhūmavān agnimattayā pramitapūrvo 'pi sampratyanumānena pratyabhijñāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:10939: pratyabhijñānaṃ cedaṃ pramāṇam eva pratyakṣapratyabhijñānavat. pūrvaṃ hi dhūmavattvopalakṣitena
GSP28mimsvtku:10940: rūpeṇāgnimattayā deśo nirjñātaḥ. sampratyayam asāv agnimān iti viśeṣato 'numānena
GSP28mimsvtku:10941: pratyabhijñāyata iti kim anupapannam. avaśyaṃ caivam abhyupagantavyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10942: anyathā katham agnimān iti viditvā vyavahārāya ghaṭate. eṣa hi paktukāmo 'gnimattām anumāyāgnaye dhāvatīti paśyāmaḥ.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10945: avāgamat khalv ayaṃ dhūmavān agnimān iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:10946: na cāgnaye dhāvatīti. katham anāśrayapratipanne 'gnau vyavaharatīti cet. na. prāg
GSP28mimsvtku:10948: vyavaharatīti cet. kim asyāgnyarthinaḥ parvatapratyakṣeṇa. tad ayam agnimattayā bodha
GSP28mimsvtku:10949: eva pūrvabodhād vilakṣaṇo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. yat kṛto vyavahāraviśeṣa ity agṛhītaviṣayatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:10950: anumānaṃ pramāṇam iti vaktavyam. tad idam asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇenoktam. ye tu smṛtyāśaṅkānirākaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:10952: teṣāṃ bādhitaviṣayam apy anumānam āpadyeta. na hi tannirākaraṇam avayavāntareṇa lakṣaṇagranthe
GSP28mimsvtku:10955: vaiparītyaparicchinne param anavakāśam ity uktam. tatra kāraṇam āha -- mūla iti. vyāptismaraṇādi hy anumānasya mūlam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10956: tad yāvad uttaraṃ tattadvyāpāravyagratayā vilambate tāvacchīghrabhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣayāpahārād
GSP28mimsvtku:10957: viprakṛṣṭasādhanasyotpattir eva nirudhyata ity anantaram eva vakṣyata iti. kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10958: punar anumānaṃ bādhyate. tad api hi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa bādhituṃ śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:10959: bādhe vā na kvacid āśvāso bhavet. ābhāso bādhyata iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:10960: katham ābhāsatvam. yadi bādhād evetarāśrayaṃ tarhy astu vā jyeṣṭhapramāṇena pratyakṣeṇānumānabādhaḥ. na tu tato 'pi jaghanyair aparair bādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:10961: tat kasya hetoḥ ata āha -- pratyakṣāder iti syādantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10962: nāma kvacit bādhyate. avadhāraṇātmakaṃ hy evaitad iti jñānaṃ pramāṇam. tad yatra
GSP28mimsvtku:10963: kasyacid arthasya kenacid ātmanāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tenotpannasyotpatsyamānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:10964: vā jñānasya bādho 'bhidhīyeta. taddvividho hi bādhaḥ prāptabādhaś cāprāptabādhaś
GSP28mimsvtku:10965: ceti. prāptabādho hi yathā -- śuktikārajatajñāne. tatra hi pūrvopamardanenaivottaram{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10966: 44}ātmānaṃ labhata iti tat tasya bādhakam. uttaraṃ ca deśādibhede 'py abādhitaṃ svabhāvataś
GSP28mimsvtku:10967: ca pramāṇaṃ pūrvam ābhāsīkaroti. tad evaṃ prāptabādhe tāvad yenottareṇārtho 'vadhāritaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:10968: trividham apy aprāmāṇyam avadhāritapadena vyudasyati. na hy ajñātas sandigdho viparyasto
GSP28mimsvtku:10969: vārtho 'vadhārito bhavatīti trividham apy aprāmāṇyaṃ yasya nāstīty uktaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:10970: tad evamātmanā jñānena pūrvam ābhāsīkṛtam iti tatrābhāsa eva bādhyata iti nātiprasaṅgaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:10971: aprāptabādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭasādhanam anumānaṃ svagocare sāmānyaśāstraṃ vā kvacid
GSP28mimsvtku:10972: viśeṣaviṣaye pravartitum ārabhate tāvat pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā siddhasarvāṅgakenāgamena
GSP28mimsvtku:10973: vā viśeṣaviṣayeṇa śīghrajanmanā yenaivārtho 'vadhārito bhavati tenaivottarasyotpattipratibandhalakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:10974: bādho bhavati. na hi balavatā śīghrabhāvinā pramāṇena niruddhamukham utpattum arhati.
GSP28mimsvtku:10975: tad evamaprāptabādhe param anutpannam eva prāptisambhāvanayā tu bādhyata ity ucyate
GSP28mimsvtku:10976: śruty eva liṅgam iti na kvacit pramāṇabādhaḥ. yat tu jaghanyena mukhyabādho na yukta
GSP28mimsvtku:10977: iti. tan na. na hi pratyakṣādīnāṃ viniyogapramāṇānām iva pāradaurbalyaniyamaḥ. yad eva
GSP28mimsvtku:10978: tu śīghrabhāvi pūrvopamardena vātmānaṃ labhate tad eva bādhakam abhidadhmahe. itarac
GSP28mimsvtku:10979: ca bādhyam ata eva tenaiva tasya bādhaṃ brūmaḥ. prāptabādha iva pratyakṣasya tenaivānumānena
GSP28mimsvtku:10980: ca siddhāṅgakena sādhyāṅgakasya viśeṣaśāstreṇa sāmānyaśāstrasya. atas sarvapramāṇāviruddham
GSP28mimsvtku:10981: eva pakṣam abhidhāsyāmaḥ. na cānāśvāsaḥ. ābhāsabādhāt. svataḥ pramāṇena cāvadhāraṇātmanā
GSP28mimsvtku:10982: jñānenetarābhāsīkaraṇāt. tad idam avadhāritapadenoktam iti. nanu ca balavatāpi nāvaśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10983: durbalaṃ bādhyate. asati hi sambhave bādhas sambhavati. ato viṣayavyavasthāyā vikalpena
GSP28mimsvtku:10985: ata āha -- vikalpāder iti. nātroktā vikalpādayas sambhavanti. na tāvatparasparaviruddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:10986: rūpadvayam ekatra samuccīyate. na hi śrāvaṇo 'śrāvaṇaś ca nityo 'nityaś ceti sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:10987: na ca vikalpaḥ. vidhiniṣedhaviṣayatvāt tasya siddhe vastuny asambhavāt. na ca viṣayavyavasthā,
GSP28mimsvtku:10988: varṇātmanām eva nityānityatvasādhanāt. ato 'sambhavād eva bādham abhidadhmaha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:10989: evam upapādito bādha udāharaṇair darśayitavyaḥ. tatra pratyakṣabādham eva tāvad darśayati
GSP28mimsvtku:10990: agrāhyateti. imaṃ tu pratyakṣabādhaṃ na budhyāmahe. svagocaraviparītārthaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:10991: 45} pratyakṣeṇa bādhyata iti yuktam. na ca grāhyatā pratyakṣaviṣayā grāhyagrahaṇasambandhaviṣayatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:10992: talaḥ. tasya ca pratyakṣāgocaratvāt. śabdo hi pratyakṣaḥ na grāhyatā. ata eva hy
GSP28mimsvtku:10993: aśrāvaṇatāpakṣo 'pi na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti vakṣyate. atrocyate. satyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:10995: grāhyas tu tadviṣayaḥ. tad iha grāhyāpalāpasyaiva pratyakṣavirodho darśitaḥ. nirālambanānumānasyeti
GSP28mimsvtku:10996: yāvat. pratyayas tv agrāhyapadād upapannas tasyaivābhāvam abhidhatte. kaś ca grāhyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:10997: bhāvo 'nyad ato bhāvāt. iyaṃ hi śaśaviṣāṇasyāgrāhyatā yan na bhavati. tadabhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:10998: eva tatrāgrāhyatābhidhānapratyayau. tad anena prakāreṇa śabdābhāvapakṣasyaiva pratyakṣavirodha
GSP28mimsvtku:10999: upadiṣṭa iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti // 58 -- 59 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11000: anumānavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- teṣām iti. teṣām eva śabdādīnām aśrāvaṇatvādyanumānaviruddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11001: yo hy aśrāvaṇam anityaṃ vā śabdaṃ pakṣam icchati tasyāsau śīghrabhāvinā viparyayānumānena
GSP28mimsvtku:11002: bādhyata iti. idaṃ tu pratyakṣavirodham anye manyante. tān nirākaroti -- na hīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11003: śabdo hi pratyakṣaḥ na tacchrāvaṇatā grāhyagrāhakasambandho hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11004: ca tvatalbhyām ucyate. kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ tvatalbhyām iti smṛteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11005: sa ca na pratyakṣeṇa samadhigamyaḥ. api ca atīndriyaṃ śrotraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11006: kathaṃ tatsambandhaś śabdasya pratyakṣo bhaviṣyati. na hy aindriyānaindriyādhāras sambandhaḥ pratyakṣo bhavati vāyuvanaspatyor iva. ato nāyaṃ pratyakṣavirodha iti // 60 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11007: kiṃpramāṇikā tarhi śrāvaṇatā. ata āha -- seti. abadhirādiṣu śabdopalabdher badhirādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11008: cānupalabdher anvayavyatirekau dṛśyete. tathā hi śrotropaghātamātreṇa cakṣurādimato
GSP28mimsvtku:11009: badhirasya śabdabuddhir na dṛśyate. śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣurādiṣv asambhave 'pi śabdagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11010: ata ābhyām anvayavyatirekābhyām idaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ gamyata iti. nanv evaṃ katham anumānavirodhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11014: ato mānasapratyakṣa evāyam iti kaścit bhrāmyati sa vaktavyaḥ. na bahirviṣayabodhe
GSP28mimsvtku:11015: manaḥ svatantram iti varṇitam asakṛt. yad yadīyanvayavyatirekāv anuvidhatte tattatkāraṇakam
GSP28mimsvtku:11017: anuvidhatte ca śabdajñānaṃ śravaṇam iti tattatkāraṇakam iti. idam eva ca śabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11018: śrāvaṇatvam. yat tu jñānasya śravaṇajanyatvam ato 'numānam evedam. nanv anyatrāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:11021: śrūyatām. paśyāmo hi vayaṃ kumbhakāravyāpārānantaraṃ kumbhasambhavam udīkṣamāṇāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11022: kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ cakṣuṣaiva. idaṃ hi kumbhasya tatkāryatvaṃ yā tadanantarasambhūtiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11023: sa ca kumbhas tatsambhavaś cobhayaṃ cākṣuṣam eveti kim atra manasā. ato yad yasmin sati bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11025: tattatkāraṇakam iti pratyakṣato viditavyāpter anumānam upapannam eva. evaṃ ca prayogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11026: -- śravaṇapramāṇaprakāśyaś śabdaḥ tasmin saty evopalabhyamānatvāt. yad evaṃ tattatprakāśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11027: santamasa iva ghaṭaḥ pradīpaprakāśya iti. idaṃ ca pratyakṣapūrvakārthāpattipūrvakam
GSP28mimsvtku:11028: anumānaṃ tayā śrāvaṇatvasiddheḥ. idaṃ ca siddhasarvāṃgatvād aśrāvaṇatvānumānād balavat.
GSP28mimsvtku:11029: yāvad dhi guṇatvasyāśrāvaṇatvena vyāptir grahītum iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11031: eva nirudhyate. evam evānityatvānumānam api. yat kṛtakatvādihetukaṃ tad apy asiddhivyabhicārādidoṣān
GSP28mimsvtku:11032: na śīghram upajāyata iti siddhāvayavaiś śīghrajanmabhir nityatvānumānair bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11033: yathā deśakālādibhinnā gośabdabuddhayas samānaviṣayāḥ gaur ity utpadyamānatvāt sampratyutpannagośabdabuddhivad
GSP28mimsvtku:11034: hy astanoccarito vā gośabdo 'dyāpy asti gośabdatvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:11036: śabdavirodhaprakāram idānīṃ pratijānāti -- tridheti. pratijñāvirodhādayo hi śabdavirodhatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:11037: prasiddhā iti te tathābhidhīyante. na tv ete śabdavirodhāḥ. yatra hi kvacid arthe
GSP28mimsvtku:11039: tatra śabdavirodho bhavati. na ca svavāgvirodhe śabdasya kvacid arthe pratiṣṭhāsti vyāhatābhidhānāt. pūrvasañjalpavirodhe 'pi pūrvāparanyāyabalābalānusāry eva nirṇaya{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11040: 47} iti na śabdavirodhaḥ. na hi tatra śabdapramāṇato 'rthaḥ nyāyagamyatvāt. loka
GSP28mimsvtku:11041: prasiddhis tu na śabdo na pramāṇāntaram. api atu pratyakṣādyantargataiveti tadviruddhapakṣapradarśanenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:11042: pradarśiteti na śabdavirodhe 'ntarbhāvayitum ucitā. na hy acandraś śaśīti pakṣaś
GSP28mimsvtku:11043: śabdena virudhyate. na hi candraśabdaś śāṅkayos sambandhaṃ śabdo vadati yenātadvācyapakṣasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11044: śabdavirodho bhavati sambandhavācyatve hītaretarāśrayaṃ bhavet. abhidhānāt sambandhaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11045: sambandhāc cābhidhānam iti. tasmān naite śabdavirodhāḥ. pūrvottaraśabdasāmarthyaparāmarśena
GSP28mimsvtku:11046: tv ekaparityāgenetaraparigrahāc chabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti tantrāntaraprasiddhivibhāgas
GSP28mimsvtku:11047: tridhā śabdavirodha ity ucyate. paramārthena tu vedārthavacanaviparītārthapratijñaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:11048: śabdena virudhyate. tatra hi pratiṣṭhitaṃ śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ śaknoti viparītapratijño
GSP28mimsvtku:11049: vārayitum. tac cānantaram ihaiva vakṣyāma iti // 61 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11050: tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati -- pratijñeti. tatra pratijñāvirodha evaikas tridhā
GSP28mimsvtku:11051: bhidyata ity āha -- yāvad iti sārdhena. ayam arthaḥ -- pratijñāvirodho hi svavāgvirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11052: sa ca tredhā bhidyate. uccāraṇadharmadharmibhedāt. yāvajjīvam ahaṃ maunīti pakṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11053: pratijñayaiva bādhyate. na hy anuktā satī pratijñā bhavati. uktimātreṇa ca maunaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11054: bādhyate. ataḥ pratijñāśarīrāntargatenoktimātreṇa bādhād bhavati pratijñayā bādhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11055: sarvavākyamṛṣātvapakṣas tu dharmoktyā bādhyate. sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanam api
GSP28mimsvtku:11056: mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet. tadamṛṣātve vā na sarvamithyātvam. tad iha pratijñāntargatadharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt
GSP28mimsvtku:11057: pakṣabādha iti dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam. pūrvatra tv aviśiṣṭamuktimātram eva maunaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11058: bādhate ity uktimātreṇety uktam. ātmabādhanam iti. dharmabādhanam ity arthaḥ. dharma
GSP28mimsvtku:11059: evāyukta ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat. vandhyā me jananīti pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11061: 48}vandhyātvam āspadaṃ labhate. na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ity api vaktavyam. ahaṃ yato
GSP28mimsvtku:11062: jāta iti viśeṣaṇāt. evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati. etac
GSP28mimsvtku:11063: cābhyupagamavādenoktam. na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhis
GSP28mimsvtku:11064: samīkartuṃ śakyante. sarvadūṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgāt. pramādājñānajāny eva hi dūṣaṇāni
GSP28mimsvtku:11065: bhavanti. teṣu kathañcit samādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhaved iti // 62 -- 63 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11066: pūrvasañjalpavirodham udāharati bauddhasyeti. anityaś śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11067: kṣaṇikād agṛhītasambandhād arthapratyaya ity anuyuktena tenaiva yadā punar ucyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11068: nityas tarhīti tadā tasya pūrvābhyupagamavirodhaḥ. yady api cātra nyāyabalābalānusārī
GSP28mimsvtku:11070: tathāpy evaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata iti na nyāyāvatāram apekṣate. sambhāvito hi pratijñāyām artho nyāyena sādhyate. asambhāvite tu nāyāpekṣā nāsty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:11071: svarasabhaṅguratvāt. ataś śabdavirodha evainam antarbhāvayati. śabdasandarbha eva
GSP28mimsvtku:11072: hi tādṛśaḥ pūrvāparaviruddhaḥ pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣām abhiprāya iti. sarvalokaprasiddhivirodhasyodāharaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11073: āha -- candreti. atrāpi mahājanaviparītārthaś śabdasaṃsargaḥ svarasād eva bhajyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11074: na pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta iti // 64 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11075: upamānavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- jñāteti. yena hi nagare gavākāro dṛṣṭaḥ samprati cāraṇye gavayākāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11076: taṃ prati gaur gavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11077: 49}parokṣe gavi sādṛśyam upameyam. pratyakṣe tu pratyakṣam eva. ata eva jñātagogavayākāram iti kramo vivakṣita iti // 65 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11078: arthāpattivirodham idānīṃ vivakṣan bhāṣyakārānusāreṇābhāvapūrvikāyās tāvadudāharaṇam āha -- geheti // 66 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11079: pratyakṣapūrvikām udāharati -- agnāv iti. adāhaka iti. atacchaktiyukta ity arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11080: anumānapūrvikām udāharati -- śabde cānabhidhāyaka iti. śabdaśravaṇānantaram arthapratītiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11081: ceṣṭayānumāya tatra śabdaḥ kāraṇam ity unnīyate. atas sarvakārakāṇāṃ kriyāvinābhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:11084: tathendriyāpalāpapakṣo 'pi pratyakṣapūrvikayārthāpattyā virudhyata ity āha -- śrotreti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11086: ayaṃ doṣa iti vivakṣatā punastadvirodho 'bhihitaḥ. atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā
GSP28mimsvtku:11087: virodho darśayitavyaḥ -- yathā gavayopamitāyā gos tajjñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11089: hi vācakaśaktim arthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthāpattyantareṇa śabdanityatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:11091: śabdapūrvikārthāpattivirodham udāharati -- śrutārthāpattibādha iti. kiṃ punar arthāpattiḥ prapañcenodāhriyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11092: tadvirodhapratipādanaṃ hi yayākayācid ekayāpi sidhyaty eva. tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11093: prapañco na darśitaḥ. arthāpattivad vā pramāṇāntaravirodho 'pi prapañcena vācyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11094: satyam. ṣoḍhā bhinnair eva ṣaḍbhir atra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11095: tatpradarśanārtham eva ṣaṭpramāṇaprasūtārthāpattir udāhṛtā. tenaiva tu mārgeṇa pramāṇāntareṣv api prapañco darśayitavyaḥ.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11096: 50}yathā tāvat pratyakṣabādha evānubhūtismṛtyanumānādibhiḥ ṣaṣṭhavarjaṃ ṣoḍhā bhidyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11097: svedyamānasya vādino 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijñā anubhavasthenaiva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11098: anāsannāgnes tu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11099: yadā khalv ayaṃ vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijānāti tadainam itaraḥ smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtam agner uṣṇatvaṃ yad evam āttheti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11100: sa tat smṛtvā tataḥ pratyakṣānnivartata iti bhavati smṛtapratyakṣabādhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11101: anumitapratyakṣabādhas tu yatrāptamukhe ceṣṭāviśeṣādarśanena tadavagatatiktādir asanivāraṇaṃ pratijñāyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11102: mukhavairūpyeṇa hi tasya tiktānubhavo 'numīyate atas tadviparītapakṣasyānumitapratyakṣabādhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11103: śrutapratyakṣabādhas tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahnute sākṣibhir dṛṣṭo 'yam
GSP28mimsvtku:11104: artha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate. na caiṣa śabdabādhaḥ. na hy atra tair
GSP28mimsvtku:11105: artho 'bhidhīyate. kin tu darśanam. atas taddarśanānusāry eva nirṇayaḥ. darśanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11106: tu taiḥ svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha evāyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:11107: upamānaṃ tu pramāṇāntaraprasiddhavastusādṛśyamātraviṣayam ity anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11108: gocarayati. yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī svātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:11110: katham anyathā pūrvedyur ardhakṛtakarmasamāpane paredyuḥ pravartate. iha ca ceṣṭayā
GSP28mimsvtku:11111: tadanurūpaṃ paragocaram anumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate. yady api cātrānumānāvagatapratyakṣabādha
GSP28mimsvtku:11113: tathāpi svajñānasādṛśyaparicchede śakyaṃ darśayitum iti tadavagatapratyakṣabādho
GSP28mimsvtku:11115: tv evaṃ darśayitavyaḥ. yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākam ekas tadāharaṇāya
GSP28mimsvtku:11116: prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣam arthāpattyā
GSP28mimsvtku:11117: pramīyate. tatra tadviparīto nistoyataṭākapakṣo 'rthāpattisiddhena pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11118: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagatapratyakṣavirodho nehodāhriyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11120: tāvat pratyakṣapūrvānumānabādhaḥ. dhūmānumitād eva bahner uṣṇatve 'numite tadviparītapakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:11121: 'numitānumānena bādhyate. yatra tu devasya tveti nirvapati{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11124: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu vrīhibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:11125: yajeteti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate. vrīhyavayavā hi tadviṣayatayā jñātasambandhāstām
GSP28mimsvtku:11126: anumāpayanti. na hi tasyāḥ svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11127: tadavayavās tu cūrṇībhūtā vrīhiśāstrārthaḥ. te ca nīvāreṣv api santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī
GSP28mimsvtku:11129: arthāpattipūrvakānumānabādhas tu śrāvaṇatvapakṣe 'bhihita eva. yatra dūrād vṛkṣābhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11131: pratyakṣaśabdabādhas tu tridhā darśita eva. anyo 'pi śrutismṛtibhyāṃ darśayitavyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11133: darśitaḥ. śakyaṃ hy aṣṭakādayaḥ śabdamūlāḥ śāstrasthāryāvartanivāsikartṛkatvād agnihotrādivad
GSP28mimsvtku:11134: ity anumātum. āgamikaśabdabādhas tu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibandhanakārāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11136: tatra hy āptāgamāvagatanityāgamavirodho viparītapakṣasya sambhavati. upamitaśabdavirodhas
GSP28mimsvtku:11137: tu manvādismṛtibhyo 'rthāpattyā vaidikaṃ kim api mūlam astīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa
GSP28mimsvtku:11138: eva mūla upamite rthavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena bādhyate. viśvajidaphalatvapakṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:11139: tu śrutārthāpattisiddhaśabdaviruddhaḥ. abhāvena tu śabdabhāvo 'vagantuṃ na śakyata
GSP28mimsvtku:11140: iti śabdeyat tāvadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāraḥ tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikārtsyne jyotiṣṭāme
GSP28mimsvtku:11141: prākṛtetikartavyatāprāptipakṣo bādhyate. yathā vakṣyati -- kṛtsnavidhānād apūrvas
GSP28mimsvtku:11142: soma iti. vrīhyabhāve tu nīvārāṇām agrāhyatāpakṣaḥ pratyakṣajopamānaviruddhaḥ. anumānapūrvakopamānabādhas
GSP28mimsvtku:11143: tu yadā hy ādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatim anumāya saṃvatsarādimadhyānteṣu tasyās
GSP28mimsvtku:11144: sādṛśyam upamīyate. yādṛśy ekatra saṃvatsarādau tanmadhye vānte vā sūryagatiḥ tādṛśī
GSP28mimsvtku:11145: vatsarānteṣv iti tatra gativaisādṛśyapakṣo 'numānapūrvakopamānena bādhyate. pūtīkā
GSP28mimsvtku:11146: na somasadṛśā iti tu pakṣaś śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddhaḥ. sāmapūtīkayor hi sādṛśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11148: 52}cānumeyam. śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11149: aucityena sārūpyaṃ pratipāditam iti śabdāvagatakāryakāraṇaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11151: hi dharmās satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate. jyotiṣṭomopamānena
GSP28mimsvtku:11152: hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāv iti. yadā tv ātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni
GSP28mimsvtku:11153: parendriyāṇy upamīyante tatra tanniṣedho 'rthāpattyupamānena bādhyate. vedakāranāstitā
GSP28mimsvtku:11154: śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvakopamānena bādhyate. dvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11155: apy abhāvenābhāve 'vagate sādṛśyam upamīyate. arthāpattivirodhas tu ṣaḍvidho varṇita
GSP28mimsvtku:11156: eva. abhāvavirodhaṃ tv anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ // 68 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11157: abhāvavirodham idānīm udāharati -- śaśaśṛṅgādīti. ayaṃ ca pratyakṣābhāvavirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11158: yadā tv amuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gato na veti cintyamāne gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvān
GSP28mimsvtku:11159: na gata ity avagate bhrānto gata iti vadati. tatrānumānābhāvavirodhaḥ. caityavandanādidharmatvapakṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:11160: tu śrutyādyāgamābhāvaviruddhaḥ. pūrvavanto darvīhomā iti tūpamānābhāvena virudhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11161: na hi teṣāṃ kenacit karmaṇā sādṛśyaṃ kathañcid avagamyata iti. palālakūṭakuñjarayos
GSP28mimsvtku:11162: tu sādṛśyāstitāpakṣa upamānābhāvena virudhyate. tathā śabde śrotradeśam anāgacchati
GSP28mimsvtku:11163: śrotre ca śabdadeśaṃ dhvanyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśravaṇopapatter yo 'rthāpatyā śabdaś
GSP28mimsvtku:11164: śabdāntaram ārabhate tataḥ krameṇāntyaḥ śrotreṇa gṛhyate ity anyathānupapattyā pratijānāti
GSP28mimsvtku:11165: tatpratijñā arthāpattyabhāvena bādhyate. abhāvābhāvas tv evaṃ darśayitavyaḥ -- yadā
GSP28mimsvtku:11166: hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti // 69 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11167: evaṃ tāvad dharmasambandhabādhaḥ ṣoḍhā prapañcitaḥ. dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhamataḥparaṃ vakṣyāma iti saṃkṣipya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11168: 53}ca vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayos saṅkīrtanaṃ karoti -- evam iti sārdhena. śrutyarthākṣiptayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11169: iti. svarūpaṃ tāvat sarvatra śrutyartha eva. tadviśeṣo 'py arthākṣiptaḥ. dharmadharmiṇor
GSP28mimsvtku:11170: hi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tam ākṣipati. tac cānantaram eva vakṣyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11172: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tam akṛtvaiva tadviśeṣaṇabādham udāharati
GSP28mimsvtku:11173: -- tṛṇādīti. yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanād agnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho
GSP28mimsvtku:11174: bhavaty eva. tadviśeṣaṇam apy uṣṇatvam arthākṣiptaṃ pratyakṣāvagatena śaityena bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11175: na ca vācyam anuṣṇo 'pi vahniḥ prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti katham arthākṣipto viśeṣa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11176: prabhāsv apy evaṃ vahnir uṣṇa eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:11179: svābhāvikī hi sā tasya. na ca hime 'py abhibhūtatvād agrahaṇam iti vācyam. tadviparītaśaityopalmbhāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11180: hetūpanyāsas tu pakṣadoṣābhidhānāvasare tadbījamātrapradarśanārthaṃ so 'yam abhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:11182: dharmiṇas tu dviprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇam āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11183: adharma iti sārdhena. hiṃsā kilādharma iti sāmānyato 'vagatam. tad yadā vihito 'dharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:11184: daikṣapaśuhiṃsādir yad duḥkhaṃ karotīty anūdya tadalpam iti sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11185: tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo 'pi duḥkhanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11186: tad api tenaiva bādhyate. na hi vihitaṃ nāma kim api duḥkhasya nidānaṃ bhavati. puruṣārthaikasādhanatvād vidheḥ. so 'yam{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11187: 54}āgamena dharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhaḥ. na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti codanīyam. arthākṣiptasyālpatayā vidhānārtham anuvādād iti //
GSP28mimsvtku:11188: ubhayasyobhayavirodham udāharati -- ayathārtheti. yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11189: tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇor api jñānayor mithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇoś ca mithyātvād
GSP28mimsvtku:11190: bhavaty ubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti. ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva
GSP28mimsvtku:11191: niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvad ubhayoḥ svarūpabādha iti // 74 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11192: kau punas tadviśeṣāv arthākṣiptau bādhyete. ata āha -- kṣaṇiketi. bādhyete iti vipariṇamya
GSP28mimsvtku:11193: sambandho darśayitavya iti. tatra caikadeśadarśanād ity ucyate. tatra ca darśanagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11194: atiricyate. ekadeśād ity eva vaktavyam. tad dhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanam ato vyākhyeyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11195: ekadeśadarśanād ity ata āha -- darśanād iti. ayam arthaḥ. naikadeśas sattāmātreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:11196: liṅgam. kin tu svapratipattau jñātaḥ parapratipādane ca jñāpitaḥ. tad idam ubhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:11198: ṇijbhāvābhāvayor api nirdeśasādhāraṇyāt. svapratipattau tāvad ekadeśe dṛṣṭe buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:11199: anumānam ity arthaḥ. parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadam ekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā
GSP28mimsvtku:11200: buddhir jāyate sānumānam ity uktaṃ bhavati. tad idaṃ tatroccaritadarśanapadam arthadvaye
GSP28mimsvtku:11201: vyākhyeyam. anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinor akasyobhayor vā saṃśayo 'dhīrviparyayo
GSP28mimsvtku:11202: vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate. na hy asau tādṛśaḥ parasmai
GSP28mimsvtku:11204: 55}svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭo bhavati. adhīrajñānam ity arthaḥ. tatra dvayaviparyastodāharaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11205: āha -- śaityād iti. vahniśabdayor dvayor api śaityacākṣuṣatve vādiprativādinor viparyād
GSP28mimsvtku:11207: anyatarāsiddhodāharaṇam āha -- kṛtakatveti. yadā vaiśeṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt guṇatvād veti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:11208: tadāsau svarūpeṇa tasyāsiddho bhavati. yadā tu svayam evaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati
GSP28mimsvtku:11209: vadati tadā tasyāsiddhiḥ. yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ dravyatvād ākāśavad iti. na hi vaiśeṣikāś
GSP28mimsvtku:11210: śabdaṃ dravyam abhyupagacchanti guṇatvābhyupagamāt. evaṃprakāra iti. parāsiddhaprakāra ity arthaḥ // 77 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11211: sandigdhāsiddham udāharati -- bāṣpādīti syādantena. yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:11212: sandihyate dvābhyām ekena vā kiṃsvid ayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā
GSP28mimsvtku:11213: dvayor apy anyatarasa vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati. evaṃ tāvat sandehaviparyayābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:11214: asiddhatodāhṛtā. ajñānena tv aprasiddhārthapadaprayoge darśayitavyā. tridheti. vādiprativādyubhayais
GSP28mimsvtku:11215: trayaḥ prakārā iti. evaṃ tāvat svarūpato hetur asiddho bhavatīty uktam ity āha -- evam iti // 78 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11216: āśrayāsiddhatāpy etair eva jñānādibhir vādiprativādyubhayāpekṣais tridhā bhidyata ity āha -- eta eveti // 79 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11217: nanu svarūpāsiddhyā hetur duṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kas tasya doṣaḥ ata āha -- jñāte 'pīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svarūpeṇa hetur gamakaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11219: 56}pakṣadharmatayā jñātaḥ. na cāprasiddhāśrayas taddharmatayā jñātuṃ śakyate. śaityacākṣuṣatvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11220: api pakṣadharmatvāsiddhyaivāhetutvam. siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavāyiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11222: hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayor asiddhatvam iti taddharmarūpābhiprāyeṇa svarūpāsiddhavacanam. ata āśrayāsiddhāv api pakṣadharmatvāsiddher ahetutvaṃ yuktam eveti // 79 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11223: tām idānīm āśrayāsiddhim udāharati -- sarvatreti asiddhāntena. yadā hi bauddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhād ātmanas sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakās
GSP28mimsvtku:11224: tadānyatarāsiddhāśrayo hetur bhavati. bauddhasyātmano 'siddher iti. yas tu pramāṇagatim ajānāno laukikaḥ kaścid ātmani saṃśete,
GSP28mimsvtku:11225: tasminn eva hetāv ucyamāne sandigdhāśrayo hetur ity āha -- laukikāder iti. ātmani
GSP28mimsvtku:11226: saṃśaya ity arthaḥ. ādiśabdena satīrthikānām api yeṣām ātmani saṃśayaḥ ta upādriyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:11227: evaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyām āśrayāsiddhir uktā. ajñānenāpy āśrayāsiddhir aprasiddhapadaprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:11228: darśayitavyā. yasya hi pakṣavacanaś śabdo na prasiddhas taṃ pratyevaṃjātīyake hetāv
GSP28mimsvtku:11231: evaṃ tarhy amūrtatvād ātmā niṣkriya ityevamāder api hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:11232: ātmano 'mūrtatvāsiddheḥ. mūrtaṃ hi te śarīrapariṇāmam ātmānaṃ manyante. akartṛkatvān
GSP28mimsvtku:11233: nityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddher ahetuḥ. śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti mīmāṃsakānām
GSP28mimsvtku:11234: asiddheḥ. tad eva hetur nāma na kaścit vyavatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- vāṅmātreti. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:11235: arthaḥ -- nāsiddho mameti vāṅmātrād dhetur asiddho bhavati. tathā sati na kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:11236: anumānavyavahāraḥ prakalpeta. dvābhyāṃ tu vādiprativādibhyām asattvenāvadhārito{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11237: tasyaiva tathāvidhasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti vākpravṛttimātrād iti // 81 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11238: nanu kim idaṃ dvayor asiddho 'siddha iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11239: na hi vivadamānayor ekatrārthe sampratipattir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11240: na hi janmasahasreṇāpi bauddho vedānām akartṛkatvaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11241: mīmāṃsako vāpi kaṇṭhagataprāṇo 'pi kṛtakatāṃ śabdasya. tad evamādāv ubhayasampratipater abhāvān na hetubhāvo 'vatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- itarad
GSP28mimsvtku:11242: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na dvayor asaṃpratipattir ity etāvataiva sādhanadūṣaṇayor anavakḷptiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11243: yadi vādinā prayukte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11244: tato bhavati sādhanam. yadi tu paramārthopapattyabhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11245: tatas tasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati. tatpramāṇatas siddhir evātropayujyate nobhayābhyupagamaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11246: dvābhyāṃ yo 'sattvato jñāta ity api pramāṇasiddhyabhiprāyeṇoktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11247: nābhyupagamamātrāpekṣayā. yad dhi pramāṇena sādhyate bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇobhayasampratipattir
GSP28mimsvtku:11248: dṛṣṭeti. asattvato jñātāpekṣayetaracchabdaḥ. yad vādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparītyena,
GSP28mimsvtku:11249: tadvādinā sādhyamānaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati. etac ca jalpanyāye sthitvoktam. vāde tu dvayor api sampratipattir bhavaty eveti. na caivam anyatarāsiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:11250: yāvat tu yādī na sādhanaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11252: sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti // 82 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11254: jñātasambandhapadasyedānīṃ vyāvartya darśayati sandeheti vacanāntena. sandehaviparītahetvor hi na saṃbandho jñāto bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11255: na hi sādhāraṇas saṃśayahetuḥ prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandham iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimsvtku:11256: dhaṭādiṣv anityatayāpi jñātasambandhatvāt nāpi kṛtakatvaṃ nityatayā,
GSP28mimsvtku:11257: teṣv evānityatayā sambandhasaṃvitteḥ. atas tajjātīyam ubhayaṃ na jñātasaṃbandham
GSP28mimsvtku:11258: iti jñātasaṃbandhapadena vyudasyati. atra cāsannikṛṣṭapadāt prabhuti prātilomyena
GSP28mimsvtku:11260: 58} tat kasya hetoḥ. pratītikramānusāreṇa. prabhātā hi prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ pratyeti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11263: ato 'satpakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ prayuktam asannikṛṣṭapadam eva tāvad upavarṇitam. tato hetupadam ekadeśadarśanād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11264: tato jñātasambandhasyeti dṛṣṭāntavacanam. dṛṣṭānte hi hetos sambandho jñāyate. ata
GSP28mimsvtku:11265: eva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api sādhyahetuvikalatvādayo 'nena nirākriyante. tadvaikalye 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:11266: svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata iti. kiyantaḥ punas saṃśayahetavaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11268: tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati -- sann iti. sādhyatadabhāvayos san sādhāraṇo 'bhidhīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11269: yathā prameyatvaṃ nityānityatvayoḥ. dvābhyāṃ sādhyatadabhāvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto 'sādhāraṇaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11270: kṣiter eva gandhavattvam. vyāvṛttaṃ hi tat sakalasajātīyavijātīyadravyāntaraguṇakarmabhyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11271: dvau viruddhārthasambandhāv iti. yau viruddhāvyabhicārīti parair abhihitau,
GSP28mimsvtku:11272: tau cānantaram evodāhāryāv iti neha vyākhyāyete iti // 84 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11273: tatra sādhāraṇaṃ tāvadudāharaṇaiḥ prapañcayati -- prameyeti. ete ca dharmās sādhyatadabhāvayos sādhāraṇā ity arthaḥ // 85 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11274: keṣu punassādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyam ata āha -- nityeti nityeṣvantena. kathaṃ punarvaiṣamye
GSP28mimsvtku:11275: yathāsaṅkhyam ata āha -- dviranityateti. anityatā svasthāne dviḥ paṭhitavyā. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:11276: yathāsaṅkhyopapattiḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- yadā nityaś śabdaḥ prameyatvād iti prayujyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11277: tadā prameyatvaṃ sādhyatadabhāvayor dṛṣṭam iti sādhāraṇatvān naikāntāya prabhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11278: ato naikāntikam ity ucyate. ata eva ca saṃśayahetuḥ. saṃśayo hi sāmānyapratyakṣād
GSP28mimsvtku:11279: viśeṣāpratyakṣād viśeṣasmṛteś ca bhavati. yathā sthāṇupuruṣayor ārohapariṇāhasāmānyadarśanād{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11280: 59}bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇāś ca viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣaḥ kiṃsvid ayaṃ sthāṇur āhosvit puruṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:11281: ity anavadhāraṇajñānātmakas saṃśayo jāyate. evaṃ prameyatvam api nityānityayos sāmānyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11283: jāyata iti prameyatvaṃ saṃśayahetuḥ. ayaṃ ca kṛtsnobhayavyāpīsaṃśayahetuḥ. tathāyatnotthaś
GSP28mimsvtku:11284: śabdaḥ anityatvād ity ayam api sādhāraṇa eva. ayatnottheṣu keṣucid vidyudādiṣu gatatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:11285: yatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭādiṣu vṛtteḥ. tad ayaṃ sakalavipakṣavyāpī sapakṣaikadeśagata
GSP28mimsvtku:11286: iti veditavyam. tathā yatnotthaś śabdaḥ anityatvād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11287: yatnottheṣu sarveṣv evānityatā dṛṣṭā. tadabhāve 'pi kvacin meghādau dṛṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:11289: sakalasapakṣavyāpī vipakṣaikadeśavartī cāyaṃ sādhāraṇa ity avasātavyam. ubhayaikadeśagatas
GSP28mimsvtku:11290: tu yathā nityaś śabdaḥ amūrtatvād iti. amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11291: bhāvād aṇuṣu cābhāvād anityam api na sarvaṃ vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣv abhāvāt karmādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11292: bhāvāt. sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvam eva hetos saṃśaye kāraṇam avṛttyaṃśas tu sann
GSP28mimsvtku:11293: api na kāraṇam ity atantram. ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhā vibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:11294: asāv anupayogy eva sādhanadūṣaṇayor ity upekṣaṇīyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11295: na hi sādhanavacanakāle tathāvidhaṃ hetuṃ parityajato vādinas sapakṣavipakṣayor avṛttyaṃśaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11296: kvacid upayujyate. aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetur atyājya eva. dūṣaṇavādino
GSP28mimsvtku:11297: 'pi vipakṣavṛttimātraṃ vacanīyam iti kiṃ tadavāntaraviśeṣāśrayaṇena. vārttikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11298: dvayavṛttitvam eva saṃśayakāraṇam iti darśayitum udāharaṇaprapañco darśitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11301: tyajyate sādhane caivaṃ sādhāraṇyād viśeṣataḥ // iti // 85 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11303: asādhāraṇam idānīṃ saṃśayahetum udāharati -- nityā bhūr iti. gandho hi pṛthivyāḥ svāsādhāraṇo guṇaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11304: na tāṃ vihāya nityam anityaṃ vā bhāvāntaram āśrayatīty asādhāraṇa iti gīyate.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11307: yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāv alambī sādhāraṇo dvayor anavasthādhiyam ādadhāno yatsaṃśayahetur iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11308: asādhāraṇas tu dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyam upajanayitum alam iti katham asya saṃśayahetubhāvaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11309: ata āha -- niścayeti. hetor hi niścayajanane 'nyayavyatirekāv aṅgam anyatarāpīye
GSP28mimsvtku:11310: 'pi na niścayāya hetuḥ paryāpto bhavati. tad yathā sādhāraṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto
GSP28mimsvtku:11312: evam evāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vikalas tam akurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti // 86 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11313: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśayae hetur iti. asādhāraṇas
GSP28mimsvtku:11314: tu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāv ekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayahetur iti yuktam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:11315: āha -- sādhāraṇa iti dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- sādhāraṇo 'pi nobhayatra buddhijananāt saṃśayahetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11317: viruddhe hy ubhayasmin pratipādite tayor ekatra samavāyāsambhavād vyāghātād eva saṃśayo bhavati. tac cāsādhāraṇe 'py aviśiṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11318: asādhāraṇo 'pi hy ubhayasmād vyāvṛttes tadabhāvaṃ gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavād eva saṃśayaṃ janayati. na hi sambhavati nityam anityaṃ ca vastu na bhavatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11319: dharmadvandvair eva hi nityānityatvādibhis sarvaṃ jagadavasthitam. ata ubhayābhāvo virudhyate. na cobhayabhāvaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11320: virodhād eva. nacānyataraparigraho 'viśeṣāt. tam imaṃ saṅkaṭam āsādya prāmāṇikas
GSP28mimsvtku:11321: saṃśete. ayaṃ cātrāvayavārthaḥ -- yathā prameyatvādis sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭas san buddhidvayanimittakaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11323: nimittaśabdena ca buddhidvayasya nimittamātratāṃ kathayati. sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11324: hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāpter eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11325: na hi parasparaviruddhābhyāṃ nityānityatvābhyām ekaś śabdo vyādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11326: 61}hi viruddhadharmādhyāso dṛṣṭaḥ. yathā nityaṃ vyoma anityaṃ kāryadravyam iti. ato 'smāt pratīti? ? ?
GSP28mimsvtku:11327: ātād eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate. sa cāyam asādhāraṇasyāpi samānaḥ. so 'pi hi
GSP28mimsvtku:11328: yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodham
GSP28mimsvtku:11329: āpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti. idaṃ cāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvaṃ nānumanyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:11330: avyavasthayā hy ubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati. na cāsādhāraṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:11332: tasya kenacid anvayābhāvāt. api ca parimiteṣv eva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭaḥ. nivṛttimukhena
GSP28mimsvtku:11333: tu saṃśayajanane sarvato nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukhas saṃśayo janyeta. na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:11334: sarvaviṣayaḥ saṃśayo dṛṣṭacaraḥ. tasya buddhāv anārohāt. na ca kvacin nivṛttimātreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:11336: yanmukhena saṃśayo bhavet. na hy anuvṛttāv adṛṣṭāyāṃ vyāvṛttis sidhyati. agnāv anuvartamāno
GSP28mimsvtku:11338: vyatiricyata ity avagamyate. yas tu na kenacid anvitas tasya katham anupalabdhiyogyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:11339: sarvato vyatirekaḥ pratīyeta. tato nānena prakāreṇāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:11340: yadi tv asādhāraṇadharmāṇo bhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti kṣitim api taddharmikām
GSP28mimsvtku:11341: upalabhya nityā vā syād anityā veti saṃśayo bhavatīty ucyate. evaṃ tarhy asādhāraṇadharmatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:11343: anyo hy asādharaṇadharmaḥ anyathā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā. tad yady asau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11344: jātā kiṃ jātam asādhāraṇasya. hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayahetur abhyupagato bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11345: siddham. nāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam. anyan matam -- anadhyavasāyahetur evāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11346: iti. asti kilānadhyavasāyo nāma jñānasya prakāraḥ. so 'nena janyate. bhavati hi tādṛgdharmadṛśaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11347: kimbhūtasyāsya dharmo 'yam ity anadhyavasitāv abhāsapratyayaḥ. na caiva pramāṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11348: aniścayātmakatvāt. na ca saṃśayaḥ pakṣadvayāsaṃsparśāt. so 'yam evaṃvidhān adhyavasāyo
GSP28mimsvtku:11349: 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti. na tv etad ghaṭate. na hy anadhyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11350: yam ayaṃ janayet. adhyavasāyābhāvo 'nadhyavasāyaḥ. sa ca prāgabhāvarūpatvān na janyaḥ. athānyamātravacano nañ agrāhyaṇādivad iṣyate tato 'dhyavasāyād anyas saṃśaya{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11351: 62}eva tacchabdavācyo bhavet. na ca taddhetur asādhāraṇa iti phaṇitam eva. athādharmādivad viparītavacano nañ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11353: na ca viparītāvagraho 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti. yadi tu na me 'smin vastuny adhyavasāyo 'stīty adhyavasāyābhāvāvadhāraṇam evānadhyavasāyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11354: sa tarhi pramāṇābhāvenaivādhyavasāyābhāvo 'vagamyate. tatra hetor na vyāpāraḥ. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:11355: jijñāsāmātrahetur asādhāraṇa iti samarthanīyam. bhavati hi taddarśinaḥ kīdṛgdharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:11356: 'yam ito dharmād bhāvo bhaved iti jijñāsā. yady api cāsauśuddhadharmidarśanād api
GSP28mimsvtku:11357: kadācid bhavaty eva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavaty eveti na taddhetutvam anupapannam. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:11359: sāmānyāt saṃśayo yuktas tathā sa pratisādhanāt // iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11360: yat tv ihāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam uktaṃ tatparamatam. jñātasambandhapadasya hi vyāvartanīyam atra darśayitum abhipretam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11361: tat saṃśayahetutve 'py asādhāraṇasya ghaṭata eva. bhavatu tāvad ayaṃ yasya kasyacid
GSP28mimsvtku:11362: dhetuḥ. sarvathā jñātasambandhapadena vyudasyata iti tātparyam. śākyās tu saṃśayahetum
GSP28mimsvtku:11364: udāharanti ca śabdānityatve sādhye śrāvaṇatvam. yathoktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:11367: iti. idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayam upanyasya yathoktadūṣaṇair dūṣitam eveti // 88 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11368: kiṃ punarudāhṛtānāṃ svābhāvikam eva saṃśayahetutvaṃ nety āha -- sandigdheti // 89 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11369: kāraṇam āha -- nirṇayasyeti labdhvāntena. kva drṣṭam ata āha -- niṣkriyeti. amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayahetur
GSP28mimsvtku:11370: saiva tu niṣkriyatve sādhye labdhvānvayavyatirekau hetutāṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11371: 63}pratipadyate. vyāptaṃ hy amūrtatvaṃ niṣkriyatvena. na hy amūrtaṃ gaganam ātmā vā parispandate. na caivaṃ tadvatāṃ rathādīnām amūrtatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti // 90 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11372: asādhāraṇasya nirṇaye hetutvaṃ darśayati -- kṣityekadeśeti. gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpteḥ kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti // 90 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11373: dvau viruddhārthasambandhāv ekatraikadeśini saṃśaye hetur ity uktam. tatrodāharaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11374: āha -- yatreti. yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyuḥ arūpatvād ity ekas sādhayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11375: aparo 'pi sparśāt tadviparyayam. tatrāsau viruddhāvyabhicāritā bhavatīti śākyair
GSP28mimsvtku:11376: abhihitam. tatra tulyabalobhayahetusannipātāt saṃśayaḥ. dvayor api sādhanayoḥ prasiddhāvayavatvāviśeṣāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11377: arūpaṃ hy arūpisamavetam apratyakṣam iti kāṇādā manyante. tathā ca vāyuḥ. ato na
GSP28mimsvtku:11378: pratyakṣaḥ. karmasvarūpam api rūpaikārthasamavāyāc cākṣuṣam ācakṣate. evaṃ sparśo
GSP28mimsvtku:11379: 'pi vāyoḥ prasiddha eva. prasiddhavyāptikaś cāparokṣatvena. atas tulyabalatvam. tataś ca saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11382: siddhe ca vastuni vikalpāsambhavāt bādhyabādhakam āvasyāpi tulyakakṣyatvāt. ato 'navasthayobhayasmin
GSP28mimsvtku:11383: pariplavamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ. tādātmyāt. tasya balābalaviśeṣe tv anumānavirodho
GSP28mimsvtku:11384: varṇita eva. yathā sarvajño 'stīti buddhavacanaṃ samyak taduktatvād kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavad
GSP28mimsvtku:11385: ity ekenokte 'paraḥ prabravīti buddho 'sarvajña iti madvacanaṃ samyak maduktatvāt yathā jyotir uṣṇa?
GSP28mimsvtku:11386: āpo dravā iti. atra maduktatvam ubhayor api siddham. buddhoktatā tu na naḥ prasiddhā,
GSP28mimsvtku:11387: ato 'prasiddhāṅgakatvāt pūrvaṃ sādhanaṃ balavatā prasiddhāṅgakena bādhyate. yat tu viruddhāvyabhicārīti dvayor ekavacanāntam abhidhānaṃ ta?
GSP28mimsvtku:11388: nyāmahe. viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśaye hetur iti śākyā vadanti. na? ?
GSP28mimsvtku:11389: kasya saṃśayahetutvam anyataraparicchedāt. na ca samudāyābhiprāyam ekavacanam. tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11390: viruddhatvāvyabhicāripadānās padatvāt. sa hy aṃśābhyāṃ vyabhicāry eva. dvau tu viruddhāvyabhicāriṇāv
GSP28mimsvtku:11391: iti vaktavyam. na tv ekavacanena. yadi pratihetu{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11392: 64}viruddham artham ekaiko na vyabhicaratīti viruddhāvyabhicārīty ucyate. tad astu.
GSP28mimsvtku:11393: na tv ekaḥ saṃśaye hetur ity uktam. ata eva vārtikakāreṇa dvau viruddhārthasambandhau
GSP28mimsvtku:11394: saṃśayahetū iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnāṃ saṃśayahetubhāvo darśitaḥ. ihāpi viruddhāvyabhicāritety
GSP28mimsvtku:11395: etāvad evoktam. na tu viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśayahetur iti. tad atra yogyatayānayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11396: viruddhāvyabhicāriteti vyākhyeyam. dvau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇāv iti yāvad iti // 91 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11397: imāṃ ca viruddhāvyabhicāritāṃ saṃśayahetuṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ jātyantaram eke
GSP28mimsvtku:11398: varṇayanti. apare punas samudāyasyāṃśābhyāṃ sādhāraṇapakṣanikṣepam. anye tu samastam
GSP28mimsvtku:11399: idaṃ militam ubhayaṃ naikatrāpy anugatam ity ananvayam asādhāraṇam evāsthiṣata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:11400: āha -- kecid iti. atra ca pradeśāntare vārtikakṛtā sādhāraṇya evāsthā darśitā. yadāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11401: sādhāraṇyān na naitasya bhedaḥ kaścana vidyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:11403: iti. na ca vācyaṃ dvayasyānanvayād asādhāraṇa evāyam iti. yadi hy ekena dvayaṃ prayujyeta tato bhaved apy evaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11404: pratyekam anvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyāṃ prayuktau nānanvitāv iti śakyate vaktum. api cāsādhāraṇatve
GSP28mimsvtku:11405: saṃśayahetubhāvo nopapadyetaṃ. tasya nirākṛtapūrvatvāt. atas sādhāraṇa evāyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11406: vayaṃ tu jātyantaram eva sādhīyo manyāmahe. yathā hi na dvayam ekena prayuktam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11407: nāsādhāraṇatvam. evaṃ sādhāraṇatvam api na syād eva. kiṃ khalv atra sādhāraṇam. ekaikasyaikaikena
GSP28mimsvtku:11409: aṃśatas sādhāraṇasya ca samudāyasyāprayogāt. ata eva cātra sādhāraṇād bhedena pratihetu
GSP28mimsvtku:11410: viruddhayos saṃśayahetutvam uktam. itarathā tenaiva gatatvān na pṛthagupādīyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:11411: saṃśayajananaprakāro 'pi cātra bhidyata eva. sādhāraṇo hy ubhayadṛṣṭas tu pratītimādadhānas
GSP28mimsvtku:11412: saṃśayahetur imau tv ekaikaśyenobhayam upasthāpayantau saṃśayahetū iti vārtikakāreṇāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:11416: ata āha -- pratijñeti nirṇayāntena. pakṣabādhoktaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pramāṇair yasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11417: sādhanavākyāvayavapratijñā bādhyate tatparājayenetarasya nirṇayaḥ kāryaḥ. yathehaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:11418: tāvat udāharaṇe tvagindriyavyāpāreṇa vāyāvaparokṣam anubhūyamāne tenaivānubhavena
GSP28mimsvtku:11419: parokṣatāpakṣo bādhyate. na hi nas tvagindriyabhuvastoyapratyakṣād vāyupratyakṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11420: viśiṣyate. na hīhānadhiṣṭhānaṃ sparśamātram anubhūyate. api tu tadadhikaraṇaṃ dravyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11421: api. na hi prabalena marutābhihanyamānasya jalaṃ vā śliṣyatas saṃvid viśiṣyate. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:11422: 'kṣasambandhaphalānusārāt pratyakṣo vāyur iti niścīyate. kvacic cāgamena viṣayāpahāro
GSP28mimsvtku:11426: prāṇyudbhūtatvād uccārādivad iti. tatra pūrvapratijñāyā āgamena viṣayāpahārād uttareṇārthanirṇayo
GSP28mimsvtku:11427: bhavati. śucītaraviveke hy āgama eva śaraṇam. tasmin paripanthini na śucitvānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:11429: nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ savāsā jalam āviśet /
GSP28mimsvtku:11430: iti. rudro hi mahāvrataṃ cacāra sa etacchavaśīrṣam upadadhāreti tv arthavādamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11431: na śavaśirodhāraṇavidhiḥ. atra ca pratyakṣādīny eva yathāsvam arthaṃ sādhayantīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11432: sādhanapadenocyanta iti. kathaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣādīny eva pratijñābādhanāyotsahante.
GSP28mimsvtku:11433: teṣv api sāmānyato darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamānatvād ata āha -- bādhavarjanād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11435: kadācid bādhasambhāvanā tu na teṣāṃ prāmāṇyam utsārayatīti // 93 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11436: atra bhikṣuṇā pakṣadharmas tadaṃśena vyāpto hetur ity ekavacanena vivakṣitaikasaṅkhya
GSP28mimsvtku:11437: eka eva hetur iti darśitam. ata eva viruddhāvyabhicāriṇor na hetutvam anekatvāt tayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11438: iti. na caitat ghaṭate. na hi pratihetu{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11440: api tarhi parasparaviruddhārthopaplāvakatvam eva. viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāv arthāv ekatropaplāvitāv iti tatra saṃśerate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11441: na tu hetvanekatvāt. saṃśayahetvor api pratyekam avagatayor ubhayasamāveśād eva kvacin
GSP28mimsvtku:11442: nirṇayo dṛṣṭaḥ. yathā ūrdhvatākākavattvayoḥ. kevalā hy ūrdhvatā sthāṇupuruṣasādhāraṇī
GSP28mimsvtku:11443: nānyataranirṇayāya prabhavati. kākanilayanasahakṛtā tu saiva sthāṇur ayam iti niścāyayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11444: tad atraikasyaiva saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyām eva tu nirṇaya ity aprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11445: viruddhānekasādhyatvam eva saṃśayahetuḥ. yathā khalv eka eva sādhāraṇas sapakṣavipakṣayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11446: vartamānas saṃśayahetur bhavati. evaṃ viruddhārthasyāpi hetudvayasyāṃśābhyām ubhayavṛttir
GSP28mimsvtku:11447: eva saṃśaye kāraṇam iti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktam ity āha -- kvacid
GSP28mimsvtku:11448: iti. nanu yuktaṃ tāvadūrdhvatayā sthāṇupuruṣasandeho bhavatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11449: kākavattāmātreṇa na saṃśayo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ. satyam. yas tu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā saṃśayahetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11450: ūrdhvatāsanāthā tu nirṇāyikety etāvad eva vivakṣitam ity adoṣa iti. api ca avirodhinoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11451: pratyekaṃ saṃhatayor api kvacid arthe sādhye hetubhāvo dṛśyate. yathaikasminn eva
GSP28mimsvtku:11453: śakyate hi tābhyām aikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum. dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe
GSP28mimsvtku:11454: naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetavaḥ prayujyeran. prayoktāras tv ekam eva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyad
GSP28mimsvtku:11455: itaś ceti nānāsādhanais sādhayanto dṛśyante. tasmād virodhanibandhana eva saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11456: na tu nānātvanibandhana ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pratyekam iti. pūrvaṃ tu pratyekaṃ saṃśayahetvor
GSP28mimsvtku:11457: eva militayor nirṇayahetutvam uktam. atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāv api saṃhatau ca gamakāv
GSP28mimsvtku:11459: tasmād viruddhārthāv eva bhinnau saṃśayahetutvena darśanīyau. yathāsmābhir uktaṃ na tu bhinnatāmātreṇety āha -- tasmād iti. vyākhyātastriprakāro{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11460: 67}pi saṃśayahetuḥ viparītaprakārān pratijānāti - ṣaḍhā viruddhatām āhur iti. dharmadharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣobhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣaiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11461: ṣaṭprakārāṃ viruddhatām eke bruvata ity arthaḥ. anye tūbhayavirodhayoḥ pratyekapakṣānatirekāt
GSP28mimsvtku:11462: cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā ity āha -- caturdhā veti. vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikam
GSP28mimsvtku:11463: eva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ity āha -- ekadhāpi veti. pūrvoktapakṣadvayanivṛttāv api
GSP28mimsvtku:11464: vāśabdaḥ. api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syād iti pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kim avāntarabhedopanyāseneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11465: triṣv api ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatām
GSP28mimsvtku:11466: āhur ity āha -- śrutyarthoktasyeti. dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpaṃ śrutyuktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11467: tadviśeṣās tu prāyeṇārthoktāḥ. te ca svarūpasvaviśeṣāḥ pratijñārthaśabdenopādīyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:11468: sarve hi te vaktur abhipretāḥ. na tu dharmādiviśeṣās sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11469: tad asmin pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetor viruddhatā bhavatīti. tatpunar idaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11470: vipratiṣiddham iva manyāmahe. kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetur viruddho
GSP28mimsvtku:11471: bhavati. sa hi pratijñārthaṃ viruṇaddhīti viroddheti vaktum ucitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11472: bādhaka iti vā. na cāyam eva pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet prasiddhatvādasya. prasiddhaṃ hi ghaṭasya kṛtakatvaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11473: na tadaprasiddhayā nityatayā bādhituṃ śakyam. ato bādhaka ity evāyaṃ vaktavyaḥ. vārtikakṛtā
GSP28mimsvtku:11474: tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ity uktam iti veditavyam iti. tatra dharmasvarūpabādhena
GSP28mimsvtku:11476: dharmaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ prayukte bhavatīty āha -- bādha iti. tam eva prayogaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11477: darśayati -- arthavad iti pādatrayeṇa. svarūpābhidhānavādino hy āhuḥ -- gaur ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:11478: iti śabdākāraviśiṣṭo 'rtho 'vagamyate. na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11479: śakyata iti svarūpam eva tāvad ādau śabdo{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11481: ajñātasambandhasya tadanavagateḥ. svarūpaṃ tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāg api tadavagamāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:11482: avyabhicārī ca śabdārtha iti yuktam. ataḥ svarūpaṃ tāvadavaśyābhidheyaṃ śabdānāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11483: tadabhidhānottarakālaṃ tu viśiṣṭābhidhānam api bhavatu nāmeti. evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogam āhuḥ -- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad
