GSP28mimsvtku:11484: agṛhītasambandho 'pi hi svādivibhaktiyuktān śabdānavagacchati. yadā ca vibhaktiyogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11485: tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād iti. kathaṃ punar evaṃ prayujyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:11486: dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavaty ata āha -- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti. yadā hi svarūpeṇārthenārthavattvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11488: tadārthād idam avagamyate -- svarūpārthavattvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti. evaṃ ca
GSP28mimsvtku:11489: bhavaty arthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti. kathaṃ punas svarūpeṇeti cāśrite
GSP28mimsvtku:11490: dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate. ata āha -- asvarūpeti. vibhaktimattvaṃ hi svarūpātirekeṇārthāntareṇārthavattvam
GSP28mimsvtku:11492: sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād arthāntarasya darśanāt. ato vyāptibalena tad eva vibhaktimattayā
GSP28mimsvtku:11493: sādhyate. ato 'rthavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ hetur ayaṃ viruṇaddhīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11495: dharmisvarūpabādhodāharaṇam āha -- ihapratyayeti. yadā hi samavāyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatirekas sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11496: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ ca hetur ucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti saṃyogo dṛṣṭāntaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11499: ata āha -- atrāpīti. atrāpy udāharaṇe dharmisvarūpasya samavāyātmano vaiparītyāpādanād
GSP28mimsvtku:11500: dhetor viruddhatā bhāvati. ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hy asamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11502: asminn eva ca dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi darśayitavya ity āha -- yac ceti. samavāyo hi
GSP28mimsvtku:11503: sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante. so 'py asya viśeṣaḥ saṃyogavadbhedāpatter
GSP28mimsvtku:11504: bādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho hetur iti // 102 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11505: ubhayasvarūpabādhāyām udāharaṇam āha -- nityam ātmāstiteti. yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati -- ātmā nityaḥ niravayatvāt vyomavad
GSP28mimsvtku:11506: tadā dharmadharmidvayasya bādhanaṃ bhavati. sautrāntikasya hy avayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi tadvadabhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11508: na punas tattvāntaram iti bauddhā manyante. ato 'navayavatvād ātmanaḥ svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhād ubhayabādha iti // 103 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11509: ubhayaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ sādhyamāne bhavatīty āha -- tadeti. yadā hi parārthāś cakṣurādayas saṅghātatvāt śayanādivad iti sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11510: tadobhayaviśeṣabādha ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ punar atrobhayaviśeṣabādhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11512: 70}hi khaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvād iti hetur vyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyam eva sādhayet. ātmānaṃ ca prati pārārthyaṃ sādhayitum abhimatam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11513: tan na sidhyet. so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11514: sa tāvad bādhyate. cakṣurāder api dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'py anenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:11515: hetunā bādhyate. saṃhatātmakatvaṃ hi śayanādāvanāhaṅkārikatvena vyāptaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11517: atas tannidarśanena cakṣurādayo 'pi bhautikā bhaveyuḥ. āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilās saṅgirante,
GSP28mimsvtku:11518: teṣāṃ cāyaṃ prayogaḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto
GSP28mimsvtku:11519: hetur yasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyam asiddham iti dharmaviśeṣabādhanaṃ tāvad bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11520: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavyāptyā sūtrito 'nantaram eva vivariṣyata iti na kevalam
GSP28mimsvtku:11522: asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi saṃhatatā prāpnotīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11523: asaṃhateti. anena cāniṣṭāntarāpattir āpāditeti veditavyam. etad uktaṃ bhavati. nānena
GSP28mimsvtku:11524: hetunāsaṃhatarūpātmārthatā sidhyati. pratyuta saṃhatataivātmano bhaved iti // 106 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11525: dharmiviśeṣabādhaṃ vivṛṇoti -- anāhaṅkārikatvam iti. vyākhyātacaraṃ cedam // 106 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11526: evaṃ tāvad jñātasambandhapadavyāvartanīyo viruddhaḥ prapañcitaḥ. idānīṃ tadvyāvartyā
GSP28mimsvtku:11527: eva dṛṣṭāntābhāsā darśayitavyāḥ. tair hi nānumānāṅgasambandho jñāpayituṃ śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11528: atas te 'pi jñātasambandhapadenaiva vyāvartyante. idaṃ cāsmābhiḥ prāg evoktam. anyatrāpy āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11531: {3,71}iti. atas tannirākaraṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanam eva tāvad avatārayati -- gamakasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11532: vyāptipradarśanāya dvividho dṛṣṭāntas tāvad sādhanavākye darśayitavyaḥ. sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11533: tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa pratipādyata ity arthaḥ // 107 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11534: tatra sādharyyadṛṣṭāntaprakāram āha -- tatreti. asyārthaḥ -- udāharaṇasādharmyāl liṅgasya prasādhakatvavacanaṃ hetuḥ. yadāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:11536: iti. sādhyasya prajñāpanavacanam iti yāvat. tasya cārtho liṅgam eva. tac coddiśya
GSP28mimsvtku:11537: sādhyopādānaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭānta iṣyate. yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimān iti yāvad iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11538: kim evam upādīyamāne sidhyaty ata āha -- uddeśya iti. uktaṃ vyāptipradarśanāya dṛṣṭāntavacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:11539: iti. evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādir vyāpyatayā kathito bhavati. itaraś copādeyo
GSP28mimsvtku:11540: 'gnyādir vyāpakatayeti vyāptyānuguṇyāt saphalam evam upādānam ity uddeśyopādeyayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11542: kīdṛśaṃ tu tayos svarūpam ata āha -- yadvṛtteti. yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyāṃ yattatpariniṣpannānāṃ yo ya ityādiśabdānām upādānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11543: tad ayam artho bhavati. yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11544: tattadvṛttayuktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:11545: sarveṣv eva ca grahavrīhyādisammārgāvaghātādiṣūddeśyopādeyeṣv ayam eva viveka iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11549: te yathā tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva. ata āha -- vadatīti. na vaktrabhiprāyaparatantrāḥ śabdāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11550: svābhāvikyaiva tu śaktyā kecid eva kvacid evārthe vartante,
GSP28mimsvtku:11551: ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhir bhavatīti vācya eva dṛṣṭāntavacanavinyāsaprakāra iti // 110 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11552: yadi tarhi svatantrāś śabdāḥ atathāsthite 'py arthe śabdānusāriṇīṣṭasiddhir bhaved ata āha -- sādhyahetutvam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nārthaśaktiś śabdaśaktim anurudhya pravartate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11556: arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhād eva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na śabdānurodhād iti // 110 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11557: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabde 'rtham ācakṣāṇe yattāvad āpadyate tad darśayati
GSP28mimsvtku:11558: -- tatrājñānād iti sārdhadvayena. yadā hi dṛṣṭāntaṃ vaktum anabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvos
GSP28mimsvtku:11559: sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati. yathā -- śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge,
GSP28mimsvtku:11560: yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvanāśitves ta iti. viparītāvagraheṇa vā na hetor vyāpyatāṃ vivakṣati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11561: satyām api vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati. sahabhāvamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:11563: viparītaṃ vā bhrāntaḥ yathā nāśitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11564: tadā tāvan na kevalam iṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭam eva tu vyāptiviparyayād āpadyate. iṣṭasya{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11565: 73}kṛtakatvasya hetutvaṃ na syāt. aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhaved ity evaṃjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya
GSP28mimsvtku:11566: yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti. etad evopasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. hetutvasammataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11568: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati -- yadetipādarahitadvayena. asyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11569: -- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ tadā yady api vaktrā na
GSP28mimsvtku:11572: arthās tu na tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvenāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhaved iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11573: vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. yathā -- nityo dhvanir amūrtatvād iti prayoge karmavat
GSP28mimsvtku:11574: paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad vyomavad iti dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthatas sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:11575: karma khalv anityam iti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11576: hetus tv amūrtatvād iti tatra vidyata eva. paramāṇavas tu mūrtā iti teṣu hetuśūnyatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:11577: sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva. ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpy amūrtatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11578: hetur ity ubhayaśūnyatā. vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatām uttaratra svayam eva vivariṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11579: atraiva ca vyomavad iti dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā
GSP28mimsvtku:11581: vyāptiśūnyatāṃ vivṛṇoti -- tatsadbhāve 'pīti. yady api ca{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11583: tac ca hetusādhyadvayayuktaṃ nityatvād amūrtatvāc ca. tathāpi karmādiṣv amūrteṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11584: anityeṣv ālocyamāneṣu hetor vyāptir nāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:11585: ayam api na sādhyasiddhaye samartho yata iti // 117 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11586: vyākhyātaḥ sābhāsas sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ. vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntamataḥ paraṃ vyākhyāsyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11587: tatraitad eva tāvat prathamaṃ vaktavyam. kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11588: kāryaṃ na veti. tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādinas sarvadā vācyam iti ye vadanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11589: tān pratyāha -- vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti. evaṃ hi manyate -- vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11590: sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena. sādharmyaṃ cāvaśyam eva vacanīyam anvayaprajñāpanāya,
GSP28mimsvtku:11591: tatpradhānatvād anumānasya. vyatirekasyāpi tanmukhenaiva siddheḥ. itarathā duradhigamatvāt. ato yadi vyāptyā sahitaṃ sādharmyam uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11592: alaṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti. kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyam ata āha -- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti
GSP28mimsvtku:11593: pādatrayeṇa. yadā hi vaktrā samyag eva dṛṣṭānta ukte paraḥ śrotā jānāti -- yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:11594: hetusādhyayos sāhityamātram anenoktaṃ na vyāptir iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11595: tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam iti vakṣyamāṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:11596: sambandha iti. yadā khalv abhyastavaidharmyas tam evāpekṣate na sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11597: tadā ca vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ity āha -- taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadeti. yadā vā vaktā
GSP28mimsvtku:11598: suśikṣitavaidharmyas sādharmyaṃ vaktum ajānānas tena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:11600: tadāpi paryanuyuktena tenaiva vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanaṃ kāryam ity āha -- vaktā veti // 119 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11601: yadā vā bhrānto viparītam anvayaṃ darśayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11602: tadāpi tatsamādhānecchayā pūrvaviparītajñānopamardanena vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ity āha --{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11603: 75}viparītānvayam iti. nanv anvayavaiparītye sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena. satyam evam apīṣṭaṃ sidhyaty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:11604: kin tu bhrāntair idam asmābhir uktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:11605: tāvad iṣṭasādhanaṃ bhavaty eveti. yat tu tatpūrvaṃ sāhityamātram uktaṃ tadvaidharmya
GSP28mimsvtku:11606: evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato 'nugrahe vartate ity āha -- sāhityamātram iti // 120 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11609: vaiparītye kāraṇam āha -- dhūmabhāva iti. yadā hi dhūmabhāvo 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:11610: tadānagnir agnyabhāvas tato dhūmāt pracyutas sannadhūme dhūmābhāva eva bhavatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:11611: evaṃ tāvad vyāpto bhavati. yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tanniyatas
GSP28mimsvtku:11612: tadvyāpta ity ucyate. yathā dhūmo 'gnāv eva bhavannagninā vyāpta iti siddho 'bhāvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:11614: yata eva cābhāvayor īdṛśo vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ ata eva bhāvayor abhimatavyāptisiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:11615: ity āha -- tathānagnāv iti. anagnāv agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmas tatra virodhivyāpter
GSP28mimsvtku:11616: alabdhāvakāśo 'gnāv eva bhavatīty evaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya sidhyati. tatheti. yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:11617: bhāvavyāptyapekṣayābhāvavyāptiḥ evam abhāvavyāptyapekṣayā bhāvavyāptir ity arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11620: {3,76} kiṃ punarabhāvayor vyāptiviparyayāśrayaṇe prayojanam ata āha -- vyāpakau tv
GSP28mimsvtku:11621: iti. yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakas tadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11622: tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmāder naiva vipakṣasyānagnyādeḥ pracyutiḥ kathitā bhavet. tatkathanārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11624: prayojanaṃ bhavet. na hi yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir itivat yatra dhūmābhāvas tatrāgnyabhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:11625: iti kathyamāne vyāpyād dhūmād anagner vipakṣasya nivṛttir darśitā bhavatīti. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:11627: ity āha -- tasmād iti vācyo 'ntena. yatrāgnir nāsti tatra dhūmo nāstīty evaṃ yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:11628: uddeśyopādeyabhāvo darśayitavya ity arthaḥ. sa cānagnir adhūmena vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11629: kin tu sādharmyoktenaivoddeśyopādeyaprakāreṇety āha -- na cānyatheti. prakāraś cānantaram evokta iti // 124 -- 125 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11630: anyathāvacane doṣam āha -- anagnyadhūmasāhitya iti. yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā
GSP28mimsvtku:11631: śabdo 'rthaṃ vadati nārthaśaktim anurudhyata iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye
GSP28mimsvtku:11635: d ihāpy artho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:11636: ekena vā tayoś śūnyo bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata
GSP28mimsvtku:11637: ity āha yatrāpīti. samyak prayukte 'pi vākye 'rthasyātadāyattatvānneṣṭasiddhir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11639: 77}yad iti. nityo dhvanir amūrtatvād ity atraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyam ucyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11640: yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtam api na bhavati yathā paramāṇur iti tadā sādhyābhāvaśūnyo
GSP28mimsvtku:11641: dṛṣṭāntaḥ. paramāṇor nityatayā tadabhāvasya tatra darśayitum aśakyatvāt. buddhivad
GSP28mimsvtku:11642: iti tu dṛṣṭānte hetvabhāvaśūnyatā. buddher amūrtatayā tadabhāvasya vaktum aśakyatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11644: nityāmūrte tasminn ubhayābhāvo duradhigamo yata iti // 127 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11645: evaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntavadvyāptivaikalye 'py ābhāsatā darśayitavyā. tatsiddhyarthaṃ hi vipakṣād dhetor vyatirekaḥ kathyate. yasya tu vipakṣaikadeśād api vyatireko nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11646: nāsau sādhyena vyāpto bhavatīty asatyāṃ vyāptāv anarthakaṃ tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- sādhyeneti // 128 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11647: yataś caivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacid abhāvayos sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:11648: na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatīty āha -- teneti. yady api yannityaṃ na bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:11651: kvacid abhāvayos sāhityaṃ śakyate darśayitum. tathāpi na sarva(ḥ)
GSP28mimsvtku:11653: nityatayā viśiṣṭo 'nena hetunā gamya iṣyate. kiñcid dhy amūrtaṃ nityam ākāśādi,
GSP28mimsvtku:11655: kim iti neṣyate ata āha -- sahadṛṣṭir iti. vipakṣaikadeśanivṛttyā hi sahabhāvamātraṃ hetos sidhyati. na ca tanmātrasambandho 'numānāṅgam. kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11656: vyāptiḥ. na cāsāv etāvatā sāhityamātreṇa sidhyatīti. etad evodāharaṇena darśayati -- mūrtānityatvayukte 'pīti. idaṃ ca prāg eva vyākhyātam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11658: {3,78} vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyam apekṣyate /
GSP28mimsvtku:11659: ity ucyate, na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetor vipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvam astīty aśeṣavipakṣo 'numātur vyatirekaṃ grahītum apekṣitaḥ. na cāsau duradhigamaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11660: ekadeśasthasyāpi sarvādarśanasaukaryāt. darśanaṃ hi sarvavipakṣāṇāṃ duṣkaram,
GSP28mimsvtku:11661: tadabhāvas tu saukaryaprāpta eva. na cāyogyānupalambhān nedam adarśanaṃ hetor vyatirekāya
GSP28mimsvtku:11662: prabhavatīti vācyam. na hi no vipakṣādarśanād avinābhāvaniyamaḥ. kin tu tādātmyatadutpattinibandhanaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11663: vipakṣadarśane tu hetoḥ paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītum aśakyo bhavati. tac caikadeśasthasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:11664: tāvannāsty eveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate. ato yadaivāgnikāryo
GSP28mimsvtku:11665: dhūma ity avagataṃ tadaiva tadāyattātmalābho nāsati tasmin bhavatīti jñāyate. na
GSP28mimsvtku:11667: asādhāraṇeṣu tadasambhavāt. na hi mahānasaparidṛṣṭayor agnidhūmasvalakṣaṇayos tatraiva niruddhayor anyatra darśanam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11668: yenānvayo 'nubhūyeta. tat kuto 'nvayaḥ kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano vyatirekaḥ. na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcid anugataṃ svarūpam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11670: vikalpākāratvāt tasya. ato viśeṣā eva kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitāḥ kañcid viśeṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11671: vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanam eva nyāyyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11672: iti. tān pratyāha -- aśeṣeti yuktirantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady api vyatireko
GSP28mimsvtku:11673: 'numānāṅgam. sa tu nādarśanamātrāt sidhyati. taddeśāgamanād api ca tasyopapatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11675: tasyaivāsati vyatireke duradhigamatvāt. yad dhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tattatkāryam. ato 'satyabhāvo{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11677: tu tasminn itaretarāśrayatā. astu vādarśanamātrād vyatirekaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11679: naitāvatānumāṃ prati yuktir anaṅgam. yuktir yogas sambandho 'nvaya ity anarthāntaram.
GSP28mimsvtku:11680: nānvayo 'naṅgam iti yāvat. tanmukhenaiva sarvapramātṝṇām anumānotpatteḥ. atas tatkathanārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11681: sādharmyadṛṣṭānto 'pi vācya eva. nāsāv ekāntena pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate. idaṃ cānvāruhya
GSP28mimsvtku:11682: vacanam. yathokta eva siddhāntaḥ samyak sādharmyaprayoge na vaidharmyam apekṣaṇīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11683: iti. anvayasyaiva prādhānyāt tam antareṇa vyatirekāsiddheḥ. avagate hi dhūmasyāgninā
GSP28mimsvtku:11684: sambandhe 'rthād anagninivṛttis sidhyati. atas sa tāvad vidhimukhena
GSP28mimsvtku:11686: avasare tu vaidharmyam api kadācid ucyate. anaṅgatvam iti tu paṭhatām iyaṃ vyākhyā -- idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyām aṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau,
GSP28mimsvtku:11687: tābhyāṃ hi tadaṅgaṃ bhavati. ato yathā vyatireko 'ṅgatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11688: evam anvayāparanāmā yuktir apīti. nanu liṅge 'pi śabdātmake pratīty uttarakālabhāvyanvayo
GSP28mimsvtku:11689: 'naṅgam evāta āha -- śābde 'bhidhāsyata iti. śābde hy anumānād bhinne pratīty uttarakālabhāvinī
GSP28mimsvtku:11690: yuktir anaṅgam iti vakṣyate. yathā vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:11692: iti. anumāne tu sarvatraivānvayaḥ pratīty aṅgam iti. ye tu tāvatā nānaṅgatvam anvayasyety adhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śabde yuktir vakṣyate iti vyācakṣate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11693: teṣām aśrutānvayādhyāhāra eva tāvadupālambhaḥ. na cānvayasyānumānāṅgatve śābde yuktir
GSP28mimsvtku:11694: vakṣyate. atraiva jñātasambandhapadena tasyoktatvāt. ata evānvayādhīnatvam anumānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11695: ca sthitam iti vakṣyati. tasmād yathoktaiva vyākhyeti // 132 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11696: yat tu bhedānām evānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na sambhavatīty uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11697: tatrāha -- bodhaprasaṅga iti. na bhedānām anumānabodhe gamyagamakatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ. teṣāṃ sarvadeśakālāvyāpter ekaikatra niruddhatvāt. na cāpy{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11698: 80}avinābhāvenāparasya tathāvidhasyaiva niyamaś śakyate 'nubhavitum. na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11699: sambhavatīti teṣām anvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti. yadi na bhedānāṃ bodhaprasaṅgaḥ. kasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11701: na bhedānugatam ekaṃ kim api pāramārthikaṃ rūpam asti. tasya vikalpākāratvāt. yady
GSP28mimsvtku:11702: api ca vyāptisamayasaṃviditarūpāropeṇaivādhunānumānam upajāyate. tathā hi tasya nipuṇato
GSP28mimsvtku:11703: nirūpyamāṇasyāsambhavād vibhrama evāyam. yady evam asadrūpāropapravṛttam anumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:11704: apramāṇam eva. satyam. pratibandhabalena tu kiñcid eva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi vikalpākāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:11705: sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yad aparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitam eva svalakṣaṇaṃ pratilambhayati
GSP28mimsvtku:11706: tatpramāṇam ity ākhyāyate. avisaṃvādo hi naḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam arthakriyāsthitiś cāvisaṃvādaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11707: yadāhuḥ -- pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam arthakriyāsthitiḥ. avisaṃvāda iti. bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:11709: atasmiṃs tadgrahād bhrāntir avisaṃvādataḥ pramā iti /
GSP28mimsvtku:11710: ato bhedānām eva gamyagamakatvam. te ca na bhājanam anvayasyeti yuktam evoktam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:11711: āha -- astīti. asyārthaḥ. bhaved evaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ vastu
GSP28mimsvtku:11712: bhavet. asti tu tad ity ākṛtigranthe sakalaparoktadoṣaparihāreṇopapādayiṣyate. tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11713: cānekadeśakālavyāpitā gamyata iti nābhājanam anvayasya. na cātasmiṃs tadgrahaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11714: pāramārthikatvāt tasya. evaṃ ca yadanumānaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ paraiḥ kim api kāśaṃ kuśam avalambyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11716: anyan matam vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyam api vācyam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11717: tattāvad upanyasyati -- kecid iti pādatrayeṇa. kiṃ punas tadicchāyāṃ kāraṇam ata āha -- vyāvṛttiniyamecchayeti // 134 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11718: etad eva vivṛṇoti -- hetāv iti. evaṃ hi manyante. yadā hi{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11719: 81}sādharmyadṛṣṭānte yatra dhūma ity uddiśya tatrāgnir eveti saivakāram upādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11720: tadā hetau sādhyenaivāgnināvadhārite sarvato 'gner anyamātrād vyāvṛttiḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11721: na caitat sambhavati. sādhyadharmādhikaraṇāder apy abhāvaprasaṅgād apakṣadharmatvāpatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11722: pakṣābhāvaprasaṅgāc ca. atas sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva vaidharmyavacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:11723: arthavat. sati hi tasminn agnyabhāve dhūmo na bhavatītyāveditaṃ, bhavatīti // 135 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11724: etad api dūṣayati -- tat tu mandaphalam iti. tad idaṃ vaidharmyavacanam evaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11725: mandaphalam ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ mandaphalam ata āha -- yasmād iti. kiṃ nirūpitam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:11726: āha -- vyāpakābhāvamātraṃ hīti. agnimān parvata iti pakṣavacane nirūpitam idam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11727: yathā niyamas tadvipakṣāc ca kalpyate nāvirodhina iti. atas sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyād dhūmāder vyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātram eva darśayitavyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11729: etad eva dṛṣṭāntavacanenopapādayann upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. tad iha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11735: atra bhāṣyam -- tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca. tatra pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ yathā -- dhūmākṛtidarśanād{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11736: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca yathā -- devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptim
GSP28mimsvtku:11737: upalabhyāditye 'pi gatismaraṇam iti. anena prameyadvaividhyād anumānadvaividhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11738: uktam iti. atra kecin nītijñammanyā avadhṛtasvalakṣaṇam eva kvacid anumānena sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:11739: gṛhyata iti manyante. tadbhramāpanayāya bhāṣyakāreṇedam uktam -- tat tu dvividham,
GSP28mimsvtku:11740: adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam apy anumānam asti kriyādiṣv iti. kathaṃ punar adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇena sambandhadarśanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11741: utpattimataḥ phalasya darśanāt. yady apy anavadhṛtasvalakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣatas sambandho 'navagataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11742: sāmānyatas tu dṛśyate. sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścid āgantukād utpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11743: tantusaṃyogebhya iva paṭaḥ. ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau
GSP28mimsvtku:11744: kadācid upalabhyāgantukaḥ ko 'pi hetur anumīyate. tad idaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham
GSP28mimsvtku:11746: svalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandham anumānam āhuḥ. na ca dravyam
GSP28mimsvtku:11747: eva saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam iti vaktavyam. saty api tasminn abhāvāt. na ca dravyāntarāgama
GSP28mimsvtku:11749: tasya pūrvadravyapratyabhijñayā bādhitatvāt. na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11750: deśādibhede 'pi tadbuddher aviparyayāt. uktaṃ ca vivaraṇakāreṇa -- kṣaṇabhaṅgas tu
GSP28mimsvtku:11751: pratyabhijñānān nirākriyata eva. ato dṛṣṭakāraṇāsambhavād adṛṣṭaṃ kim api saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11752: kāraṇam anumīyate. tac ca karmety ākhyāyate. ata eva pradeśāntareṣv api karmāpratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:11753: eveti. bhāṣyakāro darśayati -- yathā vakṣyati na hi te pratyakṣe iti. apūrvasadbhāvapratipādanāvasare
GSP28mimsvtku:11754: ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti. yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayati tatkarmety
GSP28mimsvtku:11755: ucyata iti ca. vyaktam eva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvam eva karmaṇo darśayatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11756: siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam. evaṃ ca prameyadvaividhyād
GSP28mimsvtku:11757: anumānadvaividhyopapattir iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha -- dvaividhyaṃ nopapannam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11758: idam uktaprakāraṃ dvaividhyam anupapannam iti bhāvaḥ. katham anupapannam ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:11759: -- yathaiveti pādatrayeṇa. yathā khalv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭas sambandho,
GSP28mimsvtku:11762: 83}pratyakṣam eva hi vayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattvaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe.
GSP28mimsvtku:11763: neyaṃ jātyādivikalpanābhyaḥ karmakalpanā viśiṣyate. tadvad evendriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvād
GSP28mimsvtku:11764: aparokṣanirbhāsāc ca. nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktam aparaṃ karmaṇaḥ kim
GSP28mimsvtku:11765: api rūpam aparokṣam īkṣāmahe. phaladarśanenaiva tadanumīyate. jāter vā vyaktito vya(tiriktā)
GSP28mimsvtku:11767: yad asau pratyakṣaviṣayatayāvasīyate. rūpam eva sā vyakteḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11769: karma vā kim arūpam. idam api hi tato na bhidyata eva. āgantukaṃ tu kevalam. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:11770: jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanām api pratyakṣapakṣa eva nikṣipantaḥ pañcadhā savikalpakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11772: na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ devadattaṃ nirūpayan /
GSP28mimsvtku:11773: paṭhan kāvyaṃ svasaṃjñoktaṃ parokṣam iva budhyate //
GSP28mimsvtku:11774: iti. phalānumeye tu karmaṇyādityavad devadattavat pratītiprasaṅgaḥ. na caiṣa devadattam
GSP28mimsvtku:11775: iva calantaṃ spandamānam ādityam api paśyatīti dṛśyate. sthiraṃ hi sarvadā tanmaṇḍalam
GSP28mimsvtku:11776: avalokyate. saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi pratīyete eveti tulya(?va /
GSP28mimsvtku:11777: tvā)t tābhyām ubhayatrāpy ānumānikaḥ pratyayo bhavet. api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti vartamānanirbhāsaḥ pratyayo na bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:11779: tadā kathaṃ vartamānākārabuddhigocaro bhavati. jalapravāhaniścaleṣu matsyeṣu nirantarotpadyamānajalāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgāvagamād
GSP28mimsvtku:11780: ānumānikī gatisaṃvid upajāyeta. sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:11781: tataś ca so 'pi gacchatīti buddhiviṣayatām āpadyeta. yadi mataṃ na vibhāgamātrāt karmānumānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11782: api tarhi vibhāgapūrvakāt saṃyogād iti. evaṃ tarhi yadaikaḥ śyenaviyuktaḥ sthāṇur
GSP28mimsvtku:11783: anyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅgaḥ. calitvāvasthite ca devadatte. yadi tūcyate yo
GSP28mimsvtku:11784: 'yam utpatataḥ śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogaḥ tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavān
GSP28mimsvtku:11785: na tatra karmānumānam iti. kalpyatāṃ tarhi śyene 'pi karma,
GSP28mimsvtku:11786: sthāṇau tu prasaṅgān ativṛttir eva. niyataṃ hi pratibaddhadṛśaḥ smṛtapratibandhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11787: pratibandhakavijñānam. asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapratibaddhaphaladarśanam iti nānumānodayaś śakyate{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11788: 84}niroddhum. śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāv api saṃyogavibhāgopapattau na tadgatakarmānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:11789: iti cet tan na. na hi prayojanānusāriṇy anumānavyavasthā. vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra
GSP28mimsvtku:11790: yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati. arthāpattir hy anyathopapattyā
GSP28mimsvtku:11791: parihriyate nānumānam. yadi tv avicchinnotpattayas saṃyogavibhāgāḥ kriyānumāne kāraṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11792: evaṃ tarhi na kācid gatir anumīyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:11793: bhaviṣyatsaṃyogavibhāgānāṃ pramāṇāgocaratvāt. prathamaṃ ca katipayānām evāvagateḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11794: atha svadeśasaṃyogavibhāgahetukaṃ kriyānumānam. na ca sthāṇoḥ śyeno deśa ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11796: teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva. parokṣavyomavādināṃ ca vihaṅgame gacchatīti kriyāpratyayānupapattiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11797: vyomasaṃyogavibhāgayor apratyakṣatvāt tābhyāṃ tadanumānānupapatteḥ. na ca viyadvitatālokāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgāvagamanibandhano vihaṅgame calatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11798: santamase 'pi bhāvāt. na ca tamo nāma kiñcid vastv asti bhavatsiddhānte,
GSP28mimsvtku:11799: bhāso 'bhāvamātratvāt tasya. atas tatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāyaś śakyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11800: samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhyopapattiḥ. yā tu na hi te pratyakṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:11802: tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. rūpaśabdāvibhāgam iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:11803: eva karmety āsthitam. apūrvādhikaraṇe ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti vacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11805: itarathā hy upalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:11806: na hi tatra pratyakṣopalabdhimātram eva pratiṣiddham. yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11807: ca na phalānumeyatvābhiprāyam. kiṃ tarhi. āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na
GSP28mimsvtku:11808: svarūpataḥ karmāstīty apūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati. ihāpi devadattasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11809: gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptim upalabhyeti vadan devadatte pratyakṣatām eva gater
GSP28mimsvtku:11810: darśayati. anyathā tu devadattādityayor ubhayor api karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt kena viśeṣeṇāditye
GSP28mimsvtku:11811: gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate. devadatte 'pi hi sāmānyato dṛṣṭād eva
GSP28mimsvtku:11812: gatisiddhiḥ. ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktam anupapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:11813: iti. pratiyoginor hi parasparam asaṅkare dvaividhyaṃ bhavati. iha tu yat{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11814: 85}pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginor asaṅkara iti // 138 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11815: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyām api pakṣīkṛtād ity agater apratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭas
GSP28mimsvtku:11816: sambandha ity ucyate. tad etad āśaṅkate tāvat -- āditye 'nupalabdhiś ced iti. idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11817: dūṣayati -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- deśe 'py adhunātana iti. deśe 'py adhunātane --
GSP28mimsvtku:11819: apratyakṣatopalabdhir evety arthaḥ. yadi tv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ kvacin mahānasādau apratyakṣopalabdhir
GSP28mimsvtku:11820: iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gateḥ pratyakṣatvād astīty āha -- kvacid iti // 139 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11821: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ity uktam. idānīṃ sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:11822: dṛṣṭatāpi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭābhimatāgnyākṛtyanumāne saṅkīryata ity āha -- yadīti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:11823: yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato dṛṣṭateṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11824: sā tarhi mahānasādidharmyantarāpekṣayāgnidhūmayor api gamyagamakatvenāvasthitayoḥ prāpnoty eva. sāmānyato hy avivakṣitadeśādibhedam idam avagataṃ dhūmavān agnimān iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11825: yathā deśāntaraprāptyadhikaraṇaṃ gatyadhikaraṇam iti. ataḥ pratiyogitvarahitam evedam
GSP28mimsvtku:11826: ubhayam iti dvaividhyānupapattir ity ākṣepaḥ. evam ākṣioya samādadhāti -- tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:11827: evaṃ pracakṣata iti. yathoktadvaividhyāsambhavād evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa dvaividhyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11829: tatra pratyakṣasambandhaṃ tāvad udāharati -- pratyakṣeti yudhyate 'ntena. yadā hi yayor evāgnidhūmaviśeṣayoḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11830: gomayendhano yam agniḥ -- gomayam indhanam asyeti{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11831: tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣa iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaś ca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra
GSP28mimsvtku:11832: kvacid gatvā gatas san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tam evāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11833: tadā tatpratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandham anumānaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ. anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭam
GSP28mimsvtku:11834: eva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam. pratyakṣaśabdena hi viśeṣo lakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:11835: pratyakṣeṇa hy ayam evaṃvidho 'vāntaraviśeṣo gomayendhanatajjanyatvādirūpaś śakyate
GSP28mimsvtku:11836: 'vagantum. na pramāṇāntareṇa. taddvāreṇa tv anumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:11837: yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā. viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:11838: pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattir iti bhāvaḥ. nanu viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ nāma (na)
GSP28mimsvtku:11840: gṛhītaviṣayatvāt. taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminn eva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgnir anumīyate. ato deśabhedābhāvād aprāmāṇyam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:11841: ata āha -- tasyeti pādatrayeṇa. tasyaivaṃvidhasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya sandihyamānasadbhāvavastubodhāt
GSP28mimsvtku:11842: pramāṇatā bhavati. yady api deśabhedo nāsti. kālabhedāt tu saṃśayānasya saṃśayocchedadvāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:11843: prāmāṇyam avihatam iti. etac ca vindhyavāsināpi viśeṣadṛṣṭatvenodāhṛtam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11845: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇam idaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam. evaṃ hi viśeṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:11846: eva darśayitavyo bhavet. ata āha -- ākṛtyor eveti. ayam arthaḥ -- kenacid gomayendhanatvādināyāntaraviśeṣeṇopadarśitayor{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11847: 87}ākṛtyor evātra hetusādhyatvam. evaṃ hy atra pratyayaḥ. sa evāyam adya yāvadanuvartamāno
GSP28mimsvtku:11848: gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate. ata eva tadindhanayonir agnir anuvartata
GSP28mimsvtku:11850: yady evam avivakṣitāvāntaraviśeṣam agnidhūmāntaram eva sāmānyato dṛṣṭodāharaṇatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:11851: vācyam. kim ādityodāharaṇena. ata āha -- agnidhūmāntaratve ceti. yathā hy agnidhūmākṛtyos
GSP28mimsvtku:11853: naivaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ. ataḥ prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānam āditya ekāntatas sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham iti yuktam evādityodāharaṇam iti // 145 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11854: kiṃ punas sāmānyatas sambandhagrahaṇe pramāṇam. na hy agṛhītayos sambandhinos sambandhagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11855: asti. na ca sāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣagrahaṇaṃ sambhavati. tasya svalakṣaṇaikaviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11856: nānumānam anavasthāpātāt. ata āha -- pratyakṣaviṣayatvam iti. bhaved anavasthā,
GSP28mimsvtku:11857: yady anumānena sāmānyagrahaṇam iṣyate. tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:11858: upapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ pratyakṣatvam atas siddhaṃ sāmānyasyeti. nanu vastv eva na
GSP28mimsvtku:11859: sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti nāma. tasya bhinnābhinnasyānirūpaṇād ata āha -- vastutvaṃ ceti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11860: vastutvam apy ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate. pratyakṣaviṣayatāpratipādanena
GSP28mimsvtku:11861: ca pratyakṣe 'pi prasādhitaprāyam eva. atra ca asti sāmānyavastuṣv ity anvayopapādanāya
GSP28mimsvtku:11862: sāmānyasya vastutvam upanyastam eva. ayaṃ tu hetukathanārthaḥ punarupanyāsa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11863: yas tu haituko na hetum antareṇa pramāṇāntarasiddhāv ādriyate. taṃ prati hetunaivobhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:11865: {3,88} tatra vastutvaprasādhanārthaṃ tāvad hetum āha -- dhūmād agnyanumānasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11866: bauddhā hy avastusāmānyālambanam anumānam ācakṣate. sāmānyasya vikalpākāramātrābhyupagamāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11868: sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpam upasthāpayatīti pramāṇam ity āhuḥ. tān eva pratīdam
GSP28mimsvtku:11869: ucyate -- vastv ālambanam anumānam abhāvānyapramāṇatvāt yathā svārthe śrotrādibuddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:11870: yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhir indriyair buddhir janyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11871: sā vastv ālambanaiva. yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārthaḥ prāpyakāritvād
GSP28mimsvtku:11872: indriyāṇām. tad iha mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānanirākaraṇārthaṃ svārthaviśeṣaṇam. aviśeṣeṇopādāne
GSP28mimsvtku:11873: tu nābhāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet. bhrāntīnām ubhayavikalatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11874: na hi tāḥ pramāṇam. na ca vastv ālambanāḥ. anyasamprayuktendriyasya hi tā anyaviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:11876: na punaratyantāsadartham. evaṃ vastvālambanatve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11877: vastv ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ cāvastvālambanatvam anumānasyārthapadaṃ prayuñjānena
GSP28mimsvtku:11878: bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam. anarthaviṣayam anumānam iti bauddhā manyante. yadvad iti(?)
GSP28mimsvtku:11879: svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntir apy arthasambandhena pravṛttes tadavyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11880: teṣām idam uttaram arthas sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva. na vikalpākāramātram ity ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyata iti // 147
GSP28mimsvtku:11881: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati -- sāmānyasya ca vastutvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11882: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvād asādhāraṇavastuvad iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:11883: iti. pratyakṣaviṣayatām idānīṃ prayogeṇa darśayati -- pratyakṣeti pādatrayeṇa. yadabhāvānyaprameyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11884: tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata eva. yathā saugatānām evāsādhāraṇaṃ vastv iti // 148 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11885: {3,89} bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānām anavasthā prasajyata ity āha -- sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11886: yadi tūcyate liṅgabhūtasāmānyagrahaṇārtham anumānāpekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11889: arthakriyāsamarthavastupratilambhāt. na ca pramāṇam anarthaviṣayatvāt. ato 'nirvacanīyavikalpasiddhatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:11890: liṅgasya nānavasthā bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- atheti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvat pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11891: apramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati. viruddhasvabhāvayor ekatra pratiṣedhe 'nyatarāpatter
GSP28mimsvtku:11892: aparihāryatvāt. apramāṇasya ca prameyavyavasthāpanāśakter avaśyaṃ pramāṇam eva tajjñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:11894: 90}pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sad yathā talliṅgasaṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11895: evaṃ liṅginy api prāpnoti. evaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇaprasaṅgo bhavet. pramāṇād apramāṇād veti vadannanirdhāritobhayarūpatāṃ vikalpasya darśayatīti //
GSP28mimsvtku:11898: ata āha -- evam apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumānocchedāpādanam
GSP28mimsvtku:11899: abhimatam. pramāṇāntarābhyupagame 'pi cānumānocchedo bhavaty eva. tad eva hi pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11902: tato 'pramāṇāvagatāl liṅgāl liṅgijñānam api mithyā bhavet. bāṣpād iva dhūmasaṃviditād
GSP28mimsvtku:11903: agnijñānam. evaṃ ca nānumānam iti. sa evānumānasya nityocchedaṃ ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:11905: atra codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hy apramāṇam eva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅgajñānam api bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ // 157 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11906: pariharati -- tatreti. smṛtir hi pūrvajñānād bhavantī tadupasthāpanadvāreṇānumāyām upayujyate. tac ca pramāṇam eveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti // 158 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11907: {3,91} na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatīty āha -- na tv iti. na hy atra prāg api liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcid upapadyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11908: yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti. na ca liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eveti vācyam. pūrvapramāṇābhāvād evety āha -- tadabhāvād iti // 159 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11910: ato 'trāpi nirvikalpakapramāṇāntarato nirṇayo yukta eva. ata āha -- smārtam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11912: evam etad api liṅgajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtam iti yo
GSP28mimsvtku:11913: vadati tasya vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaśaktir anivāritā. gṛhītaviṣayā hi smṛtir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11914: sthitiḥ. na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanam iti kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11915: smṛtiḥ. yad atra prakāśate tan na gṛhītaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11916: yac ca gṛhītaṃ tan na prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam. agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti // 160 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11918: yadi sāmānyātmakam eva liṅgaṃ tadgrahaṇārtham iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11919: tasyānumānavedyatvāt. asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:11920: sa ca pratyakṣa eveti nānavasthā. ata āha -- na ceti. kiṃ na kāraṇam ata āha -- yasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:11921: iti. dṛṣṭāvinābhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāvaḥ kathañcid
GSP28mimsvtku:11922: deśataḥ kālato vā dṛṣṭaḥ. asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣv anusyūtyasambhavād ekatra dṛṣṭasya
GSP28mimsvtku:11924: {3,92} sambandhadarśanābhyupagame vā kṛtakatvādivat sāmānyarūpatāpattir ity āha -- syād veti. atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti // 162 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11925: itaś cāsādhāraṇo 'rthātmā na liṅgam ity āha -- na ceti. dhūmādir hi dhūmo 'yam ityādivikalpāspadīkṛto
GSP28mimsvtku:11926: 'gnyāder liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam. asādhāraṇas tu kenacid rūpeṇāpy avyapadeśyaḥ kathaṃ liṅga
GSP28mimsvtku:11927: bhaved iti. liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. nanu tiraścām asaty
GSP28mimsvtku:11928: eva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśinām evānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvād aliṅgatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:11929: ata āha -- vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:11930: arthavikalpas tu teṣām api pūrvāparānusandhānātmako 'sty eva. ato yuktam eva teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:11931: anumāne 'vyapadeśyasyāpi liṅgatvam. asādhāraṇas tu pūrvāparānusandhānād vinārthavikalparahito
GSP28mimsvtku:11932: 'pīti kathaṃ liṅgam. na hi so 'yam ity anārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gner liṅgaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11935: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te 'py anvayābhāvād aliṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11936: kim aṅga punarnirvikalpakaikagocaro 'sādhāraṇo 'rthātmā ity āha -- kalpyanta iti. anvayābhāvād evāsādhāraṇajñānam api liṅgisāmānyajñāne na liṅgam ity āha -- etasmād eveti // 164 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11938: tato liṅgasāmānyagrahaṇa ivānavasthāprasaṅgāt tasyāpy anavadhāraṇam ity āha -{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11939: 93}sāmānyeti. yadi tu kasmiṃścid evāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe nyadarśināpi
GSP28mimsvtku:11940: sāmānyam anumīyate. evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet. aviśeṣād ity
GSP28mimsvtku:11942: evaṃ tāvan na liṅgāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam astīty uktam. idānīm anvayagrahaṇakāle liṅgijñāne
GSP28mimsvtku:11943: 'pi na kiñcit pramāṇam astīty āha -- sambandhānubhava iti. nāgṛhīte liṅgini tatsambaddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11944: liṅgaṃ śakyate 'vagantum. na cānumānapravṛtteḥ prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavanaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:11945: kiñcit pramāṇam asty asmākam iva pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11946: ato liṅginy apy avagamyamāne 'navasthāprasaṅga ity abhiprāyaḥ // 166 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11948: kim ihātinirbandhena. kācid eva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcil liṅgākāraṃ vikalpam āvirbhāvayantī
GSP28mimsvtku:11949: kiñcid evānumānasaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati. yathāhuḥ -- sa evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro
GSP28mimsvtku:11952: ata āha -- na cāpīti. na vāsanāmātranirmitaṃ liṅgajñānam. vāsanā hi pūrvānubhavāhitas
GSP28mimsvtku:11953: saṃskāraḥ. nāsau liṅgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsatas sambhavatīti kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11954: vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti. tannibandhane ca liṅgajñāna iṣyamāṇe tadvad
GSP28mimsvtku:11955: eva liṅgijñānopapatter anarthakaṃ trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam ity anumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:11957: {3,94} nanv iyam anavasthā meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvānumāne bhavato 'pi samānaiva,
GSP28mimsvtku:11958: abhāvasyānupalabdhiliṅgatvāt. sajātīyaliṅgāntarāpekṣāyām anavasthāpadyate. ata āha -- yatreti. yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāv
GSP28mimsvtku:11959: abhāvākhyapramāṇāntaragamyatvāt. ato nātra tulyajātīyāpekṣānibandhano 'navasthādoṣo jāyata iti // 168 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11960: pratyakṣasāmānyavādināṃ tu na naḥ kācid anavasthety āha -- pratyakṣāvagatād iti. ataḥ pratyakṣād ity arthaḥ // 169 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11962: ata āha -- yatrāpīti. pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptir maulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11963: tena gatim anumāyāditye gatisādhane 'numīyamāne nānavasthety abhiprāyaḥ // 170 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11965: kṛtakatvaṃ ca tatra darśanād ity evaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi hetvantarād anumāne 'navasthā bhaved ata āha -- liṅgatvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:11967: iti kārakavyāpārānantarabhāvitvaṃ liṅgam uktam. tatra ca kārakaviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakam anantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṃṣalliṅgam āpatati.
GSP28mimsvtku:11968: 95}ca tatpratyakṣam. kriyāyās tāvat pratyakṣatvam anantaram eva sādhitam. kārakam
GSP28mimsvtku:11969: api tadvat pratyakṣam eva. śaktis tu parokṣā. sā ca na tāvad iha liṅgam. na cānumeyā.
GSP28mimsvtku:11970: ataḥ kriyākārakayor ubhayor api pratyakṣatvān na dūragamanam. anumeyakarmavādinām
GSP28mimsvtku:11973: evaṃ tāvadanumānasyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityam uktam idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:11974: sarvam eva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānyāśrayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:11975: na ca tadapramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇanyāyād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- evam iti // 172 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11976: ato 'vaśyaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvam eṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyasya ca pratyakṣatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:11977: itarathā tv anavasthā prāpnotīty upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 173 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11978: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastunā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:11979: tān pratyāha -- pratyakṣeti. viśeṣo hi yadi tāvadavayavī dravyam abhimataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:11980: sa cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣas sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhiḥ kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti // 174 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11981: yadi tv avayavirūpādaya eva viśeṣā iṣyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:11982: tad apy ayuktam. te 'pi hi svaviśeṣanīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyam evety āha -- rūpādayo hīti.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11983: 96}yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam. tan na. teṣām apy avāntaranīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvād ity āha -- svaviśeṣān iti // 175 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11985: tan na. tasyāpi pakṣādisvāvayavāśritanīlaviśeṣāpekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvāt. pakṣanīlimāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:11986: tadavayavanīlāpekṣayā sāmānyam eva. evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhyaḥ prasaṅgo darśayitavya
GSP28mimsvtku:11987: ity āha -- te cāpīti. nirbhāgā hi paramāṇava iti tadrūpam asādhāraṇam eveti. tebhyas
GSP28mimsvtku:11988: tu prāk dvyaṇukarūpam api dvayos sādhāraṇam ity āha -- dvyaṇukasyāpīti // 176 //
GSP28mimsvtku:11990: sa eva naḥ pratyakṣo bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- na cāntyeneti. vyavahārārthaṃ hi pramāṇam anusriyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:11991: na vyasanitayā. na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ kasyacid astīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti. nanūpekṣāphalam api pramāṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:11992: ata āha -- na ceti. na naḥ paramāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnām iva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyeti
GSP28mimsvtku:11993: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnās sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyam ekam. ataḥ kathaṃ tatsāvayaveṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:11994: sāmānyam ity ucyate. sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti
GSP28mimsvtku:11995: te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti. mā nāmaikaikataḥ paramāṇur akṣagocaro bhaved ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:11996: bhedeneti. eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bhāvaḥ prakāśate na paramāṇubhedāḥ. na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:11997: 'bhedo gṛhyata iti sāmpratam. saṃvidvirodhād iti bhāvaḥ. nanv ayam eva bhedāvagraho{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:11999: kiṃ bhedagrahaṇenāta āha -- na ca bhinneti. nābhinnākārabuddhibodhyo bhedaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12001: nanv asaty apy ekasmin samudāyālambano 'yam abhinnāvabhāso bhaviṣyatīty ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:12002: samudāya iti. ye hi sāmānyam eva sarvajagatsaṃviditam apalapanti kutas teṣāṃ samudāyo nāmārthāntaraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12003: yadālambano 'bhinnapratibhāso bhaviṣyati. api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyam avabudhyante kathaṃ tad anyathā bhaviṣyatīty āha -- na ca sarvadeti
GSP28mimsvtku:12004: kiñcāyaṃ samudāyo 'pi naikajātyā vinopapadyeta. na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:12005: kasyacit samudāyabuddhir asti. atas samudāye 'pīṣyamāṇe 'ṇutvasāmānyam abhyupagantavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12006: āpadyeta bhavatām ity āha -- na ceti. hetau caḥ // 180 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12007: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyam abhyupagantuṃ śakyam. na caindriyakaṃ jñānam etā(?v i/
GSP28mimsvtku:12008: va)ti samartham avikalpakatvāt tasya. ata āha -- sāmānyam itīti. yady apy anekānugamakḷptes
GSP28mimsvtku:12009: tannānāvayavavyāsaṅgi dravyaṃ sāmānyam ity evaṃ vikalpya na gṛhyate. tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12010: tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
GSP28mimsvtku:12011: prativyaktivartino 'pi gotvādisāmānyasyaindriyakatvaṃ darśayitavyam. tad api sāmānyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12012: ity anena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastutas sāmānyam eva gṛhyate. śabdādismaraṇottarakālaṃ tv
GSP28mimsvtku:12013: anekānugamāvamarśāt sāmānyam iti vikalpya gṛhyate. idaṃ ca savikalpakasiddhāv uktam
GSP28mimsvtku:12014: eva. ato naivaṃ vācyam -- astvavayavisāmānyasya svalakṣaṇāparanāmna indriyair grahaṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12016: {3,98} ubhayatrāpi pratyayāviśeṣād ity āha -- vyāsajyeti. tadanenaitadāpāditam -- kim idaṃ mudhaiva sāmānyasya pratyakṣatā neṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12017: viśeṣam api hi pratyakṣam icchadbhir balāt sāmānyam eva pratyakṣam āśrayaṇīyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12018: sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpādes sāmānyarūpatvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:12020: svatantraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:12021: ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇy eva pratyakṣāṇi na
GSP28mimsvtku:12022: viśeṣā eveti tātparyam. evamparatvād eva ca pradeśāntarasiddhasāmānyāvayavisāmānyapratyakṣatāpratipādanena
GSP28mimsvtku:12024: nanu bhavadbhir mīmāṃsakais tāvadavaśyam abhyupagantavyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ. atas teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:12025: evobhayasiddhānāṃ param ekākārabuddhijananaśaktimātram evopakalpitam. kiṃ dharmikalpanayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:12026: laghīyasī hi tatkalpanāto dharmakalpanā. ata āha -- mīmāṃsakaiś ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12029: na ca sthūlaṃ hitvā paramāṇava evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau bhāsante,
GSP28mimsvtku:12030: yattānupetya sthūlam avajānīmahe. tadānuguṇyena tu yady aṇavo vyā(?pa/
GSP28mimsvtku:12032: na tadbalena mūlabhūtaṃ sthūlam apalapitum utsahāmaha iti // 183 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12033: pratyakṣaṃ tu sthūlam adṛśyaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ nihnuvānasya śaśo 'pi tadviṣāṇadhiyā nihnotavyaḥ prāpta ity āha -- samūharūpam iti // 184 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12034: {3,99} kim idānīṃ śaśaviṣāṇakalpāḥ paramāṇavaḥ. nety āha -- samūheti. na hy atra
GSP28mimsvtku:12035: kalpanālāghavena pratyakṣasiddho dharmī parityāgam arhati. siddhe ca tasmiṃs tadanuguṇāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12036: paramāṇava iti kena neṣyate. siddhyupāyas tu teṣām anyo nāstīti paramāṇavo nāvaśyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12038: ato yad eva vastu sāmānyaviśeṣayor aparokṣaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12040: na tu viśeṣa eva pratyakṣo na sāmānyam iti vācyam ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 186 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12042: tathāpi na sāmānyasya pratyakṣam apahnotuṃ śakyate. gotvādisāmānyānām api sattādiparasāmānyāpekṣayāsādhāraṇatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:12043: ato yady asādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣam ity āgraho bhavatām evam api na gotvādisāmānyam apratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:12044: iti pratyakṣasāmarthyasiddhatvān na śakyam apahnotum ity āha -- sattādīti // 187 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12045: yadi tūcyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇam api sāmānyaṃ na sāmānyollekhena gṛhyata iti (na)
GSP28mimsvtku:12047: tad etad āśaṅkate -- sāmānyeti. pariharati -- kiṃ veti. evaṃ hy asādhāraṇam api na pratyakṣaṃ bhavet. tatrāpi nirvikalpakāvasthāyāṃ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12048: 100}paravyāvṛttyakalpanād asādhāraṇollekho nāsty eveti. yadi tu tādrūpyeṇāvikalpitam
GSP28mimsvtku:12049: api svarūpeṇa vikalpako 'vabudhyata iti tatpratyakṣam. evaṃ tarhi dvyākāram eva saṃmugdhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12050: vastu lokaḥ pratipadyata iti parīkṣakair ubhayathāpi tat śakyata eva vaktum iti siddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12051: dvyākāram eva vastu pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti. siddhaṃ ca sāmānyatas sambandhadarśanam
GSP28mimsvtku:12052: ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- yadvastu lokaḥ pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tat śakyata eva vaktum
GSP28mimsvtku:12053: iti. asminn iti pratyakṣajñāna ity arthaḥ // 188 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12058: atra pratyakṣānumānayor aparīkṣyatva ukte śāstrasyāpy aparīkṣyatāpratipādanārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12059: bhāṣyam -- śāstraṃ śabdavijñānād asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe vijñānam iti. nanu vṛttikāramate
GSP28mimsvtku:12061: 101}pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstram ity ukteḥ pratyakṣavyabhicāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:12062: parīkṣām āśaṅkya tadavyabhicāra ukte 'nantaram eva śāstrasyāparīkṣā pratipādyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12064: kim anumānena vyavadhīyate. satyam evam. ayaṃ tu tantrāntarānusāreṇa krama āśritaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12065: tathā hi nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti lokāyatikā manyante. te hi vaiśeṣikādyāśritapratyakṣānantarānumānaprāmāṇyapratipādanena
GSP28mimsvtku:12066: pratibodhyante. evaṃ hi vaiśeṣikāḥ paṭhanti -- dvividhaṃ pramāṇam ālocitādhyavasānam
GSP28mimsvtku:12067: anālocitānugamanaṃ ceti. tathānye 'pi pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12068: yathākṣapādīyair api pratyakṣānantaram anumānaṃ lakṣitam -- tatpūrvakaṃ trividham
GSP28mimsvtku:12069: anumānam iti. tenehāpi tāvat pratyakṣānantaram anumānaṃ varṇitam. tato mahāviṣayatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:12070: prakṛtatvena puruṣārthaupayikatvena ca śāstram. tadanantaraṃ ca yatra kvacana vācye
GSP28mimsvtku:12071: bahūnāṃ prasiddham ity upamānam uktam. nyāyavistare hi prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:12072: upamānam ity uktam. tataḥ pārāśaryamatenārthāpattir uktā. taduttarakālam eva tanmatānusāriṇā
GSP28mimsvtku:12073: kṛtakoṭinoktatvāt. abhāvapramāṇasya tu bhāvapramāṇābhāva evātmeti taduttaraḥ prastāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12074: kiṃ punas tantrāntarānusārasya prayojanam. ucyate. prasiddhatvena hy aparīkṣā pratipādyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12075: tantrāntareṣv evam imāni pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti prasiddhiprābalyaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:12076: vyutthitāś ca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditā bhavanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12078: tat kathaṃ vigṛhyate. kiṃ śabdād vijñānaṃ śabdasya vā vijñānam iti. pūrvatra samāsānupapattiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12079: bhayena hi pañcamī samasyate. uttaratra tu savikalpakapratyakṣe 'pi śāstratvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12080: śabdavijñānād eva hi gaur ity evamādayo 'sannikṛṣṭārthavikalpā bhavanti. atrocyate. ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa evāyam. na ca savikalpake prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12082: api tu śabdasahāyād indriyāt. yathaiva hi gandhasahakṛtam indriyaṃ tailād vilīnaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12083: ghṛtaṃ vivinakti. evaṃ śabdasahakṛtaṃ jātyādīn. tathā cākṣasambandhaphalam aparokṣāvabhāsitā. ta(?tra /
GSP28mimsvtku:12084: c ca) savikalpake 'stīty uktaṃ pratyakṣānte. ato yad eva śabdaśaktivimarśotthaṃ vijñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:12085: asannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ tacchābdam. ata eva na padārthamātrajñānaṃ śābdam. na hi tadasannikṛṣṭārthagocaram.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12086: 102}vakṣyati hi -- smārakān na vimṛśyata iti. kiṃ nāma tarhi śābdam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12089: na śabdajñānāt. na. avāntaravyāpāratvāt padārthapratipādanasya śabdānām,
GSP28mimsvtku:12090: pāka iva kāṣṭhānāṃ jvalanasya. vakṣyati hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:12092: iti. ato na kiñcid anupapannam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12093: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kim idaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇāvasare viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ praṇīyate śabdaviśeṣo hi śāstram. tad yadi vaktavyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12095: lakṣyeta). yat punaratitvaritenaiva sāmānyalakṣaṇāvasare viśeṣo lakṣyate tadasāmpratam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12096: na hīha pratyakṣādīnāṃ cākṣuṣatvādayo viśeṣā lakṣyante. tataḥ pratyakṣādiṣu sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:12097: vaktum ārabdheṣu madhye śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12098: na śāstrasyeti. tad etad āha -- pratyakṣādiṣv iti // 1 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12099: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- sāmānyeti. nirjñātasāmānyalakṣaṇo hi tadviśeṣaṃ bodhayituṃ śakyo netaraḥ. na hy alakṣite dravye tadviśeṣāḥ pṛthivyādayo lakṣayituṃ śakyanta iti // 2 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12100: evaṃ tāvat śāstram iti lakṣyanirdeśo 'nupapanna ity uktam. śabdavijñānād ityādi lakṣaṇam api lakṣyaviśeṣe na saṅgacchata ity āha -- yac coktam iti // 3 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12101: kīdṛk tarhi śāstralakṣaṇam ata āha -- pravṛttir iti.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12102: 103}pravṛttinivṛttyupadeśakaṃ hi nityaṃ vedavākyam anityaṃ dharmaśāstrādikaṃ śāstram ucyate na śabdamātram iti // 4 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12103: nanu svarūpamātrābhidhāyinām api kṣepiṣṭhādivākyānāṃ śāstratvam iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12104: kim ucyate pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgaṃ śāstram iti. ata āha -- svarūpeti. tadaṅgatveneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12105: vidhāyakavākyaikadeśatvenety arthaḥ. asti hi tatrāpi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūtikāma
GSP28mimsvtku:12106: iti vidhyuddeśaḥ. tenaikavākyabhūto vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhety evamādiḥ. ato yuktaṃ tasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:12108: nanv arthavādā na tāvat sākṣāt kriyāṃ pratipādayanti. nāpi tadaṃśam. trayo 'pi hi
GSP28mimsvtku:12109: tadaṃśāḥ sādhyaṃ sādhanam iti kartavyatā ceti. na caiṣām anyatamam amībhir abhidhīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12110: ato 'kriyārthānām ekavākyatām eva na manyāmahe. ata āha -- bhāvanāyām iti śāstram
GSP28mimsvtku:12111: ityantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady api na kriyāṃ gamayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12113: tathāpi vidhinā śabdabhāvanāparanāmadheyena sahaiṣām ekavākyatā. vidhir hi puruṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12114: pravartayituṃ viṣayaprāśastyajñānam apekṣate. tac cārthavādāś śaknuvanti kartum iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12115: tat kurvatām eṣām asti pravṛttinivṛttyor upayogaḥ. atas samastāyāṃ tryaṃśapūrṇāyām
GSP28mimsvtku:12116: eva bhāvanāyāṃ mahāvākyād eva sārthavādakāt puruṣaḥ pravartate nivartate vā na vidhyuddeśamātrād
GSP28mimsvtku:12117: iti sārthavādakam eva vākyaṃ śāstram iti. etac cārthavādādhikaraṇe prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12118: darśitaṃ ca kiñcid vidhivivaraṇe ity alam anenātiparispandeneti. yata eva sārthavādakāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12120: ata eva vidhivācinaḥ pratyayamātrasya padamātrasya vā yajetety evamādikasya vidhiśrutāv
GSP28mimsvtku:12121: api na śāstratvam. yatra hi tryaṃśabhāvanāvacanam apy avāntaravākyam anapekṣitārthavādakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12123: katham iva tatra padapratyayayoś śaktir bhaviṣyatīti duradhigamam ity āha -- na padādyata iti // 6 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12124: {3,104} evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇānupapattyā dūṣitaṃ bhāṣyam upapādayati -- aparīkṣeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vedavyākhyā hi prakṛtā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12125: ato yad eva tadupayogi tad eva vācyam ity atikramyāpi sāmānyaprakramaṃ viśeṣam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:12126: lakṣitavān. na hīha lakṣaṇakaraṇam eva svarūpeṇa vivakṣitam. aparīkṣāc chalena hi
GSP28mimsvtku:12127: lakṣaṇāni praṇīyante. tatrāpi yad eva prakṛtopayogiśāstralakṣaṇaṃ tad eva kṛtam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12130: tataḥ kim ata āha -- tatreti. yadā hy ayaṃ jalpāka iva nānupayuktaṃ bhāṣata iti sthitam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12131: tatra yadi lokavākyasthitaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kathayet tad asya vedaṃ vyācikhyāsor anupayuktaṃ syād iti // 8 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12133: kim iti tarhi pratyakṣādi lakṣyate na hi teṣāṃ vedopayogo dṛśyate ata āha -- pratyakṣādīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vedasvarūpāvadhāraṇa eva tāvanmahānupakāraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12134: na hi tadantareṇa puraḥ -- prathamam eva svādhyāyagrahaṇakāle varṇamātrādy avadhārayituṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12135: tadā cānavadhṛtaṃ śāstrārthajñānavelāyām asmṛtatvān nopayujyetaiva. ataḥ purastāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12136: parastāc ca varṇamātrāditaḥ kṛte pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam. anumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:12137: api pratīkaviniyuktamantraśeṣānumāna upayujyate. yathā devasya tveti nirvapatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12138: upamānam api sauryādikarmaṇāṃ prakṛtiviśeṣopamāne. arthāpattir apy aśrutavākyaikadeśakalpanāyām.
GSP28mimsvtku:12139: abhāvo 'pi padavākyeyattāvadhāraṇe dravyadevatādyabhāvena ca karmaṇām avyaktacodanātvāvadhāraṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:12140: upayujyata iti dvayor ādiśabdayor artha iti // 9 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12141: {3,105} na caivañjātīyakaḥ kaścid upayogo gāmānayetyādivākyasthasya śābdalakṣaṇasyāstīti tadupekṣyaiva śāstragatam eva lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam ity āha -- yat tv iti // 10 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12142: yat punar alakṣite sāmānye na viśeṣo lakṣayituṃ śakyata ity uktaṃ tatpariharati -- viśeṣaś ceti. sāmānyalakṣaṇe hi viśeṣo na sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12143: vyabhicārāt. viśeṣas tu sāmānyāvyabhicārīti tasmin lakṣite tadantargataṃ sāmānyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12144: sukham eva lakṣitaṃ bhavet. yadā hi vidhāyakavijñānād asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe vijñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12145: śāstram ity uktaṃ tadārthād vidhāyakaviśeṣarahitāc chabdamātrajñānāc chābdam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12146: śakyam avagantum iti na pṛthag ucyata iti // 11 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12147: nanu nedaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣopādānābhāvād ity uktam. ata āha -- sāmānyeti. nāvaśyam upāttam eva viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12150: d ihāpi codanālakṣaṇādhikārāc chabdavijñānād ity ukte 'pi vidhāyakaviśeṣaṇaṃ pratyeṣyata iti. nanu yadi prakṛtopayogi vaktavyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12152: kiṃ śāstralakṣaṇenāta āha -- codaneti. paryāyā eta iti bhāvaḥ // 12 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12153: ayaṃ cādhikārato viśeṣalābho jaiminer apy anumataś codanāśabdam aviśeṣitaṃ dvitīye
GSP28mimsvtku:12154: sūtre prayuñjānasyety āha -- yathā ceti. evaṃ hi manyate -- yady api codanāśabdaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12157: 106}vedādhyayanānantaryasyopāttatvāt tadadhikārād eva codanāśabdo vaidikyām eva codanāyām avatiṣṭhate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12158: evam ihāpi śāstralakṣaṇe codanāprāmāṇyādhikārāt śabdavijñānārthajñānaśabdau viśiṣṭaśabdārthaparau,
GSP28mimsvtku:12160: yad api vṛttikāramatopanyāsāvasare pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12161: ca śāstram iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ tatrāpi viśeṣaśāstrāparīkṣāpratijñānaṃ prakṛtopayogitvābhiprāyeṇaiveti
GSP28mimsvtku:12162: darśayati -- pratyakṣādīti. idaṃ tu cintanīyam. yadi vidhāyakaśabdajanitaṃ vijñānaṃ śāstram,
GSP28mimsvtku:12163: kim idānīm aṅgāni mīmāṃsā karmānuśāsanāni ca na śāstrāṇi,
GSP28mimsvtku:12164: laukikāni ca gāmānayetyādivākyāni śāstrāṇi. yady evaṃ mahān lokavirodhaḥ. na hi laukikā
GSP28mimsvtku:12165: gāmānayetyādiṣu śāstraśabdam upacaranti. svavacanavirodhaś ca. yato gāmānayetyādivākyasthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12166: śābdalakṣaṇam iti hi vadanti. mīmāṃsādiṣu vedavat tato 'pi vā sātiśayaṃ śāstraśabdopacāram
GSP28mimsvtku:12167: upalabhāmahe. api cāyaṃ śāstraśabdo rūḍho vā syād yaugiko vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12170: rūḍhiś ca sātiśayeti varṇitam. atrābhidhīyate. yogarūḍhir iyaṃ paṅkajādivat,
GSP28mimsvtku:12171: ato na tāvadgāmānayetyādiṣv atiprasajyate. saty api yoge laukikānāṃ teṣv aprayogāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:12172: puruṣārthopadeśān eva laukikāś śāstram iti manyante. tathā cāṅgānīti teṣāṃ śāstratvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12174: na ca tāni kañcid vidadhati. maivam. sarveṣām evānuṣṭhānopadeśaparatvāt. vyākaraṇe
GSP28mimsvtku:12175: hi yatsādhubhir bhāṣeta tad ebhir ity upadiśyate. mīmāṃsāyām api pratyadhikaraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12176: nyāyavyutpādanenānuṣṭhānopadeśa eva sarvatra. ato yacchāstraṃ tatpravṛttivṛttyupadeśakam eveti niyamaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12177: na punas tadupadeśakaṃ śāstram eveti laukikī prasiddhir iha bhāṣyakāreṇānūditā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12178: na punas tannirapekṣaṃ śāstralakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam. ato{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12179: 107}yadasannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ puruṣaśreyovidhāyakaṃ vākyaṃ loke śāstram iti prasiddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12180: tacchāstram. yat punar asannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ vidhāyakam avidhāyakaṃ vā tacchābdam
GSP28mimsvtku:12181: iti vivekaḥ. pratyakṣavac cātrāpi śabdatajjñānādiṣu vivakṣātaḥ pramāṇavikalpā darśayitavyāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12182: nāvaśyaṃ jñānam eva pramāṇam ity abhiniveṣṭavyam. pūrvapramāṇe cottaraṃ vākyārthajñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12183: phalaṃ tatprāmāṇye ca hānādibuddhir iti viveka iti // 14 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12184: idaṃ ca śāstram anumānād abhinnam iti pramāṇadvayavādino manyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:12185: tānnirākartukāmas teṣāṃ matam upanyasyati -- tatreti. idaṃ ca pratijñāmātram eva teṣām uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12186: tadīyābhedahetūpanyāsas tu paroktabhedahetunirāsāvasare kariṣyata iti. kiṃ punar abhedopanyāsanirāsayoḥ prayasyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12187: nanv ayaṃ sāṅkhyādibhir eva bhedavādibhir abhedo nirākṛta eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:12188: ata āha -- bheda iti. na tais samyagbhedakāraṇam uktam ity arthaḥ // 15 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12189: tān eva taduktān bhedahetūn nirākartum upanyasyati -- pūrvasaṃskārety uktāntena. evaṃ hi tair uktam -- śabde hi pūrvasaṃskārayukto 'ntyo varṇo,
GSP28mimsvtku:12194: teṣām eva kramaḥ padānāṃ vā vākyatvajātir eva vāvayavī vā nirdhūtanikhilavarṇādivibhāgaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12195: sphoṭo vā padāny eva vā saṃhatyārtham abhidadhati. ete ca padeṣv api vikalpā darśayitavyāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12196: tathā vivakṣāprayatnādayaś ca śabdaniṣpattihetava iti. sarvam idaṃ dhūmādau na dṛṣṭam
GSP28mimsvtku:12198: numānatvam iti. atra dūṣaṇam āha -- tatreti. bauddhena śābdam anumānād abhinnam anvayavyatirekābhyām utpatteḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12202: vikalpasamā vā. kā punarjātiḥ. sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānaṃ jātiḥ. vādinā hi prayukte prayoge prasaṅgo jāyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12203: sa jāyata iti jātir ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12206: tatra yadā prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati. yathā -- kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogāt loṣṭavad iti vādinokte,
GSP28mimsvtku:12207: prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati -- yathā kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12210: tasmān niṣkriya iti. seyaṃ vaidharmyasamā jātir ity ucyate. tathā dharmāntaravikalpāt. yadā prativādinā sādhya(dha)
GSP28mimsvtku:12212: asau vikalpasamā nāma jātir ucyate. yathāsminn eva prayoge prativādī vadati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12213: kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcid avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12215: evaṃ kiñcit kriyāvad bhaviṣyati kiñcid akriyāvad iti. evam ihāpi pareṇābhedasādhane
GSP28mimsvtku:12216: ukte dhūmādivaidharmyamātreṇa pratyavasthāne vaidharmyasamā nāma jātir āpādyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12217: dhūmād agnyanumānaṃ hi vākyavikalpādirahitam. na ca tathā śābdam. ato nānumānam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12218: tathā vikalpasamāpy evaṃ darśayitavyā. anvayavyatirekajam eva kiñcid vākyavikalpād
GSP28mimsvtku:12223: tyuttaraṃ ca sādhakam iti na vacanīyam iti // 16 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12225: evaṃ hi sādhanam idam -- śābdam anumānād bhinnaṃ tadvaidharmyāt pratyakṣavad iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12226: ata āha -- dhūmeti. na tāvat trailakṣaṇyapa(rityāgena)
GSP28mimsvtku:12227: vaidharmyaṃ tair uktam. kiñcid viśeṣaṇamātreṇa tu vaidharmyam aviśiṣṭam arthātmakānām anumānānām iti teṣām apy anumānād bhedo bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:12229: na hi dhūmādīnāṃ ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... vailakṣaṇyam ity ananumānatā bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:12230: trailakṣaṇyāparityāgād anityatvaṃ kṛtakatve hetur iti. trailakṣaṇyaparityāgapratipādane (?py a /
GSP28mimsvtku:12232: {3,109} vailakṣaṇyamātreṇa tu bhedaṃ vadato vailakṣaṇyavacanasya jātitaivāpadyetety āha -- trailakṣaṇyeti // 18 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12233: yad api cedam aparaṃ śābdānumānayor vailakṣaṇyam uktam -- dhūmādayo hi svābhāvikenaiva pratibandhena pratibandhakabuddhim anumāne janayanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12236: tatrāpy āha -- yatheti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- atrāpi yadi kiñcid vaidharmyamātreṇa bheda ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12237: ato jātir eva. athāyaṃ prayogaḥ -- śābdam anumānād bhinnaṃ yatheṣṭaviniyogenārthapratipādanād akṣavad. akṣaṃ hi cakṣurādi yatraiva vyāpāryate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12238: tad eva pratipādayatīti. tad ayuktam. tatrāpi svābhāvikyaivātmaśaktyā rūpādipratipādanāt. atha svagocare yatheṣṭaviniyogena pratipādanaṃ hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:12239: ato liṅgam api parārthaprayoge yam eva prati prayujyate tam eva pratipādayatīti samānam. atha yatheṣṭaviniyogas saṅketo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12243: na hi śabdād anyat saṅketānuvidhānenārthaṃ bodhayati. athāvītahetur ayam. anumānaṃ hi yatheṣṭaviniyogānanuvidhāyipratipādanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12245: ato bhinnam iti. tan na. vyatirekamātrasyāgamakatvād anvayavyatirekī hi hetur iṣyate. na cāyaṃ hetur anumānād abhedena vyāptaḥ kvacid avagataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12246: śabdātirekiṇaḥ kasyacid yatheṣṭaviniyogenāpratipādanāt. athāsti hastasaṅketādīnāṃ yathāsamayaṃ pratipādanam ity ucyate. tat tarhi pramāṇāntaram anumānaṃ vā. na tāvat pramāṇāntaram,
GSP28mimsvtku:12247: tallakṣaṇābhāvāt. ato vyāptibalena jñāyamānam anumānam eva tat. evaṃ ca sati tenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:12248: vyabhicāra iti nānumānād vyāvṛttir hetos sidhyati. tad idam uktaṃ vyabhicāro 'ṅgavṛttibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:12249: iti. aṅgānāṃ hastādīnām ākuñcanaprasāraṇādyā vṛttayo 'ṅgavṛttaya iti // 19 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12250: {3,110} etad eva vivṛṇoti -- hasteti. hastādyaṅgāśritavṛttaya evārthaviśeṣajñānāṅgatayā hastasaṃjñety ucyante. kathaṃ punar idam anumām,
GSP28mimsvtku:12251: na hi hastādisanniveśās saṅkhyāviśeṣādibhir arthair vyāptāḥ. tair vināpi kadācid
GSP28mimsvtku:12252: bhāvāt. kin tu aṅgulyādisanniveśāt saṅketakālabhāviśabdasmaraṇenārthaṃ pratipadyamānāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12253: śabdād eva pratipadyante. tan na. antareṇāpi śabdasaṅke(?ta /
GSP28mimsvtku:12254: taṃ) vyavahāra evāvyutpannasyāṅgulyādisanniveśadarśinas tadarthāvagateḥ. na cātra
GSP28mimsvtku:12255: vyabhicāraḥ. na hi yādṛśe sanniveśe vyāptir avagatā tādṛśasya vyabhicāro dṛśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12256: tad idaṃ tena dharmyantareṣv eṣety atra varṇitam. ato 'numānam evedam. tad idam uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12257: - te talliṅgam iti sthitir iti. sarvaṃ cedam anvāruhya vārttikakāreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ dattam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12258: na hi yatheṣṭaviniyogena śabdād arthapratītir bhavati. gavādiśabdā hi nijaśaktyanusāreṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:12259: svārthaṃ prativedayanti. yadṛcchāśabdās tu hastasaṃjñāditulyāste saṅketānusāreṇārthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12264: atas tadvailakṣaṇyād bheda iti. ayam api avītahetuḥ. evaṃ ca vaktavyam -- na puruṣopakṣo 'numāne 'rthaniścayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12265: na ca tathā śabda ity ato bhidyata iti. etad api dūṣayati -- puruṣeti. vyatirekahetur vyatirekapuraskāreṇaivārthaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12266: prāṇādaya ivānātmakād dehād vyāvṛttam ātmānam. puruṣāpekṣitā tv anumāne 'py arthaniścayāṅgam aṅgavṛttiṣu dṛṣṭā. yādṛśo hi saṅketo yadarthapratipādane puruṣaiḥ kṛtaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12267: tam eva parapuruṣāpekṣayā budhyante. ato 'trāpi vyabhicāriteti. api cāvyāpakatvād asiddho hetur ity āha -- padeti. padāni hi svamahimnaivārthaṃ pratipādayanti na puruṣāpekṣayā.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12268: 111} vedavākyāny api na svārthapratipādanāya puruṣam apekṣante,
GSP28mimsvtku:12270: nanu nāgṛhītasambandhaṃ padaṃ pratyāyakaṃ bhavati. na ca puruṣānapekṣā sambandhāvagatir
GSP28mimsvtku:12271: asti. vedavākyāny api nāgṛhīte padapadārthasambandhe svārthaṃ pratipādayanti. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:12272: 'yaṃ padapadārthasambandhaḥ puruṣāpekṣa eveti nāvyāpakatvam. ata āha -- sambandheti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12273: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- arthapratipādane tāvadanapekṣam eva padaṃ vaidikāni ca vākyāni.
GSP28mimsvtku:12274: sambandhānubhavaś ca yatheha puruṣāpekṣas tathānyatrāpy anumāne 'sau vilakṣaṇo dṛśyata
GSP28mimsvtku:12275: eveti. vailakṣaṇyam eva darśayati -- etasminn iti anyo 'ntena. etasminn iti. hastasaṃjñādau puruṣāpekṣaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12276: pauruṣeyo hi samayaḥ. agnidhūmayos tu deśāpekṣaḥ. candrodayasamudravṛddhyos tu kālāpekṣaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12277: ādiśabdenāvasthāpekṣitāṃ darśayati. tad anenaitad uktaṃ bhavati -- anumāne 'py anekaprakāras
GSP28mimsvtku:12278: sambandhāvagamo deśādyapekṣayā bhedāt. evam ihāpi puruṣāpekṣo bhaviṣyati. anumāne
GSP28mimsvtku:12279: 'pi tadapekṣas sambandhabodho dṛṣṭa iti. api ca paroktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tair na
GSP28mimsvtku:12281: tam evābhedahetum upanyasyati -- āptavādeti. ayam arthaḥ -- yathā dhūmādiṣu bhedahānena sāmānyadharmayor vyāptir avadhāryate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12285: ato 'numānam evedam. yāvat tv avisaṃvādo nānumīyate tāvadarthagocaraṃ jñānam utpannam
GSP28mimsvtku:12286: apy aniścāyakatvād apramāṇam eva. sāmānyaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate. lyablope pañcamī.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12287: 112}tad ayam anvayo bhavati -- yady apy āptavādāvisaṃvādaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhedān na sambandho 'vagantuṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12292: śabdās tv apūrvādayas sambandhajñānānapekṣā eva svārthaṃ pratipādayantīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12293: ato bhidyate ity ata āha -- na ceti. gavādayas tāvat viditasambandhā evārthaṃ pratipādayantīti teṣāṃ durvāram anumānatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12294: yadi tv apūrvādidṛṣṭāntena teṣām api bhedo 'bhidhīyate. tan na. śaknoti hi vaktum
GSP28mimsvtku:12295: itaro 'pi teṣām anumānatvaṃ sambandhādhīnabodhakatvād dhūmādivad iti. api cāpūrvaśabdā
GSP28mimsvtku:12298: kim ato yady evam ata āha -- na ceti. yataḥ khalv etāni padāni,
GSP28mimsvtku:12299: na ca padam ajñātasambandhaṃ prakāśakam asti. ato 'mībhir api viditasambandhair evārtho vedanīyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12300: padatvāt. kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇāntarādṛṣṭapūrveṇāpūrvasvargādinā sambandho 'nubhavituṃ śakyate. na śakyetāpi,
GSP28mimsvtku:12302: svargaś ca niratiśayānandasvabhāvo vaidikavākyaśeṣebhyo 'vagamyata iti tathāvagatayos
GSP28mimsvtku:12303: sambandhagrahaṇopapattir iti. ato yat parair uktaṃ śabdo nānumānaṃ sambandhānapekṣatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:12304: akṣavad iti taddhetor asiddhyā dūṣitam ity āha -- sambandheti // 25 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12305: bhedakāraṇāntaram upanyasya dūṣayati -- tulyeti. śabdaḥ pratyāsattyā tajjñānam arthaś
GSP28mimsvtku:12306: ca taddhīś ceti vigrahaḥ. ayam apy avītahetur darśayitavyaḥ. tannirākaraṇaṃ cādhyāsanirākaṇoktam
GSP28mimsvtku:12308: {3,113} api ca vivakṣānivṛtter anaikāntiko hetur ity āha -- pratibimbeṣv iti. ekānto nirṇayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12311: ata āha -- bimbam iti. yādṛśaṃ hi darpaṇe bimbam upalabhyate tādṛśam eva mukhādi budhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12312: ato 'sty atrāpi gamyagamakayos sādṛśyam iti pratibimbeṣu vartamāno hetur anaikāntiko bhavatīti. nanu nedam anumānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12313: ādarśatejasā hi pratihatena nāyanena tejasā prakāśitaṃ pratyakṣam eva mukham avagamyata
GSP28mimsvtku:12314: iti śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyate. ata āha -- na ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadā hy ayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12315: pratyakṣeṣv aṅgulyādiṣv ādarśavartinā pratibimbena tādṛktve viditavyāptir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12316: tadā mukham apy ādarśagataṃ bimbānurūpam anuminoti. itarathā tv aṅgulisannikarṣo 'py anyarūpam anyādṛktayā bodhayatīti sambhāvayet. ato na tādṛktvaṃ niścinuyād iti // 27 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12320: yatra gamyagamakayos sādṛśyam avagamyata ity āha -- pratyakṣateti. gatānām ity anumānaviṣayasiddhyartham apratyakṣatāṃ darśāyatīti // 28 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12321: yad apīdam uktam -- śābde hi sakṛduktam eva vākyaṃ sahasā nānārthān pratibhāsayati viruddhānaviruddhāṃś ca,
GSP28mimsvtku:12324: naivam anumāne. dhūmo hi yenaiva viditavyāptis tatraikatraive dhiyam ādadhāti. ataś śabdānumānayor bhedaḥ. prayogaś ca bhavati -- śabdo 'numānād
GSP28mimsvtku:12325: ekadā nānārthapratibhāsād akṣavad iti. avītahetur vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12329: ato bhidyata iti. tadupanyasya dūṣayati -- ekavākyād iti. anenāpi prakāreṇa na bhinnatety artha iti // 29 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12331: ata āha -- liṅgasyāpīti. anaikāntiko hetur iti bhāvaḥ. hetur hi dhūmo 'gnitvam uṣṇatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12332: dāhakatvam indhanavikāratvaṃ ca ekadaiva pratipādayati. tathā viruddhaḥ -- nityaś
GSP28mimsvtku:12335: vyāptibalena cānityatvam ato 'naikāntiko hetur iti. nanu na viruddho 'nekam arthaṃ pratipādayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12336: vyāptibalena hi liṅgaṃ pratipādakaṃ bhavati. ataḥ kṛtakatvam anityatvena vyāptam iti tad eva gamayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12337: viruddhārthavyāptis tv ekasya virodhād eva na sambhavatīti. tat tāvad āśaṅkate -- virodhād iti. uttaram āha -- syād iti. vivakṣitārthapratipādane hi śabdasya śaktir avagatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12339: arthāntare tv asāv api virodhād anāgamaka eveti // 30 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12340: bhūyasāṃ caikārthānāṃ vākyānāṃ nānena hetunā bhedas sidhyatīty āha -- yatra ceti. na kevalaṃ viruddham anekaṃ śabdo na pratipādayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12341: kin tu aviruddham api. uktam idaṃ - vivakṣite śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti. sakṛduccaritāc
GSP28mimsvtku:12342: ca vākyād ekaiva vaktṛgāminī vivakṣonnīyata iti. tadanusāreṇārtho 'py eka eva buddho
GSP28mimsvtku:12343: bhavati. ato na kvacid anekārthapratipādanam ity asiddho hetur ity āha -- sakṛd iti // 31 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12346: etāvatā ca siddham anumānād vaidharmyata āha -- yas tv iti. yathā hi{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12348: tathā liṅge 'pi dhūmādāv asphuṭavidite 'nekārthapratibhānaṃ dṛṣṭam eva. bhavati hi
GSP28mimsvtku:12349: dūrād dhūmo 'yam āhosvid dhūlisantāna iti saṃśayānasyāgnivātāvartayor anavasthito
GSP28mimsvtku:12351: tathā śabde dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānam api dhūmādau vyabhicārān na bhedahetur ity āha -- dṛṣṭānteti. kathaṃ vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12354: śabde tu tad api nāstīty ata āha -- anabhyasta iti. apekṣām eva darśayati -- atreti. yatra hy aprasiddhapadārthagocaras saṃśayo bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12355: tatra yāvad ayaṃ śabdo 'muṣminn arthe vṛddhair ācarita iti cireṇa praṇidhāya na budhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12356: na tāvat tam arthaṃ niścinuyād iti. tad evaṃ tāvad bhedavādibhir na bhedahetavas samyaguktā iti darśitam // 34 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12357: bauddhoktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tair na kṛta ity āha -- paroktā iti. tān evābhedahetūn
GSP28mimsvtku:12358: upanyasyati -- śabdānumānayor iti sārdhadvayena. asyārthaḥ -- yathā dhūmād agnyanumānam anvayavyatirekajam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12361: evaṃ śabdād api jñānaṃ jāyamānam evaṃ jāyate. pratyakṣāc ca tadanyat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12364: traikālyāśrayaṃ ca. ato na bhidyate. idaṃ ca sādhanavākyasyārthakathanam. sādhanaprayogās
GSP28mimsvtku:12365: tv evaṃ darśayitavyāḥ -- śābdaṃ jñānam anumānam anvayavyatirekajatvāt agnyanumānavad
GSP28mimsvtku:12368: ca) hetuḥ. tāv eva sādhyadṛṣṭāntau. na ca vācyam anvayavyatirekajatvāt sambandhapūrvakatvaṃ na bhidyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12369: anvayavyatirekātmakatvād anumānasambandhasyeti. pūrvaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣajatvaṃ hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:12370: uktaḥ idānīṃ tv avivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ sambandhasāmānyapūrvakatvam iti. evam uttareṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:12371: api triṣu pūrvavatsādhyadṛṣṭāntayojanā kāryā. caturthe tv agnyanumānaṃ pradarśanamātram.
GSP28mimsvtku:12374: mīmāṃsakaikadeśināṃ bhedahetum idānīṃ dūṣayitum upanyasyati -- kaiścid iti. viṣayāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:12375: eva darśayati -- pūrvābhyām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadyadaparicchinne pravartate tat tato bhidyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12376: anumānam iva pratyakṣāt. śāstraṃ ca pūrvadvayāparicchinne 'rthe pravartate. tatas tābhyāṃ bhidyate. kiṃ punaḥ pratyakṣād bhedapratipādanena
GSP28mimsvtku:12378: yan nirākriyate. ucyate. asty eva keṣāñcid vibhramaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12379: śrotravyāpārāśrayāj jāyamānam idaṃ śābdaṃ śrotrapratyakṣam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:12380: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt. ata eva badhirasya na bhavatīti. tad anena pratyakṣato
GSP28mimsvtku:12381: bhedapratipādanena nirākriyate. evaṃ hi manyate -- vidyamānopalambhanaṃ pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:12382: iti darśitam. idaṃ tu śābdaṃ trikālārthaviṣayam ataḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣo 'ntarbhaviṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:12383: badhiras tu śabdāśravaṇād arthaṃ na jānāti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12384: nārthāśravaṇāt. prayogaś ca bhavati -- śābdaṃ pratyakṣād bhinnaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12386: {3,117} tad imaṃ pratyakṣato bhedam abhyupetyānumānād bhedakāraṇaṃ nirākaroti -- tatrāpīti. evaṃ hi manyate -- yady anumānāparicchinnaviṣayatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:12389: vedavākyāny eva tu mānāntarāviṣayārthāni bhidyante ity avyāpako hetur iti. kiṃ punar idam aniṣṭam āpāditam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12392: aprāpte śāstram arthavad iti vakṣyati. imāni punaḥ pramāṇāntaraprāptaviṣayapratipādakānīty
GSP28mimsvtku:12393: anuvādavākyāny eva. ata eva śāstram eva vedavākyaṃ bhinnatayā pakṣīkṛtaṃ śāstram
GSP28mimsvtku:12394: arthe pravartata iti. tadbhedasyaivopayogād iti bhāvaḥ. tad etad āha -- tatheti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12395: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- pratyaya iti. evam ayaṃ puṃvacanāprāmāṇyavādī vaktavyaḥ. kim
GSP28mimsvtku:12398: sarvalokavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt. satas tu nānimittotpattis sambhavatīti vimittaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12399: vācyam. na ca śabdād anyannimittam asyopapadyata iti jātam asandigdham avādhitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12400: ca jñānāntareṇa pramāṇam eva puṃvacanajanitaṃ jñānam iti nāsyānāgamatvābhyupagamo
GSP28mimsvtku:12401: yukta iti. itaras tv anumānāntarbhāvābhiprāyeṇāha -- vaktṛbuddher iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12403: tannaitāni śrutamātrāṇy evārthaṃ niścāyayanti. na cāniścito 'rtho jñāto bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12404: niścayasyaiva jñānatvāt. ataḥ prāṅniścayotpatter jñānābhāva eveti kiṃ nimittaprayatnena. yadā tu vaktaivam avadhāritavyāptir bhavati -- na cāyam anavagataṃ bravītīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12405: tadā tadvākyād eva jñānakāryāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ jñānam anumāya jñānasyārthāvyabhicāreṇārtho
GSP28mimsvtku:12406: niścīyate. tasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ jñānaliṅgāvagatatvād arthasya vākyam anuvādakam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:12407: ato nāgama iti. siddhāntavādī tv āha -- kuto nvasāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- avagatā
GSP28mimsvtku:12408: hi buddhir arthaṃ niścāyayati. na cāsyāḥ kiñcid avagame kāraṇam astīti vakṣyāma iti // 39 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12409: {3,118} ataḥ svayam evānavagatā nārthasya liṅgam ity āha -- neti. nanūktaṃ kāryāt śabdād anumāsyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12410: ata āha -- na śabda iti. yathā nobhayam ubhayatra liṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12411: tathā darśayati -- viśeṣa iti. anumānaṃ hi vyāptibalena bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12412: iha ca vākyasāmānyaṃ jñānasāmānyena vyāptam avagatam iti tatas tat sidhyed,
GSP28mimsvtku:12416: nanu yatrāpto vākyaṃ prayuṅkte tad eva jñātvā prayuṅkta iti vijñānaviśeṣeṇaiva sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:12418: avagatas tarhi prāg eva vākyād arthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12419: na hy anyathā yatra prayuṅkta iti śakyate vaktum. api cāvidite prathamam arthe kathaṃ jñānam anumātavyam. kim ajñāsīd ayaṃ vaktā kiñcid iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12421: nāpratipannam idamā śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum. na cārthoparāgam antareṇa jñānasya viśeṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:12422: sambhavati yo 'numīyate. na cākarmakaṃ jñānamātram anumīyate. na ca tato 'rthaviśeṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:12424: saṃśayātmano vijñānavidhāyā darśitatvāt. na caivaṃ puṃvākyebhyas sandehaḥ. yā tu
