GSP28mimsvtku:12425: kvacid vyabhicārād aprāmāṇyāśaṅkā sā āptatvādinā nirākriyata ity uktam. yadi tv evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12427: ya evam avadhārito bhavati -- nāyam ananvitārthāni padāni prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:12429: tan nūnam amīṣām anenānvayo jñāta iti. kim idānīṃ viditapadapadārthasaṅgatiḥ śrotā
GSP28mimsvtku:12430: puṃvākyād arthaṃ na budhyata eva. yady evam anuttarā guravaḥ. jātā tu buddhir asandigdhāviparyastā
GSP28mimsvtku:12431: ca na vedavākyajanitāyā dhiyo viśiṣyeta. śaṅkāmātraṃ tu kathañcid vede 'pi vākyatvādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:12432: bhavatīti na tāvatā tadaprāmāṇyam. tābhyām iti. buddhiśabdābhyām ity arthaḥ // 40 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12434: 119}cārthānumānānupapatteś śrotur aprāptapūrvam arthaṃ prāpayantī puruṣoktir vedavadāgama evety āha -- teneti // 41 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12435: yad api cedam ucyate. vedas tāvad bhinnaviṣayatayā pramāṇāntaram eveti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12436: tad api manorathamātram evety āha -- na cāpīti. na śakyate vaktum ity abhiprāyaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12437: kim iti na śakyate. ata āha -- liṅgam iti. yadā pūrvoktair hetubhir aviśeṣeṇa sarvam
GSP28mimsvtku:12438: eva śābdam anumānād abhinnam ity uktaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12440: nanv arthātmanā tāvalliṅgenānanumitapūrvam arthaṃ vedo bodhayatīti pramāṇāntaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12441: bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na ceti. dhūmavattvakṛtakatvādīnāṃ hi saty apy avāntarabhede
GSP28mimsvtku:12442: yathaiva trailakṣaṇyāparityāgenānumānatvam evam ihāpi syāt. yadi tu tad eva nāstīty ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12446: tad darśayati -- evaṃ sthita iti. ayaṃ hi teṣām abhiprāyaḥ -- codanāprāmāṇyaṃ hi pratijñātaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12447: tac cānumānatve 'pi vedavacasas sidhyaty eva. yathaiva hi śabdamadhyād vedaḥ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12448: evam anumānebhyo vedonumānam iti kim atiprayatnato bhedapratipādaneneti. nanu bhaviṣyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:12449: dharmo nānumīyate ity uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa. ato 'numānatvābhyupagame tadvirodho bhaved
GSP28mimsvtku:12450: ata āha -- bhaviṣyatīti. artharūpaliṅgābhiprāyeṇa tannirākṛtam ity arthaḥ // 44 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12451: {3,120} etad api dūṣayati -- saṃjñeti. yadi paścānmānasāmānyād anumānatvaṃ tad astu,
GSP28mimsvtku:12452: na ca tadabhyupagame doṣa ity arthaḥ. lakṣaṇaikatvena tv abheda iṣṭe 'numānalakṣaṇābhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12453: pramāṇāntarānabhyupagamāc cāprāmāṇyam eva vedavacasām āpadyata ity āha -- lakṣaṇeneti // 46 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12454: nanūktaṃ lakṣaṇaikatvam āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyād ity atrāha -- āptavādeti. puṃvākyānām anena prakāreṇānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati na vedavacasām iti bhāvaḥ // 47 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12455: kim iti na siddhyati. ata āha -- vede tv iti. āptanarābhāvāt tāvannāptavādatvenāvisaṃvādād
GSP28mimsvtku:12456: anumānam. na cātīndriyair arthair vedānāṃ sambandhānubhavas sidhyatīty apramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:12457: eva bhaveyuḥ. nāptasandṛbdhā vedā iti vedādhikaraṇe vakṣyatīti // 48 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12458: nanu pramāṇāntarasaṅgatārthāni vedaikadeśabhūtāni kṣepiṣṭhādivākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇy
GSP28mimsvtku:12459: apy agnihotrādivākyāni vedatvāt satyārthāny anumāsyante. ato 'sti lakṣaṇenānumānatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:12461: {3,121} etad api dūṣayati -- nādityeti. ādityayūpavākye vartamāno vedatvahetur anaikāntika iti. nanu nedaṃ vākyam asatyārtham,
GSP28mimsvtku:12462: ādityaśabdo hi sārūpyād gauṇo yūpe vartata iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12463: ata āha -- tadvad iti. karmaphalasambandhavākyāny api tadvad eva gauṇāni bhaveyur
GSP28mimsvtku:12464: iti. api ca prāk svamahimnā vedaprāmāṇyabalenāprāmāṇyānumānāni pratyuktāni. anumānatvābhyupagame
GSP28mimsvtku:12465: tulyabalatayā tāny api durvāraprasaraṇānīty āha -- nāta iti // 50 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12466: ato lakṣaṇabhedenaiva śabdasya pramāṇāntaratve iṣyamāṇe vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavanti. lokavedayoś ca samam eva pramāṇatā siddhety āha -- tasmād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12467: lakṣaṇam api yathā parair āśritam -- āptopadeśaś śabda iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12468: tathāpy āptābhāvān na prāmāṇyaṃ vedasyeti tannāśrayaṇīyam ity āha -- teneti vedāntena. loke 'pi nāptatvaṃ prāmāṇye kāraṇam ity āha -- loka iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12469: kāraṇam āha -- purastād iti. āptatvena hy apavādāśaṅkānirākaraṇamātram. prāmāṇyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12470: tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ sahajam eveti svataḥprāmāṇyavāde varṇitam iti. kiṃ tarhy āgamalakṣaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:12471: ata āha -- tasmād iti. nirdoṣaśabdajanitaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇam iti // 53 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12472: {3,122} ekañjātīyakasya śabdasya cānumānena prāmāṇyam eva samaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12474: svamatenedānīṃ padasyānumānād bhedaṃ vadiṣyaṃs tatpratipādane kāraṇam āha -- pada iti. yady api padasya padārthe pramāṇatvān na tadbhedapratipādanam
GSP28mimsvtku:12475: tathāpi paraiḥ padāny udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛta iti tadbhedam eva pratipādayāmaḥ. atreti. pada ity arthaḥ // 54 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12476: tad idānīṃ bhedakāraṇam āha -- viṣaya iti. viṣayabhedam eva darśayati -- sāmānyeti. ākṛtyadhikaraṇe hi padasya sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ sthāpayiṣyata iti // 55 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12477: anumānaṃ tu dharmaviśiṣṭadharmiviṣayam ity anumānaparicchede sādhitam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:12478: dharmīti. liṅgam asyāstīti liṅgī. tasya viśiṣṭasya prasādhakaṃ liṅgam astīti. nanv
GSP28mimsvtku:12479: anumāne vyāptibalena dharmasāmānyam anumīyata ity ata āha -- na tāvad iti. yāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:12480: tadanumānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ na bhavati tāvadanumānam eva na bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12484: nanu padam api viśiṣṭagocaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā -- ko rājā yātīti pṛṣṭe paraḥ pratibravīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12485: pāñcālarāja iti. tadā kevalād eva pāñcālarājapadāt kriyāviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣo 'vagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12486: ata āha -- sāmānyād iti. yad eva{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12487: 123}kiñcit śābde sāmānyād atiriktam avagamyate sa vākyasyaiva viṣayaḥ. vākyam eva hi tadanuṣaktayātipadaṃ pāñcālarājo yātīti. nanv astu śrutasyānuṣaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12488: aśrute 'pi padāntare padād ekasmād viśiṣṭabodho dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12489: yathā -- dvāram ity ukte vivriyatām iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12490: atra katham ata āha -- sāmarthyād iti. kārakaṃ hi kriyayā viditavyāptikam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12491: vyāptisāmarthyād eva kriyāpadam anumāpayati. anumitakriyāpadād vākyād eva tatrāpi viśiṣṭārthapratyaya iti // 57 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12492: atra codayati -- saṅkhyeti. pariharati -- na tāvad iti. yatra hi saṅkhyādayo 'vagamyante
GSP28mimsvtku:12493: tatra katham ata āha -- yatrāpīti. sambhavavyabhicārābhyāṃ hi viśeṣaṇam arthavad
GSP28mimsvtku:12494: bhavati. ākṛtis tu na tāvad ekatvaṃ vyabhicarati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12495: dvitvādayas tv ekatvān na sambhavantīti tadākṣiptāyā vyakter eva viśeṣaṇaṃ saṅkhyādaya iti // 58 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12496: tad evaṃ tāvad anurañjanena vyakter viśeṣaṇam ity uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12497: tādarthyena tu kriyāṃ bhāvanāṃ saṅkhyādayo viśiṃṣanti. tatra hi śrutyādibhir viniyujyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:12498: yathā paśor ekatve 'ruṇādiṣu ca vakṣyata ity āha -- padāntareti. padāntaratvenātyantaviprakṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12500: yat tarhi vākyārthavṛttiviśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ gomadādipadaṃ tadanumānaṃ bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- vākyārtha iti. yady api tāvad idaṃ viśiṣṭārthagocaram,
GSP28mimsvtku:12501: tathāpi nānumānatvam. siddho hi dharmī kenacid dharmeṇāsiddhena viśiṣṭas sādhyamānaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12502: pakṣo bhavati. iha tu padoccāraṇāt prāṅ na kiñcit pratipannam. uccaritre tu pade
GSP28mimsvtku:12503: viśiṣṭaḥ pratipanna eveti kiṃ sādhyam iti. siddhatvam eva{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12504: 124}darśayati -- tāvān iti. na tāvadagṛhītasambandhaś śabdād viśiṣṭaṃ pratyeti. gṛhītasambandhas
GSP28mimsvtku:12505: tu pratipadyamāno vyutpattikālāvagatān na kiñcid adhikaṃ pratyetīti katham anumānaṃ bhavatīti // 60 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12506: api cātra bhinnayor eva prakṛtipratyayātmanoḥ padabhāgayor bhinnāv evārthau pratipannau
GSP28mimsvtku:12507: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvam anubhavata iti siddhaṃ vaiṣamyam ity āha -- bhedabuddher iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12510: pākaḥ pratyayena ca kartṛmātram upāttam. ārthas tu viśiṣṭapratyayaḥ. gomadādau tu tadasyāstīti viśiṣṭa evārthe taddhitaḥ smaryata iti kuto vaiṣamyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12511: uktam atra tāvān eva hīti vyutpattikālāvagatād anadhikaviṣayatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12513: e)voktam iti. kiñcānumāne svatantragṛhīta eva parvatādir viśeṣyaḥ svatantrasmṛtenāgnyādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:12514: viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭo 'vagamyate. śabdenobhayoḥ svatantragrahaṇam astīty āha -- viśeṣaṇeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12518: atra codayati -- atheti. atrāpi śabdasyaiva prathamāvagatasyārthaviśiṣṭatvena sādhyatvān na kramavyatikramo bhaviṣyatīti // 62 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12519: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- pratijñārtheti. pratijñārthaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12521: viśiṣṭāpekṣayā dharmyekadeśa ucyate. sa eva hetuḥ prasajyate. śabdo hi dharmitayopāttaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12522: sa eva hetur iti. nanu yadā dūrād dhūmasyādhāraviśeṣo na lakṣyate tadā dhūmo 'gnimattayā sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12523: hetuś ca bhavati. tadvad ihāpi bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- pakṣa iti. dhūmaviśeṣo hi samprati{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12524: 125}dṛśyamānaḥ pakṣaḥ pūrvāvagatas sapakṣaḥ tadanugataṃ ca sāmānyaṃ hetur iti pakṣasapakṣahetuvibhāgopapattir iti // 63 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12525: nanv ihāpi śabdaviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya śabdatvaṃ hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12526: ata āha -- śabdatvam iti. arthaviśeṣo hy anumitsitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12527: na cāsya śabdatvaṃ gamakam anaikāntikatvād iti. nanv avāntarasāmānyaṃ tarhi gośabdatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12528: hetur bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- gośabdatvam iti. ato 'traikaiva vyaktir arthena viśeṣyā
GSP28mimsvtku:12529: hetutayā cābhidhātavyeti duṣpariharaṃ pratijñārthaikadeśatvam ity abhiprāyeṇāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:12531: nanu vyañjakabhedabhinnaikaiva vyaktiḥ pakṣīkariṣyate ity āha -- bhaved iti. pariharati -- na tv iti. naupādhiko bhedo vastu bhinatti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12532: tatpratyayānapāyād iti bhāvaḥ. api ca viśiṣṭatā sambandhe sati bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12533: tad iha kīdṛśo 'rthaśabdayos sambandha ity āha -- kathaṃ veti. na tāvat śabdadeśe 'rtho dṛśyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12536: kalau kṛtayugārthasyābhāvād ity āha -- na tāvad iti // 65 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12538: asti hi sā śabdakāla iti tad etad āśaṅkate tatpratītir iti. etad api dūṣayati --
GSP28mimsvtku:12539: param iti. pratītyā viśiṣṭe 'numīyamāne sā tāvat pūrvasiddhā grahītavyā. sā cet jñātā
GSP28mimsvtku:12540: kim aparam anumīyata iti. nanu sampratyupalabhyamānaṃ drutādiviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:12544: na pratijñārthaikadeśatā bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- na pratyāyaneti ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:12545: na drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ deśādinibandhano 'rthena sambandho vidyate. pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatā
GSP28mimsvtku:12547: kim iti na sambhavaty ata āha -- viśeṣāṇām iti. yathā pakṣīkṛtasya mahato dhūmasyaikadeśe
GSP28mimsvtku:12548: 'dhastādagnir astīti tadviśiṣṭo dhūmas sādhyo bhavati. naivaṃ drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyāyanaśaktiyogaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12549: teṣāṃ vyabhicāreṇāpratyāyakatvād iti. yat tu teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ gośabdas sa pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12550: tatra ca pakṣe sa eva pakṣo hetuś cety uktam evety āha sāmānyasyeti // 67 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12551: ato 'rthaviśiṣṭaś śabdo nānumeya ity upasaṃharann āha -- tasmād iti // 67 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12552: evaṃ tāvat śabdo na pakṣa ity uktam. yadi tv arthaṃ pakṣīkṛtya śabdo hetur ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12553: tad apy ayuktam. apakṣadharmatvād ity āha -- kathaṃ ceti. kathaṃ ca nirūpyata iti bhāvaḥ // 68 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12554: kim iti na nirūpyate 'ta āha -- na kriyeti. kasyāñcit kriyāyāṃ kartṛtayā sambaddhaṃ kiñcit kasyacit sambandhī bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12555: kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt śeṣasambandhānāṃ svasvāmyādīnām iti. tatra svasvāmisambandhas
GSP28mimsvtku:12556: tāvat kriyākārakasambandhapūrvaka ity āha -- rājeti. prathamaṃ hi bharaṇakriyāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12557: kartṛkarmabhāvam āpannau rājapuruṣau svasvāmisambandham anubhavata iti // 69 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12558: {3,127} evam avayavāvayavisambandho 'pi kriyāgarbha ity āha -- vṛkṣa iti. vṛkṣo 'vayavī
GSP28mimsvtku:12559: hy avayaveṣu tiṣṭhatīti pratītiḥ. kadācit tv avayavā eva śākhādayas tasminn iti pritītiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12560: tad evaṃ sthitikriyākartṛbhāvanibandhano 'vayavāvayavisambandha iti. evaṃ saṃyogo
GSP28mimsvtku:12561: 'pi kriyāgarbha evety āha -- deśa iti. agnimaddeśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmo 'gnimato
GSP28mimsvtku:12563: evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādayo 'pi sambandhāḥ kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakā ity āha -- kāryeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12564: kiṇvaṃ hi surāyā bījaṃ surātmake pariṇāme kartṛbhavatsurāyāḥ kāraṇam ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12565: tathā samūhasamūhisambandho 'pi. senākāryaṃ pratipakṣajayam aṃśena kurvan hastī senāyās
GSP28mimsvtku:12566: sambandhitayocyata iti. śabdārthayos tu na kaścid evam ākāras sambandhasyāvagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12567: na cānirūpitākāras sambandho 'stīti śakyate vaktum ity āha -- na ceti // [71] //
GSP28mimsvtku:12568: na ca sambandham antareṇa pakṣasya dharma iti vigrahagatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣadharma iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12569: ca tatpuruṣasamāso vā ghaṭata ity āha -- na cāstīti. vṛttivigrahāv api nopapannāv
GSP28mimsvtku:12571: anye tu śabdo 'rthaviṣaya ity evaṃ taddharmatām āhuḥ. yathānupalabdhir abhāve prameya iti vakṣyate. tad etad upanyasyati -- nivṛtta iti // 73
GSP28mimsvtku:12572: {3,128} etad api nopapannam ity āha -- tair apīti. na kenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvo ghaṭata ity arthaḥ. yathā na ghaṭate tad etad āha -- na tad iti // 74 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12574: evaṃ ca tadviṣayabuddhijanakatvasya vācyavācakabhāvam antareṇānupapattes tadabhyupagamaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12575: kāryaḥ. tatsiddhau ca na pratītyaṅgaṃ pakṣadharmatā. na cāpakṣadharmajanitā pratītir
GSP28mimsvtku:12576: anumānam ity āha -- tasmād iti dvayena // 75 -- 76 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12577: yadi tu pakṣadharmataiva tadviṣayabuddhijanane hetur iṣyate. tatas tadvyatirekeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:12578: pakṣadharmatāyā evānupapatter itaretarāśrayatvam ato neyam api kalpanā ghaṭata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:12580: itaś ca na pakṣadharmatety āha -- na ceti. anavagatavācyavācakasambandhāḥ svarūpātirekeṇa na śabdaṃ kasyacid dharmatayā jānanti. yena pakṣadharmabuddhiś śabde bhaved iti // 78 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12581: {3,129} svarūpamātravijñānaṃ tu na dhūmādau pakṣadharmatāyāṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12582: api tu dharmisambandhaḥ. na cāsāv astīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- na ceti. nanv atrāpy arthena dharmiṇā prathamaṃ vyutpattikāle sambandho 'vagata eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:12585: na cātra tathety āha -- dhūmavān iti matirantena. yata eva tannirapekṣo 'yaṃ pakṣadharmasambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12587: anyathā tadabheda eva syād ity āha -- teneti. trīṇi hetor lakṣaṇāni pakṣadharmatā
GSP28mimsvtku:12588: sapakṣe sattā vipakṣād vyāvṛttiḥ. tatra ca pakṣadharmatāyā uttaraṃ sapakṣasambandham
GSP28mimsvtku:12590: śabde tv evaṃ nāstīty āha -- na tv atreti. pūrvasambandhāpekṣayā ceyam avagamyamānārthapratītyuttarakālam avagamyate. ato na tadaṅgam ity āha -- na ceti // [81] //
GSP28mimsvtku:12591: itaś ca na pakṣadharmatety āha -- na ca dharmīti. arthād anyas tāvad dharmī na pramīyata iti bhāvaḥ // 82 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12592: yas tv asāv artho dharmitayā kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12595: parastād api sa tāvān eva pramātavyaḥ. tad yadi pakṣadharmatvam avagantum asau prathamam evāvagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12596: tato gṛhīte tasmin kiṃ parabhāvinā pakṣadharmādijñānena ato nānumānatety āha -- yaś ceti dvayena // 83 -- 84 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12597: anvayam idānīṃ dūṣayati -- anvaya iti. kathaṃ na nirūpyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12599: etad eva darśayati -- yatreti. iha tv evaṃ nāstīty āha -- na tv iti // 86 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12600: kathaṃ nety ata āha -- na tāvad iti. idaṃ ca pūrvam evoktam iti. nanu vaibhavāc chabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:12601: nityatvāc cārthasya śabdārthayoś śakyate 'nvayo darśayitum ity āha -- bhaved iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12603: kim ato yady evam ata āha -- teneti // 88 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12605: {3,131} etad api dūṣayati -- naivam iti. kāraṇam āha -- dṛṣṭo hīti (asmā)
GSP28mimsvtku:12608: nanu dvitīyādiprayoge śabdārthapratyayayor anvayo grahīṣyata ity āśaṅkate -- dvitīyādīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12609: etad api dūṣayati -- śatakṛtva iti. śatakṛtvaḥ prayoge 'py ajijñāsur na sambandhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12611: nanu jñātasambandhasya tāvan na śabdajñānam arthajñānaṃ vyabhicarati. tasyaiva cānumānatvam iṣyata ity āha -- nanv iti. pariharati -- yady evam iti. yadi jñātasambandhasyānvayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12612: anya eva tarhi sambandhaś śabdārthayor abhyupagamyata iti // 92 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12613: tataḥ kim ata āha -- nāṅgam iti. yadi nāṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12614: kiṃ jātam ata āha -- anvayeti. asaty anvaye jñānaṃ nānumānam iti bhāvaḥ // 93 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12615: anvayas tu pūrvāvagatapratītisāmarthyānusāreṇaiva jāyamāno nārthapratītau kāraṇam ity āha -- jñāta iti // 94 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12616: {3,132} upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. anumāne tu nānvayāt pūrvaṃ gamakatvasiddhir ity āha -- na ceti // 95 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12617: vyatirekam idānīṃ dūṣayati -- vyatireka iti. na hy anavagate 'rthe tajjñānena vinā
GSP28mimsvtku:12618: śabdajñānaṃ bhavatīti vyatirekaś śakyate 'vagantum. avagataś ced arthaḥ kiṃ vyatirekāśrayaṇeneti // 96 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12619: kim idānīm anupayogināv anvayavyatirekau śabde nety āha -- sambandham iti. śaktini(ṣkarṣe ta)
GSP28mimsvtku:12620: yor vyāpāro vācyavācakarūpaś śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti // 97 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12621: evaṃ ca trailakṣaṇyaparityāgenānanumānatvaṃ prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati -- tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:12622: iti. śabdo nānumānaṃ trairūpyarahitatvāt pratyakṣavat. tādṛgviṣayavarjanāt. tadvad
GSP28mimsvtku:12623: eva tādṛk. viṣayavarjanaṃ ca sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ hītyādinā varṇitam eveti // 98 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12624: idaṃ ca padasyānumānād bhedapratipādanaṃ prauḍhipradarśanārtham asmābhiḥ kṛtam. na tu padaṃ pramāṇam ity āha -- satīti // 99 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12625: {3,133} yathā na pramāṇaṃ tathā darśayati -- padam iti. tān eva caturaḥ prakārānāha -- pratyakṣa iti // 100 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12626: eṣv artheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyaṃ tathāha -- tatreti // 101 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12627: adṛṣṭapūrve tu samprati pratyakṣe 'nutpattilakṣaṇam evāprāmāṇyam ity āha -- adṛṣṭapūrva
GSP28mimsvtku:12628: iti. sambandhajñānam eva vā tadā jāyata ity āha -- sambandheti. na ca sambandha eva
GSP28mimsvtku:12630: tasyārthāpattiprameyatvād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- sambandha iti. tadarthas tu pratyakṣād avagata ity āha -- yo 'rtha iti // 102 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12631: ananubhūtapūrve parokṣe ca jñānānutpattir evety āha -- parokṣa iti. anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtir ity āha -- parokṣa iti // 103 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12632: nanu smṛtim eva janayat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- pramita iti. pramitaviṣayā hi smṛtiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12633: sannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ ca pramāṇam iti sthitir iti. kathaṃ punaḥ pramitaviṣayaṃ na pramāṇam ata āha -- paricchedeti. paricchedaphalaṃ hi pramāṇam. na ca smṛtyā kiñcit paricchidyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12635: {3,134} atra codayati -- tādātviketi. yady api pūrvam asāv artho 'vagataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12636: tathāpi tadānīṃ sattāṃ bodhayantī pratyabhijñānavat smṛtiḥ pramāṇaṃ kim iti na bhavatīti // 105 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12637: pariharati -- yāvān iti. utpadyate smṛtir anyadā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12638: na tu pratyabhijñānavat tadanīṃ vastunas sattāṃ niścāyayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12641: idaṃ tu pratyutpannakāraṇakaṃ padāt padārthajñānaṃ grahaṇam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:12642: kathaṃ smṛtir ucyate. ata āha -- padam iti. mā bhūt smaraṇaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12644: ato na padaṃ smārakebhyas sadṛśādṛṣṭādibhyo viśiṣyata ity apramāṇam iti. nanu kriyākārakayor
GSP28mimsvtku:12645: anyataroccāraṇe 'vaśyam anyatarasyānyataravyatiṣaṅgo buddhau bhavati. ataḥ katham
GSP28mimsvtku:12646: ucyate nādhikyam avagamyata ity ata āha -- yadādhikyam iti. padāntarasyaivāsau prasādo
GSP28mimsvtku:12648: idaṃ cāsmābhis sauhṛdamātreṇa śiṣyebhyaḥ kathyate na padaṃ pramāṇam iti. na tu tatpramāṇatve
GSP28mimsvtku:12649: vākyārtho nāgamārtho bhavati. tena hi pramāṇenāpi bhavatāvaśyaṃ padārthe bhavitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12650: ataḥ pramāṇāntarānadhigatam arthaṃ gamayadvākyaṃ pramāṇam eva. evam anumānāntargatatve
GSP28mimsvtku:12654: tad apy ālocitānugamanam anumānam evāta āha -- vākyārtha iti. agṛhītasambandhā eva
GSP28mimsvtku:12655: padārthāḥ vākyārthaṃ gamayanti. ato na vākyārthajñānam anumānam. evañ ca darśayitavyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12656: vākyārthabuddhir anumānād bhinnā sambandhānubhavādṛte jāyamānatvād akṣabuddhivad iti // 109 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12658: evaṃ hy atiprasaṅgaḥ. ato 'siddho hetur ata āha -- vākyeti. ye ca paraiḥ padārthabuddher anumānād abhedahetava uktāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12659: te tāvad bahavo vākyārthabuddhāvasiddhā ity āha -- sarveṣām iti. vākyārthabuddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:12660: hi na tāvad anvayavyatirekajā. nāpi sambandhapūrvikā. naiva pratyakṣadarśanaprabhavā.
GSP28mimsvtku:12661: padād avagatānāṃ padārthānāṃ tatkāraṇatvāt. sāmānyaviṣayatvam apy asiddhaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:12663: tadadṛṣṭārthabodhanaṃ cānumānābhāsair apy anaikāntikam. evaṃ trikālaviṣayam apy anumānābhāsenaiva.
GSP28mimsvtku:12664: evam eva padārthabuddhāv api darśayitavyam. anvayavyatirekajatvaṃ tu tatrāpy asiddham
GSP28mimsvtku:12665: eva. uktaṃ hi śabdaśaktinirdhāraṇe tayor vyāpāro na buddhijanmanīti. sambandhapūrvakatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12669: vyāptir hi tadaṅgam. na ca padāt padārthajñāne vyāptiḥ kāraṇam. sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ cābhāsenaivānaikāntikam eva pratyakṣadarśana(prabhavatva)
GSP28mimsvtku:12671: yata evaivaṃ vākyārthabuddhis sahārthair adṛṣṭeṣv api vākyeṣu padārthamātravido jāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12672: ato 'syāḥ sphuṭataram anumānād bhedaṃ paśyantas saugatās tato 'vatīryāgamasyānumānavyatirekāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12673: bibhyataḥ padābhedavicāraṇāyām eva kliṣṭāḥ. evaṃ hi{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12674: 136}manyante. astu tāvatpadam apy anumānād abhinnam. etāvatāpīha śabdānumānayor aikyam iti vāk pravartata eveti sopahāsam āha -- vākyeṣv iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12679: upamānam api sādṛśyam asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhim utpādayati. yathā gavayadarśanaṃ gosmaraṇasyeti bhāṣyam. asyāyaṃ tātparyārthaḥ -- upamānam api na parīkṣaṇīyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12680: evaṃ lakṣaṇakatvenāvyabhicārād iti. avayavārthas tv ekatra dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ pratiyogyantare
GSP28mimsvtku:12682: sopamānam iti yattadoradhyāhāraḥ. na ca vācyaṃ viṣayaviśeṣānupādānāt kathaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaviṣayā buddhir avagamyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12683: prasiddhapramāṇānuvādena hy atrāparīkṣā pratipādyate. loke ca sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaviṣayaiva{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12684: 137}buddhir upamānam iti prasiddham. ato na doṣaḥ. dṛśyamānaviśeṣaṇam ekadeśadarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:12685: itivad anupāttam iti ced na. udāharaṇe upādānāt. evaṃ hy āha -- yathā gavayadarśanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12687: adhikaraṇe lyuṭ. gavayo darśanam asyeti gavayadarśanam. sādṛśyam anyapadārthaḥ. etad
GSP28mimsvtku:12688: uktaṃ bhavati -- gavaye dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyam iti. atrodāharaṇānusāreṇa lakṣaṇavākye
GSP28mimsvtku:12689: 'pi dṛśyamānam eva sādṛśyam abhimatam iti gamyate. gosmaraṇasyeti ca nandigrahī(Pā 3.1.134)
GSP28mimsvtku:12690: tyādinā kartari lyuḥ. gāṃ smarataḥ pramātuḥ. yathā gavaye dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyam etatsadṛśā
GSP28mimsvtku:12691: gaur iti buddhim utpādayatīti. saṅgatis tu prasiddhibāhulyāt śābdānantaram upamānam
GSP28mimsvtku:12692: iti prāg evoktam. atra codayati -- prasiddhapramāṇānuvādenātrāparīkṣā pratipādyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12693: ato yathā naiyāyikoktam upamānaṃ pramāṇam āśrīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12694: evaṃ tad uktam evopamānalakṣaṇam āśrayitum ucitam. evaṃ hi tair uktaṃ - prasiddhasādharmyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12695: sādhyasādhanam upamānam iti. asyārthaḥ -- prasiddhena gavādinā sādharmyāt sādhyasyāprasiddhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:12696: gavayādeḥ kañcid anabhijñaṃ prati sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ yādṛśo gaus tādṛśo gavaya iti vākyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12697: tajjanitā vā buddhir upamānam iti. tad etatparihāreṇa lakṣaṇāntarapraṇayane kāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12698: vācyam ity ata āha -- kīdṛg iti dvayena. satyaṃ naiyāyikair idam uktam. na tu yuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12699: anantaroktāgamābahirbhāvāt. śabdavijñānād dhīdam asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe vijñānam. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:12701: naiyāyikāgamalakṣaṇānusāreṇāpy asyāgamatvam avagamyata ity āha -- puruṣeti. evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12702: hi naiyāyikānāṃ śābdalakṣaṇam āptopadeśaś śabda iti. atrāpi cāptapuruṣapratyayenaivāparidṛṣṭe
GSP28mimsvtku:12703: gavayādau sādṛśyena sampratyayo bhavati. nānāptā(?d dhi /
GSP28mimsvtku:12704: d vi)saṃvādāt. ata āptasyaivedaṃ vacanam avyabhicārīti matvā tadbalabhāvī niścayo jāyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12706: {3,138} nanu śābare 'pi sadṛśadarśanāt sadṛśāntare jñānam upamānam iti varṇitam. etad api smaraṇābahirbhāvād apramāṇam eva. yathā hi kiñcid dhyāyataḥ smaraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12708: ato na dhyānādijanmanā smṛtyā sahāsyāḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ. ato 'pramāṇam ity āha -- sadṛśād iti. naiyāyikalakṣaṇaṃ tāvadāgamābahirbhāvi. śābaraṃ tv apramāṇam eva saṅgṛhātīti // 4 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12709: nanu smṛtisambhinnam api deśādibhedena jāyamānaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12710: evam ihāpi gāṃ nagare dṛṣṭavato vane gavayadarśinas tadbhānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavaty ata
GSP28mimsvtku:12711: āha -- deśakālādīti. na khalu deśādibhedas sanmātratayā prāmāṇye kāraṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12714: api tu nagarāvagatas sampraty api tatstha eva smaryata iti // 5 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12715: naiyāyikaikadeśināṃ matam upanyasyati -- śruteti. yena kilātideśavākyaṃ śrutaṃ yādṛśo gaus tādṛśo gavaya iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12716: tasya śrutātideśavākyasya vanaṃ prāptasya yat svayam asau gosadṛśo gavaya iti sādṛśyānurañjitaṃ gavayajñānam idam upamānam iti // 6 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12717: {3,139} etad api dūṣayati -- pratyakṣa iti. gavayas tāvadindriyasannikarṣāt pratyakṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:12718: pratīyate. gosādṛśyam apy atideśavākyād avagataṃ smaryata iti nopameyam astīti. atra
GSP28mimsvtku:12719: codayati -- nanv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo hy atra gavayo 'vagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12721: gor apratyakṣatvāt. tadviśiṣṭo gavaya upamānasya viṣayaḥ. na hy asau pratyakṣeṇāvasīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12722: gavayamātraviṣayatvāt tasya. na cāgamād avagataḥ smaryate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12723: sāmānyaviṣayatvād āgamasya. iha cāyam asāv iti viśeṣapratibhānād iti // 7 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12724: etad api vikalpya dūṣayati -- pūrveti sārdhena. idam atra vikalpanīyam -- atideśavākyād avagatāt kiñcid adhikam avagamyate na vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12726: tataḥ smaraṇād aviśiṣṭā saṅgatir iyam apramāṇam. yathā padāt padārthajñānaṃ pratyutpannakāraṇajatvenāsmaraṇam apy anadhikaviṣayatvād apramāṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12727: evam ihāpy atideśavākyāvagatagosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayajñānam. yadi tu sāmānyāvagatād viśeṣāvagame 'sti viśeṣa ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12728: sa tarhi pratyakṣād eva labhyata iti na pramāṇāntarāvakāśa iti // 8 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12729: nanūktam asannihite gavi tatsādṛśyasyāpratyakṣatvān na tadviśiṣṭo gavayaḥ pratyakṣeṇāvagantuṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12730: śakyata iti sāvakāśaṃ pramāṇāntaram ity ata āha -- yāvad dhīti. yāvadindriyavyāpārānantaram
GSP28mimsvtku:12731: aparokṣaṃ bhāsate tan naḥ pratyakṣam. tathā ca sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya iti katham apratyakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:12732: bhaviṣyati. pratijāti kṛtsnaparisamāptam eva jātibat sādṛśyam ity apratyakṣe 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:12735: gṛhyamāṇasmaryamāṇayor vivekasya savikalpakasiddhau phaṇitatvād ity āha -- smaryamāṇasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12736: viveke sati nāpramāṇatety arthaḥ. śrutātideśavākyaviśeṣaṇopādānasyāpi na phalam upalabhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:12738: kathaṃ nopayujyate -- ye 'pīti. gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayadarśanaṃ ced upamānam abhimataṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12739: tadāśrutatadvākyānām api nagare gāṃ dṛṣṭavatāṃ vane gavayaṃ paśyatām asty eveti mandaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12741: nanv aśrutātideśavākyānām ayam asau gavaya iti saṃjñānusandhānaṃ nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12742: itareṣām astīty ayam asti viśeṣa ity āha -- atheti. pariharati -- na nāmeti. yadupamānasya prameyam abhimataṃ tattāvatte 'pi jānanti. saṃjñitvaṃ mā nāmānusandhīyatām iti // 12 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12743: syān matam -- saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha evopamānasya viṣayaḥ. yathoktaṃ nyāyavistare
GSP28mimsvtku:12744: samākhyāsambandhapratipattir upamānārtha iti. vivṛtaṃ ca -- yathā gaur iva gavaya
GSP28mimsvtku:12745: ity ukte gavā samānārtham indriyasannikarṣād upalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabdas saṃjñeti
GSP28mimsvtku:12746: saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyata iti. na cāśrutātideśavākyasya śabdam aviduṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:12748: 141}phalavadviśeṣaṇam ata āha -- na ceti. kāraṇam āha -- sādṛśyeti. atideśavākyād
GSP28mimsvtku:12750: 'vagata eva. etad dhi tadāvagataṃ gosadṛśaṃ vastu gavayaśabdavācyam iti. etāvac ca
GSP28mimsvtku:12753: nanu jñātasyāpi sambandhasya pratyabhijñāne prāmāṇyam avihatam evāta āha -- na ceti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12754: atra kāraṇam āha -- śaktyor iti. vācyavācakaśaktiniyamo hi śabdārthayos sambandhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12755: sa cātīndriyatvān neha pratyabhijñāyate. pūrvāvagata evānyūnānatiriktaḥ smaryate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12756: kim idānīm atīndriye naiva pratyabhijñānam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12757: yady evam anumānena kathaṃ pūrvānubhūtam agnyādi pratyabhijñāyate. āha ca -- gṛhīte
GSP28mimsvtku:12758: 'pi deśādibhedabhinne punaḥ pramāpratyabhijñānumānāt syāt pratyakṣavad avadhārite
GSP28mimsvtku:12761: iti. satyam. na brūmaḥ parokṣaṃ na pratyabhijñāyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12762: yad etad ayam asau gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya itīndriyajam aparokṣāvabhāsaṃ pratyabhijñānam --
GSP28mimsvtku:12765: iti. ata eva na cāsyeti sambandhasya pratyabhijñānaviṣayatvaṃ nirākaroti. gavayas tv iha gosādṛśyenāvagata pūrvaḥ pratyabhijñāyata iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti // 14 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12767: pratya)kṣād vyāvartayituṃ viśeṣaṇopādānam. śrutaśabdollikhitam idaṃ gavayajñānam ato na pratyakṣasya viṣaya ityupamānasya bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- śabdeti. śabdānuviddhabodhe 'pi{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12768: 142}hīndriyasambandhānusāri jñānaṃ na śabdaśaktiparāmarśajam eveti pratyakṣam eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:12769: varṇitam ity ato naikatrāpi lakṣaṇe upamānasya prameyam adhikaṃ paśyāma iti vācyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12770: asyāpūrvaṃ prameyam ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 15 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12771: yadi tūcyate -- pratiyogisāpekṣaṃ sādṛśyagrahaṇam ato na pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12773: na tatpūrvam aparaṃ vānusandhatte. ataḥ pratyakṣe 'pi dharmiṇi parokṣam eva sādṛśyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12774: iti na tadviśiṣṭasya pratyakṣatvam iti sāvakāśam upamānam ity ata āha -- vyavasāyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12775: bauddhānām ayaṃ siddhāntaḥ -- yadavikalpakam āpātajaṃ pratyakṣam iti. naiyāyikās
GSP28mimsvtku:12776: tu vyavasāyātmakapratyakṣavādinaḥ. ato jātyādivatsādṛśyam api teṣāṃ kiṃ na pratyakṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:12779: pratyakṣābhāsatvād ity āha -- pratyakṣeti. evaṃ tāvat sādṛśyasya vastvantaratvam
GSP28mimsvtku:12780: aṅgīkṛtya tatpratyakṣatayopamānasya viṣayābhāvenāprāmāṇyam uktam. idānīṃ bauddhamatena
GSP28mimsvtku:12781: sādṛśyāpalāpam āha -- prameyeti. nirvikalpakapratyakṣavādinām api sādṛśyaprameyābhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:12782: upamānasya pramāṇatā nābhipretā. atas teṣu spardhamāneṣu katham upamānaṃ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:12783: ayaṃ ca teṣām abhiprāyaḥ -- sādṛśyaṃ hi na tāvadāśrayebhyo bhinnam anupalambhāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:12784: abhede cāśrayāt tanmātrāpātāt. kathaṃ cāśrayeṣu vartate. na tāvat kārtsnyena bhedaprasaṅgāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:12785: na hy ekam atra kārtsnyena vṛttam anyatrāpi tathaiva vartata iti sāmpratam. na ca bhāgaśaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12786: tadabhāvāt. kiñcedaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na tāvad dravyaguṇakarmaṇām anyatamam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12787: padārthapaṇḍitais teṣv anupasaṃkhyātatvāt. na hi navasu dravyeṣu caturviṃśatyāṃ guṇeṣu pañcasu vā karmasu sādṛśyam antargataṃ paśyāmaḥ. na ca sāmānyam eva sādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12791: 143}avayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyam iti ced. na. teṣv apy aikaikaśyena sādṛśyabuddher upajananāt.[729]bhūyāṃsi sādṛśyam iti ced. na. bhūyassv apy ekatra samāhṛteṣu pratiyogya(?nyatarā)
GSP28mimsvtku:12792: napekṣeṣu sādṛśyabuddher upajananāt.[730]santi khalu tāny ekatra samāhṛtāni vastūni,
GSP28mimsvtku:12794: na hy anapekṣitapratiyogibhedaṃ sadṛśo 'yam iti gāṃ jānāti. pratiyogyapekṣayā sāmānyāni
GSP28mimsvtku:12795: sādṛśyam iti cet. kim idānīm āpekṣikaṃ sādṛśyam. bāḍham. yady evam apekṣayā tadabhivyajyate
GSP28mimsvtku:12796: janyate vā. na tāvaj janyate dvitvam ivāpekṣābuddhyā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12797: sahajasiddhatvāt. abhivyañjakāni tv ālokendriyādīni santīti kim anyad apekṣate. yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12798: yamayos tu tadabhāvād abhāvaprasaṅgaḥ. tatrāpi tadabhyupagame tannāśe sāmānyanāśāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12799: siddhāntahāniḥ. citrādau ca pāriṇāmikānām avayavānāṃ karaśiraṛprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12800: sāmānyābhāve sādṛśyābhāvaḥ. evam eva gandhādiṣv api prasaṅgo darśayitavyaḥ. avayavānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12802: matam, satyaṃ nāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyam. kin tu tattvāntaram evedaṃ dravyajātiguṇakarmabhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:12803: vyatiriktaṃ guṇabhedo vā. yathāha guruḥ -- na sāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam. kiṃ tarhi. tad eva tat,
GSP28mimsvtku:12804: gotvāder ekatvād iti. evaṃ copapanno bhavati sadṛśasambhāvanam eva tatra vidhyarthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12806: aśakyasampādanatvāt. yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyam iṣyante tatas teṣām ihābhāvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:12807: sādṛśyam api dussampādanam iti so 'nārabhyo 'rthaḥ pratijñāto bhavet śyenacitaṃ cinvīteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12808: evaṃ cānavayaveṣv api gandhādiṣu sādṛśyasaṃvidupapatsyata iti. tac ca naivam. tattvāntare
GSP28mimsvtku:12809: hi sādṛśye gām anapekṣyāpi gavayaṃ sadṛśam iti jānīyuḥ. tatra hi tanniravaśeṣam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:12810: sādṛśyaṃ parisamāptam iti kim anyad apekṣyate. katham anapekṣite gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo
GSP28mimsvtku:12811: 'vagamyata iti cet kas tasya gavā sambandhaḥ. samavāya iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:12812: so 'pi tarhi gavayavad gosadṛśatayā jñātavyaḥ. api ca samavetaṃ nāma tatsādṛśyaṃ gavayagatasādṛśyagrahaṇe 'pi kim ity apekṣyate. na hi gotvaṃ śābaleye samavetam iti{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12813: 144}bāhuleye tadbodhe 'pi tadapekṣā dṛṣṭā. tathedaṃ gavi gavayasādṛśyam iti na tadapekṣāhetur upalabhyata iti. api cāpekṣatāṃ nāma gauḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12815: viditāvayavasāmānyavibhāgasyāpi gosadṛśagavayajñānaṃ bhavet. avayavasāmānyāny api tadbodhe 'py apekṣyanta iti cet. vaktavyo 'pekṣārthaḥ. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:12820: ato gavyavagate 'navagateṣu cāvayavasāmānyeṣu gosādṛśyajñānaṃ jāyeta. jātyor hi tatsādṛśyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12821: avagate ca te iti kim anyad apekṣyate. yac cedam avayavasāmānyānāṃ bāhulye sadṛśatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12822: idaṃ ca na syād arthāntaratve sādṛśyasya sarvatra tāvattvāt. syān matam vyañjakāni
GSP28mimsvtku:12823: tāni tasya. bhavati cābhivyañjakaprakarṣe 'bhivyaṅgyabuddhiprakarṣaḥ. yathā ghaṭādau
GSP28mimsvtku:12824: tadvad ihāpi bhaviṣyatīti. tan na. na hi buddhimātram atra prakṛṣyate. api tarhi
GSP28mimsvtku:12825: vastv eva sātiśayam upālabhāmahe. ata eva mukhyāpacāre sadṛśopāditsayā susadṛśaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12826: pratinidhīyate. na mandasadṛśam ity etad api yat kiñcit. ataḥ kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12827: dvicandrālātacakrādivad bhrāntikāraṇaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na prāmāṇikam iti. prameyābhāvād api nopamānāṅgam anyad vā sādṛśye pramāṇam ity āpekṣa iti //
GSP28mimsvtku:12831: atra samādhim āha -- sādṛśyasyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nedaṃ kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12832: mithyātvahetudvayāsambhavāt. dvicandrādipratyayā hi kutaścid doṣād utpannāḥ kālādibhedeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:12833: bādhyante. sādṛśyaṃ tu jātyādivadabādhitabuddhivedyaṃ katham anyathā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:12834: yathā cāsādhāraṇapratyakṣavādināṃ tatsatyam evaṃ sādṛśyam apīti kim apahnūyate. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:12835: idam avagatam asaṃśayitam abādhitaṃ ca deśāntarādiṣv apīty asti tāvat sādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12836: pramāṇabalena yathā tadupapadyate tathā kalpanīyam. na hi dṛṣṭe 'nupapannaṃ nāma kiñcid astīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12837: tatra yat tāvad uktaṃ kim asya svarūpam iti. tatrottaram āha -- bhūyovayaveti. asyārthaḥ -- bhūyobhir avayavasāmānyair yo jātyantarasya yogaḥ{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12839: vyaktisādṛśyam api yamādiṣu dṛṣṭam eva. evam avayavasāmānyair vināpi guṇakarmādisāmānyayogenāpi sādṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:12840: yathā citrādiṣu. etena yad uktaṃ citrādau kathaṃ sādṛśyam iti tat parihṛtam. evam
GSP28mimsvtku:12841: agnāv api saṃsthānaparimāṇasāmānyaṃ darśayitavyam. yamayos tv avayavasāmānyābhyupagame yān upapattir uktā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12842: asau parihariṣyata eva. guṇānāṃ tv asaty apy avayavasāmānye 'vayavaguṇasāmānyam evāvayaviguṇānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12843: sādṛśyam iti darśayitavyam. karmaṇāṃ ca sauryādīnāṃ dravyadevatādidharmasāmānyam eva sādṛśyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12845: guṇāntargatam evāstheyam. na pañcamam alaukikatvāt. jātidravyaguṇakriyāḥ padārthā
GSP28mimsvtku:12846: iti lokasiddham. ato 'sya guṇasya sato guṇakarmaṇor anupapanna eva samavāyaḥ. atha
GSP28mimsvtku:12847: dravyasamavetam eva guṇakarmaṇī api sadṛśatayā bodhayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12848: ekārthasamavāyāt. yathāvayavasamavetaṃ sāmānyaṃ gogavayajātyor asamavetam api te sadṛśatayā bodhayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12849: ekārthasamavetasamavāyād ity ucyate. na. dravyasamavāye pramāṇā bhāvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:12850: avayavasāmānyāni hi karṇādīni vyaktisamavetāni pratyakṣāṇi. sādṛśyaṃ tu sadṛśabuddhyā
GSP28mimsvtku:12851: grahītavyam. na ca gandhādisadṛśaṃ dravyam iti pratyayo 'sti. ataḥ kathaṃ tadvartinā
GSP28mimsvtku:12852: sādṛśyena gandhādīni sadṛśāni bhaveyuḥ. ato 'vayavasāmānyam eva sādṛśyam iti. nanv
GSP28mimsvtku:12853: ekatraiva bhūyasām avayavasāmānyānām upalambhāt sādṛśyabodhaprasaktir ity uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12854: parihṛtam idaṃ jātyantarasyeti vadatā. jātyantarasamavāyināṃ jātyantare samavāyāt sādṛśyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12856: na ca bhūyastvam. etac copariṣṭād vivariṣyata eva. ato jātyantaragrahaṇam apekṣitavyam. yat tu na tena tajjanyata iti. satyam. abhivyajyate tu tat. yathoktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:12860: tattadabhivyañjakam. ata ekaikatrāpi svarūpamātreṇa sāmānyāni gamyanta eva. jātyantarasamavāyātmanā{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12862: samavāyātmā ca nāpratisaṃhite jātyantare 'bhivyakto bhavatīti yuktaiva tadapekṣā.
GSP28mimsvtku:12863: na ca yadarthāntarāpekṣapratibhāsaṃ tadavastu bhavati. na hi devadattasya pitṛtvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12865: tad avastu. ataḥ āpekṣikāṇy evañjātīyakāni na cālayituṃ śakyante. ata evāvayavasāmānyapracayāpracayayos
GSP28mimsvtku:12868: nanu padmadalākṣīyamaṅganeti padmāvayavena dalenāṅganāyāś cakṣur upamīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12872: na hi cakṣuṣaś cakṣurādyavayavāntaram asti. ata āha -- sadṛśeti. nāvaśyaṃ mahāvayavino
GSP28mimsvtku:12873: yo 'vayavas tatsāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam. avayavasāmānyāni tu sādṛśyam ity uktam. tac cāvayavānām
GSP28mimsvtku:12874: api cakṣurādīnāṃ svāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā sambhavaty eveti yukto 'ṅganādīnāṃ sadṛśāvayavabodha ity āha // 19 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12876: vināpi tu tāni tatra tatra sadṛśabodho dṛṣṭaḥ. sa katham upapadyate ata āha -- evam
GSP28mimsvtku:12877: iti. nedam avayavasāmānyagrahaṇaṃ tantram. yad eva tu kiñcid guṇādisāmānyaṃ sadṛśadhiyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12878: upajanayati tad eva sādṛśyam ato nātraikarūpyam eva. vicitratā tu sādṛśyasya yathādarśanam
GSP28mimsvtku:12879: aṅgīkartavyam. tad yathā -- jātisādṛśyam agnir vai brāhmaṇa iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12880: agnisadṛśa ity arthaḥ. kim anayos sādṛśyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12881: ekasmād brahmaṇo mukhāj jātir utpattir ity arthaḥ. idaṃ ca tadsiddhisūtre vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:12882: kutaḥ punar anayos samānābhijananatvam avagamyate. śruteḥ. evaṃ hy āha -- prajāpatir
GSP28mimsvtku:12883: mukhatas trivṛtaṃ chandasāṃ niramimīta agniṃ devatānāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12884: loke ca samānābhijananayor darśayitavyam. guṇasāmānyaṃ tu citrādau suprakāśam eva loke,
GSP28mimsvtku:12887: vede ca lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti. kriyāsādṛśyam adhyayanādisāmānyāl loke,
GSP28mimsvtku:12888: vede ca yajñavihaṅgamayor nipatyādānasāmānyāt. evaṃ hy āha -- yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte,
GSP28mimsvtku:12889: evam ayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nipatyādatte iti. śaktisādṛśyaṃ tu bhīmo malla iti loke,
GSP28mimsvtku:12890: vede ca somapūtīkayoḥ. avagamyate hi pūtīkānāṃ somaśaktir arthavādāt. tatkāryatvenāvagamāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:12891: kāryasya ca kāraṇānuvidhāyiśaktikatvāt. uktaṃ ca -- somasya yo 'ṃśaḥ parāpatat sa
GSP28mimsvtku:12892: pūtīko 'bhavad iti. svadharmasādṛśyaṃ kecit triśikhāḥ kecit pañcaśikhā iti loke triśikhādīnām anyonyasādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12893: vede ca vasiṣṭhātryādīnāṃ narāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayāja iti. dharmaniyama eva hi tatra sādṛśyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12894: prakṛtivikṛtikarmaṇoś ca dharmasāmānyam eva sādṛśyam ity uktam eva. ete ca jātyādaya
GSP28mimsvtku:12895: ekaikaśo dviśastriśas samastaśaś ca samānā bhavantas sādṛśyasya vicitratām āpādayantīti // 20 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12896: nanu yatra sādṛśyaṃ samavaiti tatsadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate. yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12897: tāni tarhy avayaveṣu samavayantīti teṣv eva sadṛśadhiyaṃ janayeyuḥ. atha teṣāṃ bhūyastā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12898: sā cāvayavasāmānyeṣv iti tāny eva sadṛśāni syuḥ. kathaṃ jātyantare sadṛśabuddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:12899: ata āha -- na dharmā iti. satyam. ata eva hetor na dharmākhyāvayavasāmānyāni tadbhūyastā vā sādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12900: teṣu sādṛśyabuddhyanutpatteḥ. yad eva hi teṣāṃ bhūyas tayā yuktaṃ jātyantaraṃ gavayādi vyaktyantaraṃ vāgneyasauryādi,
GSP28mimsvtku:12901: tad eva sadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate. ato jātyantarasamavāya eva teṣāṃ sādṛśyam. svarūpatas
GSP28mimsvtku:12902: tv ekaikaśastāni sāmānyāni pradhānasāmānyavadekatvabuddhinibandhanam eva. piṇḍitāni
GSP28mimsvtku:12904: ayaṃ ca bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyety asyaiva prapañca iti // 21 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12905: {3,148} atra codayati -- yamayor iti. jātyantarasyeti yāvacchrutagrāhiṇaḥ paricodanam
GSP28mimsvtku:12906: idam -- yadi jātyantarasya bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogatas sādṛśyaṃ kathaṃ yamayor vyaktisādṛśyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12907: iti. itaras tu -- pradarśanamātraṃ jātyantarasyeti keyam atraivāsthā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12908: tad ayam arbhako varāka ity apahasati -- dṛṣṭatvād iti. yatraiva sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:12909: tatraiva tadāśrayaṇīyam. kim ekatraivāsthāṃ badhnāsīti. syād etat. ekasvabhāvā hi
GSP28mimsvtku:12910: bhāvā jātyādayaḥ. tad idaṃ sādṛśyam api tathaiva yuktam. yadi tāvadalpavṛttisvabhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12912: atha bahuvṛttisvabhāvaṃ tato jātyor eva. ardhavaiśasaṃ tv avastutām āpādayatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12913: ata āha -- kvacid dhīti. pratītyavisaṃvādād ubhayopapattir iti bhāvaḥ // 22 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12915: tāni ca vyaktināśena naśyeyuḥ. ato nityaṃ sāmānyam iti siddhāntahānir ata āha -- sāmānyānīti. etāni tāvannāśīni bhavantu,
GSP28mimsvtku:12916: sāmānyāntarāṇi gotvādīni nityāny eveti na kaścil lokavirodha iti // 23 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12918: ata āha -- ananteti. ananto hi gotvādīnām āśrayaḥ. tadekasya nāśe 'py āśrayāntare
GSP28mimsvtku:12919: pratyabhijñānānnaikāntiko nāśa iti. nityasāmānyavādo 'pi na nas sārvatrika ity āha -- teneti // 24 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12920: {3,149} athavāvayavasāmānyānām api nātyantiko nāśo 'stīty āha -- sāmānyasyeti. kāraṇam āha -- sarvasyeti // 25 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12921: yady asti tatrāpi sādṛśyadhiyā bhavitavyam ata āha -- teṣām iti. bhūyas tayā teṣāṃ sādṛśyam atiriktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12922: na tv ekaikaśo na santīti. na kevalaṃ sāmānyam anaśvaram iti deśāntarādiṣv āśrayasadbhāvaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:12923: kalpyate. api tu pratyakṣe 'pi kvacid arthe tāny upalabhyanta evety āha -- tānīti // 26 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12925: tadavayavānāṃ tu kathaṃ sādṛśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- sadṛśeti. yathā mahāvayavino ye 'vayavāḥ svāvayavasāmānyais sadṛśā bhavanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12926: evaṃ yatra nāmāvayaveṣv api sadṛśāvayavatvam avagamyate te 'py avāntarāvayavasāmānyais sadṛśā bhavantīti na kāścad doṣa iti // 27 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12927: tāvac caivaṃ darśayitavyaṃ yāvannirbhāgā bhāgā ity āha -- evam iti. tataḥ paraṃ paramāṇutvam eva kevalaṃ sāmānyam ity āha -- tata iti // 28
GSP28mimsvtku:12928: nanu yadi sāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ gotvādau prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12929: tattvābhedād ity ata āha -- pradhānānām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- saṃvinniṣṭhā hi no{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12930: ato yatsadṛśabuddhim utpādayati tatsādṛśyam. pradhānāvayavināṃ tu yatra gotvādisāmānyam ekaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12932: na sa iveti. ataḥ pradhānasāmānyaṃ na sadṛśabuddher hetur iti na sādṛśyam. tadbhede pradhānasāmānyabhede gogavayayos sādṛśyabuddhir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:12933: na ca tayor itaretarasādṛśyabuddhiḥ. ato yatra gotvādisāmānyaṃ vartate na tatra sadṛśabuddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:12934: yatra sadṛśabuddhir na tatra tadvartata iti tadvartīny avayavasāmānyāny eva piṇḍitāni
GSP28mimsvtku:12935: sadṛśabuddher hetutvāt sādṛśyam iti siddham. evaṃ ca yannibandhanakāreṇa sādṛśyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:12936: tattvāntaratve kāraṇam uktaṃ gotvādāv api prasaṅga iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12938: citrādāv avayavasāmānyābhāvāt sādṛśyānupapattir iti codayati -- citrādāv iti. pariharati
GSP28mimsvtku:12940: parimāṇaś ca tais sādṛśyam upapāditam iti. kiṃ punar idaṃ jātisādṛśyaṃ vyaktisādṛśyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12942: ubhayābhāvāt. na hi citrādau naratvādijātayas tadvyaktayo vā sambhavanti. svabhāvanirmitapāṇyādyavayavasamavāyitvād vyakteḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12943: tatsamavāyitvāc ca jāteḥ. ucyate. vyaktir evātra sadṛśī. yady api cātra naratvaṃ nāsti,
GSP28mimsvtku:12944: dravyatvaṃ tv astīti tadvyaktis sadṛśatayā pratīyate. prāyeṇa cākṛtisādṛśyam eva tatrāvagamyate. kuśalas tu citrakāro vyaktisādṛśyam unmīlayatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:12945: nanu piṇḍitāny evāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyam. evaṃ guṇasāmānyāny api militāni sādṛśyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12946: ity uktam. citrādau tu rūpamātram eva samānaṃ na gandhādayaḥ. ata āha -- rūpeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:12948: 151}tulyatayā sādṛśyaṃ bhavaty eva. uktam asakṛt yathā darśanaṃ tadāśrīyata iti. tad iha citrādau varṇasāmānyam eva. kusumādigandhaviśeṣāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12949: kṣīraśarkarādau rasasāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam. avaśyaṃ sarvaguṇasāmānyasamavāyo nānusartavya iti // 31 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12950: parihārāntaram āha -- pṛthivyādiṣv iti. evaṃ hi satkāryavādino vadanti -- nātyantam asatkartuṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12952: ato 'sataḥ kāryatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ sattāṃ gamayati. ato narādyavayavasāmānyāny api nātyantam
GSP28mimsvtku:12953: asanti jāyante. kin tu santy eva svakāraṇeṣu pṛthivyādiṣu bhūteṣu pariṇāmād abhivyajyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:12954: sā ca teṣāṃ pāriṇāmikyabhivyaktir yathādarśanam evāvadhārayitavyā. yathā ca tāni
GSP28mimsvtku:12956: evaṃ citrādibhāgeṣv itīti tatra kim iti nābhyupagamyante. ato 'vayavasāmānyāny eva citrādāv api sādṛśyam iti // 32 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12957: prāksattve kāraṇam āha -- na hīti. idaṃ ca prāg evoktam iti. yat tu sādṛśyaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ veti vikalpyāvastutvam āpāditam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12958: tatrottaram āha -- dharmāṇām iti. sarvadharmāṇām eva jātyādīnāṃ na dharmiṇo nānātvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12959: atha cāvāntarasthitir api dharmadharmikṛtāsty eva. evaṃ sādṛśye 'pi. ato nānena tadapalapituṃ śakyate. sarvatrānaikānta eva pratīty avisaṃvādāt samarthanīya iti // 33 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12960: tad evaṃ sādṛśyasya vastutve siddhe cakṣuṣā sambaddhasya sator dvayor dharmiṇor yugapadīkṣamāṇasyaikatra vā pratyakṣatvaṃ siddham ity āha -- vastutve iti // 34 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12961: {3,152} vṛttiparicodanāyām uttaram āha -- sāmānyavad iti. kāraṇam āha -- pratiyogīti. jātyādivadupapattir iti // 35 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12962: pratyekaṃ kṛtsnasamavāye cāsannihite 'pi gotve smṛtisthe gavayasthasya sannihitasya sādṛśyasyendriyagocaratā siddhety upasaṃharann āha -- tatreti
GSP28mimsvtku:12963: svamatenedānīm upamānasya prameyaṃ darśayati -- tasmād iti. yathā vivakṣaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti // 37 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12964: nanu gauḥ smaryate sādṛśyaṃ ca pratyakṣeṇa gamyata iti na prameyam upamānasya paśyāmaḥ. ata āha -- pratyakṣeṇeti // 38 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12969: {3,153} ābhāsetaraviveke kāraṇam āha -- bādhaketi. atrodāharaṇam āha -- yatheti // 41 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12970: kathaṃ punas tadābhāsatvam ata āha -- samīpastha iti. bādhakaṃ hi tatra jñānam utpadyata iti bhāvaḥ. neti pratyayābhāve tu paramārthasādṛśyam ity āha -- na bādhyata iti // 42 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12971: sarvam evālocitānugamanam anumānam iti manyamānā ye 'syānumānāntarbhāvam icchanti
GSP28mimsvtku:12972: tān pratyāha -- na ceti. pakṣadharmādyasambhavam eva darśayati -- prāg iti. dhūmādir
GSP28mimsvtku:12973: hi prameyasya parvatāder dharmatayānumānotpatteḥ prāgavagataḥ pakṣadharmo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:12974: iha ca gauḥ prameyaḥ. na copamānotpatteḥ prāk taddharmatayā sādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate. atas
GSP28mimsvtku:12975: tāvan na pakṣadharmaḥ. gavayaśṛṅgitvādīnāṃ tu pakṣadharmatopariṣṭānnirākariṣyata iti // 43 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12976: gavayagatam api sādṛśyam apakṣadharmatvān na sādṛśyaviśiṣṭānāṃ gavām anumāpakam ity āha -- gavaya iti. gogataṃ ca pratijñārthaikadeśatvān liṅgam ity āha -- pratijñārtheti // 44 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12977: {3,154} gavayo 'py apakṣadharmatvān na sādṛśyaviśiṣṭasya gor liṅgam ity āha -- gavayaś
GSP28mimsvtku:12978: ceti. anvayo 'pi tasya sādṛśyaviśiṣṭena gavā nāvaśyaṃ viditapūrva ity āha -- sādṛśyam
GSP28mimsvtku:12979: iti. dvedhāpy upamānasya prameyaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo vā gaus tad vā goviśiṣṭam,
GSP28mimsvtku:12981: nanu yugapad ubhayaṃ paśyatāṃ sādṛśyagavayayos sambandho 'vagata evāta āha -- ekasminn iti. satyam avagataṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:12982: na tu sarveṇety uktam asmābhiḥ. yadi cānvayo jñānāṅgaṃ syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:12983: ekasyāpy agṛhītānvayasya jñānaṃ na syād iti // [46] //
GSP28mimsvtku:12985: atas tadgavaye gṛhyamāṇaṃ gavi liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ucyate. tan na. teṣām avayavabhūtānāṃ gavayāvayavijñānavyāpāraṃ pratyupakṣīṇatvād ity āśaṅkayā sahāha -- śṛṅgitvāder iti // 47 //
GSP28mimsvtku:12986: yadi tu gavayajñānaṃ pratyanupakṣīṇāni svarūpeṇaiva śṛṅgitvādīni liṅgam iṣyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:12987: tatas tebhyaḥ pūrvāvagatasambandhānusāreṇa nissādṛśyam eva gosmaraṇaṃ syād ity āha -- yadīti. kathaṃ nissādṛśyam ity ata āha -- na gaur iti
GSP28mimsvtku:12988: ayaṃ tu pratītikrama ity āha -- sadṛśeti. śṛṅgādipratyayāt{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:12989: 155}parāvartinaṃ sādṛśyapratyayam apekṣya gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayapratyayād eva punas tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagojñānam upajāyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12991: nanu śṛṅgādayo 'pi parasparasadṛśā eveti kathaṃ tebhyo nissādṛśyā pratītir ucyate. ata āha -- sadṛśeti. yadi gavayādīnāṃ sadṛśāvayavatvam avagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:12992: na tarhi te sadṛśatayā pramīyante. kin tv avayavā eva parasparaṃ sadṛśatayā. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:12993: na sādṛśyaviśiṣṭagopramitau śṛṅgitvādīnāṃ liṅgatvam. nissādṛśyaṃ tu tebhyo gosmaraṇamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:12994: syād iti. api cānumāne yad ekadeśatayā dhūmādir avagamyate prameyam apy agnyādi tadekadeśatayaiva.
GSP28mimsvtku:12995: iha tu śṛṅgitvādayo gavayaikadeśatayā pramīyante. na ca tadekadeśo gaur apy anumīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:12997: yadi tu kaścid vaiyātyād evam evānumāsyata iti brūyāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:12998: taṃ pratyāha -- ittham iti. bhrāntir iyam abhāvavirodhād iti. nagarasthagojñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:12999: aviśeṣitaṃ sādṛśyena smṛtir evety āha -- nagarastham iti. viṣayatātsthyād jñāne 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:13001: kaḥ punar upamānasya vedārtha upayogaḥ. yadi prākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vikṛtau prāptir ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13002: tan na. anumānād eva tatsiddheḥ. prākṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ dharmais sambaddhaṃ kiñcid vikṛtau
GSP28mimsvtku:13003: dṛṣṭaṃ teṣām anumāpakaṃ bhaviṣyati. jaiminer apy etad evābhimatam iti lakṣyate. yad
GSP28mimsvtku:13004: evam āha -- yasya liṅgam arthasaṃyogād iti. atra hi vyaktam eva laiṅgikīṃ dharmaprāptim
GSP28mimsvtku:13006: 156}ayaṃ bhāvaḥ -- pratibandhadarśino hi pratibandhakajñānam anumānam. na ceha sauryādivākyānām
GSP28mimsvtku:13007: āgneyādividhyantena pratibandho 'vagataḥ. na ca dravyadevatayoḥ. na karmaṇaḥ. ataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:13008: kathaṃ tajjñānam anumānam iti. pramāṇāntarād evopamānāt prākṛtavidhyantaprāptir adhyavasātavyā.
GSP28mimsvtku:13009: vaikṛtāni hi pradhānāny aśrutavidhyantāni na tam antareṇa paryavasyanti. yat kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:13011: itikartavyatām āpādya kṛtārthāni bhavanti. yathehaiva tāvat sauryāgneyayor ekadevatātvena
GSP28mimsvtku:13014: nād bhinnoktā agnyādiyutam itikartavyatājātaṃ sādṛśyamātrāt kathaṃ nu pratyāyayodity
GSP28mimsvtku:13015: evam upayujyate. itarathā sauryādivākyais saha tasyādarśanān nānumānaṃ sambhavatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:13016: aprāptir eva syāt. agnyādiyutam iti. agnyādinā devatayāgneyādikarma lakṣayati. āgneyādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:13017: karmaṇā yuktam itikartavyatāmātram ity uktaṃ bhavatīti // 52 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13018: prayojanāntaram āha -- pratinidhir apīti. darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prakrāntayor vrīhyapacāre yat tatsadṛśā nīvārāḥ pratinidhīyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:13019: tad apy upamānasya phalam iti. idam aparaṃ prayojanam ity āha -- pratikṛtir iti yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:13020: antena. mukhyāpacāre gauṇe śāstrārtha āśrayitavye yatrātigauṇair jaghanyair dvitrādisāmānyaiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:13024: tad apy upamānasya phalam iti. kathaṃ punarmandasadṛśaṃ mithyā, {3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13025: 157}susadṛśalābhe 'pi hy alpayā mātrayā tatsadṛśam avagamyata eva. ato 'stu tatrālpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13026: nāmāvayavasāmānyam ata āha -- matir iti. na kevalaṃ vastutas tayos susadṛśālpasadṛśayoḥ (?strīva /
GSP28mimsvtku:13028: api tu) tathaiva -- mukhyarūṣeṇaiva susadṛśe drāk śīghram utpadyate. ivaśabdo 'laṅkāre.
GSP28mimsvtku:13029: ato mandasadṛśasya mātrayā sādṛśyabodhe 'py anupādānalakṣaṇo bodho bhaviṣyatīty asti
GSP28mimsvtku:13035: atra bhāṣyam. arthāpattir api dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyata ity arthakalpanā.
GSP28mimsvtku:13036: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyādṛṣṭasya parikalpanā iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:13038: evaṃlakṣaṇakatvenāvyabhicārād iti. kiṃ punar anenārthāpatter lakṣaṇam uktam. artho
GSP28mimsvtku:13039: 'nyathānupapadyamāno yadarthāntaraṃ kalpayati sārthāpattiḥ. yathā jīvato devadattasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13040: gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvena vinā nopapadyamāno yad bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayati sārthāpattir ity uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:13041: yady evaṃ keyam anyathānupapattir nāma. yadi tāvad anena vināsya sadbhāvo nopapadyata iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:13044: arthāpattau na sambandhajñānam apekṣata ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13045: tad ayuktam. na hy ajñāte sambandhe 'nena vinā nopapadyata iti śakyate vaktum.{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13046: 158}yad eva hy asyedaṃ kāryam ityādinā rūpeṇa jñātasambandhaniyamaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13047: tad eva svakāraṇena vinā nopapadyata iti śakyam avasātum,
GSP28mimsvtku:13048: dhūma ivāgninā vinā. ato 'vinābhāvasambandhabalottham evedaṃ jñānam iti śabdāntareṇoktam. syād etat. dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānam agnyādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:13049: adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayārthāpattiś śaktyādiṣūpajāyata iti. tan na. dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā jñātasambandham avagamyate 'nyathānupapattyā,
GSP28mimsvtku:13050: kāryasāmānyaṃ hi kāraṇasāmānyena vinānupapadyamānaṃ yat tat kalpayati tad api sambandhajñānena
GSP28mimsvtku:13051: jāyamānaṃ katham anumānād bhidyate. adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatā cānumānasya kriyānumāne
GSP28mimsvtku:13053: yadi yad yena vinā nopapadyate tad tadgamakaṃ syāt. iha tu yan nopapadyate tad eva
GSP28mimsvtku:13054: gamyam. kim idānīṃ bahirbhāvo gṛhāmāvena vinā nopapadyate. bāḍham. na hi gṛhe 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:13056: tad asya bahirbhāvo gṛhābhāvadarśanenaivopapadyate. nanu bhāṣyakāro dṛṣṭaḥ śruto
GSP28mimsvtku:13057: vetyādi vadan gamakasyānyathānupapadyamānatāṃ darśayati. na gamyasya. agranthajño
GSP28mimsvtku:13058: devānāṃ priyaḥ. dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'rthakalpaneti hi sambandhaḥ. kim uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13059: arthāntarasya pramāṇam iti. anyathā nopapadyata iti tarhi kena sambadhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13060: pramityeti vadāmaḥ. anyathānupapadyamānatām āpādayannarthāntarasya gamaka iti. kasyārthāntarasya. yadi bahirbhāvasya,
GSP28mimsvtku:13062: na hi gṛhābhāvadarśino bahirbhāvo nopapadyata iti budhyante laukikāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13063: kin tu caitro bahir astīti. api ca gamyaviśeṣaṇam anyathānupapattim ācakṣāṇair gamakasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13064: kim anyathānupapattir neṣyata eva yady evaṃ kathaṃ tato bahirbhāvasiddhiḥ. atha so 'pi nopapadyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13065: tato 'vinābhāvabalenaiva jñānam iti punaranumānatvam. kim arthaṃ cānyathā nopapadyata iti gamakaparityāgenāśrūyamāṇayā pratītyā yojyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:13066: athocyate -- arthāntarasya caitrasambandhino vidyamānatvasyānyathānupapattim āpādayan gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayatīti. saṃśayāpādanaṃ cānyathānupapadyamānatvāpādanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13067: yena hi prāyeṇa gṛhe nivasaṃś caitro dṛṣṭaḥ sa gṛhābhāvadarśanenaiva caitrasya sadbhāva eva saṃśete. pratīte 'pi hi vastuni{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13069: gṛhasambandhāvagateti tadabhāvadarśanād bhavati vidyamānatve saṃśayaḥ -- kim asti
GSP28mimsvtku:13070: caitro na veti. ayaṃ ca saṃśayo 'nupapattir ity ākhyāyate. tām imāṃ vidyamānatvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13071: saṃśayarūpām anupapattim āpādayan gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvakalpanayā saṃśayam utsārayaṃś
GSP28mimsvtku:13072: caitrasya vidyamānatvam upapādayati. tad iha gṛhābhāvo vidyamānatvasyārthāntarasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13074: eva vā gṛhābhāvāpāditānupapattikaṃ svopapādanāya bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayatīti dvedhā darśanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:13075: ata eva cānumānād bhedaḥ. na hy anumāne dhūmādiḥ kasyācit saṃśayarūpām anupapattim
GSP28mimsvtku:13076: āpādayaṃs tadāpāditānupapattikaṃ vā kiñcid agnyādikaṃ gamayati. kin tu asandigdhād
GSP28mimsvtku:13077: eva dhūmād agnir anumīyate. yathā cānumāne niścitarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakam. tatheha sandigdham
GSP28mimsvtku:13079: tad etad asāmpratam. tathā hi -- yat tāvad uktaṃ gṛhābhāvas saṃśayam āpādayatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:13080: tad ayuktam. kathaṃ hi tena vidyamānatve saṃśaya āpādyate. gṛhe caitro dṛṣṭaḥ katham
GSP28mimsvtku:13084: so 'pi taṃ jīvantaṃ tatrāsantam avagamya sahasā bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayatīti. api ca -- yadi vastudharmavisaṃvādāt sandehaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13085: na tarhi bahirbhāvakalpanāyāṃ nimittaṃ paśyāmaḥ. yathā hi mṛtajaniṣyamāṇayoḥ gṛhābhāvo na bahirbhāvaṃ sūcayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13086: evaṃ sandigdhasadbhāvasyāpi. yāvad dhi caitrasya vidyamānatā na niścīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13087: na tāvad gṛhābhāvamātradarśanena bahiś caitro 'vasthāpayituṃ śakyate. saṃśayanirākaraṇārtham
GSP28mimsvtku:13088: api cātra pramāṇāntaram arthanīyam. na bahirbhāvaḥ. nirākṛte tu saṃśaye niścitasadbhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:13089: gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahir astīti gamyate. atha niścitasadbhāvasyaiva sthitiprakāre
GSP28mimsvtku:13090: sandehaḥ katham astīti. sa tarhi caitram apaśyato 'pi bhavatīti kiṃ gṛhābhāvadarśanena.
GSP28mimsvtku:13091: na cāsau bahirbhāvakalpanābījam. ato bahirbhāvakalpanāpratyanīkam eva saṃśayāpādanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13092: yat tatsiddhaye dvāram āśritam. sādhu sampāditam. ato na vidmaḥ kīdṛśo lakṣaṇārtha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:13093: {3,160} ata āha -- pramāṇeti. anyathā nopapadyata ity anyathānupapadyamānatām āpādayan
GSP28mimsvtku:13094: gamayatīti vyācakṣmahe. api tarhi dṛṣṭaśrutaviśeṣaṇam evedam. ya eva kaścit pramāṇaṣaṭkavijñāto
GSP28mimsvtku:13096: sa eva svopapādanāyānyam arthaṃ kalpayati tadviṣayā kalpanābuddhir arthāpattir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:13097: nanv evam avinābhāvabalotthā buddhir anumānam ity āpāditam. maivam. na hy anyathā
GSP28mimsvtku:13098: nopapadyata ity avinābhāvam ācaṣṭe. sa hy anena vinā na bhavatīty ukte gamyate. kiṃ nāmānenocyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13099: dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ kalpanām antareṇa nopapadyata iti. kā punar asyānupapattiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13100: na hi dṛṣṭe 'nupapannaṃ nāma. dṛṣṭam api pramāṇāntaravirodhād yat pratihanyate sānupapattiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:13101: dṛṣṭo hi gṛhe caitrābhāvo 'bhāvena. ānumānikī ca tasya jīvataḥ kvacit sattā. sānirdhāritadeśaviśeṣatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:13102: gṛham api vyāpnoti. so 'yam abhāvānumānayor virodho 'nupapattir ākhyāyate. saṃśayo
GSP28mimsvtku:13104: anadhyavasāya evaikasmin buddhim upasaṃhartuṃ yuktiviśeṣād aśaknuvataḥ. ato nehānyatarad
GSP28mimsvtku:13105: upādātuṃ hātuṃ vā śakyaṃ pramāṇatvāviśeṣāt. tad iha saṅkaṭe prāmāṇiko 'numānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13107: na hiṃsyād iti sāmānyaśāstrasyeva vihitavarjitāṃ hiṃsām. evaṃ cobhayam upapāditaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13108: bhavati abhāvo 'numānaṃ ceti. sarvatra caivam eva darśayitavyam. trairūpyarahitatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13113: uta pratyakṣamātradṛṣṭaḥ. pūrvasmin pakṣe śrotrādipūrvikārthāpattir na syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:13116: śabdāvagatam api hi pramitam eva. athocyate nedam arthāntaravivakṣayā śrutagrahaṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13119: 161}hi dṛṣṭaśrutaśabdam upacaranto laukikā dṛśyante. na dṛṣṭo na śrutaḥ kaścit svayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13120: dattāpahāraka iti. yathā etad evābhipretya ṭīkākāreṇoktaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ śruto veti laukikam
GSP28mimsvtku:13121: abhidhānam iti. śābdīm upalabdhiṃ pramāṇāntarebhyo bhedena laukikā upādadānā dṛśyanta
GSP28mimsvtku:13122: ity uktaṃ bhavati. idam api nopapannam. kathaṃ hi lakṣaṇagranthe sunipuṇo bhāṣyakāro
GSP28mimsvtku:13123: 'bhiprāyāntaram antareṇa śrutapadaṃ prayuṅkta ity utprekṣitum api śakyam iti vācyam
GSP28mimsvtku:13124: ubhayopādānaprayojanam ata āha -- dṛṣṭa iti. satyam. pañcabhir api pratyakṣādibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:13125: dṛṣṭo dṛṣṭo bhavati. upalabdhiparyāya eva dṛṣṭaśabda iti yāvat. tathāpy asmād dṛṣṭād
GSP28mimsvtku:13127: tad asyāḥ pramāṇagrāhitayā pūrvasyā dṛṣṭārthāpatter vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayitum. tac
GSP28mimsvtku:13128: copariṣṭād vakṣyate. prathamārthāpattyapekṣayā ca pañcabhir ity uktam iti pramāṇaṣaṭkapūrvikārthāpattyudāharaṇāvasare // 2 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13129: idānīṃ pratyakṣapūrvikām eva tāvanmukhyatayodāharati -- tatreti vahnerantena. kā
GSP28mimsvtku:13130: punar iyaṃ śaktiḥ. neyam atīndriyedantayā nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyate. nanu yadbhāvābhāvanibandhanau
GSP28mimsvtku:13132: īdṛśī ca pratyakṣavedyaiva. tathā hi -- vahnisaṃyogānantaraṃ dāho dṛśyate asati ca na dṛśyata iti tatsaṃyoga eva śaktir iti gīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13133: na tattvāntaram. sa ca pratyakṣa iti kim arthāpattyā. na. vyabhicārāt. yathā khalu svarūpamātram agner vyabhicarati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13134: evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi. bhavati hi kadācid auṣadhādisannikarṣe saṃyujyate vagnir atha ca na dahatīti. tad ihārthāpattyā tattvāntaraṃ śaktirūpaṃ kalpyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:13135: pramāṇāntaravirodhena. tathā hi -- pratyakṣeṇa dāho 'vasthāpyate. hetvabhāvena ca
GSP28mimsvtku:13136: pratikṣipyate. sa hi kāryābhāvena viditapratibandhas taṃ gamayati. tathā hi -- na
GSP28mimsvtku:13139: nānyat kiñcit. na cākasmād eva bhavatīti sāmpratam. evaṃ hi kadācin na syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:13141: anapekṣaṃ tu nityaṃ sadasad vā bhavet. ataḥ kāryadarśanādarśanabalād agneḥ svarūpād vyatiriktaṃ kiñcid rūpam unnīyate, {3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13143: tadabhedāt sadāpattir iti. svarūpamātram apratibandham agner dāhasya kāraṇam auṣadhādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13145: kaḥ pratibandhārthaḥ. svarūpaṃ tāvadavinaṣṭam. tad eva pratyabhijānīmaḥ. na hi bījasyopari ta(?nā/
GSP28mimsvtku:13146: dā)nīte pradīpe kiñcid rūpāpacayam upalabhāmahe. na ca tenāṅkuro janyate. atha vastvantarasannidhau sāmagryantaram eva jātam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13147: ataḥ pūrvasāmagrīkāryaṃ notpadyata iti cen naivam. na hi mantrādisannikarṣe pūrvasāmagrīnāśo
GSP28mimsvtku:13148: dṛśyate. na ca tat kāryam upalabhyate. atha mantrādirahitam eva kāraṇaṃ kāryasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13149: janakam. na tu tatra tena kiñcit kriyata ity ucyate. tan na. na hy akiñcitkarasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13150: sannidhiḥ kāryaṃ pratibadhnāti. anyad api hi tatrodāsīnaṃ sannihitaṃ bhavati. na
GSP28mimsvtku:13151: ca kāryaṃ na jāyate. na ca mantrādisannidhāv arthāntaram eva jātaṃ pūrvakāraṇanāśeneti
GSP28mimsvtku:13152: matir āvirasti. sakalā hi sāmagrī pratyabhijñāyate. asti ca tatra kāraṇam ity uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:13153: na ca mantrādiprāgabhāva eva vā tadviśiṣṭā vā sāmagrī janiketi yuktam. abhāvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13157: svakāle yad akurvas tu karoty anyad acetanaḥ /
GSP28mimsvtku:13162: iti darśanāt mantrādiprāgabhāvaḥ kāraṇam iṣyate. tathāpi parastāt kāryadarśanaṃ nopapadyata iti. mantrādipradhvaṃso 'pi kāraṇam iti cet,
GSP28mimsvtku:13163: sa tarhi prāṅ nāsīd iti prāṅmantrādiprayogāt kāryaṃ na jāyeta. na hi kṣitijalabījānām
GSP28mimsvtku:13164: anyatamāpāye 'py aṅkuro jāyamāno dṛśyate. api ca saty eva prācyamantrādisannidhāne
GSP28mimsvtku:13165: tadviparītamantrādyāgame kāryabhāvam īkṣamāṇā na tadabhāvasya kāraṇabhāvam avasthāpayāmaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:13166: na hi vihitākaraṇakāraṇakaḥ pratyavāyaḥ saty api vihitakaraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ. bhavati cātra
GSP28mimsvtku:13167: prayogaḥ -- yadyadabhāvakāraṇakaṃ tattadbhāve na bhavati vihitābhāvabhāvya iva pratyavāyo{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13168: 163}vihitabhāvena. na caivaṃ mantrādibhāve kāryam iti. evaṃ cākiñcitkaro mantrādibhāvo na kadācit kāryaṃ pratibadhnīyāt. ataḥ kāraṇaśakter eva pratibandhako mantraḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13169: na tadabhāvaḥ kāraṇam. balavattaropanipātāpahṛtaśaktis tu so 'pi na kiñcit pratibadhnāti. na ca yad balavadruddham ātmānaṃ naiva vindati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13170: avirodhe 'pi tenātmā na labdhavyaḥ. kadācana mābhūt śrautaparipanthiviniyogābhāve 'pi laiṅgikaviniyogābhāva iti. ato 'sti kaścid atiśayaḥ kāraṇānām,
GSP28mimsvtku:13171: yannāśatirodhānābhyāṃ kāryaṃ nārabhanta iti siddhaṃ pratyakṣāvagatād dāhād dahanaśaktikalpanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:13172: anumeyatvaṃ tu śakter upariṣṭānnirākariṣyata iti. anumānapūrvikārthāpattim udāharati
GSP28mimsvtku:13173: anumitād iti. deśāntaraprāptyā sūrye yānam anumīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13174: tato 'rthāpattyā tacchaktiḥ. atrāpi pramāṇāntaravirodha evānupapattiḥ. gamanaṃ hi
GSP28mimsvtku:13176: 'pi tathaiva na gantum arhatīti vitarkaḥ. so 'yaṃ śaktikalpanayā nivāryate. asti
GSP28mimsvtku:13179: śrutārthāpattis tu bhinnaviṣayā dṛṣṭārthāpattibhyo vivicya paścād evābhidhāsyata
GSP28mimsvtku:13180: ity āha -- śruteti. upamānapūrvikāṃ darśayati -- gavayeti. gavayasadṛśo gaur ity
GSP28mimsvtku:13181: upamite sadṛśajñānagrāhyaśaktir arthāpattyā kalpyate. īdṛśī ca tatrānupapattir bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:13183: yadi hi janayet prathamadarśane 'pi kiṃ na janayet,
GSP28mimsvtku:13185: tad evaṃ jātam api gavyupamānam anupattyāvasīdati. śaktikalpanayopapādyate. astināma
GSP28mimsvtku:13186: ko 'pi gor atiśayo yaḥ pratiyogidarśanapratilabdhābhivyaktir gavayasadṛśīṃ dhiyam
GSP28mimsvtku:13187: upajanayati. yac cedaṃ samāne paśutve gaur eva gavayasadṛśa ity upamīyate tad api
GSP28mimsvtku:13189: arthāpattipūrvikām udāharati -- abhidhāneti. śabdād anantaram arthapratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya tatkāraṇatvam avasīyate. na ca vyāpāram antareṇa{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13190: 164}kāraṇatvam upapadyata iti śabdasamavāyī vyāpāro 'numīyate. sa cābhidheti prasiddham.
GSP28mimsvtku:13191: tatsiddhyarthaṃ ca śabde vācakasāmarthyam arthāpattyā pramīyate. abhidhāyakatve hy
GSP28mimsvtku:13193: nāyam asyābhidhāyakaḥ. prāg iva sambandhajñānād gṛhītasambandhaḥ pratyāyaka iti ced
GSP28mimsvtku:13194: na. tadabhāvāt. na hy asyārthena saṃyogādīnām anyatamas sambandho dṛśyate. tad asyānupapattau
GSP28mimsvtku:13195: śaktikalpanopapādikā bhavati. asti khalv anayor vācyavācakaśaktirūpas sambandhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:13196: yadagrahān nārtho 'vagamyata iti. evaṃ ca śaktikalpanottarakālaṃ śakter api nityatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:13197: antareṇānupapatter arthāpattyantareṇa śabdasya nityatā pratīyata iti // 5 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13198: etad eva vivṛṇoti -- abhidheti sārdhena. etac ca svayaṃ jaimininaiva śabdādhikaraṇe 'bhidhāsyata ity āha -- darśanasyeti // 6 -- 7 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13199: abhāvapūrvikā tu bhāṣyakāreṇa svayam udāhṛteti na pṛthagudāhriyata ity āha -- pramāṇābhāveti
GSP28mimsvtku:13200: sārdhena. asyārthaḥ -- yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyādṛṣṭasya
GSP28mimsvtku:13201: parikalpanā iti bhāṣye ya. caitrasya bahirbhāvasiddhir darśitā tām eva prakṛtābhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:13202: 'nyām abhāvapūrvikām arthāpattiṃ bhāṣyakāra udāharat udāhṛtavān iti. prapañcas tv
GSP28mimsvtku:13205: {3,165} idānīm arthāpatter anumānād bhede veditavye bhāṣyoktatvād abhāvapūrvikāyā
GSP28mimsvtku:13206: eva bhedaṃ tāvad āha -- abhāveti. yeyam abhāvapramāṇena gṛhe nāstīty anena rūpeṇāvagatāc
GSP28mimsvtku:13207: caitrād bahirbhāvasūcanātmikārthāpattiḥ sāpi pakṣadharmādīnām anaṅgatvāc chabdavadupamānavadanumānād
GSP28mimsvtku:13209: pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvam eva darśayati -- bahirdeśeti. iha hi bahirdeśaviśiṣṭaś caitraḥ pakṣas tadviśiṣṭo vā bahirdeśaḥ. na cobhayasyāpi gṛhagato 'bhāvo dharma ity (asya)
GSP28mimsvtku:13212: nābhāvamātram aviśeṣitaṃ caitrasya bahirbhāve liṅgam. na cāsya gṛhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13214: yathā nīlimotpaladravyasya. evam ihāpi dravyabhūtaṃ gṛham eva tatparatantreṇābhāvena viśeṣyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13216: śakyate hi tena caitrādhiṣṭhitaikadeśavyatiriktajagadvyāpinā gṛhaṃ vyāptum. alpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13217: tu gṛhaṃ na mahāviṣayam abhāvaṃ vyāptuṃ śaknoti. ato yathā vyāpyasya dhūmasyāgniviśiṣṭatvam avagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13218: anenāpi prakāreṇa gṛham evābhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ bahirbhāvasya liṅgam ity āpatati. tac ca
GSP28mimsvtku:13219: tadabhāvaviśiṣṭagṛhaṃ na kathañcic caitrabahirdeśābhyāṃ sambadhyate. abhāvasya tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:13220: kathañcid asti caitrānvayaḥ. caitrābhāva iti hi sa pratīyate. gṛhaṃ tu na kathañcic
GSP28mimsvtku:13221: caitrasambaddham avagamyate ity apakṣadharma ity āha -- tadabhāveti. itaś ca gṛhābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:13222: na pakṣadharma ity āha -- gṛhābhāveti. gṛhīte hi pakṣe taddharmapratyayo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:13223: na ca caitrabahirdeśau gṛhe 'sattayā gamyete iti // 12 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13224: {3,166} gṛham eva tu tatra pratyakṣāvagatam iti taddharmapratītir evābhāve bhavatīty āha -- gamyate tu gṛham iti. na hi tatra gṛha eva caitro
GSP28mimsvtku:13225: abhāvavirodhād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tatreti. adarśanaṃ hi caitrasambaddham avagatam iti talliṅgaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na cātreti. na ca darśanābhāvo bahirbhāve liṅgam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13227: ato gṛhe 'darśanam api na hetur ity āha -- teneti. kiñ ca gṛhābhāvāvadhāraṇopakṣīṇe 'darśane bahirbhāvamatir bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13228: katham asau taddhetukā bhaviyiṣyatīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- adarśanād iti. abhiprāyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13229: vivṛṇoti -- nāsāv iti. adarśanāvadhāritasya caitrabhāvasyaivānyatrānupayuktasya hetutvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13230: sambhavati. taccāpakṣadharmatayā nirākṛtam ity āha -- caitrābhāvasyeti // 14 -- 15 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13231: evaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmatā nirākṛtā pakṣo 'py atrānumānāt pūrvaṃ nopalakṣyata ity āha -- pūrvaṃ na ceti // 16 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13232: {3,167} atra codayati -- nadīti. atra hy apratipanna evoparideśe pakṣe 'taddharmaḥ pūro liṅgaṃ tadvad ihāpi bhaviṣyatīti // 17 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13233: pariharati -- vṛṣṭimad iti. evaṃ tv anumīyamāne lokavirodhaḥ. na hy evaṃ laukikā
GSP28mimsvtku:13234: budhyante. ata āha -- yad veti. dṛṣṭasya nadīpūrasya kāraṇābhāvānupapattyopariṣṭād
GSP28mimsvtku:13236: paramārthena tu vyāptibalottham idam anumānam eva. na cāpakṣadharmatādoṣaḥ. uparideśasya pūrasambaddhadeśasambandhāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:13238: itaś ca gṛhābhāvo na bahirbhāve liṅgam ity āha -- jīvataś ceti. niścitarūpaṃ hi liṅgam
GSP28mimsvtku:13239: anumāne gamakam. iha ca yo 'yaṃ jīvato gṛhābhāvaḥ sa pramāṇāntaravirodhān niścetum
GSP28mimsvtku:13240: eva na śakyate. evaṃ hi tatra bhavati vitarkaḥ. jīvatā hi kvacid bhavitavyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13241: katham iha na syāt. evaṃ cānadhyavasāyād apratiṣṭhito gṛhābhāvo 'siddhatvād aliṅgam. siddhis tu nānantarbhāvya bahirbhāvam asya bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13242: tadantarbhāve ca parastāt prameyābhāva iti bhāvaḥ // 19 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13243: anumāne tv anapekṣitaprameyam eva dhūmādiliṅgasya svarūpaṃ siddham avagamyata ity āha -- agnimatteti // 20 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13244: yadi tv ihāpi hetor anapekṣatvasiddhyarthaṃ gṛhābhāvamātram aviśeṣitaṃ jīvanena hetur iṣyate tato naikāntika ity āha -- geheti // 21 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13245: {3,168} kathaṃ ca vidyamānatvaviśiṣṭo gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ sādhayati kathaṃ ca śuddho
GSP28mimsvtku:13246: nety ubhayatra kāraṇam āha -- vidyamānatveti dvayena. vidyamānatvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭagṛhābhāvabuddhau
GSP28mimsvtku:13247: hi yāvad vidyamānatvasya viṣayo nāvasthāpyate tāvadabhāvaḥ pratyetum eva na śakyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13248: tad yadā bhāvapratipakṣeṇābhāvena gṛham avaruddhaṃ tadā tatra tāvac caitrasya bhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:13249: bhavituṃ na prabhavatīty āśrayāpekṣayā pāriśeṣyād bahir eva bhavatīti. śuddhābhāvapratītau
GSP28mimsvtku:13251: nanu ca niścitasadbhāvasya caitrasya gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvam antarbhāvya siddhyet.
GSP28mimsvtku:13252: sandigdhasadbhāvasya tv anapekṣitabahirbhāva eva taṃ gamayiṣyatīty ata āha -- siddha
GSP28mimsvtku:13254: na tarhi tadbahirbhāvāvagatiḥ prasidhyet. asandigdha eva tu sadbhāvavijñāne 'bhāvena gehād utkālitā -- utsāritā tatsattā bahirbhavati niyamena,
GSP28mimsvtku:13255: itarathā tatrāpi sandeha eva bhavet. etena gṛhābhāvāpāditasandehaṃ vidyamānatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:13256: eva bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayatīti yair uktaṃ tannirākṛtam iti veditavyam. idaṃ ca prāyevoktam
GSP28mimsvtku:13258: ataḥ siddhaṃ jīvananirapekṣasyābhāvasya vyabhicāraḥ avyabhicāriṇaś ca prameyānupraveśadvāraṇaiva samarthanam iti dhūmād ivailakṣaṇyān na liṅgatvam ity āha -- teneti // 25 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13259: {3,169} evam anumānād bhedaṃ prasādhitum upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. anumānād bahirbhūtam idaṃ pramāṇaṃ sthitam iti // 26 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13260: tad evaṃ gṛhābhāvasya prameyānupraveśanasiddhau yadi talliṅgam iṣyate tato duruttaram itaretarāśrayatvam āpadyata ity āha -- pakṣeti dvayena
GSP28mimsvtku:13262: kathaṃ hi pramāṇāntarāpāditānupapattir anavasthito gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ gamayiṣyaty
GSP28mimsvtku:13263: ata āha -- anyatheti. dvedhā hy anupapannam -- kiñcid anupapannam eva yan na kathañcid
GSP28mimsvtku:13265: kiñcic cāsati kalpane 'nupapannam. tatra yad ekāntam anupapannaṃ tadupekṣyata eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:13266: yat tu kalpite kasmiṃścid upapadyate anyathā nopapadyate tadupapattir anyakalpanayāvasīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:13267: evam eva hi sarvalaukikaparīkṣakā budhyante. na ca viparyayo deśāntarādiṣu dṛṣṭaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:13268: ataḥ pramāṇam evedam. yathā cānumāne niścitarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13269: evam ihāpi kenacit pramāṇenāvagataṃ pramāṇāntareṇotthāpitavitarkam. na cātrānyataratrāpi prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13270: kin tu niścitaprāmāṇyayor eva dvayos samarthanāpekṣāmātraṃ katham idam ubhayam upapadyatām
GSP28mimsvtku:13271: iti. ṣoḍaśina iva grahaṇāgrahaṇaśāstrayoḥ. na tatraikaparityāgenetarad upapādayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13272: śakyate. ato yathā tatra katham idam ubhayam upapadyatām ity apekṣite prayogabhedenobhayam upapādyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13273: evam ihāpi pramāṇapratipannam ubhayaṃ niścitasadbhāvam arthāntaraparikalpanayā{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13274: 170}samarthyate. tādrūpyeṇaiva pratibhānāt. vilakṣaṇāni hi pramāṇāni vilakṣaṇasāmagrīkāṇi. ata eva parasparato bhidyante. aprāmāṇyakāraṇāni ca saṃśayaviparyayāvajñānaṃ vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:13275: tac cārthāpattāv api nāstīti katham apramāṇatā. katham ajñātasambandhāt pratītiḥ pramāṇam iti cet. na sambandhaḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13276: api tu bādhavirahaḥ. sa cehāpy aviśiṣṭa iti na kaścid doṣo 'rthāpattāv asmākaṃ pratibhātīti // 29 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13277: nanu gṛhābhāvo nāntareṇa bahirbhāvam upapadyate ato nāntarīyakaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13279: ato 'numānam evedaṃ bahirbhāvajñānam ata āha -- avineti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nāntarīyakārthadarśanaṃ tadvido 'numānam iti kecit paṭhanti,
GSP28mimsvtku:13280: teṣām api tadvido nāntarīyakatāvida eva nāntarīyakadarśanam anumānam abhipretam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13281: na ceha nāntareṇa bahirbhāvaṃ gṛhābhāvo bhavatīti prāgavagatam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13282: tadaiva hy arthāpattyā bahirbhāvaṃ parikalpyāyamanena vinā na bhavatīty avinābhāvitā kalpyate. atas sā svarūpasaty api na pūrvam avagateti na jñānotpattau kāraṇam iti // 30 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13283: nanv avagatasambandhasya tarhy anumānaṃ syād ata āha -- gṛhābhāveti tāntena. na tāvanniyamena sarvair eva dvayos sāhityam avagatam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13284: aviditasāhityasya tāvat siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaram ity abhiprāyaḥ. yenāpi tayos sāhityam avagataṃ tasyāpi nāgṛhītayos tayos sāhityagrahaḥ sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13285: na ca tayor ekagrahaṇe 'paradarśanam arthāpattyā vinā sambhavati. anyathānupapattyaiva tv ekena gṛhābhāvena{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13286: 171}bahirbhāvena vā tayor ekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ. evaṃ cākalpyamāne nyatarasya sambandhino 'gṛhītatvāt sāhityapratītir eva na syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:13287: atas sāhityārtham arthāpattir arthanīyeti siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaram ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pramāṇaṃ ceti pratīyate 'ntena. abhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti -- teneti // 31 -- 33 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13288: nanu ca nāvaśyam arthāpattyaivānyataras sambandhī grahītavyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13289: śakyate hi gṛhadvārāvasthitenābhāvapratyakṣābhyām ubhayaṃ viditvā sambandho 'nubhavitum,
GSP28mimsvtku:13290: tathā viditasambandhāc ca gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvānumānam ity āśaṅkate tāvat -- gṛhadvārīti // 34 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13291: atrottaram āha -- tadāpīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- sidhyaty evaṃ gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvānumānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13292: na punar evam eva sarveṣām avagatiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13293: agṛhītasambandhānām api pratītibhāvāt. eṣo 'pi ca prakāro naikatra bhāvena sarvatrābhāvāvagame sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13294: na hi jagadabhāvenaikatra bhāvo 'nvitaś śakyo 'vagantum. jagadabhāvasya pratyetum
GSP28mimsvtku:13295: aśakyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. nanv evaṃ tadāvagataṃ yadāyam ekatra bhavati tadā paratra
GSP28mimsvtku:13296: tatsamīpe na bhavatīti. evaṃ ca viditavyāpter ekadeśabhāne sarvatrābhāvānumānaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:13297: ata āha -- na ceti. na hy ekadeśanāstitayā trailokyābhāvena hetor vyāptis sidhyatīti // 35 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13302: 172}nupalabhyamāno nāstīti niścīyate. evam ekatra san sarvatra nopalabhyata iti sarvatraiva nāstīti śakyam avagantum. na hi darśanavadadarśanam api prayatnam apekṣate,
GSP28mimsvtku:13303: darśanaṃ hi kāryaṃ svakāraṇam arthendriyasannikarṣādyapekṣamāṇam ekatra sato na sarvatra sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13304: darśanābhāvas tu na kiñcid apekṣata iti codayati -- nanv atreti. atrety ekadeśaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13305: parāmṛśati. atra khalv ekadeśe 'nupalabdhito 'vidyamānatvam avagamyate. tac ca sarvatrāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:13307: atra parihāram āha -- naitayeti. kim iti na pratīyate ata āha -- taddeśeti. upalabdhiyogyasya hy anupalabdhir abhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13308: dūrastheṣu tvayogyatvād eva satsv apy anupalabdhis sambhavatīti nābhāvaniścaya iti // 37 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13311: na cedaṃ śakyakaraṇam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- gatvā gatveti // 38 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13312: atra codayati -- nanu ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvad vipakṣād avyāvṛtto hetur gamakaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:13313: na ca sarve vipakṣā gatvopalabdhuṃ śakyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:13314: ato 'vaśyam ekadeśasthasyaivānupalabdhyā vipakṣād hetor vyatireko grahītavyaḥ. tadvad
GSP28mimsvtku:13315: ihāpi bhaviṣyatīti. dhūmādayaś ca te vyatirekiṇaś ceti dhūmādivyatirekiṇaḥ. agnyādyabhāve
GSP28mimsvtku:13316: ye vyatirekiṇo dhūmādayas teṣām agnyādyabhāvadeśāgamanād vyatireko na sidhyatīti // 39 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13317: {3,173} pariharati -- yasyeti. vyatirekapradhānavādino hi bauddhasyāsati vipakṣād vyatirekagrahaṇe na hetur gamako bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13319: agnyāder vastuno 'nyasyānagnyāder abhāva iti yāvat. sa hi sarvānagnivyatirekam antareṇa na sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:13321: anvayamātraniyamena. sa ca vipakṣādarśanamātreṇa dvitrair eva darśanaiḥ sidhyatīti // 40 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13322: nanv anvayavādino 'py ajātātivṛttapratyutpannānantadeśavartivahnisahacaritadhūmadarśanaṃ durlabham eva. atha katipayāgnisāhityadarśanādevāsahitāvagatā api vahnayo 'numīyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:13323: evaṃ tarhīhāpi caitrābhāvasya jagadvartina ekadeśabhāvena sambandha upapadyata eva. atrāpi hy ekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tadabhāvo dṛṣṭa
GSP28mimsvtku:13324: tāvatā ca sarvatrābhāvo 'numāsyata ity āha -- nanv evam iti // 41 //
GSP28mimsvtku:13325: atra parihāram āha -- sāhitya iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na hi no vyaktiviṣayam anumānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13327: ākṛtyoś ca prativyaktikṛtsnasamavāyāt sulabham eva sāhityadarśanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:13328: sakṛddarśanenaiva hy ākṛtyos sāhityam avagamyate. ata eva dvitrādidarśanam api vyabhicārāśaṅkāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:13329: niyamārtham abhyarthyate. avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā -- kim ayam aupādhikas
GSP28mimsvtku:13330: saṃsargo dhūmasyāgninā saha āhosvit sahaja eveti,
GSP28mimsvtku:13332: iti bhavati matiḥ. agnes tu prathamam avagatasambandhasyāpi dhūmena darśanāntare
GSP28mimsvtku:13333: vyabhicāradarśanādārderndhanādir upādhir anupraviśati. na ca deśādibhede vyabhicārāśaṅkā,
GSP28mimsvtku:13334: sakṛddarśanāvadhāritasāhacaryayor hi dvayor apy agnes tāvad vyabhicāro dṛṣṭo{3,
GSP28mimsvtku:13336: asyāpi hi dvitricaturair eva darśanair vyabhicāro dṛśyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:13337: na ca dṛśyate. ato 'gnyanvitasvabhāvo 'yam iti niścīyate. yasya tv evam apy anāśvāsaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:13338: tasya sarvapramāṇeṣv eva kvacid vyabhicāradarśanād anāśvāsaḥ syāt. vipakṣavyatireko
GSP28mimsvtku:13339: 'pi caivam arthād eva siddho bhavati. sa hi prathamam anvicchato vipakṣadeśānām anantatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:13340: durlabho bhavati. svabhāvaniyame tu jñāte svabhāvasyāvyabhicārāt sulabho vyatirekaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:13341: na hi svābhāvikam uṣṇatvam antareṇa kvacit kadācid agnir bhavatīti kaścid āśaṅkate.
GSP28mimsvtku:13343: ekadeśabhāvajagadabhāvayos tu naivaṃ sāhityajñānaṃ bhavatīty āha -- iheti. eko hy atra sarvatrābhāvas sahabhāvyanantadeśavartī,
GSP28mimsvtku:13346: atra codayati -- nanv iti. anumānena deśāntarābhāvaś caitrasya pratīyate. evaṃ hy anumāsyate. parokṣās sarvabhūmayaś caitrābhāvasambandhāḥ,
